T03D3805:1b-1: a'arya aashta sa ha sri ka pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a ma rma koo mi ta n'a ma /
T03D3805:1b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:1b-4: brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad [dd] kyi zla ba'i
T03D3805:1b-6: bcom ldan 'das mi pham mgon po la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3805:1b-7: gang zhig 'od zer snying gi mun las rgyal nas spros med lnga po phung por gyur pa ste //
T03D3805:1b-8: gang la shar na sems kyi rtog pa'i rnyog pa bsal bar gyur nas sa la longs spyod pa //
T03D3805:1b-9: de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba 'gro la bskyed phyir bsam mi khyab pa'i sku sprul pa'i //
T03D3805:1b-10: shes rab pha rol phyin pa srid par 'khyams pa 'jig byed de la gus par phyag 'tshal nas //
T03D3805:1b-11: yid kyi dri ma bshig cing lta ba ngan pa 'joms byed la //
T03D3805:1b-12: skye ba'i rnyog pa'i yal ga ma lus nges par drung 'byin la //
T03D3805:1b-13: che mchog rtog med rdzogs sangs sa na gnyis med lam gnyen gyi //
T03D3805:1b-14: 'od zer brtse bas brlan char ji lta bur na ston pa yi //
T03D3805:1b-15: gang yang 'phags pa mi pham bstan bcos de nyid bral ba'i gzhung gis kun tu tshim min pas //
T03D3805:2a-0: @2a * // yum gyi gnad las phyir phyogs log pa'i lam gyis skye bo phal che yun rings 'khyams gyur pas //
T03D3805:2a-1: de phyir nang gi mun pas khyab pa'i rgyun gyis 'phrog byed bstan bcos snying po la reg pa'i //
T03D3805:2a-2: legs gsungs sbyangs pa'i bdud rtsi'i gter ldan bdag gis de gnad yang dag gsal byed zla 'od spro //
T03D3805:2a-3: 'dir nges par bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa rab
T03D3805:2a-4: 'byam mang po dpag tu med cing rnam pa sna
T03D3805:2a-5: tshogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa phan tshun
T03D3805:2a-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa
T03D3805:2a-8: dag gis kun tu rtog pa'i dra ba mtha' dag
T03D3805:2a-9: skye ba'i rgyun drungs phyung nas mu med pa'i phyogs
T03D3805:2a-10: thams cad kyi khams gsum pa rnams kyi srog chags
T03D3805:2a-11: dpag tu med pa rnams kyi so so'i sems skad
T03D3805:2a-12: cig la gzigs nas mchog tu brtse ba chen po'i
T03D3805:2a-13: gzhan gyi dbang gi ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa
T03D3805:2a-14: de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyis rtogs
T03D3805:2a-15: par bzhed nas bstan pa ji lta ba de lta
T03D3805:2a-16: bur sdud pa pos bsdus pa ni /
T03D3805:2a-17: 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:2a-18: mngon par bstod do zhes bya ba'i bar gyis te 'di nyid du zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:2a-19: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes
T03D3805:2a-20: pa la sogs pa ni sdud pa po'i rang bzo
T03D3805:2b-0: ma yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi @2b bka' nyid
T03D3805:2b-1: du bshed de / chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs pa /
T03D3805:2b-2: 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes byas nas chos bsdu bar bya'o //
T03D3805:2b-3: de bzhin du 'bral ba dang go rims kyis bshad do zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
T03D3805:2b-4: 'di sdud pa po ni lcang lo can na bzhugs
T03D3805:2b-5: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bcu'i dbang phyug
T03D3805:2b-7: de yang bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3805:2b-8: rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku dang chos kyi sku srung
T03D3805:2b-9: bar dbang bskur nas rting la rjes su gshegs zhes
T03D3805:2b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bstan pa'i mdo las
T03D3805:2b-11: bshad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur
T03D3805:2b-12: ba'i mdo las bstan pa so sor gtad pas so
T03D3805:2b-13: bshad pa dang / // gang yang 'phags pa kun
T03D3805:2b-14: dga' bo la yongs su gtad pa de ni nyan
T03D3805:2b-15: thos rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten pa la spyod par
T03D3805:2b-16: byed pa'i don du yin gyi //
T03D3805:2b-17: chos sdud pa'i don du ni ma yin no //
T03D3805:2b-18: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa dang /
T03D3805:2b-19: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes 'jig rten thams cad
T03D3805:2b-20: rjes su gzung ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:2b-21: tu phyin pa bsdu bar 'dod nas /
T03D3805:2b-22: 'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3805:2b-23: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs rnams la 'di skad
T03D3805:2b-24: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs te /
T03D3805:2b-25: ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa po las thos
T03D3805:2b-26: pa cig kyang rjes su brjod cing de bzhin du
T03D3805:2b-27: yang las gzhan yang nyan par byed do zhes pa
T03D3805:2b-28: ni sdud pa por brjod do //
T03D3805:2b-29: bsdus pa'i rjes la dus der gnas pa nyid na /
T03D3805:2b-30: mchog tu zab cing rjes su rtogs par dka' la
T03D3805:2b-31: rtogs par mi nus zhes pas thugs rjes de rtogs
T03D3805:2b-32: pa'i don du 'phags pa byams pas mngon par rtogs
T03D3805:2b-33: pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le 'ur byas pa'i bstan bcos
T03D3805:2b-35: 'phags pa thogs med kyis byas nas dus phyis byas
T03D3805:2b-36: zhes pa ni seng ge bzang po la sogs pa
T03D3805:2b-38: sngon du byas pa la ma bshad ces pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:2b-39: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:2b-40: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par 'byed par 'dod nas
T03D3805:2b-41: / mchog tu bla ma rnams kyi yang bla na med pa ni bla ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:2b-42: rab tu dang bas phyag 'tshal ba shin tu don che ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:3a-0: rnam par bshad par bya ba'i mdo sde rin po che brjod @3a * //
T03D3805:3a-1: par bya ba'i phyir na de nyid la dang po phyag 'tshal ba ni /
T03D3805:3a-2: nyan thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang //
T03D3805:3a-3: 'gro la phan par byed rnams lam shes nyid kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang //
T03D3805:3a-4: gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams sna tshogs rnam pa 'di dag kun gsung ba'i //
T03D3805:3a-5: nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi yum de la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3805:3a-6: ci ste nye bar zhi ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3805:3a-7: thar bar 'tshal ba'i nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bsdu ste /
T03D3805:3a-8: de dag gi theg pa las khyad par chung ba'i
T03D3805:3a-9: phyir na rim pa gcig tu bstan pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:3a-10: // 'gro la phan par byed pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:3a-11: rnam pa 'di dag sna tshogs zhes pa ni thub pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi chos so //
T03D3805:3a-12: gang dang ldan pas rnam pa 'di dag kun gsung
T03D3805:3a-13: zhes pa 'dis ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3805:3a-14: nyid kyi ngo bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:3a-15: phyin par gsal bar byas la /
T03D3805:3a-16: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:3a-17: gang phung po lnga rnams mi rtag par rnam par shes pa'i slob ma dang bse ru dag dang /
T03D3805:3a-18: gang yang slob ma dang bse ru de rnams kyi dang /
T03D3805:3a-19: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rnam pa rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T03D3805:3a-20: gang yang de rnams kyis rtogs pa'i rnam pa de
T03D3805:3a-21: rnams mkhyen pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:3a-23: de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'o //
T03D3805:3a-24: sangs rgyas kyi zhes pa ni bskyed pa nyid la gcig pa'i tshig go //
T03D3805:3a-25: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste /
T03D3805:3a-26: ji skad du bshad pa'i don chen po thob par byed pas so //
T03D3805:3a-27: de thob nas kyang zag pa med pa'i phung po
T03D3805:3a-28: lnga'i bdag nyid can du bdag gis dngos po bskyed
T03D3805:3a-29: pa dang rgyas par byed do //
T03D3805:3a-30: de bas na yul 'dzin pa por rtogs par bya'o //
T03D3805:3a-31: de ltar kun mkhyen pa gsum gyis mngon par rtogs
T03D3805:3a-32: pa gzhan lnga po rnams bsdus pa'i brgyad car gyi
T03D3805:3a-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang
T03D3805:3a-34: zhes bya ste / de nyid chung ngu dang 'bring
T03D3805:3b-0: dang chen @3b po'i rtogs pa pa'i dbye ba la
T03D3805:3b-1: zhes bya ste / dgongs nas / kun mkhyen pa gsum gyi sgo nas phyag 'tshal nas /
T03D3805:3b-2: gzhan gdul bya 'jug pa'i yan lag brjod par bya
T03D3805:3b-3: ba la sogs pa brjod par 'dod pas gsungs pa
T03D3805:3b-4: ni / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam //
T03D3805:3b-5: ston pas 'dir ni bshad pa gang //
T03D3805:3b-6: blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur gyi //
T03D3805:3b-7: gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin zhes //
T03D3805:3b-8: chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid can //
T03D3805:3b-9: mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas //
T03D3805:3b-10: bde blag tu ni rtogs 'gyur ba //
T03D3805:3b-11: zhes bya rtsom pa'i dgos pa'o //
T03D3805:3b-13: bgrod par bya bas lam zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:3b-14: gtso bo ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:3b-15: 'bras bu sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku ste
T03D3805:3b-16: / ji skad du mdo sde rgyan las /
T03D3805:3b-17: sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa yi //
T03D3805:3b-18: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen thob pa'i //
T03D3805:3b-19: rin chen sgrom phye lta bu la //
T03D3805:3b-20: sangs rgyas nyid du yang dag brjod //
T03D3805:3b-22: 'dis bgrod par byed ces pas na lam rnams sangs
T03D3805:3b-23: rgyas nyid kyi rgyu phal pa'i rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:3b-24: mkhyen pa nyid de khongs su ji ltar rigs par
T03D3805:3b-25: mngon par rtogs pa drug 'dus pa'o //
T03D3805:3b-26: de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can gyi
T03D3805:3b-27: mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi ngo bo'i lam shes
T03D3805:3b-28: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo sde rin
T03D3805:3b-29: po che rjod par byed pa'i brjod par bya ba
T03D3805:3b-30: de byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa rnams kyis
T03D3805:3b-31: khong du mi chud pas na blo dang ldan pa
T03D3805:3b-32: ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams so //
T03D3805:3b-33: mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhes pa ni dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'o //
T03D3805:3b-34: de yang mdo'i don ji skad du bshad pa'i brjod
T03D3805:3b-35: par bya ba thos pa nyid bsam pas dran pa
T03D3805:3b-36: la bzhag cing / chos ni sems bskyed pa dang
T03D3805:3b-37: gdams ngag la sogs pa rnam pa bcu'i khongs su
T03D3805:3b-38: gtogs pa'i mngon par rtogs pa brgyad rab tu phye
T03D3805:3b-39: ba de'i spyod pa spyad pa rnams kyis bde blag
T03D3805:3b-40: tu rjes su gnas par 'gyur zhes brjod par bya
T03D3805:3b-41: ba thob pa byed pa'i thabs la rjes su gnas
T03D3805:3b-42: pa ni mdo brtsam pa'i dgos pa'o //
T03D3805:3b-43: 'brel pa ni brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3805:3b-44: bsgrub par bya ba dang sgrub par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid de go sla ba kho na'o //
T03D3805:3b-45: 'di skad ces bya ba ni ji lta ba bzhin du bsdu bar bya zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:4a-1: gzhi'i go skabs yin gyi nye bar bsdu ba ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:4a-2: mdo sde'i lus nyid 'di skad du'o //
T03D3805:4a-3: bdag gis ni mngon sum du thos pa ste /
T03D3805:4a-4: bla ma las phan tshun brgyud pas ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:4a-5: de ltar 'dir gleng bslang ba bstan pa'i rjes su
T03D3805:4a-6: gleng gzhi dang dus gang dang yul dang ston pa
T03D3805:4a-8: de la dus gcig na zhes pa nas brtsams te
T03D3805:4a-9: ji srid du kun dga' bo zhes pa'i bar ni
T03D3805:4a-10: go skabs la / de nas yang zhes pa la
T03D3805:4a-11: sogs pas nye bar bsdu ba bcom ldan 'das kyis
T03D3805:4a-12: de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes pa la sogs
T03D3805:4a-13: pa'i lhag ma ma lus pa ni mdo sde'i lus
T03D3805:4a-14: go skabs la / so // ci'i phyir bcom ldan
T03D3805:4a-15: 'das kyis 'di nyid gsungs zhes ma bstan pa ni
T03D3805:4a-16: bcom ldan 'das la rnam par rtog pa med pas
T03D3805:4a-17: don dam par ni bstan pa mi srid ces pa
T03D3805:4a-18: go skabs la / so // la dgongs la /
T03D3805:4a-19: bstan pa'i snang ba ni gdul bya rnams kyi bsod
T03D3805:4a-20: nams dang bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam
T03D3805:4a-22: gang du byas pa dang thos pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ste /
T03D3805:4a-23: dus gcig ni dus gcig la ste 'dis ni gdul
T03D3805:4a-24: bya rnams chos 'di la gus pa bskyed pa'i don
T03D3805:4a-25: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lan cig gsungs pa
T03D3805:4a-26: la bdag nyid thos pa 'dzin pa nyid du gsal
T03D3805:4a-27: dang / bar byas pa'o // bdud bzhi bcom pa dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das te /
T03D3805:4a-28: nges par brjod pa lan phyi ma'o //
T03D3805:4a-29: yang na bdud bzhi po rnams shes rab kyis bcom pas na bcom pa ste /
T03D3805:4a-30: byed pa'i nges pa'i tshig lan phyi ma'o //
T03D3805:4a-31: 'byed par byed ces pas bcom pa ste /
T03D3805:4a-32: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de dang ldan pas na bcom ldan 'das sam /
T03D3805:4a-33: mngon par bstan zhes pas bcom ldan 'das sam /
T03D3805:4a-34: bstan par byed pa la ni rgyu rnams kho na byed pa nyid rnam par 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4a-35: de yang tshogs pa dbang phyug dang gzugs bzang dang
T03D3805:4a-36: grags pa dang dpal dang ye shes dang brtson 'grus
T03D3805:4a-37: dang drug go // de la dbang phyug ni gzhan dbang ma yin pa ste /
T03D3805:4a-38: bcom ldan 'das de'i tshogs pas bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4a-39: gzugs kyi tshogs pa ni bla na med pa'i mtshan
T03D3805:4b-0: dang dpe byad kyis lham me ba'i @4b ska'i phyir
T03D3805:4b-1: ro // grags pa'i tshogs pa ni phyogs su sgra chen po'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4b-2: gang yang phun sum tshogs pa mang po gang gi
T03D3805:4b-3: rten du gyur pa de ni dpal gyi tshogs pa
T03D3805:4b-4: ste / 'jig rten pa thams cad la 'jig rten
T03D3805:4b-5: las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa'i 'dod pa rnams
T03D3805:4b-6: kyi dpal du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4b-7: ye shes kyi tshogs pa ni thams cad nas rnam
T03D3805:4b-8: pa thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la dag cing
T03D3805:4b-9: ma chags shing ma thogs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir
T03D3805:4b-10: ro // brtson 'grus kyi tshogs pa ni rnam pa
T03D3805:4b-11: thams cad du gzhan gyi don la rtag par mi
T03D3805:4b-12: dga' ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4b-13: bzhugs so zhes pa ni 'dir so sor sdud par
T03D3805:4b-14: byed cing sems can 'dis 'dren par byed ces pas
T03D3805:4b-15: cho 'phrul la / cho 'phrul de nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:4b-17: gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang /
T03D3805:4b-18: zag pa zad pa shes pa'o //
T03D3805:4b-19: de la rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi
T03D3805:4b-20: cho 'phrul gyis 'jig rten las 'das shing rmad du
T03D3805:4b-21: byung ba'i chos ston pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:4b-22: kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul gyis ni sems kyi bag
T03D3805:4b-23: la nyal yongs su mkhyen nas dge ba'i rtsa ba
T03D3805:4b-24: rgyas pa'i tshul gyis yongs su smin par byed pa'i
T03D3805:4b-25: phyir dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis
T03D3805:4b-26: ni theg pa gsum gyi gdul bya'i sems can rnams
T03D3805:4b-27: khyad par du dran pa la sogs pa byas nas
T03D3805:4b-28: mngon par 'dod pa'i don byed pa'i spyod lam rnam
T03D3805:4b-29: pa bzhis gnas shing bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3805:4b-30: de la sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad du sku'i phrin las ni spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3805:4b-31: thams cad ni gsung gi phrin las ni chos ston pas bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3805:4b-32: gang rang bzhin gyis mnyam par bzhag pa dang /
T03D3805:4b-33: gang yang ting nge 'dzin mngon du byed pa'i de gnyis char thugs kyi phrin las te /
T03D3805:4b-34: de gnyis char snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3805:4b-35: gang sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sems can rnams la
T03D3805:4b-36: kun tu gzugs pa nyid dang der nye bar 'gro
T03D3805:4b-37: ba'i sems can la dmigs pa'i thugs kyi phrin las
T03D3805:4b-38: de gnyis char nang du yang dag par 'jog pa
T03D3805:4b-39: la gnas par rnams par gzhag par bya ste /
T03D3805:4b-40: 'jig rten la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:4b-41: rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba ni rgyal po chen
T03D3805:4b-42: po mang pos bkur ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang gi
T03D3805:4b-43: 'khor gyi grong khyer chen po ste /
T03D3805:5a-1: sa phyogs su bya rgod phung po ste /
T03D3805:5a-2: rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin la /
T03D3805:5a-3: ri ni lha la sogs pa rnams kyis dus tshigs ltad mo gsal bar byed pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:5a-4: mchod rten du gyur pas sems can rnams kyi bsod
T03D3805:5a-5: nams kyi tshogs nye bar sogs pa'i don du gnas
T03D3805:5a-6: bstan pa'o // ci'i phyir rgyal po'i khab tu bstan ce na /
T03D3805:5a-7: mang pos bkur ba chen po'i grong khyer chen po'i gnas nyid bzhin du /
T03D3805:5a-8: mdo sde 'di chos kyi rgyal po chen por sems can la gsal ba'i don du /
T03D3805:5a-9: 'dir yang mdo sde bstan pa gang bcom ldan 'das ma la rab tu bzhugs pa'o //
T03D3805:5a-10: ci'i phyir bya rgod phung po zhe na /
T03D3805:5a-11: nyan pa po rnams kyi bstan pa la ring nas
T03D3805:5a-12: mngon par 'phags pa nyid kyi gsal ba'i don du'o
T03D3805:5a-13: // chen po zhes bya ba ni yon tan dang grangs kyis che ba'i dag gis so //
T03D3805:5a-14: nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyid kyis dge slong ni dgra bcom pa ste /
T03D3805:5a-15: de 'dir ma bzung bas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'phags
T03D3805:5a-16: pa kun dga' bo ma gzung bas na thal bar
T03D3805:5a-17: 'gyur bas / cung zhig gang bsnyen par rdzogs pa de 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
T03D3805:5a-18: dge slong rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi tshogs te /
T03D3805:5a-19: de ci ltar dge 'dun zhe na /
T03D3805:5a-20: dkon mchog gsum la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis mi phyed pa nyid kyi ste /
T03D3805:5a-21: kun tu bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:5a-22: de la grangs kyi che ba nyid ni phyed ces te /
T03D3805:5a-23: brgya phrag phyed ma tshang ba'i brgya phrag bcu gsum mo //
T03D3805:5a-24: 'dir thams cad ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig bco
T03D3805:5a-25: lngas ni yon tan gyi che ba nyid brjod do
T03D3805:5a-26: // dgra ni nyon mongs pa ste de bcom pas dgra bcom pa'am /
T03D3805:5a-27: bsgrub pa'i mchod pa yang dag pas de bzhin gshegs
T03D3805:5a-28: pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing mchod par byed
T03D3805:5a-30: yang na lha dang mi rnams kyis mchod pa dang
T03D3805:5a-31: yon tan gyi 'os su gyur pas na mchod 'os
T03D3805:5a-32: so // de bzhin du dgra bcom pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:5a-33: yon tan thabs cig pa nyid brjod pa ni srid
T03D3805:5a-34: pa'i rtse mo dang mnar med pa'i bar du kun
T03D3805:5a-35: tu zag pa byed cing skyed par byed pa'i ji
T03D3805:5a-36: srid du sems can rnams kyis dge ba g-yo ba'i
T03D3805:5a-38: de la ma rig pa ma rtogs pa 'dod pa
T03D3805:5a-39: na kun tu spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ni
T03D3805:5b-1: gzugs dang gzugs med na kun tu spyod pa ni srid pa'i zag pa'o //
T03D3805:5b-2: khams gsum pa can gyi lhan cig skyes pa dang
T03D3805:5b-3: kun tu brtags pa'i ma rig pa dang lta ba
T03D3805:5b-4: drug cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa de ni ma
T03D3805:5b-6: 'di rnams zad pas na zag pa zad pa'o //
T03D3805:5b-7: zag pa zad pa nyid kyi rnam par dag pa'i yon gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:5b-8: nyon mongs pa med ces pa ste kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3805:5b-9: las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ste
T03D3805:5b-10: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gang gis nyon
T03D3805:5b-12: gang nyon mongs par byed cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3805:5b-13: gang du nyon mongs pa de rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:5b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams nyon mongs
T03D3805:5b-15: pa med pa nyid la sdug bsngal med pas de'i
T03D3805:5b-16: yon tan gsungs pa ni dbang du gyur pa zhes
T03D3805:5b-17: pa ste / ji ltar rdzu 'phrul la dbang bas
T03D3805:5b-18: sems can dang snod dag la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir
T03D3805:5b-19: pa ste / ro // dbang po la dbang bas
T03D3805:5b-20: spyod lam nye bar zhi nas de rnams kyis 'jig
T03D3805:5b-21: rten la dbang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:5b-22: ting nge 'dzin la dbang bas ni sems de rnams dbang du byed pa la 'jog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:5b-23: shes rab la dbang bas ni nyon mongs pa dang
T03D3805:5b-24: las dang rnam par smin pa thams cad kun tu
T03D3805:5b-25: bcad nas 'ching ba las rnam par grol ba rnams
T03D3805:5b-26: par grol ba rnams bzhin du rang nyid la dbang
T03D3805:5b-28: sems shin tu rnam par grol bas na sems shin tu rnam par grol ba ste /
T03D3805:5b-29: srid pa'i phyogs kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i
T03D3805:5b-30: nyon mongs pa spong zhing thob par bya ba'i ting
T03D3805:5b-31: nge 'dzin rnams la snyoms par 'jug pa ni sems
T03D3805:5b-33: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba ni shes
T03D3805:5b-34: rab rnam par grol bas ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi
T03D3805:5b-35: rnyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams
T03D3805:5b-36: cad spong bar gyur zhing dgra bcom pa'i lam gyi
T03D3805:5b-37: ye shes thob pa ni shes rab rnam par grol
T03D3805:5b-38: ba'o // cang shes pa ni 'jigs pa rnams med pa ste /
T03D3805:5b-39: 'jigs pa'i dogs pa rnam pa bzhi med pas go
T03D3805:5b-40: rims ji lta ba bzhin du bde ba rnyed pa
T03D3805:5b-41: 'jigs pa med pa rnyed pa bag tsha ba med
T03D3805:5b-42: pa rnyed pa dbugs 'byin pa thob pa zhes brjod
T03D3805:5b-43: de / de la mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don
T03D3805:5b-44: pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba
T03D3805:6a-1: pa ni sdug bsngal gyi dogs pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:6a-2: bdag nyid kyis gnod pa dang gzhan gyis skur pa
T03D3805:6a-3: 'debs pa dang ngan 'gro dang 'tsho ba chad pa
T03D3805:6a-4: dang mya ngan dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams med
T03D3805:6a-5: pas 'jigs pa'i dogs pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:6a-6: rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa dang grags pa dang
T03D3805:6a-7: ma grags pa dang bstod pa dang smad pa dang
T03D3805:6a-8: bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis rjes su
T03D3805:6a-9: ma gos pas na 'jig rten pa'i chos kyis dogs
T03D3805:6a-10: pa med pa'o // ye shes kyi yongs su sbyangs
T03D3805:6a-11: pa rnams la mi shes pa dang the tshom dang
T03D3805:6a-12: log pa'i shes pa rnams med pas na mi shes
T03D3805:6a-14: de ltar dogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir na cang shes pa'o //
T03D3805:6a-15: glang po chen po ni gtso bo chen po ste /
T03D3805:6a-16: rig pa gsum la sogs pa nyid kyis khyad par du gyur pa'i rtogs pa'i chos thos pas so //
T03D3805:6a-17: rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang zag
T03D3805:6a-18: pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa rnam pa gsum
T03D3805:6a-19: rig pa la ni gzhan dag tu de la rig
T03D3805:6a-21: bya ba byas pa ni tshul khrims dang ting nge
T03D3805:6a-22: 'dzin dang shes rab rnams yongs su rdzogs pas sdug
T03D3805:6a-23: bsngal thams cad las rnam par grol ba'i bya ba
T03D3805:6a-25: bya ba byed pa ni 'dod pa chung ba dang
T03D3805:6a-26: zhugs pa dang chog shes pa la 'jug pa dang
T03D3805:6a-27: sbyangs par grags pa la 'jug pa dang /
T03D3805:6a-28: kun tu mnyes par byed pa la 'jug pa zhes
T03D3805:6a-29: pa la sogs pa byed pa la rang gi mos
T03D3805:6a-31: khur bor ba ni khur rnam pa bzhi ste de rnams bor ba ste /
T03D3805:6a-32: de la phung po'i khur btang ste sdug bsngal yongs
T03D3805:6a-33: su shes pas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i bde
T03D3805:6a-34: ba thob pa la sbyor nus pa nyid do //
T03D3805:6a-35: nyon mongs pa'i khur spangs pas ni kun 'byung spangs pas rnam par grol ba'i bde ba thob pa'o //
T03D3805:6a-36: dam bcas pa'i khur bor bas ni 'gog pa mngon
T03D3805:6a-37: sum du byas pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba
T03D3805:6a-38: thob pa'o // sbyor ba rtsom pa'i khur gyis yongs
T03D3805:6a-39: su rdzogs pa ni lam bsgoms pas nye bar zhi
T03D3805:6a-41: khur bor ba nyid kyis khur bor nas bde ba thob pa'i yon tan gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:6a-42: rang gi don rjes su thob pa zhes pa la /
T03D3805:6a-43: rang gi don rjes su thob pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:6a-44: de la don min pa spong ba ni rang gi
T03D3805:6b-0: nyon mongs pa'i @6b ma rig pa spangs pas nyon
T03D3805:6b-1: mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa dang don
T03D3805:6b-2: rtogs pas gang zhig gi rig pa bskyed nas mya
T03D3805:6b-4: yongs su zad pa shes pa'i srid par kun tu sbyor ba ni dgu ste /
T03D3805:6b-5: skyes bu srid par kun tu sbyor ba'i phyir ste /
T03D3805:6b-6: 'dod chags dang khong khro ba dang nga rgyal dang
T03D3805:6b-7: ma rig pa dang the tshom dang lta ba mchog
T03D3805:6b-9: phrag dog dang ser sna de rnams gzhan du spangs pas so //
T03D3805:6b-10: de la zag pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i lta
T03D3805:6b-11: ba ni lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang the
T03D3805:6b-13: 'dir 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba dang /
T03D3805:6b-14: log par lta ba ste lta ba rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3805:6b-15: lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa dang tshul khrims dang
T03D3805:6b-16: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa zhes pa'i mchog tu
T03D3805:6b-18: zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas phrag
T03D3805:6b-19: dog dang ser sna dang khong khro ba rnams dang
T03D3805:6b-20: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags rnams spangs shing /
T03D3805:6b-21: nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang srid pa'i 'dod
T03D3805:6b-22: chags rnams dgra bcom pa'i lam gyi ye shes kyi
T03D3805:6b-23: zad pas so // yang dag par zhes pa ni
T03D3805:6b-24: yang dag par kun tu shes shing yang dag par
T03D3805:6b-25: kun tu rtogs pas dkon mchog gsum dang yon tan
T03D3805:6b-26: rnams dang theg pa gsum po rnams ston cing /
T03D3805:6b-27: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams dang byang chub
T03D3805:6b-28: kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang dag par mos
T03D3805:6b-29: pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang bral bas sems
T03D3805:6b-30: shin tu rnam par grol ba'o //
T03D3805:6b-31: sems kyi dbang thams cad ces pa ni sems gang
T03D3805:6b-32: gis ting nge 'dzin dbang du byas nas dbang sgyur
T03D3805:6b-33: bar 'gyur te / de'i sems la dbang ba de thams cad la yang ngo //
T03D3805:6b-34: de rnams la dam pa'i pha rol ni pha rol ste /
T03D3805:6b-35: mthar thug pa 'dir 'gro ba dang 'dir phyin pa'i don gyis so //
T03D3805:6b-36: pha rol ni mthar thug par 'gro ba la dam
T03D3805:6b-37: par pha rol tu son pa ni des thob pa'o
T03D3805:6b-38: // dbang ni gang du ji ltar 'dod par lugs
T03D3805:6b-39: las 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa nyid la
T03D3805:6b-40: dang po'i rim pa nas snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
T03D3805:6b-41: pa dgu po rnams kun tu bsgrub pa la snyoms
T03D3805:6b-43: gnas pa dang lta ba rnams la so sor rtogs pa la dbang thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:7a-0: thams cad ces smos pa na de ci 'phags pa kun dga' @7a * //
T03D3805:7a-1: bo yang yon tan de rnams dang ldan no zhe
T03D3805:7a-2: na min par gsungs pa ni gcig ces pa la
T03D3805:7a-3: sogs pa ste / gang zag gi tshig ni don
T03D3805:7a-4: mthun pa'i 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po rnams las
T03D3805:7a-6: ma rtogs pa ni yongs su spangs pa'o //
T03D3805:7a-7: 'di lta ste zhes pa ni gzhan la nye bar ston pa'o //
T03D3805:7a-8: tshe dang ldan pa zhes pa ni khyad par du mnyes par byed pa'i don te /
T03D3805:7a-9: 'jig rten du cho 'dod pas des de bzhin du de mnyes pa'o //
T03D3805:7a-10: 'dir nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bshad pa ni /
T03D3805:7a-11: rjes la theg pa chen po la 'jug pa la dgongs pa dang /
T03D3805:7a-12: rab tu grags pa'i 'khor gyi phyir dang /
T03D3805:7a-14: de yang rab tu grags pa ni rab tu byung
T03D3805:7a-15: ba'i 'khor nyid la nges pa ni rang gi rdzogs
T03D3805:7a-16: sangs rgyas kyi drung du rtag par kun tu gnas
T03D3805:7a-17: pa'i phyir ro // byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta ma yin te /
T03D3805:7a-18: phal cher khyim pa yin pa'i phyir dang 'di nas
T03D3805:7a-19: kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su 'gro
T03D3805:7a-20: ba'i phyir dang / de rnams nas kyang 'di ru
T03D3805:7a-21: 'ong bas na de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i dge
T03D3805:7a-23: de'i theg pa gsungs pa de nyid pas na byang
T03D3805:7a-24: chub sems dpa'i 'khor ni dpag tu med pa yin
T03D3805:7a-25: par gsal ba'i phyir dang yum 'dir bsdus pa'i skabs
T03D3805:7a-27: de la sgrub pa po rnam pa gsum ste gcig
T03D3805:7a-28: ni gsungs nas go bas tshig lhur len pa ste
T03D3805:7a-29: de ni rgyas pa la dga' ba'o //
T03D3805:7a-30: gnyis pa ni mang du bshad pas lhag ma yang go bas rnam par spros nas go ba ste /
T03D3805:7a-32: gsum pa ni nyung du bshad pas mang du rtogs pa'i mgo smos pas go la /
T03D3805:7a-33: de ni bsdus pa la dga' ba ste /
T03D3805:7a-34: de rnams la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma stong phrag brgyad pa dang /
T03D3805:7a-35: stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa dang /
T03D3805:7a-37: de la gzhung ni bsdus par 'dod pas na gzhung 'di'i gleng gzhi yang bsdus pa ste /
T03D3805:7a-38: dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /
T03D3805:7a-39: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za la sogs pa'i 'khor yang 'dir shes par bya'o //
T03D3805:7a-40: de rnams bshad pas ni gang du bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:7a-41: bya rgod phung po la ji skad bshad pa'i 'khor
T03D3805:7b-0: dang bzhugs par 'gyur ba der bdag gis @7b bcom
T03D3805:7b-1: ldan 'das las thos so zhes bya ste gling gzhi'o
T03D3805:7b-2: // bstan pa go ba'i skabs gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:7b-3: yang zhes bya ba tshig gi rgyan la der bzhugs
T03D3805:7b-4: par gyur pas sam der gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi
T03D3805:7b-6: gnas brtan zhes smos pas ni mchod pa'i don te /
T03D3805:7b-7: dgra bcom par 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyang mchog gi phyir ro //
T03D3805:7b-8: bka' stsal pa ni rab tu 'byor ba zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:7b-9: gsung gis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T03D3805:7b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa'i don du rnam pa gsum gyis byin gyis rlob ste /
T03D3805:7b-13: kha cig tu thugs kyis so //
T03D3805:7b-14: ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rigs can rnams kyi spro ba bskyed pa'i don du'o //
T03D3805:7b-15: spobs par gyis shig ces pa ni /
T03D3805:7b-16: khyod kyis rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi mngon sum du gyis zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:7b-17: gang du rab 'byor la bos nas bstan pa'i skad
T03D3805:7b-18: cig la gzhan gdul bar bya ba mang po rnams
T03D3805:7b-19: kyis so sor bcom ldan 'das ni zhal 'dzum pas
T03D3805:7b-20: bdag la gzigs nas chos ston to snyam du sems
T03D3805:7b-21: par gyur te / de ltar na yang rab 'byor nas bka' stsal pas na de gnyis bsdus pa'o //
T03D3805:7b-22: 'o na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa
T03D3805:7b-23: rnams ston pa la de rnams kyang lan cig ci'i
T03D3805:7b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bos nas bstan pa nas
T03D3805:7b-26: mdo 'di ni zab pas bdag cag rnams sbyor bar
T03D3805:7b-27: mi nus zhes kha cig lung la 'dzin par mi
T03D3805:7b-28: 'gyur la / rab 'byor la brtsams nas bstan na
T03D3805:7b-29: ni skye bo thams cad kyi thun mong ba ste
T03D3805:7b-30: 'gyur la / / shin tu zab pa ma yin
T03D3805:7b-31: no snyam du sems nas rab tu 'jug par 'gyur
T03D3805:7b-32: 'gyur la / / la / thun mong par yang
T03D3805:7b-33: ste kun mkhyen pa gsum gyi skabs kyi phyir ni
T03D3805:7b-34: des bshad pas kyang dge slong rnams dang 'khor gzhan
T03D3805:7b-35: gyi chos mngon par rtogs pa thob pas so //
T03D3805:7b-36: gang yang bla mas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma
T03D3805:7b-37: med kyang de lta na yang 'di gsol ba btab
T03D3805:7b-38: pa ni chos la gus pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:7b-39: de lta na yang bshad pa /
T03D3805:7b-40: gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:7b-41: phyin pa la chung ngu na lhag par mos zhes
T03D3805:7b-42: pas so // gang gi dbang du byas shen gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:7b-43: shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:8a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i @8a * //
T03D3805:8a-1: gtso bo chos kyi sku rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:8a-3: don de la sbyor bas gzhung dang lam dag la yang de'i sgras so //
T03D3805:8a-4: de las brtsams nas zhes pa ni skyes bu dam pas don du gnyer bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:8a-5: thabs las byung ba nyid kyi chad du'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3805:8a-6: ci nas zhes pa ni ji srid du thos pa
T03D3805:8a-7: dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i bye brag gis so
T03D3805:8a-8: // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:8a-9: zhes pa ni kun mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum la
T03D3805:8a-10: // ste / de lam la brten nas bgrod pas
T03D3805:8a-11: nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste ma lus par
T03D3805:8a-12: // ste / 'gro ba'o // ji ltar de yis bgrod ce na /
T03D3805:8a-13: sbyor dang sbyor ba'i rab tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:8a-15: sbyor ba'i mthar thug pa ste /
T03D3805:8a-16: dgos pa'i tshul des ma lus par gyis zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:8a-17: de la ngag gnyis po 'dis ni 'phags pa rab
T03D3805:8a-18: 'byor la yang brjod par bya ba'i mngon par rtogs
T03D3805:8a-19: pa brgyad kyis so sor ston pa ste /
T03D3805:8a-20: de ltar yang bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:8a-21: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03D3805:8a-22: dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad //
T03D3805:8a-23: ces pa ste stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:8a-24: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo'i phyir
T03D3805:8a-25: na rab kyi shes rab la shes rab 'di'i pha
T03D3805:8a-26: rol pas na pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3805:8a-28: gang gi pha rol zhe na rnam par rtog pa'i ste /
T03D3805:8a-29: ci rigs par 'phags pa dang byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3805:8a-30: rnams dang dag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pha
T03D3805:8a-31: rol tu phyin zhing so sor rtogs pas pha rol
T03D3805:8a-32: tu phyin pa'o // sbyor ba'i lam la ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa yin te /
T03D3805:8a-33: de ni don gyi bya ba ste /
T03D3805:8a-34: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin zhe na /
T03D3805:8a-35: de'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:8a-36: yang dag bshad ces pa ni mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyis bsdus nas bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:8a-38: rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid //
T03D3805:8a-39: de nas thams cad shes pa nyid //
T03D3805:8a-40: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang //
