T03D3805:11a-41: / chos dang zang zing gi longs spyod rnams kyis
T03D3805:11a-42: tshad med pa'i sems can rnams tshim pas mi zad
T03D3805:11a-43: / pa'i phyir ro // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:11a-44: lhan cig tu gyur pa ni rin po che'i 'byung gnas lta bu ste /
T03D3805:11a-45: yon tan rin po che rnams thams cad des 'phel
T03D3805:11b-0: @11b bar byed cing rin po che'i 'byung gnas su
T03D3805:11b-2: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni rgya mtsho dang 'dra ste /
T03D3805:11b-3: mi 'dod pa thams cad thog tu bab kyang mi 'khrug pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-4: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan
T03D3805:11b-5: cig par gyur pa ni rdo rje lta bu ste
T03D3805:11b-6: / bstan pa'i phyir dang 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-7: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni ri lta bu ste /
T03D3805:11b-8: mi bskyod pa dang mi g-yeng pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-9: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan
T03D3805:11b-10: cig par gyur pa ni sman gyi rgyal po lta
T03D3805:11b-11: bu ste / sgrib pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-12: thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan cig
T03D3805:11b-13: tu gyur pa dang tshad med pa dang lhan cig
T03D3805:11b-14: tu gyur pa ni bshes gnyen chen po lta bu
T03D3805:11b-15: ste / gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi don mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-16: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan
T03D3805:11b-17: cig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang lhan cig
T03D3805:11b-18: pa ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ste
T03D3805:11b-19: / mos pa ji lta ba de'i 'bras bu spel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-20: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa dang sbyin pa dang /
T03D3805:11b-23: don mthun pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bsdu ba'i dngos po
T03D3805:11b-24: dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni nyi ma dang
T03D3805:11b-25: 'dra ste / gdul bar bya ba'i lo tog smin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:11b-26: de la sbyin pa ni nang phyi rol gyi yo byad sbyin pa'o //
T03D3805:11b-27: snyan par smra ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o //
T03D3805:11b-28: don spyod pa ni chos las yang dag par len du 'jug par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:11b-29: don mthun pa ni gang gzhan la yang dag par
T03D3805:11b-30: len du bcug pa de la bdag nyid rjes su
T03D3805:11b-31: 'jug par byed ces pa ni sems can gyi bsdu
T03D3805:11b-32: ba'i dngos po'i thabs rnams so //
T03D3805:11b-33: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang lhan
T03D3805:11b-34: cig pa ni dri za'i dbyangs 'jam zhing snyan pa
T03D3805:11b-35: dang 'dra ste / gdul bya 'dun pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir ro//
T03D3805:11b-36: mngon par shes pa dang lhan cig par gyur pa ni rgyal po lta bu ste /
T03D3805:11b-37: bar ma chad par mthus gzhan gyi don la rjes
T03D3805:11b-38: su gnas pa la rnam par 'jug pa'i rgyu'i phyir
T03D3805:11b-39: ro // rgyal po'i lcags kyus ni skye dgu lam log pa nas mi ltung ngo //
T03D3805:12a-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i so sor rton pa'i lcags kyu'i @12a * //
T03D3805:12a-2: de la don la rton gyi yi ge la ma yin te /
T03D3805:12a-3: legs par sbyar ba la sogs pa can lam yin no //
T03D3805:12a-4: chos kyi rigs pa las sor rton gyi gang gis
T03D3805:12a-5: gang de ltar brjod pa'i chos thams cad stong pa
T03D3805:12a-6: ma yin zhes pa lam yin /
T03D3805:12a-7: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi ye shes
T03D3805:12a-8: la rton gyi rnam par shes pas thos pa dang
T03D3805:12a-9: bsams pa'i shes rab lam yin pa dang /
T03D3805:12a-10: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton gyi /
T03D3805:12a-11: drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde lam yin zhes pa ni rton pa rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3805:12a-12: nges pa'i don ni gang du bcom ldan 'das rnams
T03D3805:12a-13: kyis gtan la phab pa'i chos thams cad stong pa
T03D3805:12a-14: nyid kyi mtshan nyid don gang de nyid de ltar
T03D3805:12a-15: ro // bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang lhan cig pa ni bang mdzod lta bu ste /
T03D3805:12a-16: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mang po'i gnas kyi mdzod yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:12a-17: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /
T03D3805:12a-18: lhan cig pa ni rgyal po'i lam po che lta bu ste /
T03D3805:12a-19: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:12a-20: zhi gnas su gyur pa dang snying rje dang lhag
T03D3805:12a-21: mthong dang lhan cig pa ni bzhon pa dang 'dra
T03D3805:12a-22: ste / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3805:12a-23: gzhan du mi ltung bas bde bar 'gro ba'i phyir
T03D3805:12a-24: ste / ro // gzungs dang spobs pa dang lhan
T03D3805:12a-25: cig par gyur pa ni bkod ma lta bu ste
T03D3805:12a-26: ste / ro // / chu 'dzin pa dang mi
T03D3805:12a-27: zad pa dang 'byung ba dang chos mthun pa ste
T03D3805:12a-28: ste / ro // / / thos pa dang ma
T03D3805:12a-29: thos pa'i chos kyi don 'dzin pa dang mi zad
T03D3805:12a-30: pa bstan pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:12a-31: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
T03D3805:12a-32: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /
T03D3805:12a-33: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang /
T03D3805:12a-34: mya ngan las 'das ba zhi ba zhes bya ba'i chos ched du byed pa de dang /
T03D3805:12a-35: lhan cig pa ni sgra snyan pa lta bu ste /
T03D3805:12a-36: thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis snyan pa thos pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:12a-37: chos la skye ba med pa can gyi bzod pa
T03D3805:12a-38: thob pa can gyi bde bas byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3805:12a-39: rnams kyi 'bras bu'i bya ba tha mi dad pa'i
T03D3805:12a-40: phyir bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam de dang lhan cig
T03D3805:12a-41: gyur pa ni / chu klung gi rgyun lta bu ste /
T03D3805:12a-43: dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa ni gnas pa
T03D3805:12a-44: kun tu bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de dang
T03D3805:12a-45: lhan cig tu gyur pa'i chos kyi sku dang lhan
T03D3805:12b-0: cig @12b tu gyur pa ni sprin lta bu ste
T03D3805:12b-1: / sems can thams cad kyi don gyi bya ba
T03D3805:12b-2: rnams la des 'jug ste sprin bzhin du snod kyi
T03D3805:12b-3: 'jig rten gyi phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T03D3805:12b-4: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis po 'di ni blo gros mi zad pa'i mdor te /
T03D3805:12b-5: tshad med pa dang dngos po dang yang dag par
T03D3805:12b-6: rig pa dang mi rton pa dang ched du brjod
T03D3805:12b-7: pa lnga la bzhi bzhi ste gnyis pa tshogs dang
T03D3805:12b-8: zhi gnas dang gzungs kyis zil gyis gnon pa gsum
T03D3805:12b-9: la gnyis gnyis dang mngon par shes pa lnga rnams
T03D3805:12b-10: dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang /
T03D3805:12b-11: dang po'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang bgrod pa gcig
T03D3805:12b-12: pa'i lam dang lhan cig tu gyur pa'i thabs la
T03D3805:12b-13: mkhas pa las byung ba zhes pa'i brgyad cu mi
T03D3805:12b-15: 'dir sbyor ba dang lhan cig pa'i bsam pa dag
T03D3805:12b-16: bzlog nas bstan pa ni gnyi ga la gnyis char
T03D3805:12b-18: de nyid kyis 'phags pa thogs med kyis smon pa
T03D3805:12b-19: phan tshun gyi brgyud pa la sbyor ba bshad pas
T03D3805:12b-20: sems bskyed pa bco lnga pa la 'bring gi bcom
T03D3805:12b-21: ldan 'das mar mngon par shes par bsgrub pa ni
T03D3805:12b-22: gang du yang 'gal ba med do //
T03D3805:12b-23: de la dang po'i sems bskyed pa gsum ni thos
T03D3805:12b-24: pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab dag
T03D3805:12b-25: mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs kyi thar pa'i cha dang
T03D3805:12b-26: mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ste /
T03D3805:12b-27: las dang po pa'i sa'i tshogs kyi lam gyi tshogs kyis te /
T03D3805:12b-28: chos kyi rgyun las sangs rgyas las gdams ngag thob
T03D3805:12b-29: par 'gyur zhes pas go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3805:12b-30: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang /
T03D3805:12b-31: chen po la chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i
T03D3805:12b-32: gang zag gi yul rnams te dran pa nye bar
T03D3805:12b-33: gzhag pa dang yang dag par spang ba dang /
T03D3805:12b-34: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang lhan cig pa'i go
T03D3805:12b-35: cha'i bsgrub pa ni smon pa'i sems la de'i gong
T03D3805:12b-36: gi bcu dgu ni 'jug pa'i sems so //
T03D3805:12b-37: sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni mos pas spyod pa'i
T03D3805:12b-38: sa ste rab tu dga' ba'i sa la sbyor ba'i
T03D3805:12b-39: lam 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i rang bzhin zag pa
T03D3805:12b-40: dang bcas pa'i bsgom pa'i lam nges par 'byed pa'i
T03D3805:12b-41: cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang po
T03D3805:12b-42: dang stobs dang lhan cig pa ni /
T03D3805:12b-44: mdo dkon mchog sprin du sa 'di rnams su byang
T03D3805:12b-45: chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo yin yang byis
T03D3805:12b-46: pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dang bral ba thams cad
T03D3805:13a-1: med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par
T03D3805:13a-2: thar pa dang mngon par shes pa dang ldan zhes
T03D3805:13a-3: gsungs so // lnga pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems bskyed pa dang po ste /
T03D3805:13a-4: de la lnga pa rab tu dga' ba'i sa mthong
T03D3805:13a-5: ba'i lam gyi byang chub kyi lam gyi yan lag
T03D3805:13a-7: drug pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom pa'i
T03D3805:13a-8: lam gyi sems bskyed pa bco lnga pa'i dang po
T03D3805:13a-9: ste 'phags pa'i lam gyi yan lag dang lhan cig
T03D3805:13a-10: pa'o // 'di'i dang po'i dgu ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i sa dgu pa'o //
T03D3805:13a-11: gzhan drug ni chos kyi sprin gyi sa'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi lam la'o //
T03D3805:13a-12: 'di'i tha ma bar chad med lam sangs rgyas kyi sa la gcig go //
T03D3805:13a-13: rgyu 'dis na sngas rgyas kyi sas bsdus zhes pa'i
T03D3805:13a-14: seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pas nye bar brtags pa
T03D3805:13a-15: dgos pa med pas mi rigs so //
T03D3805:13a-16: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang rtsa
T03D3805:13a-17: gnyis pa ni dngos gzhi dang rjes kyis sangs rgyas
T03D3805:13a-18: kyis zhes pa ste de ni sems bskyed pa rab
T03D3805:13a-19: tu dbye ba'o // sh'a ri'i bu ni ma'i ming
T03D3805:13a-20: la sh'a ri ni rigs yin pas sha ra dva
T03D3805:13a-21: tu dbye ba'o // ti ste / de'i bu ni sh'a ri'i bu ste /
T03D3805:13a-22: sha ra dva ti'i bu zhes pa ni ming ngo //
T03D3805:13a-23: 'dis 'chad par 'gyur ba 'di rnams la rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:13a-24: bdag nyid ces pa ni rang gi rgyud du gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:13a-25: rang gi zhes pa ni rang dbang gis so //
T03D3805:13a-26: shes rab dang spobs pa de dag gi stobs skyed pa po ni nus pa'i bag chags so //
T03D3805:13a-27: de'i bskyed pa ni mngon du skyes pas so //
T03D3805:13a-28: de'i byin gyis brlabs pa ni phyis sad pas so //
T03D3805:13a-29: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa na mthu dang nus pas so //
T03D3805:13a-30: 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthu zhes pa ni nyan
T03D3805:13a-31: thos rnams ni mnyam par ma bzhag na gzhan gyi
T03D3805:13a-32: sems shes pa la mi 'jug pas so //
T03D3805:13a-33: sems pa dang sems ni rnam grangs te mngon par shes pa'i tshig go //
T03D3805:13a-34: sems kyi yongs su rtog pa ni de nyid na gnas pas na mi gsal ba ste /
T03D3805:13a-35: yongs su tshol ba po'i yid kyi brjod pa'o //
T03D3805:13a-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni 'khor la mdo ste la sogs pa rnams so //
T03D3805:13a-37: ston pa ni de nyid gzhan la'o //
T03D3805:13a-38: 'chad pa ni dri ba la sogs pa la'o //
T03D3805:13a-39: nye bar bstan pa ni phyogs nas nye bar song zhing gdul bya rnams la gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:13b-0: de bzhin @13b du gang bcom ldan 'das kyis de
T03D3805:13b-1: lta bu'i dngos po ston pa dang bshad pa dang
T03D3805:13b-2: 'khor la rab tu ston par byed pa de nyid
T03D3805:13b-3: gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par rab tu ston par
T03D3805:13b-4: byed pa ste / khor yug tu son nas rang
T03D3805:13b-5: gis rab ston par byed pa'i gsungs pa la sogs
T03D3805:13b-6: pa de thams cad skyes bu'i byed pa ste /
T03D3805:13b-7: de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis rab tu phye ba'i phyir
T03D3805:13b-8: na nyan thos la sogs pa rnams kyi rang dbang
T03D3805:13b-10: 'dir rgyu des na zhes pa kun tu bshad par
T03D3805:13b-11: 'dod nas rang gis dris pa ni de ci'i phyir
T03D3805:13b-12: zhes pa ste / gang gi phyir de'i rgyu gsungs pa ni chos gang zhes te /
T03D3805:13b-13: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang theg pa chen po
T03D3805:13b-14: la slob par byed pas thos pa dang bsam pa
T03D3805:13b-15: dang bsgom pa rnams kyis te de la ji ltar
T03D3805:13b-16: thos pa rnams mngon sum du byed pa ni nyan
T03D3805:13b-17: thos kyi theg pa can rnams so //
T03D3805:13b-18: 'dzin par byed pa ni theg pa chen po pa ste /
T03D3805:13b-19: chos des ji ltar thos pa'i thos pa dang bsam
T03D3805:13b-20: pa dag gis brtan par gyur pas dran pa'i sa
T03D3805:13b-22: rgyu mthun pa ni 'dra ba ste mthun pa'o //
T03D3805:13b-23: 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi skyes bu'i byed pa gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:13b-24: de ltar thos pa nyid kyi chos des rang gi ston pa des na'o //
T03D3805:13b-25: 'gal bar mi byed ces pa ni nyan thos rnams bdag nyid chen por gsungs so //
T03D3805:13b-26: 'di ltar sh'a ri'i bus rnam par rtog pa nyid
T03D3805:13b-27: ni rab 'byor gyis 'dir bstan pas ston pa ma
T03D3805:13b-28: yin zhes kha cig dag gi dogs pa de bzlog
T03D3805:13b-29: pa ste / 'dir gang bcom ldan 'das ni thams
T03D3805:13b-30: cad nas thams cad du chos chos thams cad don
T03D3805:13b-31: dam par mthong ba'i mchog tu tshad mar gyur pas
T03D3805:13b-32: rang gis sam nyan thos la sogs pa'i zhal nas
T03D3805:13b-33: ston pa thams cad de nyid las gzhan du med
T03D3805:13b-34: pa ste / ces gsungs so // gdams ngag bstan
T03D3805:13b-35: pa 'dod nas nye bar 'jug pa ni de nas
T03D3805:13b-36: zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
T03D3805:13b-37: de la de ni phyogs bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:13b-38: tshig bla dgas ni ming ste /
T03D3805:13b-39: chos kyi dngos po ni gang du ji ltar med la /
T03D3805:13b-40: bdag gi dngos po ni kun rdzob tu yang med ces bya bar dgongs so //
T03D3805:13b-41: chos ni phung po lnga la sogs pa can la /
T03D3805:13b-42: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba ni don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:13b-43: byang chub sems dpa' ma dmigs pa ni gang zag
T03D3805:13b-44: la bdag med pa'i shes pa la phung po la
T03D3805:14a-0: sogs pa mi dmigs pa ni chos @14a * //
T03D3805:14a-1: la bdag med pa'i shes pa ste /
T03D3805:14a-2: de gnyi ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:14a-3: pa la de yang don dam par ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:14a-4: kyis stong zhes pa ni mi dmigs pa'o //
T03D3805:14a-5: 'di lta bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:14a-6: pa kha cig tu gcig pu zhig tu dben par
T03D3805:14a-7: song nas lung gi don la nges par rtogs pa
T03D3805:14a-8: las skye bar 'gyur ba de ni thos pa las
T03D3805:14a-9: byung ba'o // de ltar yang the tshom gang du
T03D3805:14a-10: yang med pas rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:14a-11: stobs kyis skye bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa de ni
T03D3805:14a-13: de dag gis the tshom drungs phyung nas dang du
T03D3805:14a-14: len par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas sgom
T03D3805:14a-15: pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'o //
T03D3805:14a-16: de la dang po gnyis bstan par 'dod nas gsungs
T03D3805:14a-17: pa ni bdag gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:14a-18: / byang chub sems dpa'i chos ni nang gi bdag nyid can gyi phung po lnga la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:14a-19: ma 'tshal ba ni thob pa med pa ste tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14a-20: de nyid la gnod pa bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni ma dmigs zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:14a-21: lung las skyes pa'i mi dmigs pas gnod par byed pa yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'o //
T03D3805:14a-22: rjes su dpag pa la sogs pas gnod par byed
T03D3805:14a-23: pa 'dis rjes su ma dmigs zhes pa ni thos
T03D3805:14a-24: pa las byung ba'i shes rab gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:14a-25: yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhes pa'i rigs pa ni bsam pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T03D3805:14a-26: rigs pa brjod de gang zhig ni ci yang med pa'o //
T03D3805:14a-27: gang 'dir zhes pa ni don dam par gang du yang med pa'o //
T03D3805:14a-28: kun rdzob tu ni rtog par byed pa la 'doms
T03D3805:14a-29: pas gdams ngag la rjes su 'jug par bstan pa
T03D3805:14a-30: ni rjes su bstan pa'o zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o
T03D3805:14a-31: // rdzogs pa'i zhi gnas la rab tu 'jug par
T03D3805:14a-32: byed pa gang de dang lhan cig tu dpyod pa
T03D3805:14a-33: can gyi shes rab de ni lta ba dang rig
T03D3805:14a-34: pa dang blo dang snang ba dang lhag mthong la
T03D3805:14a-35: // / de gnyi ga zung du 'brel ba can
T03D3805:14a-36: ni bsgom pa'i rang bzhin can gyi shes rab ste
T03D3805:14a-37: // / / de bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa
T03D3805:14a-38: ni 'on kyang zhes pa dang gal te zhes pa
T03D3805:14a-39: ni don dam par 'jug pa na gal te'o //
T03D3805:14a-41: de bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pas te smra
T03D3805:14a-42: bar byed pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T03D3805:14a-43: da lta ba la nye ba'i phyir ni gsung bar
T03D3805:14b-0: byed pa don gsungs zhes pa la sogs par @14b
T03D3805:14b-1: shes par bya'o // 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni
T03D3805:14b-2: bstan par byed pa ni thos pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T03D3805:14b-3: shes rab kyi mtshan nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:14b-4: nye bar bstan par byed ces pa ni bsam pa'i
T03D3805:14b-5: rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyi mtshan nyid kyis mngon
T03D3805:14b-6: sum du dpyod par 'gyur ro zhes pa lhag ma'o
T03D3805:14b-7: // 'dir thar pa 'dod pa rnams ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:14b-8: gyi yon tan rnams la mngon par yid ches pa'i
T03D3805:14b-9: mtshan nyid la dad pa de las 'dod pa skye
T03D3805:14b-10: // bar 'gyur la / de'i stobs las brtson 'grus
T03D3805:14b-11: de'i stobs las lus dang sems sbyangs pa nyid do
T03D3805:14b-12: // bar 'gyur la / // des le lo rnam
T03D3805:14b-13: par mi 'jug nas dran pas yang dag par dmigs
T03D3805:14b-14: pa la nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:14b-15: des shes bzhin la des dga' ba'i dngos po sangs
T03D3805:14b-16: rgyas la sogs pa'i yon tan yid la byas nas
T03D3805:14b-17: des de nyid ji ltar thos pa dang bsam pa'i
T03D3805:14b-18: don de nyid la ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i
T03D3805:14b-19: sems la brnyas pa med nas zhugs par mi 'gyur
T03D3805:14b-20: te / de nyid kyis nges par bcings pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14b-21: kun tu mi zhum pa mi 'gyur ba ni rgyun
T03D3805:14b-22: tu 'jug pas kyang zhum par 'ong bar mi 'gyur
T03D3805:14b-23: te / gzhan du 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14b-24: rang bzhin gyis g-yo ba'i phyir rgod nas gzhan du
T03D3805:14b-25: 'gro ba yang myur du shes par byas la yang
T03D3805:14b-26: bsdus na yang mi rgod pa'o //
T03D3805:14b-27: kun tu mi zhum pa ni bstan par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi rang bzhin rigs pa'i phyir na /
T03D3805:14b-28: gzhan du rnam par 'phro ba'i gong nas gong du
T03D3805:14b-29: zhib mor byed pa la dub pa med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:14b-30: ro // phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur te /
T03D3805:14b-31: ting nge 'dzin byad pa la yang btang snyoms su gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14b-32: ji ltar na de nyid la sems dga' bar byed ce na /
T03D3805:14b-33: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi yon tan mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14b-34: bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur ba ni de
T03D3805:14b-35: la dga' ba dang bde bas rnam par g-yeng bar
T03D3805:14b-36: byed pa can du mi byed pa ste /
T03D3805:14b-37: rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon mthong ba'i phyir te /
T03D3805:14b-38: skyon ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams so //
T03D3805:14b-39: mi dngang ba ni brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba la sogs pa ldang bas mi skrag ste /
T03D3805:14b-42: rnam par g-yeng ba'i skyon mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:14b-44: sems rang bzhin gyis skyon med par rang gi ngang
T03D3805:14b-45: gis 'jug pa'i don du 'du byed la 'bad pa
T03D3805:15a-1: par mi byed ces pa'i don to //
T03D3805:15a-2: kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur ba ni lhun gyis
T03D3805:15a-3: grub par ngang gis 'jug pa nyid kyis sems la
T03D3805:15a-4: skrag pa kun tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T03D3805:15a-5: lhun gyis grub pa de nyid ngang gis 'jug pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:15a-6: gzhan yang lhun gyis ma grub pa ni sems rnam par g-yeng bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:15a-7: de ltar yang mdo sde rgyan las /
T03D3805:15a-8: dmigs pas sems ni nges bcings la //
T03D3805:15a-9: de rgyun rnam par g-yeng mi bya //
T03D3805:15a-10: rnam g-yengs myur du rtogs byas la //
T03D3805:15a-11: de yis so sor yang bsdu bya //
T03D3805:15a-12: so sor dag la kun bsdus sems //
T03D3805:15a-13: gong nas gong du blo ldan gyis //
T03D3805:15a-14: ting 'dzin yon tan mthong gyur pa //
T03D3805:15a-15: de yis sems ni dga' byas la //
T03D3805:15a-16: rnam g-yengs skyon ni mthong 'gyur ba //
T03D3805:15a-17: de yis dga' yin zhi bar bya /
T03D3805:15a-18: brnab sems yid mi bde la sogs //
T03D3805:15a-19: langs pa de bzhin zhi bar bya //
T03D3805:15a-20: de yis mngon par 'du byas pa'i //
T03D3805:15a-21: sems kyi ngang du gyur pa nyid //
T03D3805:15a-22: de la goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T03D3805:15a-23: des ni mngon 'dus ma byas thob //
T03D3805:15a-25: de bzhin du zhi gnas rdzogs par gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:15a-26: 'di nyid zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i
T03D3805:15a-27: ting nge 'dzin mthar thug pa'i kun rdzob dang don
T03D3805:15a-28: dam pa'i rnam par dbye ba shes pa'o //
T03D3805:15a-29: 'di nyid ces pa ni de'i ting nge 'dzin dang
T03D3805:15a-30: yang dag par rab tu ldan pa'i shes rab bo
T03D3805:15a-32: gang dag zhi gnas dang shes rab dag phan tshun yang dag par sbyor ba'i yon tan gyis so //
T03D3805:15a-33: sems ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i
T03D3805:15a-34: de kho na nyid la de las phyir phyogs pa
T03D3805:15a-35: thams cad ni rnam par g-yengs pa'i zhes brjod la
T03D3805:15a-36: / de kho na nyid gcig tu mthar thug pa
T03D3805:15a-37: ni kun rdzob tu skad cig gis 'jig pa can
T03D3805:15a-38: yin yang mnyam par gzhag pa'o //
T03D3805:15a-39: de nyid kyis na zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag ni 'gal ba med do //
T03D3805:15a-40: de kho na nyid ma yin pa la dmigs pa
T03D3805:15a-41: las ldog pa'i bdag nyid can gyis sems rtse gcig
T03D3805:15a-42: pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i shes pa dag phan
T03D3805:15a-43: tshun rjes su sbyar nas bskyed pas rab kyi mthar
T03D3805:15a-44: thug pa na ro gcig par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:15a-45: de ltar 'dir zhi gnas dang shes rab kyi rang
T03D3805:15a-46: bzhin gyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa ro gcig
T03D3805:15b-0: @15b pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ni 'dir
T03D3805:15b-2: 'di nyid 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:15b-3: gdams pa'i rgyun ni rjes bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:15b-4: de ltar dang po'i byang chub sems dang des bsdus
T03D3805:15b-5: pa'i chos kyi ngo bo shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:15b-6: tu phyin pa la kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
T03D3805:15b-7: bden pa las mi 'da' zhing dmigs pa med pa'i
T03D3805:15b-8: spyod pas so sor sgrub pa'i gdams ngag ni sgrub
T03D3805:15b-11: sgrub pa la snying por byed pa la ni bla
T03D3805:15b-12: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3805:15b-14: sgrub pa de yang mdor bsdu na byang chub kyi
T03D3805:15b-15: sems bsgom pa dang sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs
T03D3805:15b-17: de la byang chub kyi sems ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i rang bzhin te /
T03D3805:15b-18: de la phung po lnga po rnams la ji srid
T03D3805:15b-19: du dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i rnam par
T03D3805:15b-20: rtog pa de thams cad ni phyin ci log gi
T03D3805:15b-21: spros pa la / spros pa med pa ni chos kyi dbyings stong pa nyid do //
T03D3805:15b-22: stong pa nyid du brjod pa ni sgro btags pa
T03D3805:15b-23: thams cad las ldog pa rab tu bsgrubs pas gdul
T03D3805:15b-24: bya'i rgyud la de kho na nyid kyi ngo bo
T03D3805:15b-25: mngon par gsal bar byed par 'gyur zhes pas na
T03D3805:15b-26: 'dir brjod par bya ba la nye bar btags nas
T03D3805:15b-27: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i sgra brjod de ;
T03D3805:15b-28: sgro btags pa ma lus pa dang bral ba'i ngo
T03D3805:15b-29: bo de kho na nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:15b-30: // ji skad du bcom ldan 'das ma bdun brgya pa las gsungs pa /
T03D3805:15b-31: bcom ldan 'das gang du yang rab tu mi gnas
T03D3805:15b-32: pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:15b-33: bsgom pa ste / chos gang la yang gnas pa
T03D3805:15b-34: nye bar dmigs pa dang mi gnas pa yang ma
T03D3805:15b-35: bsgom pa ste / yin no // chos gang la
T03D3805:15b-36: yang mi sems zhing mi shes gang kho nar sems
T03D3805:15b-37: pa med pa de nyid mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3805:15b-38: ma skyes pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:15b-39: pa chos kyi dbyings kun tu spyod pa med pa'i
T03D3805:15b-40: dbyings zhes pa dang gnyis su byar med pa gang
T03D3805:15b-41: kho na'i ye shes des sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
T03D3805:15b-42: bsgom pa ste / yin no // te / dmigs
T03D3805:15b-43: pa med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so zhes pa dang
T03D3805:15b-44: yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
T03D3805:15b-45: pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pa ni /
T03D3805:15b-46: chos gang yang nye bar dmigs pas so sor gnas pa med do //
T03D3805:15b-47: chos gang 'jig pa'am skye ba med do //
T03D3805:16a-1: ma skyes pa la nyams pa'i 'phel ba med ces gsungs la /
T03D3805:16a-2: chos thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa'i mdo las kyang /
T03D3805:16a-3: gang las so sor rtogs nas chos gang yang gcig
T03D3805:16a-4: pa nyid dang du ma nyid du byed pa med
T03D3805:16a-5: de rnam par 'gyur ba med cing bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:16a-6: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yang dag pa so
T03D3805:16a-9: chos kun gnas med zhi ba yi //
T03D3805:16a-10: don 'di rtag tu bsgom par bya //
T03D3805:16a-11: gnas med pa dang sgyu 'dra ste //
T03D3805:16a-12: stong nyid srid pa 'jig byed pa //
T03D3805:16a-13: skye med ces dang stong pa zhes //
T03D3805:16a-14: dmigs med ces dang stong nyid la //
T03D3805:16a-15: bdag nyid dman pas gang bsgoms pa //
T03D3805:16a-16: des ni 'di la bsgom pa min //
T03D3805:16a-17: dge dang mi dge rnam rtog rnams //
T03D3805:16a-18: rgyun chad pa yi mtshan nyid can //
T03D3805:16a-19: sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong nyid gsungs //
T03D3805:16a-20: gzhan du stong nyid 'dod pa min //
T03D3805:16a-21: dmigs pa med par 'gyur pa'i sems //
T03D3805:16a-22: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can du gnas //
T03D3805:16a-23: gang dag stong pa nyid bsgom pa //
T03D3805:16a-24: de ni nam mkha' bsgom par 'dod //
T03D3805:16a-26: snying rje chen po dang chos thams cad ngo bo
T03D3805:16a-27: nyid med pa'i dmigs pa med pas skyed par byed
T03D3805:16a-28: pa'i phyir dmigs pa med pa'i zhes pa'i stong pa
T03D3805:16a-29: nyid snying rje dag de'i bdag nyid kho nas bsgom
T03D3805:16a-30: pa'o // stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i tha snyad kyi dbye ba ni ldog pas byas pa ste /
T03D3805:16a-32: phung po lnga po rnams la dngos po dang dngos
T03D3805:16a-33: po med pa la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa
T03D3805:16a-34: mtha' dag bzlog nas thams cad la yid bsdus nas
T03D3805:16a-35: cung zad kyang / sems par mi bya ste /
T03D3805:16a-36: de nyid kyis gang zhig rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3805:16a-37: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:16a-38: phyin pa bskyed par gyur nas /
T03D3805:16a-39: de'i mthong ba med pa'i sbyor bas mngon sum du
T03D3805:16a-40: so sor rtogs nas de'i sems can gyis kyang rtogs
T03D3805:16a-41: par bya zhes rnam par sems shing de'i bdag nyid
T03D3805:16a-42: can du de ltar 'gro ba mtha' dag dmigs par
T03D3805:16a-43: byas nas dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo'i snying rje
T03D3805:16a-44: chen po skye bar gyur nas des shes rab dang
T03D3805:16a-45: snying rje dag dbyer med pa'i ngo bo gnyis su
T03D3805:16a-46: med cing gcig tu 'dres par gyur par mthong ngo
T03D3805:16a-47: // de'i gnas dang shes rab dag gis bdag nyid
T03D3805:16b-0: @16b kyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa
T03D3805:16b-1: nyid du rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes rab kyi
T03D3805:16b-2: pha rol tu phyin pa dang snying rje chen po
T03D3805:16b-3: dbyer med pa'i phyir kun rdzob dang don dam pa
T03D3805:16b-4: gnyis gcig pa nyid kyis zung du 'brel pa'i lam
T03D3805:16b-5: gyi byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i ngo bo mchog
T03D3805:16b-6: tu rnam par mi rtog pa'i rnal 'byor bsod nams
T03D3805:16b-7: dang ye shes thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi mngon
T03D3805:16b-8: par rtogs pa brgyad po rnams kyis ji ltar rigs
T03D3805:16b-9: par mi mthun pa'i phyogs ldog pa ni 'chad par
T03D3805:16b-10: 'gyur pa'i rnam pa kun ji ltar rigs par mnyam
T03D3805:16b-11: par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su ro gcig pa nyid
T03D3805:16b-12: ni sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi skabs
T03D3805:16b-13: su mgon pos rnam par gzhag par byas so //
T03D3805:16b-14: de las langs nas mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas
T03D3805:16b-15: skabs su sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs bsten pa'i
T03D3805:16b-16: dus su yang mos pa de nyid bsgom par bya
T03D3805:16b-17: zhes pa nyid ni zung du 'brel pas bgrod pa'i
T03D3805:16b-18: lam la 'di nyid sgrub pa la gdams pas te
T03D3805:16b-19: / bcom ldan 'das ma 'dir tshogs shing bsdus nas
T03D3805:16b-20: gsungs la 'di las gzhan pa'i gdams ngag rnams ni
T03D3805:16b-21: zhad tsam du gsungs pa yin la /
T03D3805:16b-22: yum chen mo la ni bcu char yang rgyas par gsungs te /
T03D3805:16b-24: sgrub dang bden pa rnams dang ni //
T03D3805:16b-25: sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum //
T03D3805:16b-26: ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang //
T03D3805:16b-27: lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3805:16b-28: spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi //
T03D3805:16b-29: yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang //
T03D3805:16b-30: sgom zhes bya la gdams ngag ni //
T03D3805:16b-31: bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya //
T03D3805:16b-33: de la gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang de stong
T03D3805:16b-34: pa nyid ni gang du cung zad ldan pa'am mi
T03D3805:16b-35: ldan par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste
T03D3805:16b-36: / de rnams kyang de'i ngo bo nyid kyis na
T03D3805:16b-37: tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa dag tu
T03D3805:16b-38: mi sbyor bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:16b-39: pa la sbyor bar rig par bya zhes pa ni
T03D3805:16b-40: sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la gdams pa'o//
T03D3805:16b-41: gzugs la sogs pa can la skye ba dang 'gag
T03D3805:16b-42: pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par
T03D3805:16b-43: byang ba'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su
T03D3805:16b-44: mi mthong la gzugs nas ji srid du rnam par
T03D3805:16b-45: shes pa'i bar nyid stong pa la stong pa nyid
T03D3805:16b-46: kyang rnam par shes pa'o zhes dbyer med pa'i sgro
T03D3805:17a-1: yongs su spangs pa ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'o //
T03D3805:17a-2: stong pa nyid ni skye bar mi 'gyur 'gag par
T03D3805:17a-3: mi 'gyur zhes pa nas ji srid du 'phel bar
T03D3805:17a-4: mi 'gyur la de la gzugs la sogs pa med
T03D3805:17a-5: cing kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam med
T03D3805:17a-6: pa nas ji srid du sangs rgyas med byang chub
T03D3805:17a-7: med ces pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa la'o //
T03D3805:17a-8: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:17a-9: spyod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs
T03D3805:17a-10: pa dang bdag nyid ldan pa'am mi ldan par yang
T03D3805:17a-11: dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa nas rnam
T03D3805:17a-12: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das pa la sogs
T03D3805:17a-13: pa rnams su sbyor bar mi byed de /
T03D3805:17a-14: dus gsum stong pa nyid nye bar gzung ba'i phyir zhes pa ni lam gyi bden pa'i'o //
T03D3805:17a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po lam du bshad
T03D3805:17a-16: pa rnams la sangs rgyas nyid ni rnam pa thams
T03D3805:17a-18: de la phung po dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3805:17a-19: pa nyid du sbyor bar byed pa gang de yang
T03D3805:17a-20: dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes pa nas ji
T03D3805:17a-21: srid du sangs rgyas dang sbyor bar byed pa gang
T03D3805:17a-22: de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste
T03D3805:17a-23: / de la des gang du de mthong ba med
T03D3805:17a-24: la de bzhin du byang chub med cing des de'i
T03D3805:17a-25: byang chub par bya ba med do //
T03D3805:17a-26: de ltar na 'dis sangs rgyas nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la /
T03D3805:17a-27: de nyid sangs rgyas dang byang chub nyid de /
T03D3805:17a-28: de nyid byang chub nyid ces pas dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03D3805:17a-29: dmigs pa po mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ni
T03D3805:17a-30: sangs rgyas so zhes pa ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog
T03D3805:17a-31: la gdams pa'o // chos kyi ni lam gyi 'bras bu ste /
T03D3805:17a-32: byang chub dang sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bshad la /
T03D3805:17a-33: 'dir chos ni lam gyi bden pa'i stong pa nyid
T03D3805:17a-34: kyi rnal 'byor gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:17a-35: phyin pa nyid chos dkon mchog ste /
T03D3805:17a-36: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir de
T03D3805:17a-37: la cung zad kyang ji ltar yang spyod pa med
T03D3805:17a-38: pa la gang du yang cung zad shes rab kyi
T03D3805:17a-39: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang med
T03D3805:17a-41: de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste /
T03D3805:17a-43: stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor zhes gzhan min par
T03D3805:17a-44: thams cad sbyor zhing zil gyis mnan nas kun tu
T03D3805:17a-45: gnas so zhes pa ni chos dkon mchog la gdams
T03D3805:17b-0: pa'o // de la dge 'dun dkon mchog @17b ni
T03D3805:17b-1: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs so
T03D3805:17b-2: zhes 'phags pa rnam par grol sdes bshad la de
T03D3805:17b-3: ni gang zag nyi shu ste /
T03D3805:17b-4: de dag rnams nyan thos kyi gang zag rnams dang
T03D3805:17b-5: mi 'dra ba ni dge 'dun nyid du yid chas
T03D3805:17b-6: pa'i don du'o // 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i dbye
T03D3805:17b-7: ba ni de rnams las byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3805:17b-8: kyi khyad par brjod pa'i don te /
T03D3805:17b-9: de ni bar ma ji lta bzhin no //
T03D3805:17b-10: 'dir bstan bcos kyis rgyun tu zhugs pa dang lan
T03D3805:17b-11: cig phyir 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
T03D3805:17b-12: la zhugs pa ni go sla ba nyid las ma
T03D3805:17b-13: bsdus so // dbang po rtul dang rnon po dag / dad dang mthong thob rigs nas rigs //
T03D3805:17b-14: bar chad gcig par skyes nas dang //
T03D3805:17b-15: byed dang byed min 'og min 'gro /'phar gsum srid
T03D3805:17b-16: rtse mthar thug 'gro / gzugs kyi 'dod chags bcom
T03D3805:17b-17: pa dang // mthong chos zhi lus mngon sum byed //
T03D3805:17b-18: bse ru dang ni nyi shu'o //
T03D3805:17b-19: zhes te 'chad par 'gyur ba mthong ba'i lam gyi
T03D3805:17b-20: skad cig ma bco lnga la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
T03D3805:17b-21: 'bras bu la zhugs pa po brgyad pa la rnam
T03D3805:17b-22: pa gnyis la dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni
T03D3805:17b-23: dbang po rtul po nyid de dad pas de'i lam
T03D3805:17b-24: gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:17b-25: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni chos mthong ba'i
T03D3805:17b-26: shes rab des de lam gyi rjes su 'brang bas
T03D3805:17b-27: dbang po rnon po de nyid de phyir mi ldog
T03D3805:17b-28: pa'i phyir ro // de ltar yang yum bar mar /
T03D3805:17b-29: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ni gang zhig mi
T03D3805:17b-30: dag las shi 'phos nas mi rnams su skyes nas
T03D3805:17b-31: de phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpar gnas
T03D3805:17b-32: par 'gyur ba nyid ni dbang po som nyi can
T03D3805:17b-33: du 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:17b-34: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni dga' ldan gyi
T03D3805:17b-35: lha rnams nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes nas de'i
T03D3805:17b-36: dbang po rnams kyang rnon por 'gyur ro zhes pa
T03D3805:17b-37: la sogs pa'o // skad cig ma bcu drug pa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa ste /
T03D3805:17b-38: de nyid kyis bsgom pa'i lam gyis 'dod pa na
T03D3805:17b-39: spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa bye brag rnam pa bzhi
T03D3805:17b-40: po spangs shing rtogs pa'i bye brag rnam pa bzhi
T03D3805:17b-41: dang ldan pa'i sbyang dka' ba'i sa la rnam pa
T03D3805:17b-42: gnyis te / mi'i rigs nas rigs dang lha'i rigs nas rigs so //
T03D3805:17b-43: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bye brag
T03D3805:17b-44: rnam pa lnga pa spangs nas rnam pa lngas mngon
T03D3805:17b-45: du gyur pa'i sa pa ste /
T03D3805:18a-0: lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la @18a * //
T03D3805:18a-1: zhugs pa can gyi dbang po rtul po dad pa dang mthong bas thob pa nyid ni gcig go //
T03D3805:18a-2: 'dod pa na kun du spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa
T03D3805:18a-3: rnam pa drug spangs shing rnam pa drug gis ring
T03D3805:18a-4: du song ba la lan cig phyir 'ong ba ste
T03D3805:18a-5: / 'jig rten 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas gzhan du mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:18a-6: de nyid la skye ba gcig gis lhag ma dang
T03D3805:18a-7: bcas pa'i phyir 'dir skye ba gcig gis bar chod
T03D3805:18a-8: ces pas na bar chad gcig pa can te /
T03D3805:18a-9: bar chod pa'i mthar sangs rgyas nyid du'o //
T03D3805:18a-10: 'dod pa na kun tu spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa
T03D3805:18a-11: rnam pa bdun pa nas bye brag bdun gyi la
T03D3805:18a-12: / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bye
T03D3805:18a-13: brag med pa spangs pa ni mi g-yo ba dang
T03D3805:18a-14: legs pa'i blo gros su ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i
T03D3805:18a-15: 'bras bu la zhugs pa can te /
T03D3805:18a-16: snga ma bzhin du dad pa dang mthong bas thob pa'o //
T03D3805:18a-17: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i bye brag dgu pa spangs
T03D3805:18a-18: pas de chos kyi sprin la phyir mi 'ong ba
T03D3805:18a-19: ste / de ltar yang theg pa chen po'i chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las bshad pa /
T03D3805:18a-20: bsgom pa'i lam la 'dod pa na kun tu spyod
T03D3805:18a-21: pa'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa dgu pa rnam par
T03D3805:18a-22: spangs pas phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes pa
T03D3805:18a-23: dang / 'phags pa rnam par grol sdes kyang /
T03D3805:18a-24: sems can gyi don gyi nges par 'byung ba'i 'grel
T03D3805:18a-25: par sa bcu pa la ni rnam par rtog pa
T03D3805:18a-26: chung ngu'i chung ngu'i gnyen por lam chen po'i chen
T03D3805:18a-27: pos rnam par bral ba tsam du bshad ces pa'i
T03D3805:18a-28: phyir ro // ji ltar phyir mi 'ong ba zhe na /
T03D3805:18a-29: ji ltar gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der skyes pa gnyis par mi 'jug pa'o //
T03D3805:18a-30: de yang rnam pa lnga ste /
T03D3805:18a-31: bar ma dor mya ngan las 'da' ba ni tshangs
T03D3805:18a-32: ris nas 'og min gyi bar du mngon par rdzogs
T03D3805:18a-33: par sangs rgyas nas 'dir mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T03D3805:18a-34: rgyas pa la sogs pa ston par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:18a-35: skyes nas mya ngan las 'da' ba na 'og min
T03D3805:18a-36: nas dga' ldan dang de nas 'dzam bu'i gling du
T03D3805:18a-37: 'ongs nas khyim na gnas pa las nges par byung
T03D3805:18a-38: nas de ma thag du byang chub kyi shing drung
T03D3805:18a-39: du skyil mo krung bcas nas gang dang po'i sems
T03D3805:18a-40: bskyed pa des bskyed pa nyid kyis 'chad par 'gyur
T03D3805:18a-41: ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi phung po lhag ma dang
T03D3805:18a-42: bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'o //
T03D3805:18a-43: mngon par 'dus byas nas mya ngan las 'da' ba
T03D3805:18b-0: @18b ni 'dir sems can gyi don rnams bcom pa
T03D3805:18b-1: nyid du mngon par 'du byed pa'o //
T03D3805:18b-2: mngon par 'du byed pa med par mya ngan las
T03D3805:18b-3: 'da' ba ni 'di ni rigs kyi khyad par gyis
T03D3805:18b-4: myur bar 'gyur te 'bad pa chung ngu nyid kyis
T03D3805:18b-6: lnga pa gang du 'pho ba ni de nas 'og
T03D3805:18b-7: min dang srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa ste
T03D3805:18b-8: / dang po ni tshangs ris nas 'phar ba dang
T03D3805:18b-9: phyed du 'phar ba dang gnas thams cad las 'pho
T03D3805:18b-10: bas 'og min du 'jug pa ste rnam pa gsum
T03D3805:18b-11: / mo // srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:18b-12: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mthong ba'i
T03D3805:18b-13: chos la zhi ba mya ngan las 'da' ba ste
T03D3805:18b-14: / skye ba rnam pa thams cad du rgyun mi
T03D3805:18b-15: 'chad par mthong ba la sbyin pa dang tshul khrims
T03D3805:18b-16: la sogs pa'i chos kyis 'di nyid du bla na
T03D3805:18b-17: med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
T03D3805:18b-18: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ba dang
T03D3805:18b-19: / / lus kyis mngon sum byed pa ni mya
T03D3805:18b-20: ngan las 'da' ba dang 'dra ba'i chos la lus
T03D3805:18b-21: kyis mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir na ji ltar
T03D3805:18b-22: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas lus kyis mngon sum
T03D3805:18b-23: du byed na sems de med de lus la brten
T03D3805:18b-25: gang yang yum bar ma las /
T03D3805:18b-26: de bas bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs
T03D3805:18b-27: shing de las langs nas 'gog pa la snyoms par
T03D3805:18b-28: 'jug pa'o // de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis
T03D3805:18b-29: pa la snyoms par 'jug la zhes pa nas ji
T03D3805:18b-30: srid du thabs mkhas pa'i thod rgal gyi snyoms par
T03D3805:18b-31: 'jug pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams
T03D3805:18b-32: su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3805:18b-33: byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par
T03D3805:18b-35: gang zhig phyir mi 'ong ba lnga po rnams kyis
T03D3805:18b-36: khyad par gyi lam du nyon mongs pa'i bye brag
T03D3805:18b-37: bdun cu rtsa gnyis po rnams spangs nas gnyen po'i
T03D3805:18b-38: bye brag bdun cu rtsa gcig po rtogs pa rnams
T03D3805:18b-39: ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa can
T03D3805:18b-40: te / dad pa dang mthong bas thob pa sbal
T03D3805:18b-41: pa mchong ba'i tshul gyis dad pa dang mthong ba
T03D3805:18b-42: thob pa'i sgra'i rjes su 'jug pa'i zhugs pa po
T03D3805:18b-43: gsum ni tshig le'ur byas pas so sor bsgrub la
T03D3805:18b-44: te / / de nyid kho na 'phags pa rnam
T03D3805:18b-45: par grol sde'i snga ma dang phyi ma'i ngag rnams
T03D3805:19a-0: te / / kyis gsungs so // gang de ni da ltar 'dod @19a * //
T03D3805:19a-1: pa na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bye brag dgu
T03D3805:19a-2: pa spangs pa'i phyir phyir mi ldog pa rnam pa
T03D3805:19a-3: lnga'o // de nas 'dir srid pa'i rtse mo'i nyon
T03D3805:19a-4: mongs pa'i bye brag brgyad pa spangs pas dgra bcom
T03D3805:19a-5: pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:19a-6: dgra bcom pa ni mi slob pa yang dag par
T03D3805:19a-7: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas na dge 'dun gyi nang
T03D3805:19a-8: du mi 'du'o // so so'i skye bo ni slob pa dang mi slob kyang rung ste /
T03D3805:19a-9: slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3805:19a-10: smon lam btab pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:19a-11: rang sangs rgyas dang nyi shu ste /
T03D3805:19a-12: gang du gsungs pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems
T03D3805:19a-13: dpa' gang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten rnams
T03D3805:19a-14: su song zhing nyan thos rnams sam rang sangs rgyas
T03D3805:19a-15: rnams kyi byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par
T03D3805:19a-16: gyur nas de'i thabs la mkhas pas /
T03D3805:19a-17: srog chags brgya stong mang po dang srog chags bye
T03D3805:19a-18: ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yongs su smin
T03D3805:19a-19: par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par
T03D3805:19a-20: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
T03D3805:19a-21: rgyas par 'gyur ba yang yod ces pa'o //
T03D3805:19a-22: de ni rnam pa gnyis kyis rang sangs rgyas dang chos mthun te /
T03D3805:19a-23: gcig pa'i rang nyid kyis dang gzhan rnams la thos
T03D3805:19a-24: pa med par sangs rgyas kyi chos kun du gsal
T03D3805:19a-25: bar byed pa'i phyir dang gzhan du rang sangs rgyas
T03D3805:19a-26: kyi cha byad kyis kyang byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:19a-27: gang zag nyi shu po 'di rnams kyang shes rab
T03D3805:19a-28: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i phyir
T03D3805:19a-29: bsgrub pa la gdams pa las zhad tsam du bshad
T03D3805:19a-30: de / de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir byang
T03D3805:19a-31: chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun nyi shu po la slob
T03D3805:19a-32: pa rnams kyis skye ba med par rab tu 'jug
T03D3805:19a-33: ces pa ni dkon mchog gsum la gdams pa'o //
T03D3805:19a-34: byang chub sems dpa' lus dang ngag dang sems rnams
T03D3805:19a-35: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la
T03D3805:19a-36: spyod pa na de nye bar dmigs par yang mi
T03D3805:19a-37: 'gyur te / pha rol tu phyin pa yang med
T03D3805:19a-38: la lus la sogs pas bde ba myong ba yang
T03D3805:19a-39: 'gyur te / med de / lus la sogs pa
T03D3805:19a-40: rnams ni don dam par na ngo bo nyid kyis
T03D3805:19a-41: med ces pa ni ma zhan pa la gdams pa'o
T03D3805:19a-42: 'gyur te / med de / // dus yun ring
T03D3805:19a-43: por sbyangs pas kyang mnyam par bzhag pa'i don ma
T03D3805:19a-44: grub na yongs su ngal ba med de gzugs la
T03D3805:19b-0: sogs pa @19b nas ji srid du bla na med
T03D3805:19b-1: pa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar
T03D3805:19b-2: la rlom pa med ces pa ni mi ngal ba
T03D3805:19b-3: 'gyur te / med de / // la gdams pa'o
T03D3805:19b-4: // des phyogs re re zhing gang g'a'i klung gi
T03D3805:19b-5: bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la blta
T03D3805:19b-6: ba dang de rnams kyis chos bstan pa rnams nyan
T03D3805:19b-7: pa dang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang
T03D3805:19b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la blta
T03D3805:19b-9: 'gyur te / med de / // la gdams pa'o
T03D3805:19b-10: // ba dang / des bdag nyid dang gzhan thams
T03D3805:19b-11: cad kyis mi shes pas pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:19b-12: rnams la spyod pa dang zhes pa nas ji srid
T03D3805:19b-13: du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
T03D3805:19b-14: 'gyur te / med de / // la gdams pa'o
T03D3805:19b-15: // ba dang / par byed la / de yang
T03D3805:19b-16: thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir rlom pa
T03D3805:19b-17: med pa'i spyod pa rnams kyis kun nas yang dag
T03D3805:19b-18: par yongs su zin pas so zhes pa ni yongs
T03D3805:19b-20: des spyan lnga dang mngon par shes pa drug so
T03D3805:19b-21: sor thob kyang de dang de thams cad kyang kun
T03D3805:19b-22: tu shes pa med cing nye bar dmigs par mi
T03D3805:19b-23: 'gyur ro // de la sha'i spyan gang gis ni
T03D3805:19b-24: dpag tshad brgya nas ji srid du stong gsum gyi
T03D3805:19b-25: stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs mthong
T03D3805:19b-26: 'gyur ro // ngo // lha'i spyan ni gzugs dang /
T03D3805:19b-27: sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'o //
T03D3805:19b-28: shes rab kyi spyan gyis don dam par chos thams cad rjes su mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:19b-29: kun rdzob tu ni thams cad rjes su dmigs pa'o //
T03D3805:19b-30: chos kyi spyan gyis ni 'phags pa'i gang zag gis
T03D3805:19b-31: gang rtogs pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ba'o
T03D3805:19b-32: // sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis chos thams cad rnam
T03D3805:19b-33: pa thams cad du zhes pa ni spyan lnga la
T03D3805:19b-34: // gdams pa'o // rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa dang
T03D3805:19b-35: lha'i mig dang lha'i rna ba dang sems can gyi
T03D3805:19b-36: sems kyi spyod pa shes pa dang /
T03D3805:19b-37: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang zag pa
T03D3805:19b-38: zad par shes pa zhes pa ni mngon par shes
T03D3805:19b-39: pa drug ste / lha'i mig gis mngon par shes
T03D3805:19b-40: pas ni sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye
T03D3805:19b-42: 'di ni mngon par 'du byas pa'i sngon gyi lha'i
T03D3805:19b-43: mig gi rnam par smin pa las byung ba can
T03D3805:19b-44: la sangs rgyas kyi spyan dang zag pa zad pa'i
T03D3805:19b-45: ye shes ni sa brgyad pa nas brtsams te skye
T03D3805:19b-46: bar 'gyur zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis ni /
T03D3805:20a-0: yid kyi blo bzhin du dbang pos rtogs par bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi yul @20a * //
T03D3805:20a-1: yongs su gcod pas rnam par shes pa thams cad kyi yul du thams cad 'dod do //
T03D3805:20a-2: ji skad du dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las /
T03D3805:20a-3: de bzhin du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor gyis kyang gzigs so //
T03D3805:20a-4: de bzhin du mdzod spu dang mtshan re res kyang gzigs so //
T03D3805:20a-5: de bzhin du dus gcig la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
T03D3805:20a-6: gyi khams rab 'byam rnam pa thams cad mthong zhes
T03D3805:20a-7: gsungs pa de ltar na yang dbang po'i blo ni
T03D3805:20a-8: sngon gyi rjes su 'brang nas rnam par gzhag par
T03D3805:20a-9: bya zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa drug la
T03D3805:20a-10: gdams pa'o // de nyid kyis sgrub pa'i ting nge
T03D3805:20a-11: 'dzin gyi chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par
T03D3805:20a-12: yongs su brtags pa'i lhag mthong dag mngon du byas
T03D3805:20a-13: gdams pa'o // nas / de yongs su smin nas
T03D3805:20a-14: lhun gyis grub pa'i spros pa med pa'i dbyings su
T03D3805:20a-15: sems pa yang dag par 'jog nas 'jig rten las
T03D3805:20a-16: 'das pa'i ye shes kyis de ltar gang yang ma
T03D3805:20a-17: mthong ba'i don des mthong ngo zhes pa ni mthong
T03D3805:20a-19: gang du mthong ba'i kho na'i rgyun gyi ye shes
T03D3805:20a-20: des bsgom par bya ba zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i
T03D3805:20a-22: de nyid mi dmigs pa'i rnam pas shes rab kyi
T03D3805:20a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sgrub pa
T03D3805:20a-28: yongs su mi ngal ba dang /
T03D3805:20a-29: phyogs bcur lta dgongs kyang des 'dir theg pa gzhan
T03D3805:20a-30: du mi 'gro ba'i rgyur lam yongs su 'dzin pa'i
T03D3805:20a-32: gzhan mngon par shes pa drug dang /
T03D3805:20a-34: bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'phags pa'i sa rnams la kun tu spyod do //
T03D3805:20a-35: zhes pa ni 'dir gdams ngag rim pa'o //
T03D3805:20a-36: 'dir tshogs kyi sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3805:20a-37: dpas chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob nas
T03D3805:20a-38: stan gcig la 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang
T03D3805:20a-39: chub sems dpa' rnams la chos nyan cing gzhung dang
T03D3805:20a-40: don dag 'dzin pa rnams la bsam gtan dang /
T03D3805:20a-41: mngon par shes pa mngon par bsgrubs nas 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su de 'gro bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:20a-42: sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa rnams //
T03D3805:20a-43: mchod pa'i don dang gzhan don du //
T03D3805:20b-1: gdams ngag gis bstan mngon shes kyis //
T03D3805:20b-2: spyod pa'i sa la rab tu 'jug / ces pa ste /
T03D3805:20b-3: sems bskyed pa bzhi pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha
T03D3805:20b-4: dang mthun pa'i dge bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3805:20b-5: mthong ba'i lam 'byed cing so sor phye nas mngon
T03D3805:20b-6: sum du byed pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha shas
T03D3805:20b-7: des rten cing thob pa des na nges par 'byed
T03D3805:20b-9: nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag ni rgyu'o //
T03D3805:20b-10: yang na nges par 'byed pa ni nges pa la de'i yan lag ni cha shas te /
T03D3805:20b-11: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang chen po'i chen po nyid kyis rnam pa bzhi'o //
T03D3805:20b-12: de la drod ni shing gtsubs pa'i me bzhin du

T03D3805:26b-38: bde ba dang sngon po dag ni rnam par chad
T03D3805:26b-39: pa'i yul nyid pas sbyor ba med par nyams su
T03D3805:26b-40: myong bas grub pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:26b-41: 'on te sngon po dang bde ba dag kyang tha
T03D3805:26b-42: mi dad pa yang ma yin pas rang rig pa'o
T03D3805:27a-0: zhes te / gang sngon po de nyid bde ba zhes @27a * //
T03D3805:27a-2: bde ba yang gzhan la sngon po yang gzhan zhes pa ni phan tshun 'gal te /
T03D3805:27a-3: des gang las tha dad pa'i go skabs nyid kyi
T03D3805:27a-4: mtshams su rtogs par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:27a-5: // rnam par rig pa tsam gyi thul gang zhig ni gsal ba gcig pu'i ngo bo yod de /
T03D3805:27a-6: mi gsal ba med pa'i phyir 'di nyid tha mi dad par gnas la /
T03D3805:27a-7: phyi rol dag pa ni de kho na nyid du
T03D3805:27a-8: mi gsal ba nyid kyis de ni mi dmigs pa
T03D3805:27a-9: las gzhan pa'i med pa ni med pas /
T03D3805:27a-10: de'i phyir gzhan du mngon par 'dod pa'i zhad tsam
T03D3805:27a-11: yang rtogs pa med pa nyid la gang las tha
T03D3805:27a-12: dad de / 'das pa la sogs pa la ni rig pa med de med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:27a-13: de ltar snga ma dang phyi ma nyid la gsal ba med la /
T03D3805:27a-14: gsal bar bya ba yang snga ma dang phyi ma
T03D3805:27a-15: nyid du mi sbyor ba'i phyir re de brjod pa
T03D3805:27a-16: ni 'khrul dang ma 'khrul brtags dang ma brtags pa
T03D3805:27a-17: // dkar po nag po la sogs dpang skyes ma lus rnams //
T03D3805:27a-18: shes las gzhan du tha mi dad par lhan cig dmigs //
T03D3805:27a-19: sngon dang phyi ma nyid la rig pa med pa nyid ces bya //
T03D3805:27a-21: ci grub pa'i mtha' g-yang sa ni ltung bar byed
T03D3805:27a-22: pa rtsom pa 'dis ni gzhan gyi rgyud med par
T03D3805:27a-24: rgyud gzhan srid pa na ni nges par rang gi
T03D3805:27a-25: sems de las tha dad pa ca la tha mi
T03D3805:27a-26: dad pa ni rang gi rgyud las gzhan gyi rgyud
T03D3805:27a-28: de ltar 'dod pa'i phyir mi 'gyur te /
T03D3805:27a-30: mngon sum rnag rig pa tsam dang //
T03D3805:27a-31: gang du kun tu gnas gyur pas /
T03D3805:27a-32: 'dod pas dag yod ces brjod pa //
T03D3805:27a-33: 'di la kho bos mtshar du brtsis //
T03D3805:27a-35: tshul chen po'i de kho na nyid las phyin ci
T03D3805:27a-36: log pa'i sangs rgyas pas rig byed kyi grub mtha'
T03D3805:27a-38: sna tshogs tshangs par smra ba rnams kyi ni gzung
T03D3805:27a-39: ba dang 'dzin pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i bdag
T03D3805:27a-40: gi ngo bor yongs su gsal ba'i chu dang /
T03D3805:27a-41: med la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i rgyun chad pa med
T03D3805:27a-42: pa'i rtag pa'i rang rig pa tsam gyi gnyis su
T03D3805:27a-43: med pa ni tshangs shes pa ste /
T03D3805:27a-44: don dam pa'o zhes pa'i grub pa'i mtha' ste /
T03D3805:27a-45: gang du sems kyi 'khor lo med pa'i gcig med pa'o //
T03D3805:27b-0: bdag nyid @27b 'dis ni nam mkha' khyab bdag de lta na 'ang //
T03D3805:27b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de ltar thugs kyis gsal ba yi //
T03D3805:27b-2: bsgrub par byas pa de ni shin tu de nyid min /
T03D3805:27b-4: de nyid ni cung zad min cing de yang nges par dam pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:27b-5: ma rig pa dang bcas pa'i shes pa la nam
T03D3805:27b-6: mkha' bzhin gyi yul dang dus la khyab pa po
T03D3805:27b-7: nyid kyi de kho na nyid so sor snang ba
T03D3805:27b-9: ma rig pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs
T03D3805:27b-10: kyi gsal ba de yang de kho na nyid min
T03D3805:27b-11: pa min / sna thogs gsal ba tsan gyis gnyis
T03D3805:27b-12: su med pa zhes pa'i de kho na nyid kyi
T03D3805:27b-13: pa min / mtshan nyid la / cung zhig de
T03D3805:27b-14: kho na nyid min zhes 'dir bcom ldan 'das 'khrul
T03D3805:27b-15: pa nyid ces smad pa brjod pa'i phyin ci log
T03D3805:27b-17: de'i phyir na 'dir khyad par med pa'i sna tshogs
T03D3805:27b-18: pa dang 'dir ni gnyis med dang gsal ba'i sgra
T03D3805:27b-19: don gyi rnam pa dang bcas pas gnyis su gsal
T03D3805:27b-20: zhes pa'i gsum go khyad par med do //
T03D3805:27b-21: tha ma'i 'dod pa yang ni snga ma bzhin du mi dmigs pas rgyud gzhan med par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:27b-22: rnam pa med pa'i shes pa ni rang gsal ba tsam mo //
T03D3805:27b-23: gnyis su med pa'i snga ma dang phyi ma myong
T03D3805:27b-24: ba med pa'i ngo bo'i rnam pa med par smra
T03D3805:27b-25: ba'i sangs rgyas pas gzhan gyi rgyud med ces pa
T03D3805:27b-26: khas mi len cing bdag nyid med pa'i sgra don
T03D3805:27b-27: gyi sngon po la sogs pa bzhin du /
T03D3805:27b-28: gzhan gyi rgyud kyi gsal ba med pas med ces
T03D3805:27b-29: nyid ni snang ba med pa'i tshang pa dang khyad
T03D3805:27b-30: par med par thal bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:27b-31: rnam par 'phro ba'i yul gyi rnam par ni rtog
T03D3805:27b-32: pa'i bdag nyid la gsal ba tsam po'i tshangs pa
T03D3805:27b-33: gnyis su med pa ni don dam pa ste /
T03D3805:27b-34: tshu rol byi gnas skabs su ni ma tig pas kun du bsgribs pa ste /
T03D3805:27b-35: de la rtag pa dang khyab bdag nyid la sogs
T03D3805:27b-36: pa'i khyad par la goms pas ma lus pa'i ma
T03D3805:27b-37: rig pa zad nas de'i khyad par las byung ba
T03D3805:27b-38: 'dir gsal bar 'gyur zhes pa ni rig byed kyi
T03D3805:27b-40: gzhan gyi rgyud mi srid na thugs rje chen po
T03D3805:27b-41: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs la sogs
T03D3805:27b-42: pa med pas gang du bsod nams dang ye shes
T03D3805:27b-43: kyi tshogs bsgrub par bya bas skyes bu'i don mchog
T03D3805:28a-1: na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dpag tu med
T03D3805:28a-2: pa'i gzhan gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa can
T03D3805:28a-3: la yang smod par 'gyur bas de'i phyir tha dad
T03D3805:28a-4: par 'dzin pa bzhin tha mi dad par 'dzin pa
T03D3805:28a-6: gang las tha dad mthong ba dang //
T03D3805:28a-7: ma 'dres tha mi dad par shes //
T03D3805:28a-8: tha dad tha mi dad dag las //
T03D3805:28a-9: gzhan pa'i dngos dang dngos 'dzin med //
T03D3805:28a-12: don dam par ni dngos po gzung ba dang 'dzin
T03D3805:28a-13: pa tha dad pa'am tha mi dad rnams med de
T03D3805:28a-14: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir na chos rnams thams
T03D3805:28a-15: cad kyi gnyi ga med pa'o //
T03D3805:28a-16: de nyid spros pa des rig pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:28a-17: bden pa nyid la ni gzung ba la sogs pa
T03D3805:28a-18: dang gzhan pa'i bye brag gi bden pa dang mi
T03D3805:28a-19: bden pa la sogs pa'i spros pa dang bral zhing
T03D3805:28a-20: med pas de la mi srid do //
T03D3805:28a-21: de nyid kyis na rang dang gzhan gsal ba'i ldog
T03D3805:28a-22: pa'i ma brtags na nyams dga' bas myong ba'i bdag
T03D3805:28a-23: nyid kyi bye brag gzhan gsal ba ni rigs pa
T03D3805:28a-24: kho na'o // bems po las ldog pa tsam gyis
T03D3805:28a-25: kun rdzob tu rang gi rig pa'i ngo bor yang
T03D3805:28a-26: tha snyad byed de kun rdzob tu yang rnam par
T03D3805:28a-27: chad pa'i sngon po la sogs pa can gyi phyi
T03D3805:28a-28: rol nyid kyi dngos por ma brtags na nyams dga'
T03D3805:28a-29: ba de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i shes
T03D3805:28a-31: rnam par rtog pas ni bden ba la sogs pa nyid du sgro 'dogs /
T03D3805:28a-32: sgro btags nas yang tha snyad rab tu 'jug pa po'i byed pa ste /
T03D3805:28a-33: rjod byed dang ldan pa'i rjod byed sbyor ba'i sbyor
T03D3805:28a-34: bya'i don gsal bar ma nges pa ni rnam par
T03D3805:28a-36: rnam par rtog pa nyid la dmigs pa dang mngon
T03D3805:28a-37: par rlom pa la sogs pa ni rnam grangs te
T03D3805:28a-38: / de nyid kyis kho na nyid min par sgro
T03D3805:28a-39: btags nas phyin ci log pas de kho na nyid
T03D3805:28a-40: dang de kho na nyid min pa gtan la ma
T03D3805:28a-41: / phebs nas / the tshom dang de kho na
T03D3805:28a-42: nyid mtha' gcig pa'i yul gyi phyir nges pa zhes
T03D3805:28a-43: pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag par rig par
T03D3805:28a-44: / phebs nas / bya'o // de nyid la kun
T03D3805:28a-45: rdzob tu phyi rol gyi dngos pos gnas pa 'di
T03D3805:28a-46: thams cad dang gzhan gyi sems yod pa nyid ni
T03D3805:28a-47: kha na ma thob med pa'o //
T03D3805:28a-48: thog ma med pa'i srid pa nas goms pa'i tha
T03D3805:28b-0: snyad kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis na @28b byas
T03D3805:28b-1: pa dang bud med la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:28b-2: yang 'jig rten pas skyes bu la sogs pa can
T03D3805:28b-3: du mngon sum nyid kyi sems pa dang sems pa
T03D3805:28b-4: med pa dang bden pa dang mi bden pa la
T03D3805:28b-5: sogs pa nyid du yongs su gcod cing /
T03D3805:28b-6: myur du 'khyud pa dang brdeg pa la sogs pa'i don la nye bar 'jug la /
T03D3805:28b-7: thos pa la sogs pas the tshom mi skye ba nyid du gzhan gyi sems rjes su dpag ste /
T03D3805:28b-8: de ltar yang 'dod pa'i sems kyi de ma thag
T03D3805:28b-9: tu tshig gi brjod pa'i bya ba ston la de
T03D3805:28b-10: med pa na mi ston pa'i rjes su 'gro ba
T03D3805:28b-11: dang ldog pa'i bdag nyid can du 'dod pa'i sems
T03D3805:28b-12: dang lhan cig pas tshig tu brjod pa la sogs
T03D3805:28b-13: pas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por rtogs pa'i bdag
T03D3805:28b-14: nyid kyis de'i 'dod pa'i sems kyis myong ba'i dus
T03D3805:28b-15: su rnam par chad pa'i tshig gis brjod pa la
T03D3805:28b-16: sogs pa mthong nas de'i rgyur gyur pa'i 'dod pa'i
T03D3805:28b-17: rjes su dpog par byed pas /
T03D3805:28b-18: rgyud gzhan la gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:28b-19: tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i dngos po thams cad ni
T03D3805:28b-20: kun rdzob pas na yang dag pa'i kun rdzob la
T03D3805:28b-21: brten pa nyid du bya ste /
T03D3805:28b-22: gzhan du na ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:28b-23: de ltar yang rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin du
T03D3805:28b-24: ji ltar 'dod pa'i don kun tu thob pa tsam
T03D3805:28b-25: gyi don dam par ni ma yin pa can gyi
T03D3805:28b-26: dngos po'i yul nyid ni tha snyad pa'i tshad mar
T03D3805:28b-27: rnam par gzhag pa las gzhan du ni min no
T03D3805:28b-29: 'di ltar kun du tha snyad ni /
T03D3805:28b-30: tshad ma yi ni mtshan nyid do //
T03D3805:28b-32: 'dir kun rdzob tu yang ji srid du bsgrub bya
T03D3805:28b-33: dang sgrub byed du gnas pa de srid du tshul
T03D3805:28b-34: gsum pa'i rtags nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ba yod
T03D3805:28b-35: pa'am / dgag pa 'grub ste phyogs chos dang 'brel
T03D3805:28b-36: pas tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis kyang mngon sum
T03D3805:28b-37: gyi rtags 'dzin par byed na kun rdzob pa'i ngo
T03D3805:28b-38: bo nyid med pa gzung bar 'gyur la /
T03D3805:28b-39: tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis dngos po'i ngo bo
T03D3805:28b-40: la goms pa'i mngon sum du ni mi myong ba'i
T03D3805:28b-41: phyir ro // 'o na 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rjes
T03D3805:28b-42: su dpag pas sngon po la sogs pa rnams kyi
T03D3805:28b-43: rang bzhin la gnod pa'i phyir ji ltar na de
T03D3805:28b-44: rnams la mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhe na /
T03D3805:28b-45: kun rdzob pa'i dngos po'i ngo bo rnams la des mi gnod de /
T03D3805:29a-0: cung zhig bsgrub bya kho na la de ltar sgro btags pa'am bden @29a * //
T03D3805:29a-1: pa'i rnam pa kho na bzlog bya'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29a-2: tha snyad pa'i mngon sum gyi spyod yul gyi don
T03D3805:29a-3: ni rmi lam la sogs pa bzhin kun rdzob tu
T03D3805:29a-5: byis pa rnams kyis don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:29a-6: la sogs pa sgro 'dogs pa la rjes su dpag
T03D3805:29a-8: mthong ba la sogs pa'i don gyi tha snyad la ni ma yin no //
T03D3805:29a-9: gang ma 'khrul pa de ni mngon sum de la
T03D3805:29a-10: rjes su dpag pas mi gnod la gnod pa ni
T03D3805:29a-11: bden par sgro btags pa nyid la sogs pa la
T03D3805:29a-12: ste / de la ma 'khrul pa de med ces
T03D3805:29a-13: pas na mngon sum la skur pa 'debs par thal
T03D3805:29a-15: de yang chos thams cad bdag med par sgrub pa
T03D3805:29a-16: ni gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las skyes
T03D3805:29a-17: pa de don dam par rang bzhin gyis stong ste
T03D3805:29a-18: / dper na sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T03D3805:29a-19: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las skyes pa'i rtsod
T03D3805:29a-20: pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i dngos po rnams kyang ngo
T03D3805:29a-21: zhes pa ni rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs te /
T03D3805:29a-22: de yang ba lang rdzi la sogs pa rnams la grags pas chos can ma grub pa med la /
T03D3805:29a-23: dmigs par rung ba ma dmigs pa las /
T03D3805:29a-24: gang gang du de bden par dmigs pa de de'i
T03D3805:29a-25: 'bras bu zhes rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas sam
T03D3805:29a-26: / gzhan rnams yod pa'i mthu dang ldan pa'i rgyu
T03D3805:29a-27: rnams gang med na gang mi 'byung bas de de'i
T03D3805:29a-28: 'bras bu'o zhes ldog pa'i sgo nas kun rdzob pa'i
T03D3805:29a-29: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por grub pa ni kun
T03D3805:29a-31: snga nas yod pa'i chos la byed pa po nyid dang /
T03D3805:29a-32: bya ba dag gi byed pa po gcig pa nyid ni brtags te /
T03D3805:29a-33: rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa'i rten cing 'brel pa las
T03D3805:29a-34: skye bar 'gyur ba la ni chos zhes brjod de
T03D3805:29a-35: / skye ba'i chos ni chos gzhan la brten nas bdag nyid thob la /
T03D3805:29a-36: de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T03D3805:29a-37: 'di yod pa las 'di 'byung ba dang 'di skyes
T03D3805:29a-38: pas 'di skye bar 'gyur zhes pas ni 'gal ba
T03D3805:29a-39: med de mthun pa'i phyogs la yod pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:29a-40: // ma nges pa yang ma yin te don dam
T03D3805:29a-41: pa'i rang bzhin gyi skye ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir
T03D3805:29a-42: // dang / mi sbyor ba ni 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29a-43: don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29a-44: ma grub pa ni don dam par shes pa'i bdag
T03D3805:29a-45: nyid kyis bdag nyid la 'dzin pa la sbyor bar
T03D3805:29b-1: rang rig pa'i shes pa rnams kyang rang rig pa
T03D3805:29b-2: tsam du bya bas snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos
T03D3805:29b-3: po gang du yang mi 'dzin pa'i phyir rgyud gcig
T03D3805:29b-4: nyid du btags pas dngos por med pa'i phyir dang
T03D3805:29b-5: / rgyu tha dad pa can rnams kyang phan tshun mi rig pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:29b-6: dmigs pa'i dus su yang rgyu dang 'bras bur mngon par 'dod pa dag 'gegs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29b-7: rim gyis 'byung ba'i blos snga ma dang phyi ma'i
T03D3805:29b-8: dngos po nyams su myong nas de'i rjes la de
T03D3805:29b-9: la sems rnam pa can gyi blos rjes su mtshams
T03D3805:29b-10: sbyor bas snga ma khyad par can du 'dus byas
T03D3805:29b-11: pa'i sgo nas snga ma dang phyi ma'i dngos po
T03D3805:29b-12: rtogs pa nyid dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po
T03D3805:29b-13: rtogs pa nyid de zhes bya zhe na //
T03D3805:29b-14: de ni kun rdzob kyi bdag nyid du 'gyur te
T03D3805:29b-15: kun tu myong ba'i dus kyi rang gi ngo bo
T03D3805:29b-17: gang du 'di nyid rnam par gzhag pa med pas
T03D3805:29b-18: de nyid la mngon sum gyis ni rgyu dang 'bras
T03D3805:29b-19: bu'i dngos por grub pa med do //
T03D3805:29b-20: de nyid kyis ni rjes su dpag pa yang med pa ste /
T03D3805:29b-21: gang yang ji ltar 'bras bu skad cig la rang
T03D3805:29b-22: gi rgyu'i skad cig gi dngos po mthong la de
T03D3805:29b-23: med na de de'i rgyu'i skad cig dang dus mnyam
T03D3805:29b-24: pa'i dngos po ma lus pa sna tshogs par gyur
T03D3805:29b-25: pa'i skad cig ma'i dngos po yang mthong la de
T03D3805:29b-26: med na mi mthong zhes pa ni de'i rgyu nyid
T03D3805:29b-28: rgyud gang zhig gi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:29b-29: 'dir ni don dam pa pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i sgrub pa'i skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29b-30: skad cig ma las gzhan pa yang don dam pa pa'i rgyu ni ma grub la /
T03D3805:29b-31: rtag pa'i don ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por
T03D3805:29b-32: med pas mngon sum gyis lhan cig gzung bar mi
T03D3805:29b-33: nus pa nyid pas bdag dang dbang phyug la sogs
T03D3805:29b-34: pa'i 'bras bu'i bde ba la sogs par ni rjes
T03D3805:29b-35: su 'gro ba grub pa med la /
T03D3805:29b-36: bden pa de dang ma bral bar gang du yang bde ba mi skye'o //
T03D3805:29b-37: de la ldog pa yang med de /
T03D3805:29b-38: rtag pa nyid kyis ldog pa can min pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:29b-39: de'i phyir na don dam par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i
T03D3805:29b-40: dngos por grub pa'i tshad ma cung zad kyang yod
T03D3805:29b-42: gang yang don dam pa pa'i 'bras bu'i skyed pa
T03D3805:29b-43: po rang las sam gzhan las sam gnyi ga las
T03D3805:29b-44: sam gnyi ga ma yin pa las sam rgyu med
T03D3805:30a-1: pa nas yod pa dang med pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid la ni rgyu nyid mi 'thad la /
T03D3805:30a-2: med pa ni mo gsham gyi bu'i rjes su 'gro
T03D3805:30a-3: ba bzhin du med cing rang nyid ma skyes pa
T03D3805:30a-4: la rang las skye ba ni med la /
