T03D3805:39b-10: pha rol tu phyin pa la ste /
T03D3805:39b-11: de la spyod pa gang na ma yin pa ni
T03D3805:39b-12: yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags pa ni dmigs pas
T03D3805:39b-13: so // rnal 'byor du byed pa ma lags pa dang /
T03D3805:39b-14: yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa ma lags pa ni
T03D3805:39b-15: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba dang
T03D3805:39b-16: dngos gzhin dang rjes kyi gnas skabs rnams la'o //
T03D3805:39b-17: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la zhes pa ni kun mkhyen pa gsum po rnams la'o //
T03D3805:39b-18: yongs su mi gzung ba ni mi gzung bar rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:39b-19: yongs su mi gzung zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa gang du mi gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:39b-21: gang yang ngo bo nyid med pas gzugs la sogs
T03D3805:39b-22: pas yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags
T03D3805:39b-23: pa de gzugs la sogs pa ma lags zhes pa
T03D3805:39b-24: ni rnam pa'o // thams cad ces pa ni gang
T03D3805:39b-25: chos thams cad la yongs su gzung ba ma mchis
T03D3805:39b-26: ni rnam pa'o // pa de'o // chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa rgya che bas yangs pa'o //
T03D3805:39b-27: mngon du byas pa ni ji skad du bshad pa'i
T03D3805:39b-28: dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par dag gi sems
T03D3805:39b-29: pas mdun du gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:39b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:39b-31: tshad med pa ni sangs rgyas pa'i don du snying
T03D3805:39b-32: rje chen po'am shes rab kyi sbyor bas tshad med
T03D3805:39b-33: pa'i sems can gyi don byed par nges pa'i phyir
T03D3805:39b-35: thun mong ma lags pa ni dmigs pa rtogs pa
T03D3805:39b-36: la sogs pa lnga po'i khyad par rnams kyis so
T03D3805:39b-37: // rtse mo 'bring gi dbang du byas gnas bstan bcos su /
T03D3805:39b-38: chos rnams mi 'dzin gang nyid dang //
T03D3805:39b-39: de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir //
T03D3805:40a-1: rnams thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni de'i dmigs
T03D3805:40a-2: pa la chos kyi mtshan ma ma mthong ba ni
T03D3805:40a-3: rnam pa ste 'dir de gsung ba ni de yang
T03D3805:40a-4: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:40a-5: mi rtag pa la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid
T03D3805:40a-6: kyang ste mtshan ma ni chos rnams kyi khyad par
T03D3805:40a-8: gzugs zhes pa dang tshor ba zhes pa nas ji
T03D3805:40a-9: srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes pa'i bar ro
T03D3805:40a-10: // bstan par byed pa gsungs pa ni gal te
T03D3805:40a-11: zhes pa la sogs pa ni 'dir sangs rgyas kyis
T03D3805:40a-12: // bstan pa'o // na ni gang gi phyir ro //
T03D3805:40a-13: phreng ba can ni mi la kun tu rgyu'i dka' thub can no //
T03D3805:40a-16: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring la'o //
T03D3805:40a-17: de lta bu ni byed ces pas so //
T03D3805:40a-18: dad pas rjes su 'brang bar gyur pa ni bstan
T03D3805:40a-19: pa'i phyogs gcig la rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T03D3805:40a-20: // phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhes pa ni rtse mo 'bring gis so //
T03D3805:40a-21: gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin zhes pa ni de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:40a-22: dga' ba dang bde ba ni yid dang lus kyis te ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan pas so //
T03D3805:40a-23: rnam pa'i khyad par gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:40a-24: de nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par
T03D3805:40a-25: rjes su mi mthong zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:40a-26: / de ngo bo nyid med pas de'i mtshan mar yid la mi byed pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:40a-27: gzhan du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhes
T03D3805:40a-28: pa ni mtshan mar yid la mi byed kyang phung
T03D3805:40a-29: po lnga po rnams kun rdzob tu snang ba'i phyir
T03D3805:40a-34: rnam par shes pa zhes pa'i phung po ste lnga po la'o //
T03D3805:40a-35: de la tshogs par byed cing 'dus par byed pas gzugs te /
T03D3805:40a-45: reg bya zhes pa'i yul lnga dang bcu zhes pa
T03D3805:40a-46: ni gzugs kyi phung po'i 'byung ba dang 'byung ba
T03D3805:40a-47: las gyur pa can gyi ngo bo'o //
T03D3805:40a-48: de las 'byung ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung la /
T03D3805:40a-49: reg bya dang mig la sogs pa bcu po ni 'byung pa las gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:40a-50: tshor ba'i gsum la sogs pa ni sems kyi bya
T03D3805:40a-51: ba'i ngo bo'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyi sems
T03D3805:40b-1: de la tshim pa po dang yongs su gdung ba
T03D3805:40b-2: po dang btang snyoms kyi yul mngon sum du byed
T03D3805:40b-3: pa'i bya ba'i yul gyi rjes su myong ba po'i
T03D3805:40b-4: rnam par shes pa'i nyams su myong ba tshor ba
T03D3805:40b-5: zhes pas na tshor ba zhes brjod la de yang
T03D3805:40b-7: bde ba dang sdug bsngal dang bde ba yang ma
T03D3805:40b-8: yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin zhes pa ni tshor
T03D3805:40b-9: ba'i phung po'o // mtshan ma ni yangs shing zhabs
T03D3805:40b-10: yangs shing ldir ba la sogs pa can du sems
T03D3805:40b-11: las byung ba gang gis 'dzin zhing yongs su gcod
T03D3805:40b-12: pa byed pa de ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag
T03D3805:40b-13: nyid can gyi 'du shes zhes bya ste 'du shes
T03D3805:40b-14: ba'i phung po'o // kyi phung po'o // 'di 'du
T03D3805:40b-15: byed kyi phung po 'di rnams las logs su ston
T03D3805:40b-16: pa ni rtsod pa'i rtsa bar gyur pa'i phyir dang
T03D3805:40b-17: 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir tshor ba dang 'du
T03D3805:40b-18: shes log pa shig tu phung por byas pa'o //
T03D3805:40b-19: gnyis yang rtsod pa'i rtsa ba ste /
T03D3805:40b-20: 'dod pa la dmigs pa dang lta ba la dmigs
T03D3805:40b-21: pas tshor ba dang 'du shes de dag go rim
T03D3805:40b-22: bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgyu'i yang gtso bo'i rgyu ste
T03D3805:40b-23: / tshor ba la chags shing 'du shes kyis phyin ci log pas de 'khor ba'o //
T03D3805:40b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyis sgrib pa spangs pa'i kun rdzob
T03D3805:40b-25: pa'i phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can ni rnam par
T03D3805:40b-26: rtog pa med pa'i mchog tu bde ba myong ba
T03D3805:40b-27: gcig tu mthar thug pa tshor ba'i phung po gtso
T03D3805:40b-28: bo yin pas logs su rnam par gzhag go //
T03D3805:40b-29: 'gu shes kyi phung po ni sngon gyi gnas skabs
T03D3805:40b-30: kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gdul bya rnams kyi bsam
T03D3805:40b-31: pa'i ngor ji lta rigs par 'du byed kyi phung
T03D3805:40b-32: po'i khongs su gtogs pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag
T03D3805:40b-33: pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi
T03D3805:40b-34: rjes su 'brang bas logs su rnam par gzhag pa'o
T03D3805:40b-35: // don dam par ni tha dad pa dang tha
T03D3805:40b-36: mi dad pa la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad
T03D3805:40b-38: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams ni 'khor ba
T03D3805:40b-39: dang cig shes kyis gnas skabs dag tu sgrubs shing
T03D3805:40b-41: tshor ba dang 'du shes dag gis gzhan du sems
T03D3805:40b-42: pa'i spang bya dang blang ba ni 'du shes kyi
T03D3805:40b-43: phung po'o // de yang gong du go skabs ji lta ba bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:41a-0: gang du don 'dzin cing yongs su gcod pa ni rnam par shes pa @41a * //
T03D3805:41a-1: rtogs la de'i shes pa ni drug ste /
T03D3805:41a-2: mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus
T03D3805:41a-3: dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
T03D3805:41a-5: de ltar mtha' yas mu med pa'i phyogs rnams dang
T03D3805:41a-6: dus rnams kyi bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i
T03D3805:41a-7: khams kyi 'gro ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba tha
T03D3805:41a-8: dad pa rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i
T03D3805:41a-9: chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdu na phung po lnga'o
T03D3805:41a-10: // 'di nyid 'dir shes par gsal bar byed skyed
T03D3805:41a-11: par byed ces pa'i skye mched ni bcu gnyis te
T03D3805:41a-12: // / dbang po'i dang yul gyi bcu dang yid dang chos kyi skye mched dang bcu gnyis so //
T03D3805:41a-13: de la yid kyi skye mched ni bdun gyi dngos po can te /
T03D3805:41a-14: yul drug gi rnam par shes pa dang yid kyi dbang po ste /
T03D3805:41a-15: de ni rnam par shes pa drug po rnams kyi
T03D3805:41a-16: nang na gang zhig rnam par shes pa'i de ma
T03D3805:41a-18: chos kyi skye mched la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa
T03D3805:41a-19: las ni chos thams cad la dmigs shing gcig pu
T03D3805:41a-20: ma yin pa'i shes pa gzhan dang thun mong ma
T03D3805:41a-21: yin pa ste / tshor ba'i phung po dang 'du
T03D3805:41a-22: shes kyi phung po dang 'du byed kyi phung po
T03D3805:41a-23: la 'dus ma byas dang bstan du med pa dang
T03D3805:41a-24: thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo dang skye mched drug
T03D3805:41a-25: dang kun rdzob kyi sa bon zhes bshad do //
T03D3805:41a-26: yid kyi skye mched rnam pa bdun du phye bas ni khams bco brgyad ces brjod do //
T03D3805:41a-27: mig gi khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang mig gi
T03D3805:41a-28: rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa nas ji srid
T03D3805:41a-29: du yid kyi khams dang yid kyi rnam par shes
T03D3805:41a-30: pa'i khams zhes pa'i bar la khams drug gi skyes
T03D3805:41a-31: bu zhes pa ni 'dir sa dang chu dang me
T03D3805:41a-32: dang rlung dang nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes
T03D3805:41a-33: pa'i khams te / de la lus kyi nang gi khong stong ni nam mkha'i khams so //
T03D3805:41a-34: gang zhig lang kar gshegs par rnam par shes pa'i
T03D3805:41a-35: tshogs brgyad du rnam par gzhag pa ni dbang po
T03D3805:41a-36: lnga'i shes pa dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
T03D3805:41a-37: drug dang / de nyid bdag dang bdag gir sgro
T03D3805:41a-38: btags pa las 'jug pa'i nyon mongs pa can gyi
T03D3805:41a-40: drug po nyid kyi bag chags ma lus pa'i bdag
T03D3805:41a-41: nyid can gyi gnas ngan len la sogs pa'i gnas
T03D3805:41b-0: des dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar @41b du gcod pa'i
T03D3805:41b-1: mtshams sbyor bas khams kyi sa la 'dod chags dang
T03D3805:41b-2: bral ba yongs su bcom zhing skye ba dang 'chi
T03D3805:41b-3: zhes pa'i chos drug po'i gnas nyid de /
T03D3805:41b-4: gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas ngan len la sogs pa
T03D3805:41b-5: 'dir kun tu zhugs par byed ces pa kun gzhi'i
T03D3805:41b-6: rnam par shes pa dang brgyad do //
T03D3805:41b-7: de nyid yang de las gzhan pa'i rnam par shes
T03D3805:41b-8: pa de rnams dang lhan cig tu gyur nas chos
T03D3805:41b-9: gzhan rnams kyi dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams
T03D3805:41b-10: la sems par byas pas ji ltar rigs pa'i bag
T03D3805:41b-11: chags kyi bdag nyid kyi sa bon rgyas bar byas
T03D3805:41b-12: pa las / gang zhig rgyud yongs su sgyur ba'i
T03D3805:41b-13: khyad par byed pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin gyis
T03D3805:41b-14: dngos po las mi ldog pa thob nas bden par
T03D3805:41b-15: dus phyis de'i 'bras bu dga' ba'am mi dga' bar
T03D3805:41b-17: dper na rgya skyegs kyi khu bas sbabs pa'i ras
T03D3805:41b-18: bal gyi sa bon gyi me tog dang 'bras bu
T03D3805:41b-19: yang dmar por skye bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:41b-20: 'bras bu de ru de nyid skye //
T03D3805:41b-22: mdo dgongs pa nges par 'grel bar gdul bya'i khyad par gyi ngor gsungs te /
T03D3805:41b-23: len pa'i rnam par shes pa zab cing shin tu phra //
T03D3805:41b-24: sa bon thams cad chu bo'i rgyun bzhin 'bab //
T03D3805:41b-25: bdag tu rtogs par 'gyur na mi rung zhes //
T03D3805:41b-26: 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo rnams la ngas ma bstan //
T03D3805:41b-28: de yang yang srid par nyid mtshams sbyor ba rnams
T03D3805:41b-29: su lus su nye bar len pa'i len pa ste
T03D3805:41b-30: / sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa dang
T03D3805:41b-31: rnam par shes pa'i sa bon thams cad kyi 'di
T03D3805:41b-32: ni kun gyi gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang zhes
T03D3805:41b-33: / pa la'o // 'di ni byis pa rnams la
T03D3805:41b-34: ni bye brag tu smra ba'i khyad par rnams la
T03D3805:41b-35: / pa la'o // ste / sems de bdag nyid
T03D3805:41b-36: ces mngon par rlom par byed pas nyan thos kyi
T03D3805:41b-38: de nyid kyis de thos nas de la rnam par
T03D3805:41b-39: shes pa'i bdag ces shin tu brtan pa'i mngon pa'i
T03D3805:41b-40: nga rgyal can du ma gyur cig ces kyi /
T03D3805:41b-41: gang yang 'di ltar ngar rnam par rig par smra
T03D3805:41b-42: ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral zhing dmigs pa
T03D3805:41b-43: dang rnam pa yongs su ma chad pa'i ma lus
T03D3805:41b-44: pa'i bag chags kyi gzhi la kun gzhi'i rnam par
T03D3805:41b-45: shes pa zhes pa'i btags pa ni de la mi
T03D3805:42a-1: rnam pa rten 'brel ma yin pa ni rnam pa thams cad du yul ma nges pa ste /
T03D3805:42a-2: de ni rta'i rva bzhin te /
T03D3805:42a-3: don dam par yod pa'i rang rig pa'i mngon sum
T03D3805:42a-4: dang de'i mtshan nyid ni snga nas dpyad zin pas
T03D3805:42a-5: 'dir rgya chan pos ci zhig bya ste /
T03D3805:42a-6: 'di ni bdun pa dang brgyad pa dag tu phye
T03D3805:42a-7: ba'i 'dod pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
T03D3805:42a-8: kho nar rnam par bzhag go zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-9: dbang po drug dang yul drug dang rnam par shes
T03D3805:42a-10: pa drug dang zhes pa bco brgyad kyis rang rang
T03D3805:42a-11: gi mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i khams zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-12: 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:42a-13: tshig ni rtse mo las te /
T03D3805:42a-14: de'i rnam grangs ni rab tu phye bas te rtse mo 'bring la zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:42a-15: mos pa ni mthar thug pa'i nges pa ma skyes pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-16: 'di la thams cad du zhes pa ni mngon par bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-17: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-18: chos nyid ni sngon gyi bden pa'i stobs kyis te /
T03D3805:42a-19: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos la'o //
T03D3805:42a-20: yongs su gzung ba ni nang gi sgro btags pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-21: ma dmigs pa ni dngos por nye bar mthong bas so //
T03D3805:42a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa ni thams cad kyi mchog go //
T03D3805:42a-23: de la yang rlom sems su mi byed pa ni dngos po nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:42a-24: 'di ni mu stegs kyi ting nge 'dzin las langs nas /
T03D3805:42a-25: mos pa'i stobs kyis de nyid kyi phyir btang ba dbang po nyid du shes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:42a-26: 'di yang ni 'chad par 'gyur ba la yang ngo //
T03D3805:42a-27: gang gis ni gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa can du sgro 'dogs par mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:42a-28: de'i nang gi sgro 'dogs pa thams cad 'gags pas
T03D3805:42a-29: rim gyis nyan thos bzhin du mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:42a-30: par mi 'gyur zhe na gsungs pa /
T03D3805:42a-31: bar ma do min zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-32: rtse mo'i rab ni bstan bcos las //
T03D3805:42a-33: yongs su brtags pa'i shes rab kyis //
T03D3805:42a-34: thams cad rjes su mi dmigs nyid /
T03D3805:42a-36: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs
T03D3805:42a-37: su brtags pa ni 'dir dmigs pa la thams cad
T03D3805:42a-38: rjes su mi dmigs pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3805:42a-39: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:42a-40: 'di gang 'di gang gi zhes tshol ba ni spyi'i tshol ba'o //
T03D3805:42b-0: ci zhes pa la sogs pa ni khyad par @42b gyis so //
T03D3805:42b-1: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
T03D3805:42b-2: pa ni don gyi rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi pha
T03D3805:42b-3: rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:42b-4: nye bar brtags pa ni med par byed pa la
T03D3805:42b-5: mi dmigs par byed pas zhes pa ni rnam par
T03D3805:42b-6: brtags na'o // nye bar dmigs pa ni mtha' gcig tu nges pa'o //
T03D3805:42b-7: mi 'gong zhes pa la sogs pa ni sems med ces pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3805:42b-8: lhag ma ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3805:42b-9: bzod pa chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:42b-10: gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid //
T03D3805:42b-11: de med pa yi ngo bo nyid //
T03D3805:42b-13: gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo
T03D3805:42b-14: bo nyid dang bral ba'o zhes pa'i chos thams cad
T03D3805:42b-15: la ngo bo nyid med ces pa ni dmigs pa
T03D3805:42b-16: ste kun rdzob kyi sgo nas so //
T03D3805:42b-17: de'i ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi dngos po
T03D3805:42b-18: med pa'i ngo bo nyid gzugs la sogs pa zhes
T03D3805:42b-19: pa ni rnam pa ste don dam pa'i sgo nas
T03D3805:42b-20: so // de la gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:42b-21: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:42b-22: gzugs la sogs pa gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas zhes pa ni dmigs pa la /
T03D3805:42b-23: ngo bo nyid kyang ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid
T03D3805:42b-24: dang bral ba zhes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral
T03D3805:42b-25: ba'i ngo bo ni gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3805:42b-26: no zhes pa ni rnam pa ste /
T03D3805:42b-27: gang du yang mtshan nyid cung zad med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:42b-28: bzod pa 'bring ni bstan bcos las //
T03D3805:42b-29: de la skye med nges 'byung med //
T03D3805:42b-32: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:42b-33: thams cad la skye ba med pa dang nges pa 'byung ba med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /
T03D3805:42b-34: de thos par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus
T03D3805:42b-35: dang ngag dang yid yongs su dag pa ni rnam
T03D3805:42b-36: pa ste / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang bral ba'o //
T03D3805:42b-37: gnas na gnas shing gsal la rdzogs pa ni mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3805:42b-38: sems can dang snod dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3805:42b-41: de yi mtshan mar mi rten pas //
T03D3805:42b-42: mos min 'du shes med pa yin //
T03D3805:42b-44: gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan mas dben pa nyid ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /
T03D3805:43a-1: pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang gzugs la sogs pa /
T03D3805:43a-2: zhes pa gang la gnas pa dang mos pa'i 'du
T03D3805:43a-3: shes de rnams las ldog pa ni rnam pa ste
T03D3805:43a-4: / de la mos pa brtan por gyur pa ni
T03D3805:43a-5: mi gnas pa la nges pa ni mos pa la'o
T03D3805:43a-7: de la gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-8: 'gag pa ni skad cig mas 'jig pa la 'jig pa ni rgyun gyis so //
T03D3805:43a-9: yod dang so sor 'gag pa yi //
T03D3805:43a-10: dngos po lhan cig gyur pa yang //
T03D3805:43a-11: so sor bkag pa de dag nyid //
T03D3805:43a-12: rnam pa thams cad shes pa min //
T03D3805:43a-14: mtshan ma'i spyod pa dgag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yod pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-15: mtshan ma'i spyod pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang /
T03D3805:43a-16: gzugs la sogs pa la brten pa dang /
T03D3805:43a-17: mos pa dang 'du shes pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T03D3805:43a-18: de'i stobs kyi rnam pa yang gsungs pa yin te /
T03D3805:43a-19: de yang spyod ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa
T03D3805:43a-21: ni rlom sems med pa rnam pa brgyad bstan pa
T03D3805:43a-22: ste / min zhes pa ni mi 'dzin zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:43a-23: de ltar bzod pa thob pas las la dbang du
T03D3805:43a-24: gyur pas ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing rtag par rdzus
T03D3805:43a-26: chos kyi mchog chung ngu'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:43a-27: ting nge 'dzin de'i byed pa ni //
T03D3805:43a-29: chos thams cad len pa med pa ni 'di'i dmigs pa la /
T03D3805:43a-30: de'i byed pa ni rnam pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-31: de'i byed pa ni 'dir byed pa po'o //
T03D3805:43a-32: de las gsungs pa de ni ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-34: nye bar ma gtogs zhes pa ni bstan pa la bshad pa ni /
T03D3805:43a-35: nye bar ma zin zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-36: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /
T03D3805:43a-37: gang du chos rnams thams cad yod pa min pa
T03D3805:43a-38: nye bar bzung nas gang du de ltar gsungs pa
T03D3805:43a-39: ni / 'di'i dmigs pa la 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3805:43a-41: lung bstan pa dang rlom pa zad //
T03D3805:43a-42: ces pa ste gang zhig ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas
T03D3805:43b-0: pa la @43b sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa
T03D3805:43b-2: lung ston par byed pa dang /
T03D3805:43b-3: lung bstan pa'i rgyu nyid dam /
T03D3805:43b-4: khyad par gyi gzugs la dmigs zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:43b-5: gang zhig ni ting nge 'dzin de'i rlom pa zad pa de ni rnam pa ste /
T03D3805:43b-6: de la gsungs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43b-7: des kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3805:43b-8: de lta bu de la zhes pa ni ji skad bshad pa'i rlom pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:43b-9: thams cad nas zhes pa ni chos thams cad len
T03D3805:43b-10: pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la
T03D3805:43b-11: sogs pa'i khyad par gyis so //
T03D3805:43b-12: thams cad ces pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3805:43b-13: thams cad kyi chung ngu'i chung ngu'i bye brag gis kyang ngo //
T03D3805:43b-14: thams cad ni ting nge 'dzin thob pa las brtsams nas dus thams cad du'o //
T03D3805:43b-15: chen po ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:43b-16: gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig /
T03D3805:43b-17: ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pas //
T03D3805:43b-19: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:43b-20: phyin pa dang byang chub sems dpa' zhes pa ni
T03D3805:43b-21: gsum la de'i phan tshun gyi ngo bo ni 'di'i
T03D3805:43b-22: dmigs pa ste / ting nge 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa ni rnam pa'o //
T03D3805:43b-23: de la gsungs pa ni de skad ces gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43b-24: byang chub ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:43b-25: de nyid la sems pa ni 'dir de'i bdag nyid kyis so zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'o //
T03D3805:43b-26: rang bzhin gyis ting nge 'dzin che ba de nyid 'dis sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ste /
T03D3805:43b-27: byang chub sems dpa' 'di nyid kyi skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:43b-28: 'dir 'di gsum gyi ngo bo gcig pa ni dmigs
T03D3805:43b-29: pa la nus sam zhes pa la sogs pas rnam
T03D3805:43b-30: pa gsungs te / bstan par zhes pa ni tshig gis gsal bar zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:43b-31: mi shes par ni don dam par ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:43b-32: med pas mi snang zhing rnam par rtog pa med
T03D3805:43b-33: pa'o // yang dag par mi shes pa ni brjod
T03D3805:43b-34: du med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa ste
T03D3805:43b-35: pa'o // / 'dir nye bar bsdu ba ni /
T03D3805:43b-36: de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni //
T03D3805:43b-37: chung ngu 'bring dang chen po yin //
T03D3805:44a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs @44a * //
T03D3805:44a-1: pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o zhes pas rnam par
T03D3805:44a-2: rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dbang du bya ba ni
T03D3805:44a-3: bstan bcos las / gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis //
T03D3805:44a-4: gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis //
T03D3805:44a-5: rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis //
T03D3805:44a-7: gzung byar rnam par rtog pas na gzung pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:44a-8: gcig ni gzhi'i rnam par rtog pa ste ma rig pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang /
T03D3805:44a-11: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-13: 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-14: lam du nye bar dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-15: bdag tu nye bar dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-16: rnam par dag pa'i rtog pa'i bdag nyid na ni 'jig rten las grags pas yin la /
T03D3805:44a-17: gnyis pa de'i gnyen po'i phyogs ni phung po dang /
T03D3805:44a-20: skye ba la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:44a-25: mi slob pa'i lam gyis rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo ste /
T03D3805:44a-26: 'di rnams de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni go skabs phye ba dang /
T03D3805:44a-27: bcom ldan 'das la yang sh'a ri'i bus de nyid
T03D3805:44a-28: bstan pa'i don du gsol ba la sh'a ri'i bu
T03D3805:44a-29: la gsal bar 'dod nas gsungs pa ste /
T03D3805:44a-30: chos 'di gang gi yin zhes pa ni ci rdzas dang yon tan dang /
T03D3805:44a-31: las dang gtso bo dang skyes bu la sogs pa'i 'am /
T03D3805:44a-32: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i ste /
T03D3805:44a-33: de la dmigs nas slob pa'i phyir //
T03D3805:44a-35: gang du'ang min zhes pa ni chos thams cad la
T03D3805:44a-36: bdag med pa nyid la slob pas so zhes pa
T03D3805:44a-37: la dgongs pa'o // de zhes pa ni chos thams
T03D3805:44a-38: cad la mi slob ste rdzas la sogs pa dang
T03D3805:44a-39: gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa la yang ngo
T03D3805:44a-40: la dgongs pa'o // // de ltar ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyis te /
T03D3805:44a-41: ji ltar ni gang gi ngo bo nyid la mngon par zhen pa med par bden pa'o //
T03D3805:44a-42: so so'i skye bo ni 'phags pa ma thob pa rnams so //
T03D3805:44a-43: de yang byis par gyur pa'i gang du thos pa
T03D3805:44a-44: dang mi ldan pa ni mang du thos pa med
T03D3805:44b-0: pa'o // yod pa min pa ni don dam par yod pa min pa @44b ste /
T03D3805:44b-1: gnod pa yod pas zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:44b-2: de ltar yod ces pa ni kun rdzob tu sgra don gyi ngo bos yod ces pa'i don to //
T03D3805:44b-3: mi rigs zhes pa ni yul med pa'i phyir mi rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:44b-4: de ni mi rtag pa la sogs pa de'i yul du rnam par rtog pa bstan pa ste /
T03D3805:44b-5: 'di ni ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'o //
T03D3805:44b-6: de rnams kyi zhes pa ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:44b-7: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:44b-8: brtag ces pa ni dngos po nyid do //
T03D3805:44b-9: gzung bar zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung por rnam par rtog pas so //
T03D3805:44b-10: mtha' gnyis zhes pa ni skye ba dang 'gag pa dag go //
T03D3805:44b-11: mi shes zhes pa ni sbyor ba'i lam ma thob pas de kho na nyid du mi nges pa'o //
T03D3805:44b-12: ma thob pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ma rtogs pas so //
T03D3805:44b-13: de'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T03D3805:44b-14: mngon par zhen par mi byed ces pa'i bar gyis ni nye bar bsdu ba ste /
T03D3805:44b-15: de dag gis ni mtha' gnyis la zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:44b-16: mngon par zhen zhes pa ni gnyis dang ldan pa ste de'i nges pa dang de'i rtsa ba'o //
T03D3805:44b-17: nye bar dmigs pa ni log pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:44b-18: ming ni gzugs med pa'i phung po rnams la gzugs ni gzugs kyi phung po ste /
T03D3805:44b-19: de gnyis ni ming dang gzugs te phung po lnga rnams so //
T03D3805:44b-20: 'di ni ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
T03D3805:44b-21: lnga po ni gzhan rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
T03D3805:44b-22: 'di ni gzugs la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:44b-23: kun nas nyon mongs pa la 'di ni rnam par
T03D3805:44b-24: byang ba nyid ces pa mi shes shing mi mthong
T03D3805:44b-25: nas khams gsum dang theg pa dman pa las nges
T03D3805:44b-26: par mi 'byung ba'o zhes pa ni kun nas nyon
T03D3805:44b-27: mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mi shes pa'i
T03D3805:44b-29: de stong pa nyid la dad pa mi skyed cing
T03D3805:44b-30: pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3805:44b-31: gnas par mi 'gyur zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i lam

T03D3805:44b-33: // de la pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs
T03D3805:44b-34: pa dmigs par byed pas nges par 'byung bar mi
T03D3805:44b-35: 'gyur zhes pa ni lam nye bar dmigs pa'i rnam
T03D3805:45a-0: // par rtog pa'o // de bdag dang chos su nye bar @45a * //
T03D3805:45a-1: dmigs pa la zhes pa ni bdag la sogs pa nye bar dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //

T03D3805:45a-3: 'du bya ba med pa dang rnam par dag pa
T03D3805:45a-4: zhes pa ni rnam par dag pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:45a-7: // / rnam par rtog pa de rnams drod kyis bsrabs
T03D3805:45a-8: par byed cing rab tu spong bar ni mi byed
T03D3805:45a-9: de / de'i phyir de rnams dang ldan pa'o //

T03D3805:45a-11: phyir na snang ba thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
T03D3805:45a-12: gnas pa zhes gsungs pa ste /
T03D3805:45a-13: gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang po'i dgu pa'o //

T03D3805:45a-15: de dag gi zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:45a-16: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:45a-18: phung po la sogs pa la brtags pa ni /
T03D3805:45a-19: phung po la sogs pa las bye brag gis zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:45a-20: phung po la sogs par brtags pa'i phung po la
T03D3805:45a-21: sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa dgu ste
T03D3805:45a-22: / de la gzugs su brtag pa byed pas mngon par zhen pa dang /
T03D3805:45a-23: 'gyur zhing ji srid du rnam par shes pa'i bar
T03D3805:45a-24: zhes pa ni phung po'i don gyi rnam par rtog
T03D3805:45a-25: pa'o// mig tu rtog par byed ces pa nas /
T03D3805:45a-26: ji srid du chos zhes pa'i bar ni skye ba'i sgo'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:45a-27: mig dang gzugs dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes pa nas /
T03D3805:45a-28: ji srid du yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes
T03D3805:45a-29: pa dang chos kyi khams zhes pa'i bar ni rigs
T03D3805:45a-30: kyi don gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //

T03D3805:45a-32: pa'i bar ni skye ba'i don gyi rnam par rtog
T03D3805:45a-33: pa'o // nang stong pa nyid ces pa nas /
T03D3805:45a-34: ji srid du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:45a-35: ces pa'i bar ni stong pa nyid kyi don gyi
T03D3805:45a-37: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces pa ni pha
T03D3805:45a-38: rol tu phyin pa'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa'o
T03D3805:45a-39: // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
T03D3805:45a-40: bdun zhes pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rnam par

T03D3805:45a-42: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug ces pa ni
T03D3805:45a-43: bsgom pa'i lam gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //

T03D3805:45b-1: ji srid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:45b-2: ces pa'i bar ni mi slob pa'i lam gyi rnam

T03D3805:45b-4: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid la /
T03D3805:45b-5: de dag gi mtha' ni rtse mo dang spyi bo ste /
T03D3805:45b-6: de yang lhag pa'i de kho na nyid med de /
T03D3805:45b-7: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni stong pa nyid ces pa'i don to //
T03D3805:45b-8: grangs su bgrang ba'i rnam par rtog pa dgu po

T03D3805:45b-12: gyi rnam par rtog pa rnam pa dgu po rab

T03D3805:45b-15: rnam par rtog pa ni yod pa ma yin la rnam par rtog pa'i phyir la /

T03D3805:45b-18: par 'gyur zhes pa ni gzung ba'i rnam par rtog

T03D3805:45b-20: rdzas dang btags pa'i rten can gyis //

T03D3805:45b-23: rdzas la brten pa dang btags pa la brten pa'i
T03D3805:45b-24: zhes pa'i 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa
T03D3805:45b-25: gnyis te / 'dzin pas rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:45b-27: rang dbang bdag sogs ngo bo yis //
T03D3805:45b-28: phung sogs rten la de bzhin du //
T03D3805:45b-29: de ni so sor rnam pa dgu //

T03D3805:46a-1: ji srid du rnam par shes pa'i bdag nyid kyis

T03D3805:46a-5: nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bdag
T03D3805:46a-6: nyid gcig gis dmigs su med ces pa'i bar ni
T03D3805:46a-7: rgyu'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //

T03D3805:46a-11: nyid kyis dmigs su med ces pa'i bar ni lta

T03D3805:46a-13: pa'o // rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes pa

T03D3805:46a-15: nyid kyi rten du dmigs su med ces pa'i bar
T03D3805:46a-16: ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi bdag nyid

T03D3805:49b-4: ji ltar rigs par de'i gnyen po'i phyir ram de 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:49b-5: de rnams la ma chags pa nyid du slob pa ni dge bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:49b-6: 'dir de rnams kyi ma lus pa'i dri ma bsal
T03D3805:49b-7: nas chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa
T03D3805:49b-8: las 'byung ba'i byang chub yang dag par skye bar
T03D3805:49b-9: 'gyur ro // de'i phyir na 'di ltar byang chub la rigs logs na med do //
T03D3805:49b-10: chos rnams 'dir ji ltar rab tu bsten te /
T03D3805:49b-11: rigs dman pa la sogs pas de rnams la rab tu mi brten ce na /
T03D3805:49b-12: 'dir bgrod byar gnas pas yod pa ste /
T03D3805:49b-13: thams cad du son pa'i nam mkha'o zhes pa bzhin no //
T03D3805:49b-14: bgrod pa dang gnas zhes pas rigs las mi g-yo ba'i sbyor bas 'dzin pa'i phyir na rten no //
T03D3805:49b-15: de ltar yang ci yang med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
T03D3805:49b-16: med pa nyid la ji ltar de rnams brten ce
T03D3805:49b-17: na / dper na nam mkha' ci yang med pa
T03D3805:49b-18: la zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis mun
T03D3805:49b-19: pa zad par byed pa bzhin no //
T03D3805:49b-20: dmigs pa'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:49b-21: dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de //
T03D3805:49b-22: de yang dge la sogs pa yin //
T03D3805:49b-23: 'jig rten pa yi rtogs pa dang //
T03D3805:49b-25: zag bcas zag pa med chos dang //
T03D3805:49b-27: slob ma thun mong chos rnams dang //
T03D3805:49b-28: gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min //
T03D3805:49b-29: ces te sogs pas ni mi dge ba dang lung
T03D3805:49b-30: du ma bstan pa nyid la rtog par bya bas
T03D3805:49b-32: dge ba la 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las
T03D3805:49b-33: 'das pa'i rtogs pa zhes pa ni phung po gnyis
T03D3805:49b-34: te / de gsungs pa ni chos rnams thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:49b-35: mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi don rim gyis rtogs
T03D3805:49b-36: par bya ba la gang chos rnams thams cad de'i
T03D3805:49b-37: don gyi thabs su 'dir don du gnyer bar byed
T03D3805:49b-38: cing tshol bar byed pas so //
T03D3805:49b-39: des na de rnams la ma zhen pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T03D3805:50a-1: pa'i bden pa gnyis las mi 'da' bas dmigs pas
T03D3805:50a-2: dag par rtogs par gyur nas mngon par sangs rgyas
T03D3805:50a-4: dmigs pas chos rnams thams cad de //
T03D3805:50a-5: zhes 'dis rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3805:50a-6: dang bral ba las dmigs pa'i chos kyi de kho
T03D3805:50a-7: na nyid bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis chos 'phen par 'gyur
T03D3805:50a-8: te / de lta na yang rang bzhin la dmigs dgos te /
T03D3805:50a-9: de kho na nyid tsam po la dmigs pa de don du gnyer ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:50a-10: de nyid kyis na rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:50a-11: mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa la dmigs
T03D3805:50a-13: bstan bcos su yang rnam pa bzhi nyid ces so //
T03D3805:50a-14: 'o na chos rnams dngos po med pa ste //
T03D3805:50a-15: ngo bo med pas ci yang med //
T03D3805:50a-16: ces pas ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3805:50a-17: dngos med ces pa ni dngos po la dmigs pa min zhes pa la dgongs pas so //
T03D3805:50a-18: dngos po med pa ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T03D3805:50a-19: rab 'byor gnyis med pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes gsungs pa ste /
T03D3805:50a-20: don dam pa la ni gang du yang dmigs par bya ba dang /
T03D3805:50a-22: dmigs pa'i spros pa med de /
T03D3805:50a-23: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba nyid ni ngo bo
T03D3805:50a-24: nyid kyis ma skyes pa'i phyir yod dang med pa'i
T03D3805:50a-25: mtha' dang dbus su yongs su brtags pa'i khyad par
T03D3805:50a-26: gyis dmigs par mi nus pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:50a-27: dmigs pa med pa la byis pa rnams kyis skrag par byed pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:50a-28: de nyid gting dpogs par mi nus pa'i phyir na zab pa ste /
T03D3805:50a-29: de ltar yang 'phags pa klu sgrub zhabs kyis gsungs te /
T03D3805:50a-30: yod dang med las rnam 'das pas //
T03D3805:50a-31: gang rnams la ni blo mi gnas //
T03D3805:50a-32: de yis zab mo dmigs med pa'i //
T03D3805:50a-33: rkyen gyi don la rnam par bsgom //
T03D3805:50a-35: sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' las grol ba de ni zab pa nyid do //
T03D3805:50a-36: gang la dngos med dngos med min //
T03D3805:50a-37: blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa //
T03D3805:50a-38: de la rtogs pa gzhan med pas //
T03D3805:50a-39: dmigs pa med nas rab tu zhi //
T03D3805:50a-40: rang bzhin gyis zhi ba'i rnam pas so //
T03D3805:50a-41: de nyid mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas skabs su
T03D3805:50a-42: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3805:50b-0: @50b du chos thams cad la dmigs la /
T03D3805:50b-1: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs su rnam par rtog
T03D3805:50b-2: pa'i spros pa ma lus pa las log pa'i cir
T03D3805:50b-3: yang dmigs pa med pa la sogs pa la gnas
T03D3805:50b-4: zhes pa'o // dmigs pa la bsgrub pa'i dus su ni /
T03D3805:50b-6: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i de'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs ni
T03D3805:50b-7: rang bzhin gyi ched du bya ba ni mtshon bya
T03D3805:50b-8: bzhin no // de'i dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:50b-9: sems can kun mchog nyid sems dang //
T03D3805:50b-10: spong dang rtogs dang gsum po la //
T03D3805:50b-11: chen po gsum gyi rang 'byung gis //
T03D3805:50b-12: ched du bya ba 'di zhes bya //
T03D3805:50b-14: rang las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pas rang 'byung ste /
T03D3805:50b-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de rnams kyi ched
T03D3805:50b-16: du bya ba ni 'dir gang ched du gnyer bar
T03D3805:50b-17: bya ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod
T03D3805:50b-18: par 'gyur ba'o // sems can kun gyi mchog nyid
T03D3805:50b-19: du sgrub par byed pa la chen po gsum rnams
T03D3805:50b-20: par 'gyur ba'o // kyis te / de la gsum ni sems dang /
T03D3805:50b-23: de la sems che ba nyid ni rdo rje lta bu la sogs pa'i sems so //
T03D3805:50b-24: lta ba rnams thams cad spang ba'i don du bstan pa ni spong ba chen po nyid la /
T03D3805:50b-25: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa nyid la zhen pa med pa nyid ni /
T03D3805:50b-26: rtogs pa chen po nyid do //
T03D3805:50b-28: spong ba chen po nyid dang /
T03D3805:50b-29: rtogs pa chen po nyid kyis ched du gnyer bar
T03D3805:50b-30: byed ces pa ni ched du byed pa chen po'o
T03D3805:50b-31: // 'dir ched du bya ba chen po'i yul yin
T03D3805:50b-32: pa'i phyir sems can chen po la dgongs pa'o zhes
T03D3805:50b-33: pa ni sems can chen po'o //
T03D3805:50b-34: 'dir de nyid skabs su bab ces pas rtogs par
T03D3805:50b-35: bya ba'i don du zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:50b-36: / rtogs pa'i don ni don med par mi dmigs pas 'dod pa ste rgyu mtshan des na'o //
T03D3805:50b-37: sems can gyi phung po zhes pa ni mdor bstan
T03D3805:50b-38: pa la sems can gyi ris zhes bya ba ni
T03D3805:50b-40: de'i mchog nyid ni theg pa chen pos yang dag par bsdus pa'i ched du'o //
T03D3805:50b-41: ma lus pa'i 'khor bar bzhugs pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:50b-42: sems can gyi phung po'i mchog nyid chen po ni
T03D3805:50b-43: sems can gyi phung po chen po nyid kyis brjod
T03D3805:51a-1: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:51a-2: de'i dus la zhes pa ni go skabs te /
T03D3805:51a-3: 'dir bdag la sogs pa bzhi ni yum chen mor ni bcu gsum gsungs te /
T03D3805:51a-4: thams cad kyang grub mtha' tha dad pa las don gcig go //
T03D3805:51a-5: sgra bshad pa tsam gyis tha dad de /
T03D3805:51a-6: de la ngar 'dzin pa'i rgyu nyid kyis na bdag go //
T03D3805:51a-7: 'gro ba rnams su chud pas na sems can no //
T03D3805:51a-8: srog gi dbang po'i dbang gis ris mthun pa'i lus
T03D3805:51a-9: zad pa dang mi gnas pa'o zhes pa ni srog
T03D3805:51a-10: go // nyon mongs pa dang las kyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur bas rtsom pas grol ba'o //
T03D3805:51a-11: khams la sogs pa'i zas kyis gso bar byed ces pas gso ba'o //
T03D3805:51a-12: skyes bu'i lus la gnod par byed pas na skye bu ste /
T03D3805:51a-13: skyes bu'i dbang po dang ldan pas ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:51a-14: gzugs kyi khams pa'i skyes bu rnams nyid la skyes
T03D3805:51a-15: pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
T03D3805:51a-16: // yang nas yang du 'gro ba rnams su 'jug par 'gyur bar bas na gang zag go //
T03D3805:51a-17: gtso bo yid kyi las rnams kyis 'gro ba rnams
T03D3805:51a-18: su skye bar byed ces pas na shed can no
T03D3805:51a-19: // shed kyi bdag po'o zhes pas ni shed bdag go //
T03D3805:51a-20: dge ba la sogs pa'i las kyis rten du gyur pas na byed pa po'o //
T03D3805:51a-21: las kyi rnam par smin par myong bas na tshor ba po'o //
T03D3805:51a-22: yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas yin pa'i phyir shes pa po'o //
T03D3805:51a-23: mig la sogs pa rnam par shes pa lnga'i gnas yin pa'i phyir mthong pa po'o //
T03D3805:51a-24: de rnams kyi lta ba ni de dngos po yod par mngon par zhen pa'o //
T03D3805:51a-26: 'jig pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3805:51a-27: de gnyis la lta ba mchog tu nyid du nges pa'o //
T03D3805:51a-28: mya ngan las 'das pa thob nas 'chad par 'gyur zhes pas ni chad par lta ba'o //
T03D3805:51a-29: rtag par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa ni rtag par lta ba'o //
T03D3805:51a-30: 'on kyang 'di rnams ni sngon du byung ba las
T03D3805:51a-31: phyis med do zhes pa la chad pa la gang
T03D3805:51a-32: zhig ngo bo nyid kyis yod cing med pa la
T03D3805:51a-33: med ces pa ni rtag pa'o //
T03D3805:51a-34: phung po lnga po rnams kyi lus ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:51a-35: med pa de rnams la ngo bo zhes pa ni
T03D3805:51a-37: de bzhin du de la sogs pa'i log par lta
T03D3805:51b-0: ba dang lta ba mchog tu @51b 'dzin pa la
T03D3805:51b-2: chos zhes pa ni rigs pa'i lam zhes pa ste spong pa chen po'o //
T03D3805:51b-3: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:51b-4: byang chub kyang sems 'di nyid la thams cad mkhyen pa yang sems 'di nyid do //
T03D3805:51b-5: zag pa med pa ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i 'chi 'pho ba'i zag pa thams cad med pa'o //
T03D3805:51b-6: mnyam pa med pa ni so so'i skye bo rnams dang ngo //
T03D3805:51b-7: mi mnyam pa ni sangs rgyas de rnams dang ngo //
T03D3805:51b-8: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ste mi mnyam pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:51b-9: ma chags pa ni bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:51b-10: yongs su ma zin zhes pa ni bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:51b-11: lhag ma rnams ni rnam par bshad zhin to zhes pa ni rtogs pa chen po'o //
T03D3805:51b-12: sgrub pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:51b-13: de la go cha dang 'jug pa'i sgrub pa ni
T03D3805:51b-14: sems dpa' chen po'i sgra'i 'jug pa'i rgyu mtshan gsungs
T03D3805:51b-15: la / gang pos de brjod pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste //
T03D3805:51b-16: gang du 'jug pa nyid bgrod pa ste /
T03D3805:51b-17: 'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la //
T03D3805:51b-18: 'dzeg pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3805:51b-20: go cha bgos zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:51b-21: theg pa yang dag par gnas zhes pa'i bar gyi tshig phyis pas sems dpa' chen po'o //
T03D3805:51b-22: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams
T03D3805:51b-23: kyi so so'i go cha re re la ma lus
T03D3805:51b-24: pa nye bar gnas pa ni go cha'i sgrub pa
T03D3805:51b-25: ste / dpung gi tshogs kyis go gon pa bzhin te //
T03D3805:51b-26: rgyas pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum chen mo la'o //
T03D3805:51b-27: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dir ni go cha ste bsrung
T03D3805:51b-28: ba dang bsrung ba'i sgrub pa ni bar mar ro
T03D3805:51b-29: // thams cad du ni rnam pa thams cad rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:51b-30: ji ltar ched du byed pa la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //
T03D3805:51b-31: 'dis ni bar du gcod pa thams cad la mda' so sor bsnun par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:51b-33: sbyin pa la sogs rnam drug la //
T03D3805:51b-34: de dag so sor bsdus pa yis //
T03D3805:51b-35: go cha'i bsgrub pa gang yin de //
T03D3805:51b-36: drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin bshad //
T03D3805:51b-37: ces te gang gis sbyin pa byed pa de ni sbyin pa ste /
T03D3805:51b-38: rang gi rang nyid yongs su gtong zhing gzhan rang gi byed pa'i sems kyis te /
T03D3805:51b-41: chos kyi dbye ba rnam pa gsum mo //
T03D3805:52a-1: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni 'bras bu dang bcas
T03D3805:52a-2: pa ji srid du bdag nyid kyi dngos po yang
T03D3805:52a-4: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni tshul khrims dang bzod
T03D3805:52a-5: pa dang skyed pas byas pa dang ma byas pa'i
T03D3805:52a-6: gnod pas gzhan rnams la nye bar mi 'byed pa'i
T03D3805:52a-7: phyir ro // chos kyi sbyin pa ni brtson 'grus
T03D3805:52a-8: dang bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:52a-9: phyin pa rnams dub pa med par bsam gtan gyis
T03D3805:52a-10: gzhan du bskyed par byas pas gzhan rnams kyi bsam
T03D3805:52a-11: pa dang bag la nyal shes par byas nas shes
T03D3805:52a-12: rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba'i don nye
T03D3805:52a-13: phyir ro // bar ston pa'o // rang bzhin gyis
T03D3805:52a-14: kha na ma tho ba rnams kyis mi dge ba
T03D3805:52a-15: phyir ro // bar ston pa'o // bcu rnams dang
T03D3805:52a-16: / btags pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams las
T03D3805:52a-17: ldog par byed pa'i tshul khrims so //
T03D3805:52a-18: bzod pa dang lhan cig pa ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:52a-19: gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa la bzod pa dang /
T03D3805:52a-20: sdug bsngal la lhag par gnas pa'i bzod pa dang /
T03D3805:52a-21: mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos la dmigs pa'o //
T03D3805:52a-22: dge ba'i las la spro ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T03D3805:52a-23: sems rtse gcig pas sems par byed pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T03D3805:52a-24: stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i bar
T03D3805:52a-25: du mi gnas pa'i byang chub kyi shes rab kyi
T03D3805:52a-26: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:52a-27: byang chub sems kyi gzhi yin pa'i phyir rten dam
T03D3805:52a-28: pa dang dngos po mtha' dag kun tu spyod pas
T03D3805:52a-30: sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba
T03D3805:52a-31: la dbang ba yin pa'i phyir dbang dam pa dang
T03D3805:52a-32: / rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis gzung ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa dam pa dang /
T03D3805:52a-33: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3805:52a-34: chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo
T03D3805:52a-36: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa med par
T03D3805:52a-37: byed pas kun nas 'du ba rnam par dag pa
T03D3805:52a-38: dam par rnams ni so sor sbyin pa la sogs
T03D3805:52a-39: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid
T03D3805:52a-40: du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las bshad do //
T03D3805:52a-41: 'dir sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa ni
T03D3805:52a-42: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa bsam gtan ni
T03D3805:52a-44: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhag par shes rab la /
T03D3805:52b-0: brtson 'grus ni @52b gsum char gyis yang lhan cig byed pa can no //
T03D3805:52b-3: bzod pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs la /
T03D3805:52b-4: bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T03D3805:52b-5: brtson 'grus ni tshogs gnyi ga'i grogs te mdor bsdu
T03D3805:52b-6: na ni snying rje'i las kun sems can gyi don
T03D3805:52b-7: du byed pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T03D3805:52b-8: shes rab kyis don rtogs pa'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs so //
T03D3805:52b-9: sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni don dam par
T03D3805:52b-10: dmigs su med kyang du rdzob tu yod pa'i phyir
T03D3805:52b-11: rgyun ma chad pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i gnas
T03D3805:52b-12: skabs rnams la rab tu 'jug la ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:52b-13: gyi gnas skabs su sbyin pa la sogs pa btang
T03D3805:52b-14: snyoms su byas nas bor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:52b-15: de dag gi sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3805:52b-16: so sor re res mtha' dag bsdus pa la nye
T03D3805:52b-17: bar gnas pas gang zhig gi sgrub pa rgyas par
T03D3805:52b-18: bshad par byed pa ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3805:52b-20: go cha'i sgrub pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:52b-21: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:52b-22: 'di ltar zhes pa ni 'di 'dra ba'i sems so //
T03D3805:52b-23: phyogs dang yul grangs kyis yongs su mi chod pa'i
T03D3805:52b-24: phyir go rims bzhin du gzhal du med pa dang
T03D3805:52b-26: yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya zhes pa
T03D3805:52b-27: ni ji skad kyi ched du bya ba las gzhan
T03D3805:52b-28: du mi 'gyur ba ste skur ba 'debs pa'i gnyen
T03D3805:52b-29: por gsungs pa'o // yod pa ma yin zhes pa
T03D3805:52b-30: la sogs pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'i gnyen por ro
T03D3805:52b-31: por gsungs pa'o // // de ltar na mtha' gnyis kyi gnyen po'i dbu ma sgrub pas so //
T03D3805:52b-32: de bzhin du thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab
T03D3805:52b-33: kyi go cha gsungs nas bsam pa'i rang bzhin brjod
T03D3805:52b-34: par 'dod nas rigs pas 'dri ba ni /
T03D3805:52b-36: de la mtha' gnyis dang bral ba nyid la byed pa po gang yang mi 'thad pa'o //
T03D3805:52b-37: chos rnams ni phung po lnga po la /
T03D3805:52b-38: de rnams mtha' gnyis dang bral ba nyid kyi chos nyid ni rang bzhin no //
T03D3805:52b-39: sgyu ma ni rgyu gzhan gyi dbang gis kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don te /
T03D3805:52b-40: de la yod pa nyid la sogs pa rnams kyis brtags la /
T03D3805:52b-41: stong pa nyid ni chos nyid nye bar gzung ba nyid du 'dod do //

T03D3805:59b-24: pas mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:59b-25: de nyid gang gis mtshams sbyar bar 'gyur na /
T03D3805:59b-26: gang du snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems yun ring du
T03D3805:59b-27: 'gags pas de'i de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyis zhes
T03D3805:59b-29: slob dpon dbyig gi bshes gnyen gyis ni sems dang
T03D3805:59b-30: bcas pa'i 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bshad
T03D3805:59b-31: la / de la sems ji lta bu na yid
T03D3805:59b-32: kyi rnam par shes pa zhes pa ni gcig go
T03D3805:59b-33: la / // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'o zhes
T03D3805:59b-34: pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam du smra ba ste
T03D3805:59b-35: la / // / de'i yang bsam par bya'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:59b-38: 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:59b-39: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la
T03D3805:59b-40: snyoms par zhugs pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
T03D3805:59b-41: sdud pa'i don du 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug
T03D3805:59b-42: pa ste / des thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:59b-43: sems gnas pas dmigs pa zil gyis mnan pas zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched la /
T03D3805:60a-1: gyis gnon pa'i skye mched de ni gzhan du brgyad de /
T03D3805:60a-2: de la dang por rnam par thar pas gnyis mngon par bsdus la gnyis bas kyang gnyis so //
T03D3805:60a-4: de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
T03D3805:60a-5: nang gzugs kyi 'du shes can gyis phyi rol gyi
T03D3805:60a-6: gzugs chung du mthong yang de dag zil gyis mnan
T03D3805:60a-7: nas shes so // zil gyis mnan nas mthong la
T03D3805:60a-8: de ltar 'du shes can du ma gyur zhes pa
T03D3805:60a-9: nas shes so // ni dang po'o // de bzhin du chen pos zhes pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-10: nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ste /
T03D3805:60a-11: chung du de dag ces pa la sogs pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-12: de bzhin du chen po zhes pa la sogs pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-13: nang gzugs med pa can gyis phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ste /
T03D3805:60a-14: sngon po de dag ces pa la sogs pa ni lnga pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-15: de bzhin du ser po zhes pa ni drug pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-16: de bzhin du dmar po zhes pa ni bdun pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-17: de bzhin du dkar po zhes pa ni brgyad pa'o //
T03D3805:60a-18: de la gzugs chung ngu ni sems can du bshad pa ste /
T03D3805:60a-19: de ni tshad chung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:60a-20: chen po la ni sems can gyi grangs dang /
T03D3805:60a-21: khyim dang khang bzangs dang ri la sogs pa ni tshad che ba'i phyir te /
T03D3805:60a-22: des ni ji ltar rigs par rnam par thar pa
T03D3805:60a-23: rnams kyis lhag par mos pa zil gyis gnon pa'i
T03D3805:60a-24: skye mched rnams kyis zil gyis mnan te /
T03D3805:60a-25: yang nas yang du mi snang bar byas shing mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:60a-26: zil gyis mnan nas shes zhes pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
T03D3805:60a-27: mthong ba ni lhag mthong gis so //
T03D3805:60a-28: de lta'i 'du shes can du gyur pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:60a-29: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched kyis zil gyis mnan
T03D3805:60a-30: pa'i sa la sogs pa rnams kyi zad par ni
T03D3805:60a-31: 'khor yug rnams su spro bas gzhan du 'dir zad
T03D3805:60a-33: kha cig tu de las gzhan pa'i skye mched la
T03D3805:60a-34: zhes pa ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ces
T03D3805:60a-35: brjod de / kha cig tu sa la sogs pa
T03D3805:60a-36: rnams kyis khyad par du byas pa ston par 'gyur
T03D3805:60a-37: brjod de / te / zad par sa dang /
T03D3805:60b-2: zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T03D3805:60b-3: zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:60b-4: 'di rnams kyang 'bras bu'i don du de kho na
T03D3805:60b-5: nyid ma yin pa nyid du bsgom zhing de yang
T03D3805:60b-6: de kho na nyid ma yin pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:60b-7: kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di ltar so sor
T03D3805:60b-9: 'di rnams las gzhan pa'i lam rnams kyang ma lus
T03D3805:60b-10: par lam gyi tshogs ni ji ltar rigs par brtson
T03D3805:60b-12: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par bsdus pas so //
T03D3805:60b-13: gzungs zhes pa ni mtha' dag gzung bar bya ba na gzungs kyi tshogs te /
T03D3805:60b-14: aa ra pa tsa na la sogs pa'i yi ge
T03D3805:60b-15: rnams las de bzhin nyid bskyed nas sgom par byed
T03D3805:60b-17: bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa na de la yi ge'i don gyi bzod pa skye bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:60b-18: de ni bzod pa'i gzungs so //
T03D3805:60b-19: blo gzungs dang ldan pa des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
T03D3805:60b-20: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstan pa'i
T03D3805:60b-21: phung po 'dzin pa'i rgyu ni chos kyi gzungs te
T03D3805:60b-22: / dran pa dang shes rab kyis gcig tu byas nas des 'dzin pa ni don gyi gzungs so //
T03D3805:60b-23: dran pa dang shes rab kyis gcig tu byas nas /
T03D3805:60b-24: des sems can rnams rjes su gzung bar byed pa'i
T03D3805:60b-25: sgyu ma lta bu'i sngags rnams gsungs pa la dbang
T03D3805:60b-26: byed pa ni sngags kyi gzungs so //
T03D3805:60b-27: man ni shes pa la treng ni skyong ba'o //
T03D3805:60b-30: stong pa nyid kyi ye shes dang snying rje dag dbyer med pa ni sngags so //
T03D3805:60b-31: de'i rgyu mthun pa'i phyir yi ge la yang sngags zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:60b-32: de la aa ni gdod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir
T03D3805:60b-33: chos thams cad kyi sgo'o zhes pa ni chos rnams
T03D3805:60b-34: thams cad kyi yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3805:60b-35: so sor rig pa'i thabs te /
T03D3805:60b-37: gdod nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:60b-38: gang gi phyir chos rnams thams cad ni gdod ma
T03D3805:60b-39: nas dri ma dang bcas pa'i gnas skabs nyid du
T03D3805:60b-40: yang ma skyes pa nyid de ma skyes shing ngo
T03D3805:60b-41: bo nyid med pa 'di'i ma skyes pa nyid ni
T03D3805:60b-42: aa'i don la / de bzhin du ra la sogs
T03D3805:60b-43: pa rnams kyi don du yang rig par bya ste
T03D3805:61a-0: aa'i don la / / 'dir ni sbyin pa la sogs pa'i @61a * //
T03D3805:61a-1: gzungs mthar thug pa ni tshogs kyi sgrub pa ste /
T03D3805:61a-2: chos mchog rab tu ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:61a-3: shes pa nyid gong nas gong du yon tan gyi
T03D3805:61a-4: grangs mthu cher thob par byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa
T03D3805:61a-5: la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la lhag
T03D3805:61a-6: par gnas pa'i rnam par smin par bgyi dbye bas
T03D3805:61a-7: phye bar byas pa'i yon tan la rab tu gnas
T03D3805:61a-8: par 'gyur ba'i phyir sa zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:61a-9: de la rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu ni sa'i tshogs te /
T03D3805:61a-10: de la dang po la rang dang gzhan gyi don
T03D3805:61a-11: bsgrub pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam thob pa'i
T03D3805:61a-12: phyir rab tu dga' bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:61a-13: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' de ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa'o //
T03D3805:61a-14: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi dri ma dang bral bas dri med pa'o //
T03D3805:61a-15: ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas chos chen po'i snang ba byed pa'i phyir 'od byed pa'o //
T03D3805:61a-16: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyis kun nas
T03D3805:61a-17: nyon mongs pa'i bud shing bsregs pa'i phyir 'od 'phro
T03D3805:61a-18: ba'o // gang zhig 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten
T03D3805:61a-19: las 'das pa dag gi rig pa dang mi bden
T03D3805:61a-20: pa'i shes pa dag 'gal bas yongs su rgal bar
T03D3805:61a-21: dka' ba de'i phyir sbyang dka' ba'o //
T03D3805:61a-22: gang gis 'dir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rab
T03D3805:61a-23: tu rnam par phye bas mngon du phyogs par brjod
T03D3805:61a-24: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:61a-25: gnas pa de'i phyir mngon du gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:61a-26: gang du 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs dang rten cing
T03D3805:61a-27: 'brel bar 'byung ba la dmigs pa'i mtshan ma med
T03D3805:61a-28: pa la gnas pa la 'bad pas brtsal bas de'i
T03D3805:61a-30: gang du 'dir de nyid rlung du gyur pa'i phyir g-yo ba ste /
T03D3805:61a-31: de'i phyir mi g-yo ba ste /
T03D3805:61a-32: rnam par smin pa'i sa'i chos rnams thams cad lhun
T03D3805:61a-33: gyis grub pas rnam par smin pa'i bdag nyid can
T03D3805:61a-35: gang du 'dir so so yang dag par rig pa
T03D3805:61a-36: rnams kyis chos ston pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3805:61a-37: legs pa ste / de'i phyir na legs pa'i blo gros so //
T03D3805:61a-38: gang du 'dir byang chub sems dpa' rgyal tshab tu mngon par dbang bskur par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:61a-39: de'i phyir na chos kyi sprin no //
T03D3805:61a-40: bcu po 'di rnams kyis so sor pha rol tu
T03D3805:61a-41: phyin pa drug po rnams yang dag par bsus pa'i
T03D3805:61b-0: go rims ji lta ba @61b bzhin gyi sbyin pa
T03D3805:61b-9: ye shes rnams ni pha rol tu phyin par brjod de /
T03D3805:61b-10: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug nye bar
T03D3805:61b-11: bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsal bla na med pa yang
T03D3805:61b-12: dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par
T03D3805:61b-13: yongs su bsngo ba ni thabs kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:61b-14: phyin pa'o // de'i thabs kyis de mi zad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:61b-15: bzang por spyod pa la sogs pa'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:61b-16: gang gis skye ba so so la pha rol tu
T03D3805:61b-17: phyin pa drug la spyod cing bsgom pa'i stobs dang
T03D3805:61b-18: so sor brtags pa'i stobs ni stobs kyi pha rol
T03D3805:61b-19: tu phyin pa'o // gang gis nyi ma re re
T03D3805:61b-20: dang so so skad cig re re la de rnams
T03D3805:61b-21: la spyod cing dgongs pa ji lta ba'i sgra ji
T03D3805:61b-22: bzhin ma yin pa'i theg pa chen po yongs su
T03D3805:61b-23: shes pa ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:61b-24: pa ste rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:61b-25: seng ge bzang pos ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T03D3805:61b-26: ye shes rjes la thob pa'i ye shes kyi pha
T03D3805:61b-27: rol tu phyin pa la rnam par rtog pa'i bdag
T03D3805:61b-28: nyid ces zer ba de ni mi rigs te /
T03D3805:61b-29: snga nas rnam par rtog pa mtha' dag spangs pas
T03D3805:61b-30: 'dir rtogs pa rab kyi mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs
T03D3805:61b-31: su dag pa 'jig rten pa'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3805:61b-32: thams cad ni srid pa'i dogs pa yang med de
T03D3805:61b-33: / de ltar yang 'phags pa byams pas theg pa chen po'i rgyud bla mar gsungs la /
T03D3805:61b-34: sngon gyi 'phen pa'i dbang gyur las //
T03D3805:61b-35: rnam rtog thams cad dang bral bas //
T03D3805:61b-36: yang ni 'bad pa mi mdzad de //
T03D3805:61b-37: lus can rnams ni yongs smin phyir //
T03D3805:61b-38: lhun gyis grub pas de nyid kyi //
T03D3805:61b-39: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par ni //
T03D3805:61b-41: brtan pa la ni yang dag 'jug / rtog pa 'di rnams rjes thob pa'i //
T03D3805:61b-42: byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs rnams //
T03D3805:61b-43: sems can yang dag sgrol ba la //
T03D3805:61b-44: 'jig rten na ni mnyam pa nyid //
T03D3805:61b-46: sa rnams kyi rgyas pa ni thub pa'i dgongs pa'i rgyan las so //
T03D3805:61b-47: yongs su spyod pa 'di rnams ni bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:61b-48: ma yum chen mo las bstan pa dang bcas pas
T03D3805:62a-0: so // de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos kyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi @62a * //
T03D3805:62a-2: de rnams sa ji lta bas so sor byas nas bshad par bya ste /
T03D3805:62a-3: yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis //
T03D3805:62a-4: sa ni dang po thob 'gyur te //
T03D3805:62a-5: bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang //
T03D3805:62a-6: sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid //
T03D3805:62a-7: gtong dang bshes gnyen bsten pa dang //
T03D3805:62a-8: dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang //
T03D3805:62a-9: rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang //
T03D3805:62a-10: sangs rgyas skur bstod dga' ba dang //
T03D3805:62a-11: chos ston pa dang bden pa yi //
T03D3805:62a-12: tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod //
T03D3805:62a-13: 'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas //
T03D3805:62a-14: yongs su sbyong bar shis par bya //
T03D3805:62a-15: zhes te bsam pa ni dad pa dang 'dun pa'o //
T03D3805:62a-16: phan pa'i dngos po ni sems can thams cad kyi phan pa tshil ba nyid do //
T03D3805:62a-17: 'di rnams kyi rgyu ni sems can rnams la sems mnyam pa nyid do //
T03D3805:62a-18: gtong pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:62a-19: dam pa'i chos ston pa po rnams la bsten bkur dang chos tshol ba dang /
T03D3805:62a-20: khyim gyi gnas nas nges par 'byung bas na nges par 'byung ba ste /
T03D3805:62a-21: nges par 'byung ba de nyid 'dod pas de 'dod pa nyid de rtag tu 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:62a-24: bsam pa la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis rab tu dga' ba'i sa la'o //
T03D3805:62a-25: tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod //
T03D3805:62a-26: rab tu dga' dang snying po rtse che //
T03D3805:62a-27: bla ma bkur sti gus pas nyon //
T03D3805:62a-28: brgyad pa sbyin la sogs pa brtson //
T03D3805:62a-30: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /
T03D3805:62a-31: bla ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mdzad pa'i phan pa chung ngu la yang cher dran pa dang /
T03D3805:62a-32: bzod pa ni sems can rnams la gnod sems la sogs pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:62a-33: mgu pa nyid ni rab tu dga' ba'o //
T03D3805:62a-34: sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ba chen po dang /
T03D3805:62a-35: bla ma dang mchod par 'os pa bkur sti dang /
T03D3805:62a-36: dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ston pa'i 'du shes dang /
T03D3805:62a-37: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis ni dri ma med pa la'o //
T03D3805:62a-39: thos pas mi ngoms nyid 'ang ni //
T03D3805:62a-40: zang zing med par chos sbyin dang //
T03D3805:62a-41: sangs rgyas zhing kun spyod pa dang //
T03D3805:62a-42: 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang //
T03D3805:62b-0: @62b ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba //
T03D3805:62b-1: rlom med bdag nyid de rnams lnga //
T03D3805:62b-4: zang zing ni longs spyod kyi dngos po ste /
T03D3805:62b-5: 'dir zang zing ni zang zing 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:62b-6: de'i sbyin pa ni chos kyi sbyin pa la /
T03D3805:62b-7: yongs su spyod pa ni dag pa des de bzhin du bsod nams yongs su bsngo bas so //
T03D3805:62b-8: yongs su mi skyo ba ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:62b-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pas ngo tsha ba ste /
T03D3805:62b-11: khrel yod pa ni gzhan la ltos nas te /
T03D3805:62b-13: rlom pa med pa'i bdag nyid can te /
T03D3805:62b-14: des na rlom pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:62b-15: rnam lnga zhes pa ni yongs su spyod pa'o //
T03D3805:62b-17: nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang //
T03D3805:62b-18: sbyangs pa yon tan sdom bsten dang //
T03D3805:62b-19: bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang //
T03D3805:62b-20: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang //
T03D3805:62b-21: mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong //
T03D3805:62b-22: mi zhum pa dang ltos pa med //
T03D3805:62b-24: dgon par gnas par 'dod pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:62b-27: sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang sdom pa mi gtong ba'o //
T03D3805:62b-28: de yang zab mo'i chos kyi bzod pa mi gtong zhes pa gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:62b-29: tshul khrims 'chal ba la sogs pa dang bral ba dang /
T03D3805:62b-30: bzung ba rnams mi gtong ba dang /
T03D3805:62b-31: 'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3805:62b-32: chos rnams thams cad la mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
T03D3805:62b-33: bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /
T03D3805:62b-34: sems zhum pa med pa nyid ni dge ba'i chos
T03D3805:62b-35: la dmigs pa'i sems kun tu mi zhum pa nyid
T03D3805:62b-36: dang / dngos po thams cad la ltos pa med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:62b-40: bdag stong gzhan la smod pa dang //
T03D3805:62b-41: mi dge las kyi lam bcu dang //
T03D3805:62b-42: rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log / yid gnyis dang ni nyon mongs pa zong //
T03D3805:62b-43: bcu po 'di dag rnam spangs nas //
T03D3805:62b-44: sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob //
T03D3805:62b-46: 'dris pa ni khyim pa la rab tu byung ba rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:63a-0: khyim rnams su nye bar 'gro ba @63a * //
T03D3805:63a-2: 'du 'dzir gyur ba ni tshul dang mi mthun pa'i gtam rnams kyis dang bstod pa dang /
T03D3805:63a-8: khengs pa ni bla ma rnams la lus kyis mi 'dud pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:63a-9: phyin ci log ni don phyin ci log tu 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3805:63a-13: zhe sdang dang gti mug lhag par gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:63a-14: mngon du gyur ba la ni /
T03D3805:63a-15: sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus //
T03D3805:63a-16: bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas //
T03D3805:63a-17: slob ma dang ni bse ru la //
T03D3805:63a-18: dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs la //
T03D3805:63a-19: blangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun //
T03D3805:63a-20: gtong yang mi dga' med pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-21: dbul yang slong ba mi spong bas //
T03D3805:63a-22: sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob //
T03D3805:63a-24: yongs su sbyong ba bcu gnyis po rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:63a-25: skrag pa ni yongs su zhum pa'o //
T03D3805:63a-26: ring du song ba la ni /
T03D3805:63a-27: bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-28: srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang //
T03D3805:63a-29: mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po dang //
T03D3805:63a-30: khams dang skye mched dag dang ni //
T03D3805:63a-31: khams gsum pa la gnas chags dang //
T03D3805:63a-32: sems ni kun tu zhum pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-33: dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims dang //
T03D3805:63a-34: de lta ba la mngon zhe na dang //
T03D3805:63a-35: stong ba nyid la rtsod pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-36: de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni //
T03D3805:63a-37: nyi shu gang la rnam chad pa //
T03D3805:63a-38: de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob //
T03D3805:63a-39: rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-40: 'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03D3805:63a-41: snying rje dang ni rlom med dang //
T03D3805:63a-42: chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes //
T03D3805:63a-43: mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang //
T03D3805:63a-44: chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston //
T03D3805:63a-45: rtog pa kun tu 'joms pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-46: 'du shes lha dang nyon mongs spong //
T03D3805:63a-47: zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-48: lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa dang //
T03D3805:63a-49: sems dul ba dang thams cad la //
T03D3805:63a-50: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang //
T03D3805:63a-51: chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod par //
T03D3805:63a-52: zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang //
T03D3805:63a-53: kun tu bdag gi ngo bo ni //
T03D3805:63a-54: ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o //
T03D3805:63a-56: yon tan rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
T03D3805:63b-0: @63b bdag tu 'dzin pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-2: 'dzin pa ni mngon par zhen pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-3: bdag tu 'dzin pa nas ji srid du skye mched du 'dzin pa'i bar ro //
T03D3805:63b-4: khams gsum pa la rab tu gnas pa ni dmigs pa la kun tu gnas pa rnams so //
T03D3805:63b-5: der lta ba ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog la sogs par lta ba'o //
T03D3805:63b-6: de la mngon par zhen pa nyid ni nges pa'o //
T03D3805:63b-7: sangs rgyas su lta ba la gnas pa nas ji
T03D3805:63b-8: srid du tshul khrims su lta ba'i bar la gnas
T03D3805:63b-9: pa'o // stong pa nyid chos zhes rtsod pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-10: stong pa nyid la 'gal ba'i gnod pa'o //
T03D3805:63b-11: stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-12: mtshan ma med pa mngon sum du byas pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-13: smon pa med pa'i ye shes dang 'khor gsum rnam par dag pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-14: sems can thams cad la snying rje ba dang /
T03D3805:63b-15: de rnams su yid la mi byed pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-16: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du ston pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-17: theg pa chen po'i tshul gcig tu gyur pa so sor rtogs pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-18: mi skye ba la bzod pa'i ye shes dang /
T03D3805:63b-19: theg pa chen po'i tshul gcig tu ston pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-20: chos rnams thams cad la rnam par rtog pa thams cad kun tu bcom pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-21: 'du shes dang lta ba log pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-22: zhi gnas la nges par sems pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-23: lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-24: nyon mongs pa dang lta ba las log pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-25: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i 'jig tshogs la sogs pa'i lta ba dang /
T03D3805:63b-28: mngon par zhen pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-29: gang du 'dod pa'i zhing du 'gro ba ste /
T03D3805:63b-30: mnyam zhes pa ni lhan cig pa ste /
T03D3805:63b-31: des de ltar sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor rnams su bdag gi lus kun tu ston pa'o //
T03D3805:63b-33: sems can kun yid shes pa dang //
T03D3805:63b-34: mngon par shes pas rtse ba dang //
T03D3805:63b-35: sangs rgyas zhing bzang bsgrub pa dang //
T03D3805:63b-36: yongs su brtags phyir sangs rgyas bsten //
T03D3805:63b-37: dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi //
T03D3805:63b-38: zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang //
T03D3805:63b-39: bsams bzhin srid pa len pa dang //
T03D3805:63b-40: las kyi rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad //
T03D3805:63b-41: ces pa ni dge ba yongs su dag pa sgrub pa dang /
T03D3805:63b-42: rnam pa thams cad kyi chos rnams la yongs su brtag pa dang /
T03D3805:64a-1: ni dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'o //
T03D3805:64a-2: sbyong ba ni yongs su sbyong ba'o //
T03D3805:64a-3: sgyu ma lta bu ni ting nge 'dzin gyis myur bar snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T03D3805:64a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:64a-5: thog ma ni snod kyi 'jig rten la /
T03D3805:64a-6: de'i rjes la sems can gyi 'jig rten no zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:64a-7: legs pa'i blo gros la ni //
T03D3805:64a-8: smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang //
T03D3805:64a-9: lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang //
T03D3805:64a-10: spobs pa tshu bo lta bu dang //
T03D3805:64a-11: mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni //
T03D3805:64a-12: rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang //
T03D3805:64a-13: 'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni //
T03D3805:64a-14: nges 'byung byang chub shing rnams kyi //
T03D3805:64a-15: yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin //
T03D3805:64a-17: chu bo ltar yongs su gang ba'i spobs pa dang /
T03D3805:64a-18: mngal 'jug pa'i mchog la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa dgu ste /
T03D3805:64a-19: de la rigs ni skye bo thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i mngal du 'jug pa ste /
T03D3805:64a-21: rus ni nyi ma la sogs par skyes pa'i rus la /
T03D3805:64a-22: cho 'brang ni ma la sogs pa dang 'brel ba'i gnyen no //
T03D3805:64a-23: rang la brten pa ni 'khor la brgya byin la sogs pa mngon par dga' ba ni skyi ba'o //
T03D3805:64a-24: sangs rgyas la sogs pas yang dag par bskul ba ni nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:64a-25: byang chub shing ni yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i aa shva tva la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:64a-26: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yon tan gyi ngo bo yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T03D3805:64a-28: sa dgu 'das nas ye shes ni //
T03D3805:64a-29: gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa //
T03D3805:64a-30: de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa //
T03D3805:64a-31: bcu pa yin par shes par bya //
T03D3805:64a-33: sa ni rigs kyi sa la sogs pa dgu ste /
T03D3805:64a-34: de la rigs kyi sa ni mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:64a-35: pa'i rigs can rnams kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha
T03D3805:64a-36: dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs so //
T03D3805:64a-37: kha cig tu ni dang po'i nges par 'byed pa'i
T03D3805:64a-38: cha dang mthun pa'i gsum la dkar po rnam par
T03D3805:64a-40: rigs kyis ni chos mchog gi gnas skabs zhes rnam par gzhag pa ste /
T03D3805:64a-42: brgyad pa'i sa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pas so //
T03D3805:64a-43: mthong ba'i sa ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i'o //
T03D3805:64b-0: bsrabs pa'i @64b sa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i'o //
T03D3805:64b-1: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i'o //
T03D3805:64b-2: byas pa dang ye shes kyis byas pa rtogs pa ni dgra bcom pa ste /
T03D3805:64b-3: de'i sa ni byas pa rtogs pa'i sa'o //
T03D3805:64b-4: zhugs pa po rnam pa gsum dang drug po rnams bsdus pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la'o //
T03D3805:64b-5: nyan thos kyi sa theg pa gsum du rnam par gzhag pa la dgongs nas bdun du gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:64b-6: rang sangs rgyas kyi ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'o //
T03D3805:64b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i sa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa ste /
T03D3805:64b-8: sngon du bshad pa'i sa dgu po ste /
T03D3805:64b-9: sa dgu bo 'di rnams zhes pa ni sa'i tshogs so //
T03D3805:64b-10: 'dir byang chub sems dpa' mos pas spyod pa'i sa
T03D3805:64b-11: la theg pa la dang po yang dag par rab
T03D3805:64b-12: tu zhugs pa'i mos pa dang /
T03D3805:64b-13: rab tu dga' ba la lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam
T03D3805:64b-14: par dag pa can 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems
T03D3805:64b-15: bskyed rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa can dang
T03D3805:64b-16: / de la sogs pa nas sa bdun pa rnams
T03D3805:64b-17: yongs su 'bad rtsol dang bcas pas mtshan ma med
T03D3805:64b-18: pa'i spyod pa la gnas pa rnams dang /
T03D3805:64b-19: sa brgyad pa la sogs pa nas sa gsum pa
T03D3805:64b-20: mtshan ma med par lhun gyis grub pas gnas pa
T03D3805:64b-21: can nges par spyod pa la zhugs pa'i rnam par
T03D3805:64b-23: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa khyad par gyi lam nye ba'i skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste /
T03D3805:64b-24: nges par skye ba gcig gi rgyu bas bar chod
T03D3805:64b-25: pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa'i phyir zhes pa ni
T03D3805:64b-27: gnyan po'i tshogs kyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:64b-28: mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag dang //
T03D3805:64b-29: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams //
T03D3805:64b-30: nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir //
T03D3805:64b-31: gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya //
T03D3805:64b-33: goms pa ni bsgoms pas so //
T03D3805:64b-35: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa'i'o //
T03D3805:64b-36: mthong ba'i lam gyi gzung ba'i rnam par rtogs pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:64b-37: dngos po tsam la brten pa dang /
T03D3805:64b-38: gnyen po'i phyogs la brten pa'o //
T03D3805:64b-39: 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gnyis ni gang zag rdzas la brten pa dang /
T03D3805:64b-40: gang zag brtags pa la brten pa'o //
T03D3805:64b-41: de bzhin du bsgom pa'i lam la brgyad po 'di
T03D3805:64b-42: rnams spong la gnyen po brgyad ni gnyen po'i tshogs
T03D3805:65a-1: mthong ba'i lam la de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03D3805:65a-2: rmi lam la sogs pa rnams kyi gzung ba'i dngos por dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /
T03D3805:65a-3: de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong bar rtogs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03D3805:65a-4: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3805:65a-5: kyi bar rnams la gnyen po'i gnyen por nye bar
T03D3805:65a-6: dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:65a-7: de rnams ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir zhes
T03D3805:65a-8: pas nye bar dmigs pa med pa ni gnyen po'o
T03D3805:65a-9: // dgra bcom pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gang
T03D3805:65a-10: zag rdzas su nye bar dmigs pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:65a-11: // pa'o // de ltar mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03D3805:65a-12: ming dang brda dang tha snyad la sogs pa nye
T03D3805:65a-13: bar dmigs pa ni rnam par rtog pa la de
T03D3805:65a-14: ltar mi dmigs pa ni gnyen po'o //
T03D3805:65a-16: chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sbyor bas mi
T03D3805:65a-17: gnas shing mi gnas pa la yang ma yin te
T03D3805:65a-18: / chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor gyis so zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:65a-19: de ltar na gzung ba'i dngos po rnams nye bar mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:65a-20: sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i dngos po mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:65a-21: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa'i gang zag gi rdzas mi dmigs pa dang /
T03D3805:65a-22: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa'i gang zag brtags
T03D3805:65a-23: pa la brten pa'i rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
T03D3805:65a-24: la sogs pa rnams mi dmigs pa'o //
T03D3805:65a-25: nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa 'dis nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i go skabs te /
T03D3805:65a-26: de dag gi nges par 'byung ba ni ma lus par 'gro ba'i sgrub pa ste /
T03D3805:65a-27: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3805:65a-28: gyi gong gi ji srid du sems bskyed pa nyi
T03D3805:65a-29: shu pa la / de'i gong du 'bras bu'i gnas
T03D3805:65a-30: skabs su byas pa'i ngo bo sgrub pa med pas
T03D3805:65a-31: nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu nges 'byung thob pa
T03D3805:65a-32: shu pa la / ste / de ni nges par 'byung ba'i phyir sgrub pa ste /
T03D3805:65a-33: de rnams thams cad kyi dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:65a-34: ched du bya dang mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3805:65a-35: sems can don bya 'bad med dang //
T03D3805:65a-36: shin tu nges par 'byung ba dang //
T03D3805:65a-37: nges 'byung thob pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
T03D3805:65a-38: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
T03D3805:65a-39: nges 'byung lam gyi spyod yul can //
T03D3805:65a-40: rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid can //
T03D3805:65b-0: nges 'byung @65b bsgrub pa yin zhes bya /
T03D3805:65b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:65b-4: gang gi phyir 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas byang chub sems dpa' nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:65b-5: de'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:65b-6: ci'i phyir 'dis 'jig rten zil gyis mnan pa yin na /
T03D3805:65b-7: de thob pas bdag nyid chen po thob pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:65b-8: de yang ji ltar na sems can gyi phung po'i
T03D3805:65b-9: mchog nyid du sgrub pa la sems can chen po
T03D3805:65b-10: dang / spong ba chen po dang /
T03D3805:65b-11: rtogs pa che bas chen po'o zhes pa ni ched du byed pa'i nges par 'byung ba ste /
T03D3805:65b-12: de'i theg pa ni chen por brjod ces pa dang 'brel to //
T03D3805:65b-13: ji ltar na mnyam pa nyid na /
T03D3805:65b-14: ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs kyi dbye bas phye yang don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa /
T03D3805:65b-25: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dang
T03D3805:65b-26: mi ldan pa de bzhin du theg pa chen po'o
T03D3805:65b-27: zhes pa ni mnyam pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung
T03D3805:65b-28: ba'o // nam mkha' go phye ba'i nang du 'dus pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:65b-29: theg pa chen po yang de bzhin du ste /
T03D3805:65b-30: des de rnams kyi don byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:65b-32: phyogs rnams grangs kyis yongs su bcad pa'i phyir na gzhal du med pa dang /
T03D3805:65b-35: rnam grangs 'dis ni bye brag gis so //
T03D3805:65b-36: ji ltar na de srid du de rnams kyi gong byed na /
T03D3805:65b-37: gang zhig sems can dang nam mkha' dang theg pa
T03D3805:65b-38: chen po dang chos thams cad ni don dam par
T03D3805:65b-40: de bzhin du sems can 'di rnams ni theg pa
T03D3805:65b-41: chen pos go 'byed ces pa ni sems can gyi
T03D3805:65b-43: 'ong ba ni 'ong ba la 'gro ba ni 'gro ba'o //
T03D3805:65b-44: gnas dang 'gro ba dang ldog pa gsum char theg pa chen po la yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3805:65b-45: chos rnams thams cad mi bskyed pa ni gang zhig
T03D3805:65b-46: de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong ba nyid
T03D3805:65b-47: pas / gang nas 'ongs pa med cing gang du
T03D3805:65b-48: 'gro ba yang med la gang du gnas pa yang
T03D3805:66a-1: yongs su rdzogs pa la longs spyod pa zhes pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:66a-2: de bzhin du zhes pa ni nam mkha' la'o //
T03D3805:66a-3: sngon gyi mtha' ni 'das pa'i dus so //
T03D3805:66a-4: phyi ma'i mtha' ni ma 'ongs pa'o //
T03D3805:66a-5: dbus ni da ltar byung ba'o //
T03D3805:66a-6: ji ltar dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ni gang la
T03D3805:66a-7: dus gsum med pas dus gsum mnyam pa nyid de
T03D3805:66a-8: / theg pa chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' yang rang bzhin gyis stong la /
T03D3805:66a-9: stong pa nyid la ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba yang med la /
T03D3805:66a-10: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med do //
T03D3805:66a-11: rnam par byang ba med do //
T03D3805:66a-13: mya ngan las 'das pa med do zhes pa'i mtha' med pa ni shin tu nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:66a-14: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni thob pa'i nges 'byung gi go skabs te /
T03D3805:66a-15: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
T03D3805:66a-16: rjes su mthun zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:66a-17: khyod kyis chos thams cad theg pa chen po zhes
T03D3805:66a-18: pa'i ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa de'i nang
T03D3805:66a-19: du 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i ye shes
T03D3805:66a-20: la de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:66a-21: pa ste / de bas na rjes su mthun par bstan zhes par dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:66a-23: de ci'i slad du zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:66a-25: de bzhin du zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:66a-28: de bzhin du zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:66a-30: de bzhin du zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:66a-33: de yang zhes pa'i tshig bcu gnyis po rnams ni
T03D3805:66a-34: rang bzhin gyis thob pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i dbang
T03D3805:66a-36: de rnams kyis thob pa'i khyad par bcu gnyis gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:66a-37: de la chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa
T03D3805:66a-38: med pa la goms pa mthar phyin pa de rnams
T03D3805:66a-39: kyis mngon par zhen pa skye ba'i sgrib pa dang
T03D3805:66a-40: bcas pa'i phung po lnga po rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:66a-41: du log nas sgrib pa med pa'i kun rdzob kyi
T03D3805:66a-42: tshul gyis skye ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3805:66a-43: nyid ni byang chub sems dpas thob par 'gyur ro
T03D3805:66a-44: zhes pa ni bsdus pa'i don te //
T03D3805:66a-45: so so'i don bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa brjod de /
T03D3805:66a-46: theg pa chen po 'dir slob pa nyid ces pa
T03D3805:66a-47: nas ji srid du rjes su thob par 'gyur zhes
T03D3805:66b-0: pa'i bar te / @66b de la sngon gyi mtha'
T03D3805:66b-1: la sogs pa thams cad kyis gnyis su byar med
T03D3805:66b-2: pas de'i phyir med cing 'gro ba med pa'o //
