T03D3805:69b-20: gang de ltar mthong ba de nyid chos rnams thams
T03D3805:69b-21: cad kyi bden pa nyid kyis sgro btags pa rnams
T03D3805:69b-22: thams cad rjes su nye bar mi dmigs pa ste
T03D3805:69b-23: de nyid yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:69b-25: des phung po lnga la bden par mngon par zhen
T03D3805:69b-26: pa zad par byed cing de'i mngon par zhen pa
T03D3805:69b-27: med pa'i rgyu can des sgrib pa thams cad kun
T03D3805:69b-28: tu 'dzin pa can gyi gnas kyi phung po lnga
T03D3805:69b-30: sngon gyi rlung du gyur pa rnams 'gag pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:69b-31: rgyu med pas de dang 'dra ba rnams kyi phyi
T03D3805:69b-32: ma rnams mi skye ba'i phyir ro byang chub sems
T03D3805:69b-33: dpa' de rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i kun rdzob
T03D3805:69b-34: dang don dam par ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi
T03D3805:69b-35: sems kyi bdag nyid yin yang glo bur ba'i sgrib
T03D3805:69b-36: pa'i dri ma rnams kyis dri ma can du byas
T03D3805:69b-37: pa de'i de rnams zad pa ste /
T03D3805:69b-38: de zad pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rnam par dag pa snga na med pa'i phyir na thob pa'o //
T03D3805:69b-39: 'khrul pa thams cad log pa las kun rdzob tu
T03D3805:69b-40: skyes pa'i shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phung po
T03D3805:69b-41: lnga po stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi mtshan
T03D3805:69b-42: nyid kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang
T03D3805:69b-43: snga ma med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpas thob
T03D3805:69b-44: pa ste / de'i rnam par dag pa yang dag
T03D3805:69b-45: par rig pa de nyid kyis thob pa dang mngon
T03D3805:69b-46: par rtogs pa yang dag par skye bar 'gyur zhes
T03D3805:69b-48: de la 'di ni glo bur gyi sgrib pa rnam
T03D3805:69b-49: par dag pa'i gnas brtan dag tu brjod par bya
T03D3805:69b-50: ste / kun rdzob dang don dam pa la gnas
T03D3805:69b-51: nas skyes pa dang ma skyes pa'i rnam par gzhag
T03D3805:70a-0: ste / pa @70a * // pa ni / skyes pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa ni /
T03D3805:70a-1: skyes pa zhes pa ni skye ba'i rgyu dang rkyen
T03D3805:70a-2: la rag las pa'i chos la mi spobs zhes pa
T03D3805:70a-3: ni skyes pa dang ma skyes pa de kho na
T03D3805:70a-4: nyid du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:70a-5: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i sems
T03D3805:70a-6: kyi rgyud gang de kho nas 'khrul pa rnams thams
T03D3805:70a-7: cad las ldog cing de dag la rnam pa thams
T03D3805:70a-8: cad mkhyen pa nyid skye bo zhes pa la dgongs
T03D3805:70a-9: pa'o // brjod pa'i rnam pa dang rtog pa dgag
T03D3805:70a-10: pa gsungs pa ni ma skyes pas kyang zhes pas
T03D3805:70a-11: pa'o // te // ma skyes pa ni tshad mas
T03D3805:70a-12: grub par 'dod pa'i phyir de skad ces brjod pa'o
T03D3805:70a-13: pa'o // te // // de yang med ces pa
T03D3805:70a-14: ni 'bad pas 'dri ba'i brjod pa rnams dang yid
T03D3805:70a-15: dang sgras spobs shing brjod pa'i brjod par bya ba'o
T03D3805:70a-16: pa'o // te // // // shin tu ni dngos
T03D3805:70a-17: po dang dngos po med pa'i mtha' dang bral ba
T03D3805:70a-18: dang spobs pa dang brjod pa dang bcas pa'i blo
T03D3805:70a-19: gsum po 'dir ma skyes pa ste /
T03D3805:70a-20: de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:70a-21: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyis de lta
T03D3805:70a-22: bu chos rnams thams cad de la snang bar byed
T03D3805:70a-24: de rnams bshad pas ni spros pa med pa'i don
T03D3805:70a-25: dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ma skyes pa
T03D3805:70a-26: la don dam pa zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:70a-27: mngon par rtogs pa'i dus su ni rnam par rtog
T03D3805:70a-28: pa thams cad las grol ba gzung bar byar med
T03D3805:70a-29: pa nyid kyis skye ba med pa'i gzung bar bya
T03D3805:70a-31: 'dzin pa med pa nyid ni 'dzin pa'i spobs pa ste /
T03D3805:70a-32: rnam par rtog pa med pas so //
T03D3805:70a-33: ji ltar de'i ngo bo nyid med kyang de'i ngo
T03D3805:70a-34: bo nyid la spobs pa zhes pas nye bar bsdu
T03D3805:70a-36: de kho na bzhin zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:70a-37: ji ltar mthong ba spong ba la sgrib par mi
T03D3805:70a-38: nus pa'i phyir kun rdzob tu ni gang dang gang
T03D3805:70a-39: zhes pa ma brtags na nyams dga' ba nyid kyis
T03D3805:70a-41: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:70a-42: lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'i go skabs rnams kyi byed pa ni /
T03D3805:70a-43: de skad ces smras pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:70a-44: gang dang gang zhes pa ni gang dang gang gi gnas nyid la'o //
T03D3805:70a-45: 'byung ba zhes pa ni mthong ba'o //
T03D3805:70b-0: mi g-yo ba ni the tshom dang mi @70b shes pa dag med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:70b-1: 'gal bar mi byed pa ni phyin ci log par mi byed de /
T03D3805:70b-2: log pa'i shes pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:70b-3: 'di rnams kyi zhes pa ni lam gyi nges par 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:70b-4: mi gnas pa ni mngon par zhen pa la chos ni gang de de ltar bshad pa rnams so //
T03D3805:70b-5: mi g-yo zhes pa 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni
T03D3805:70b-6: gang la yang gnas pa med pa dang spros pa
T03D3805:70b-7: med pa'i phyir na pha rol tu phyin pa drug
T03D3805:70b-8: po 'di rnams kyi nang na ji ltar na shes
T03D3805:70b-9: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi 'da'
T03D3805:70b-10: zhes pa ni nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste /
T03D3805:70b-11: mi shes pa dang the tshom dag med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:70b-12: 'di zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
T03D3805:70b-13: 'di ni chos thams cad nyid las gzhan ma yin no //
T03D3805:70b-14: theg pa thams cad pa ni theg pa gsum gyi thun mong ba'o //
T03D3805:70b-15: de ltar ni ni gang dang ngo //
T03D3805:70b-17: zhum par mi 'gyur ba ni sgyid lug pas so //
T03D3805:70b-18: nem nur du mi 'gyur ba nyid ni the tshom gyis so //
T03D3805:70b-19: ci 'dir gzhan zhes pa ni lam gyi bar du gcod pa 'dod pas so //
T03D3805:70b-20: rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni de kho na nyid ma shes pa'i ngo bos bsgrub pa min pa'o //
T03D3805:70b-21: gzhan du mi 'gyur ba ni kha phyir phyogs par 'gyur pa 'am /
T03D3805:70b-22: log pa'i shes pas phyin ci log tu sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T03D3805:70b-23: gnas pa ni lam gyi ngo bos so //
T03D3805:70b-24: yid la byed pa zhe pa ni rnam pa rtog
T03D3805:70b-25: pa med pa'i yid kyi lam gyi bdag nyid kyis
T03D3805:70b-26: mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs rnams la'o //
T03D3805:70b-27: ci ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:70b-28: rtog pa pos yid la byed par 'dod pa'i 'dri ba ni yid la mi byed pa dang /
T03D3805:70b-29: gnas pa dag lhan cig mi gnas par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:70b-30: mi 'gal na ni sems can thams cad shes rab
T03D3805:70b-31: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par thal
T03D3805:70b-32: bar 'gyur ro // legs so legs so zhes pa
T03D3805:70b-33: ni rgol ba rgya chen por byas pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:70b-34: bar 'gyur ro // // 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni lan no//
T03D3805:70b-35: don du gnyer bar bya bas don te /
T03D3805:70b-36: de nyid ni bdag gis bstan pa nyid la klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:70b-37: yang dag pa'i gnas mngon par brjod pas zhes pa
T03D3805:70b-38: ni rnams par rtog pas yid la byas pa ni
T03D3805:70b-39: phyin ci log la kun tu gnas pa las yang
T03D3805:71a-0: dag pa'i de kho na nyid shes rab @71a *
T03D3805:71a-1: // kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
T03D3805:71a-2: ni rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mtha'
T03D3805:71a-4: de la ni yid la byed pa nyid yid la
T03D3805:71a-5: byed par 'dod kyi rnam par rtog pas ni ma
T03D3805:71a-6: yin no // des yang dag pa'i tshig mngon par
T03D3805:71a-7: brjod par thal bar 'gyur pa las bzlog pa las
T03D3805:71a-8: bsams nas mi 'dod pa med pas rgol zhing /
T03D3805:71a-9: mi 'dod par brjod pa'i klan ka la rigs pas
T03D3805:71a-10: bstan par 'dod nas rang nyid kyis slar dri ba
T03D3805:71a-11: ni de ci'i phyir zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:71a-12: de gang du yang dag pa'i gnas te /
T03D3805:71a-13: sems can rnams ni phung po lnga'i bdag nyid can
T03D3805:71a-14: de ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi ngo bo
T03D3805:71a-15: nyid ni stong pa nyid la ji ltar sems can
T03D3805:71a-16: rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:71a-17: de ltar de dang tha dad pa ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa yang ngo //
T03D3805:71a-18: sems can mi bden pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na sems can ngo bo nyid med pa ste /
T03D3805:71a-19: de kho nar skye ba la sogs pas dben pa'o //
T03D3805:71a-20: sems pa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T03D3805:71a-21: mngon par byang ma chub ba nyid ni yang dag pa'i shes pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:71a-22: yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:71a-23: log pa'i dngos po nyid dang sgra don nyid kyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:71a-24: mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa 'dis zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:71a-25: yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pa nyid de /
T03D3805:71a-26: tshig drug po 'di rnams ni go rims ji lta
T03D3805:71a-27: ba bzhin du nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3805:71a-29: mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i gnas skabs su sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3805:71a-30: 'dis zhes pa ni ji skad du bshad pas so //
T03D3805:71a-31: de lta bu'i ngo bos ni yang dag pa'i don so sor rtogs pa can gyis te /
T03D3805:71a-32: phyin ci ma log pa'i phyir 'jug pa'i phyir 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:71a-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid
T03D3805:71a-34: kyis gnas pa ni zhi gnas kyi ngo bo'i lam
T03D3805:71a-35: gyis nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyis te /
T03D3805:71a-37: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis spyod pa
T03D3805:71a-38: spyad pa ni sems bskyed pa la sogs pa'i don
T03D3805:71a-39: bcu la de gsal bar byed pas le'u ste de'i
T03D3805:71a-40: le'u'o // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:71a-41: phyin pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa pandi ta chen
T03D3805:71b-0: po 'jigs med @71b 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa'i
T03D3805:71b-1: gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od las le'u dang po'o /
T03D3805:71b-3: // / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rjes la de khyad par du bsgrub pa'i phyir ram /
T03D3805:71b-4: tha dad du phye ba'i phyir lam shes pa nyid brjod par bya ste /
T03D3805:71b-6: mog mog por byed la sogs dang //
T03D3805:71b-7: slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang //
T03D3805:71b-8: 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyi //
T03D3805:71b-9: phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3805:71b-10: byed pa dang ni mos pa dang //
T03D3805:71b-11: bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang //
T03D3805:71b-12: bsngo dang rjes su yi rang dang //
T03D3805:71b-13: yid la byed pa bla med dag / sgrub dang shin tu dag pa yis //
T03D3805:71b-14: bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam //
T03D3805:71b-15: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi //
T03D3805:71b-16: lam shes nyid ni de 'drar bshad //
T03D3805:71b-18: gang du lam 'dis mthong ba'i lam ni byang chub sems dpa'i ste /
T03D3805:71b-19: shin tu dag pa zhes pa ni rjes su 'jug pa ste /
T03D3805:71b-20: shin tu rnam par dag pa can ni sangs rgyas kyi zhes bshad do //
T03D3805:71b-21: 'dir 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi dag pa ni zhing la 'dir bshad kyi /
T03D3805:71b-22: lam shes pa'i nang du 'dus pa ma yin pa nyid do //
T03D3805:71b-23: bsgom pa nyid kyi lam ni bsgom pas ji ltar
T03D3805:71b-24: na shin tu rnam par dag pa bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3805:71b-25: gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:71b-27: lha rnams rung par bya ba'i phyir //
T03D3805:71b-28: 'od kyis mog mog por mdzad dang //
T03D3805:71b-29: yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang //
T03D3805:71b-30: rang bzhin dang ni de yi las //
T03D3805:71b-31: zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T03D3805:71b-32: lam shes par rung ba nyid ni sems bskyed pa
T03D3805:71b-33: la lha de rnams kyi don du mog mog por
T03D3805:71b-34: mdzad pa nyid ni dman pa dang ngan par byas
T03D3805:71b-35: pa ste / bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi
T03D3805:71b-36: 'od kyis zil gyis mnan pa ni lam shes pa
T03D3805:71b-37: rnams kyi rtsa ba ni sems bskyed pa ste /
T03D3805:71b-38: de dang bral ba rnams kyis de la mi rung ba'i phyir la /
T03D3805:71b-39: de nyid kyis na 'dir rung ba zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:71b-40: des na 'di nyid gtso bo la /
T03D3805:71b-42: de la mog mog por byed kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:71b-43: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:71b-45: 'dus pa ni phyag byas pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:71b-46: 'khod pa ni nye ba na 'dug pa'o //
T03D3805:71b-49: rnam thos sras la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:72a-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag nyid ni mi mjed de'i bdag po'o //
T03D3805:72a-2: lnga ngo zhi gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams la stong phrag lnga nyid do //
T03D3805:72a-3: 'dir gzugs can gyi lha'i ris ji lta ba'i gong
T03D3805:72a-4: gi khyad par can rnams kyi 'od mthu la sogs
T03D3805:72a-5: pa rnams kyi snang bas 'od zil gyis mnan ba
T03D3805:72a-6: ni sems bskyed pa'i don gyi phyir bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:72a-7: kyis mog mog por byas nas thams cad zil gyis
T03D3805:72a-8: mnan zhes mkhas pa nyid kyis de'i ngo bo la
T03D3805:72a-9: dga' bskyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:72a-10: lhan cig skyes pa ni mngon par 'dus byas pa
T03D3805:72a-11: can ma yin pa'o / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
T03D3805:72a-12: rlabs ni nye bar byed pa po gang gis byas
T03D3805:72a-13: she na / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis te /
T03D3805:72a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis so //
T03D3805:72a-15: sangs rgyas kyi mthus zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:72a-16: sangs rgyas kyi mthus so sor bcom mo zhes pa ni mog mog por byed pa nyid kyi'o //
T03D3805:72a-17: mi mjed la sogs pa rnams kyi ji ltar skye ba dang gnas pa mdor bsdus nas brjod de //
T03D3805:72a-18: 'dir sems can rnams kyi las kyi dbang gis mngon
T03D3805:72a-19: par ldog cing nam mkha' rab tu gnas pa la
T03D3805:72a-20: 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor dpag tshad 'bum phrag
T03D3805:72a-21: bcu drug pa kha khyer yongs su bskor ba la
T03D3805:72a-22: grangs med pa'o // de'i steng du glog me'i sprin
T03D3805:72a-23: dang bcas pa'i sprin chen po las char pa'i chu'i
T03D3805:72a-24: dkyil 'khor dpangs su 'dum phrag brgyad pa'o //
T03D3805:72a-25: de'i steng du chu yongs su gyur pa las gser
T03D3805:72a-26: gyi dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dpangs su 'bum phrag
T03D3805:72a-27: gsum dang stong phrag nyi shu'o //
T03D3805:72a-28: 'di gnyis kyi rgya'i tshad ni dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang /
T03D3805:72a-30: brgya phrag phyed dang lnga ni dbus kyi rgya'i tshad do //
T03D3805:72a-31: khor yug tu ni dbus kyi drang thad kyi sum 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:72a-32: de'i steng du ri rab grub shel bee d'u rya
T03D3805:72a-33: dang shel dang gser dang dngul te rin po che
T03D3805:72a-34: bzhi'i rang bzhin la lho la sogs pa'i logs bzhi
T03D3805:72a-35: la logs re re la tha dkar dpag tshad stong
T03D3805:72a-36: phrag brgyad cu la de'i 'khor yug tu ni zlum
T03D3805:72a-37: pos yongs su bskor ba la chu lan lag brgyad
T03D3805:72a-38: dang ldan pa'i rol mtsho bdun dang /
T03D3805:72b-0: mtsho ri re'i phyi rol du ris bskor @72b ba'i
T03D3805:72b-1: nang gi rgya mtsho la ni dpag tshad stong phrag
T03D3805:72b-2: brgyad cu'o // de las gzhan pa'i chu la ni
T03D3805:72b-3: bcu drug pa las rim gyis phyed kyis dman pa'o
T03D3805:72b-4: brgyad cu'o // // mtha'i ri mu khyud 'dzin gyi
T03D3805:72b-5: phyi rol tu ba tsha can gyi chu'i rgya mtsho'i
T03D3805:72b-6: tshad ni dbu ma phrag gsum dang /
T03D3805:72b-7: stong phrag nyi shu gnyis so //
T03D3805:72b-8: de'i phyi rol du lcags kyi lcags ri khyud mo ste ri brgyad pa'o //
T03D3805:72b-9: ri rab la sogs pa'i ri rnams dang gling rnams
T03D3805:72b-10: kyi chu'i nang du nub pa ni dpag tshad brgyad
T03D3805:72b-11: khri la / chu'i steng du yang ri rab la ni yang stong phrag brgyad cu ste /
T03D3805:72b-12: brgyad po rnams kyi dpangs su ni phyed phyed phra ba'i rngams dpangs dang mnyam pa'o //
T03D3805:72b-13: mu khyud 'dzin gyi ba tsha can las phyi rol
T03D3805:72b-14: gyi mtsho la 'dug pa'i rang bzhin gyi gling bzhi
T03D3805:72b-15: dang / gling phran mang po ste /
T03D3805:72b-16: de la lho dang nub kyi phyogs la phyogs pa
T03D3805:72b-17: la go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzam bu'i
T03D3805:72b-18: gling dang / ba lang spyod dang /
T03D3805:72b-19: byang gi sgra mi snyan dang /
T03D3805:72b-21: sog ka pa ni 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la /
T03D3805:72b-22: stong phrag gnyis yod shing rta'i dbyibs //
T03D3805:72b-23: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi'o //
T03D3805:72b-26: dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi brgya'o //
T03D3805:72b-27: ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste //
T03D3805:72b-28: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
T03D3805:72b-29: phyed dang gnyis ni dbus kyi'o //
T03D3805:72b-30: sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhi'i dbus su stong gnyis so //
T03D3805:72b-31: tshad byas pa 'di rnams kyi gang zhig gi phyogs la tshe [?] la mi gnas te /
T03D3805:72b-32: phyogs gang du zla ba 'char ba dang zad pa'i
T03D3805:72b-33: rim gyis rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs rnams kyis nub par
T03D3805:72b-34: 'gyur ba dang / gtang bar 'gyur ba rtogs pas khang du brtsigs pa'i mdo las ni /
T03D3805:72b-35: 'dzam bu'i gling ni dpag tshad stong phrag 'dun la /
T03D3805:72b-36: shar gyi lus 'phags la ni brgyad do //
T03D3805:72b-38: sgra mi snyan la bcu zhes gsungs pa /
T03D3805:72b-39: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni /
T03D3805:72b-40: shing rta'i dbyibs kyi lho phyogs kyi tha mar ni dpag tshad lnga brgya la /
T03D3805:72b-41: lus 'phags po'i ni logs gcig la dpag tshad stong phrag gcig ces bshad do //
T03D3805:72b-42: 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'og na dpag tshad stong phrag
T03D3805:72b-43: nyi shun mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba dang
T03D3805:73a-1: gong du nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba dang /
T03D3805:73a-4: mi rnams ji ltar rigs pas gling dang gling phran dang /
T03D3805:73a-5: ri dang rgya mtsho chen po la sogs pa rnams la /
T03D3805:73a-6: chu'i gting gi ri rab kyi bar thag re re
T03D3805:73a-7: la stong phrag bcu yod pa'i bang rim bzhi pa'i
T03D3805:73a-8: rgyal po chen po bzhi ste /
T03D3805:73a-13: de'i phyi rol du de dang gnya' shing 'dzin dang
T03D3805:73a-14: mnyam pa'i nam mkha'i khang bzangs la spyod pa'i nyi
T03D3805:73a-15: ma dang zla ba la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:73a-16: bang rim rnams dang ri rnams la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams so //
T03D3805:73a-17: ri rab kyi rtse mo ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams so //
T03D3805:73a-18: zur gyi lcog la gnas pa ni lag na rdo rje la sogs pa gnod sbyin rnams so //
T03D3805:73a-19: de'i steng du nam mkha'i khang bzangs na gnas pa'i lha ste /
T03D3805:73a-20: ji srid du 'og min gyi bar de go rims ji lta ba bzhin du /
T03D3805:73a-24: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:73a-29: lha drug ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /
T03D3805:73a-30: de'i gong du bsam gtan gsum pa re re las gsum gsum mo //
T03D3805:73a-31: 'du shes med pa'i sems can ni 'bras bu che ba rnams kyi phyogs gcig na gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:73a-49: 'di la bcu gnyis ni so so'i skye bo'i sa'o //
T03D3805:73a-50: mi che ba la sogs pa lnga ni gnas gtsang ma'i ste /
T03D3805:73a-51: 'di rnams la ni sa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T03D3805:73a-52: 'bras bu la gnas pa rnams skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:73a-53: 'og min gyi steng du de dang rab tu 'brel
T03D3805:73a-54: ba nyid du gnas pa ni gang du bcom ldan
T03D3805:73a-55: 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sa bcu
T03D3805:73a-56: pa'i dbang phyug rnams gnas zhes pa ni gzugs kyi
T03D3805:73a-57: khams te / 'dir bud med ni med do //
T03D3805:73b-0: lha'i gnas nyi shu rtsa gsum po 'di @73b rnams kyi gnas dang /
T03D3805:73b-2: de nas de'i gong de srid la /
T03D3805:73b-3: dpag tshad kyi tshad ni thams cad du 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:73b-4: gzugs dang bral ba nyid dam cung zad tsam nyid
T03D3805:73b-5: kyis ni gzugs med pa nyid kyi gzugs med pa'i
T03D3805:73b-6: khams ni dmigs pa tha dad pa ste /
T03D3805:73b-7: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T03D3805:73b-8: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /
T03D3805:73b-9: ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /
T03D3805:73b-10: 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched ces pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:73b-11: gnas ni med de nam mkha' nyid la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:73b-12: ji ltar snang ba med pa'i 'gro ba po'i sems
T03D3805:73b-13: can rnams gang yang thams cad du nam mkha' bzhin
T03D3805:73b-15: de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ste /
T03D3805:73b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gzigs par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:73b-17: de la yang shing rta'i 'phang lo'i tshad tsam gyis
T03D3805:73b-18: nam mkha' cha mtho dma' ji srid pa de srid
T03D3805:73b-19: la stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams lha dang
T03D3805:73b-20: mi tsam mo zhes pa ni khams gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:73b-21: khams gsum pa de las gzhan du yang ste /
T03D3805:73b-22: khams gsum pa rnams la mtha' med de phyogs bcu'i
T03D3805:73b-23: nam mkha' ji srid pa de srid du 'jig rten
T03D3805:73b-24: gyi khams te / 'og min gyi gong du yang 'dod pa'i khams /
T03D3805:73b-25: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'og tu yang 'og min no //
T03D3805:73b-26: de la 'dod pa'i khams dang bsam gtan dang po rnams /
T03D3805:73b-27: bsam gtan dang po pa rnams stong la ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams so //
T03D3805:73b-28: de stong 'gyur gnyis la ni stong gnyis so //
T03D3805:73b-29: de stong 'gyur gsum la ni stong gsum ste mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes grags so //
T03D3805:73b-30: gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya rnams kyi 'jig
T03D3805:73b-31: rten gyi khams rnams dus gcig tu 'byung ba dang
T03D3805:73b-32: 'jig pa'o // dmyal ba'i 'gro ba nas bzung ste /
T03D3805:73b-34: chu'i dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te snod 'jig pa'o //
T03D3805:73b-35: de la 'dir gang zhig sems can rnams 'jig rten
T03D3805:73b-36: gyi khams gzhan du skyes nas rim gyis rgyun chad
T03D3805:73b-37: pa'i snod stong pa la nyi ma bdun gyi mes
T03D3805:73b-38: ji srid bsam gtan dang po'i bar du 'jig par
T03D3805:73b-39: 'gyur ro // chus ji srid du gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:73b-40: rlung gis ni ji srid du bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar ro //
T03D3805:74a-0: de bzhin du 'jig pa gsum po @74a * //
T03D3805:74a-1: rnams la re res 'jig pa la bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu 'jig par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:74a-2: de nas nyi shu la nam mkha' stong pa nyid du gnas so //
T03D3805:74a-3: de nas nyi shu la chags par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:74a-4: chags pa dang gnas par 'gyur ba'i nyi shu zhes
T03D3805:74a-5: pa'i bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la ni bskal
T03D3805:74a-6: pa chen po'o // de la bskal pa dang por
T03D3805:74a-7: mi rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa nas
T03D3805:74a-8: rim gyis thung ngu nas lo bcu'i tshe'i bar ji
T03D3805:74a-9: srid de ni bar gyi bskal pa'o //
T03D3805:74a-10: de la tshe 'phel nas tshe lo stong phrag brgyad
T03D3805:74a-11: cu rnams nas yang thung nas tshe lo bcu'i bar
T03D3805:74a-12: ji srid pa de ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:74a-13: de bzhin du 'phel ba dang 'grib pa gzhan bcu
T03D3805:74a-14: bdun la ji srid du tshe lo stong phrag brgyad
T03D3805:74a-15: cu de rab kyi mthar thug pa nyi shu gcig
T03D3805:74a-16: ces pa dang nyi shu'i brgyad cu po rnams kyi
T03D3805:74a-18: de ltar brgyad cu bskal pa bzang po'o //
T03D3805:74a-19: de ltar gzhan yang bskal pa chen po phal che
T03D3805:74a-20: ba dpe skar ma lta bu'i bskal pa'i 'grib pa
T03D3805:74a-21: yang 'di nyid kyi dus kyi ji skad du bshad
T03D3805:74a-22: pa'i bar gyi bskal ba'i tshad kyi dus kyis yongs
T03D3805:74a-23: su bcad pa'i bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu'o //
T03D3805:74a-24: de btang nas bzang po la sogs pa'i bskal pa
T03D3805:74a-25: chen po de grangs kyi gnas gzhan drug cur gyur
T03D3805:74a-26: pa rjes su thob pa grangs med ces brjod do
T03D3805:74a-27: // de las bzlog nas grangs gzhan yang zhes pa ste grangs med gsum mo //
T03D3805:74a-28: de ltar bskal pa grangs med pa gsum la sbyin
T03D3805:74a-29: pa la sogs pa'i bya ba las byung ba'i gang
T03D3805:74a-30: zhig thabs goms pas bsgrub par bya ba ni sangs
T03D3805:74a-31: rgyas nyid de / de ltar yang grangs med dang
T03D3805:74a-32: pos ni sa dang po thob par 'gyur la gnyis
T03D3805:74a-33: pas ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:74a-34: gsum pas ni mi g-yo ba la sogs pa'o zhes mdo sde las bshad la /
T03D3805:74a-35: 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bye ba mtha'
T03D3805:74a-36: yas pa'i dge bas nges par 'byung ba'i byang chub
T03D3805:74a-38: de lta bu la brtson 'grus chen pos slob par
T03D3805:74a-39: byed pa na bskal pa mang po rnam par ldog
T03D3805:74a-40: par 'gyur te / ji ltar bdag cag gi ston
T03D3805:74a-41: pa byang chub sems dpar gyur pas sangs rgyas nye
T03D3805:74a-42: rgyal la brten pas bskal pa dgu bcu rnam par
T03D3805:74a-43: log cing de bzhin du shin tu sbyor ba dang
T03D3805:74a-44: par 'gyur te / / thabs chen po'i khyad par
T03D3805:74a-45: gyis bskal pa bye ba mang po rnams la ji
T03D3805:74b-0: @74b srid du bskal pa grangs med pa gnyis rnam
T03D3805:74b-1: par log par gyur pa dang /
T03D3805:74b-2: ji srid dus gcig na yang skye ba nyung ngu rnams kyis dang /
T03D3805:74b-3: ji srid du bla na med pa'i tshul las skye
T03D3805:74b-4: ba 'di la mngon par byang chub ces gsungs pa
T03D3805:74b-5: na / de bas 'dod pa gzhan mi 'thad do //
T03D3805:74b-6: 'dzam bu'i gling pa rnams tshe lo stong phrag brgyad
T03D3805:74b-7: cur song nas mar 'grib pa'i lo brgya'i bar la
T03D3805:74b-8: rdzogs sangs rgyas byung bar gyur to //
T03D3805:74b-9: dus gcig tu gling bzhi par ni de bzhin gshegs
T03D3805:74b-10: pa gcig kho na 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni gdul
T03D3805:74b-11: bya'i skye bo rnams gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:74b-12: // sangs rgyas mang pos gdul bar bya ba'i sems
T03D3805:74b-13: can srid pa la ni dus gcig tu de bzhin
T03D3805:74b-14: gshegs pa du ma skye bar 'gyur ba nyid de
T03D3805:74b-15: // / tshogs gnyis la goms pa'i rgyu'i mthus dus
T03D3805:74b-16: gcig la mtha' yas pa'i stong gsum 'jig rten pa
T03D3805:74b-17: rnams na de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa skye
T03D3805:74b-18: // / bar 'gyur la / skyes nas kyang mya
T03D3805:74b-19: ngan las 'da' ba chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa
T03D3805:74b-21: sprul pa'i sku gzugs dang dbyibs kyi khyad par la ni yod pa nyid de /
T03D3805:74b-22: ji ltar bsod rnams chung ba rnams la mi 'byung la /
T03D3805:74b-23: de yang bsod nams bsags pa rnams kyis ni mthong bar 'gyur gyi /
T03D3805:74b-24: bdag cag legs spyad ma byas pa rnams kyis ni mi mthong ste long ba rnams bzhin no //
T03D3805:74b-25: bdag cag gi ston pa ni 'og min du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas /
T03D3805:74b-26: sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis ni mi mjed kyi nang
T03D3805:74b-27: du chud pa'i gling bzhi bye ba phrag brgya rnams
T03D3805:74b-28: la rim dang cig char gyis dga' ldan du skye
T03D3805:74b-29: ba dang shi nas 'dzam bu'i gling rnams su skye
T03D3805:74b-30: ba la sogs pa nas ji srid du dgongs pa
T03D3805:74b-31: can gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar bstan pa
T03D3805:74b-32: mdzad do // rnam pa thams cad du bcom ldan
T03D3805:74b-33: 'das mar me bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3805:74b-34: na gang 'dir sangs rgyas la skyabs su skye bo
T03D3805:74b-35: ji ltar 'gro zhes pa la sogs pa'i sun 'byin
T03D3805:74b-36: mdzad do // pa srid pas / nyan thos kyi
T03D3805:74b-37: theg pa pa rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3805:74b-38: zhes pa ni mi rigs pa nyid de /
T03D3805:74b-39: de ji ltar rgya che bar 'gyur bas nyes pa 'jug par byed /
T03D3805:74b-40: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:74b-41: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni lam shes pa la'o //
T03D3805:74b-42: nye bar bstan pa ni gdams ngag go //
T03D3805:75a-0: gnas par bya ba ni thos pa las byung ba'i @75a * //
T03D3805:75a-2: bslab par bya ba ni bsams pa las byung bas so //
T03D3805:75a-3: rnal 'byor du bya ba ni bsgoms pa las byung bas so //
T03D3805:75a-4: byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa ni mthu'i rnam grangs te /
T03D3805:75a-5: de la mthu shes pa ni bstan pa'o //
T03D3805:75a-6: cig shos dag gis bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:75a-7: gzi brjid kyis ni spobs par nus pa bskyed pa'i mthus so //
T03D3805:75a-8: byin gyis brlabs pa ni rab tu rtogs pas so //
T03D3805:75a-9: de bzhin du sbyor bar nus pa rnams kyi gnas
T03D3805:75a-10: skabs su byas nas de gsungs pa ni gang zhes
T03D3805:75a-12: des bskyed par bya zhes pas ni sbyor bar nus pas so //
T03D3805:75a-13: de dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni lam
T03D3805:75a-14: dman pas thob par bya ba'i mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:75a-15: pa yang dag pa nyid du nges pa de des
T03D3805:75a-16: thob pas so // mtshams bcad pa ni mtshams bcad pa ste /
T03D3805:75a-17: rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pas bla na med
T03D3805:75a-18: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur
T03D3805:75a-19: gang yang nas yang du de la bor ba'i skal
T03D3805:75a-20: ba med de / ji srid du sangs rgyas rnams
T03D3805:75a-21: kyis byin gyis ma brlabs kyi bar du zhes pa
T03D3805:75a-22: ni sbyor bar nus pa'i yul so sor nges pa'o
T03D3805:75a-23: ba med de / // 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ni khyab pa ste /
T03D3805:75a-24: nyan thos rnams kyis ni bag la nyal chad nas
T03D3805:75a-25: skye ba med pa skye ba phan tshun gyis bsgrub
T03D3805:75a-26: par bya ba'i sangs rgyas nyid du byed ces pa
T03D3805:75a-28: nyon mongs pa spangs pas so so'i skye bo dang
T03D3805:75a-29: thun mong gi 'khor ba rgyun chad kyang ma rig
T03D3805:75a-30: pa'i nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal ma spangs pa
T03D3805:75a-31: de'i rkyen dang zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa
T03D3805:75a-32: ba'i rgyu de bsod nams kyi tshogs chol bas chog
T03D3805:75a-33: shes pa med pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:75a-34: sems can yongs su smin pas du pa med pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:75a-35: de la nyon mongs pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa bzhin gyi ma rig pa'i bag chags dang /
T03D3805:75a-36: las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa bzhin du zag pa med pa'i las mngon par 'du byed la /
T03D3805:75a-37: skye ba'i nyon mongs pa bzhin du nyan thos dang
T03D3805:75a-38: rang sangs rgyas dang dbang du gyur pa thob pa'i
T03D3805:75a-39: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba drug tu
T03D3805:75a-40: 'dus pa de yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus kyis
T03D3805:75a-41: 'jug la / de'i rkyen gyis yang skye bo'i rkyen
T03D3805:75a-42: bzhin du rgas pa dang shi ba la ni bsam
T03D3805:75a-43: gyis mi khyab pa'i yongs su bsgyur ba can gyi
T03D3805:75b-0: 'chi 'pho ba zhes dpal phreng seng ge'i nga @75b
T03D3805:75b-2: de nyid kyis na theg pa gsum du gsungs pa ni dgongs pa can te /
T03D3805:75b-3: de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:75b-4: pa theg pa chen po'i bdag nyid 'dis 'gro zhes
T03D3805:75b-5: pa dang / der 'gro zhes pa'i lam dang /
T03D3805:75b-6: 'bras bu'i ngo bo'i theg pa ni gcig nyid la
T03D3805:75b-7: theg pa gsum du rnam par gzhag pa ni byis
T03D3805:75b-8: pa rnams theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i drang
T03D3805:75b-10: de ltar yang lang kar gshegs pa las /
T03D3805:75b-11: bdag gis theg gcig bshad pa las //
T03D3805:75b-12: theg pa'i rnam gzhag yod min te //
T03D3805:75b-13: byis rnams yongs su drang don du //
T03D3805:75b-14: theg pa tha dad bdag gis bshad //
T03D3805:75b-17: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med pas //
T03D3805:75b-18: theg pa tha dad yod ma yin //
T03D3805:75b-19: theg pa gsum ni kun bshad pa //
T03D3805:75b-20: khyod kyis sems can gzhug pa nyid //
T03D3805:75b-22: chos kyi dbyings ni chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid gcig pa nyid de /
T03D3805:75b-23: de nyid grub pa'i mtha'i dbye bas tha dad pa
T03D3805:75b-24: nyid na ni mthar thug pa med par thal bar
T03D3805:75b-25: 'gyur la / phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes rnams kyis ni de kho na nyid rtogs pa med de /
T03D3805:75b-26: rtogs na ni ches thal bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:75b-27: de'i phyir ni gang zag chos la bdag med pa'i
T03D3805:75b-28: de kho na nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i ye
T03D3805:75b-29: shes de nyid kyis mya ngan las 'das pa thob
T03D3805:75b-30: pa las yang dag pa'i chos las gzhan gyis ni
T03D3805:75b-31: min zhes pas na theg pa ni gcig nyid do
T03D3805:75b-32: // de'i phyir na lam gzhan la yang dag pa'i thar pa med ces pa bsgrub pa ni /
T03D3805:75b-33: bden pa gnyis la 'jug pa'i mdo las /
T03D3805:75b-34: de la yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med
T03D3805:75b-35: pa nyid bsgoms pas gang gis nyon mongs pa spong
T03D3805:75b-36: gi / lam gzhan gyis min te /
T03D3805:75b-37: nyon mongs pa rnams ni dngos po la mngon par
T03D3805:75b-38: zhen pa'i rtsa ba can yin pa'i phyir zhes gsungs
T03D3805:75b-39: so // gang du yang gsungs pa 'jam dpal ji
T03D3805:75b-40: ltar nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes par 'gyur
T03D3805:75b-41: bas nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul bar 'gro bar 'gyur
T03D3805:75b-42: so // smras pa / don dam par ma skyes
T03D3805:75b-43: pa'i chos rnams kyi yod pa ma yin pa'i yul
T03D3805:75b-44: rnams la yod par sgro btags pas phyin ci log
T03D3805:75b-45: gi bdag nyid kyi lta ba kun tu ldang la
T03D3805:75b-46: so // smras pa / / de las nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu 'jug go //
T03D3805:76a-0: gang yang lha'i bu don dam par chos rnams @76a * //
T03D3805:76a-1: ma skyes pa rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi
T03D3805:76a-2: sbyor ba mi byed pa ni phyin ci ma log
T03D3805:76a-3: pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:76a-4: yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs par mi
T03D3805:76a-5: byed cing lta ba kun nas ldang bar mi byed
T03D3805:76a-6: do // skye ba med pa de nyid la gnas
T03D3805:76a-7: pas nyon mongs pa shin tu 'dul ba nyid du
T03D3805:76a-9: mthong ba med pa'i sbyor bas so //
T03D3805:76a-10: gang du don dam par skye ba med pa'i ngo

T03D3805:76a-13: pa rnams rab tu shes pa med pa'i sbyor bas
T03D3805:76a-14: yongs su shes pa yin te /
T03D3805:76a-15: 'di lta ste dper na mche ba dug can gyi rigs brjod pas dug zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:76a-16: de bzhin du gang nyon mongs pa'i rigs shes pa
T03D3805:76a-17: ni de'i nyon mongs pa rnams shin tu mi dmigs

T03D3805:76a-21: rnams thams cad la kun tu brtags pa 'di ni
T03D3805:76a-22: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi rigs zhes gsungs so //
T03D3805:76a-23: mdo ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal por yang /
T03D3805:76a-24: 'gro ba 'di rnams thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur //
T03D3805:76a-26: 'dir yang dri ma rnams ni glo bur ba'i phyir
T03D3805:76a-27: na sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas ma lus
T03D3805:76a-28: pa'i 'gro ba rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtshan nyid
T03D3805:76a-29: can gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can te

T03D3805:76a-31: sbyor bar rung bar yod pa nyid do zhes pa
T03D3805:76a-32: / la dgongs pa'o // 'dir theg pa gsum bstan
T03D3805:76a-33: pa ni nges pa'i don la theg pa gcig bstan
T03D3805:76a-34: pa ni dgongs pa can nyid ces pa dang /
T03D3805:76a-35: rigs med pa'i sems can yang yod ces pa'i brtags pa ni shin tu ma brtags pa'i ste /
T03D3805:76a-37: sems can rdzogs sangs rgyas la sbyor mi rung ba ni gcig kyang med ces pas gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:76a-38: de ltar yang dbang po thams bden pa bsgoms pas
T03D3805:76a-39: ni bdag med par mnyam pos 'dod chags dang bral
T03D3805:76a-41: 'bring gis ni cung zhig gzhan gyi don 'dod pas
T03D3805:76a-42: 'dod chags dang bral ba rtogs kyang 'dod pa'i khams
T03D3805:76a-43: rnams su dam pa'i chos nub pa na kun tu
T03D3805:76a-44: 'jug cing shes bya'i sgrib pa'i phyogs gcig gzung ba'i
T03D3805:76b-0: rnam par rtog pa @76b spangs nas rang sangs rgyas
T03D3805:76b-1: mngon sum du byas nas rdzu 'phrul rnams dang lus
T03D3805:76b-2: kyis chos rnams ston par byed do //
T03D3805:76b-3: dbang po rab kyis ni brtse ba'i rang bzhin nyid
T03D3805:76b-4: kyis sems can thams cad 'dren pa'i bsam pa can
T03D3805:76b-5: te / gsum char yang khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs
T03D3805:76b-6: pa'i sgrib pa tsam las grol ba'i mya ngan las
T03D3805:76b-7: 'das pa med kyang mar me zad pa bzhin du
T03D3805:76b-8: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can gyi zag
T03D3805:76b-9: pa med pa'i khams na padma'i snying po la bskul
T03D3805:76b-10: ba'am ji srid du gnas pa la /

T03D3805:76b-29: 'bras bu gyur pa la lhag par dmigs par bya zhes te /

T03D3805:76b-33: de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i phyir na

T03D3805:76b-39: ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras la /
T03D3805:76b-41: de'i nyan thos rnams kyis mang du byas pa de

T03D3805:76b-43: thos rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sras byang chub
T03D3805:76b-44: sems dpa' rnams la mang du bya'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:77a-2: sngon gyi nyid ni sngon gyi rnams so //

T03D3805:77a-9: skad kyi dbyings don du ma la 'jug pa'i phyir

T03D3805:77a-18: rab tu ni g-yeng ba'i yid kyis so //

T03D3805:77a-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes pa ni lam shes pa la'o //
T03D3805:77a-23: gnas par bya ba ni spyad par bya ba'o //
T03D3805:77a-24: de la nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i lam gyi dbang du byas te gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:77a-25: stong pa nyid la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:77a-26: 'phags pa rnams la bden pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:77a-27: phyin ci ma log pa nyid las /
T03D3805:77a-28: byis pa rnams la ni ma yin zhes pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa ste /
T03D3805:77a-29: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam mo //
T03D3805:77a-30: nad kyis sdug bsngal ba la de'i nges par zad pa'i sman tshol ba bzhin gyi rim pa ste /
T03D3805:77a-31: gnyi ga la yang bdag med par bstan pa'i skabs

T03D3805:77a-33: 'gog pa'i bden pa don dam pa la /
T03D3805:77a-34: gsum ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes pa'i gnyis po nyid ni bden pa gnyis te /
T03D3805:77a-35: ji skad du yab sras mjal ba'i mdo sder /
T03D3805:77a-36: rnam par blta dka' bden pa 'dir ni mkhas rnams kyis //
T03D3805:77a-37: rang gis mthong 'gyur gzhan gyis mnyen sogs rnams kyis min //
T03D3805:77a-38: kun rdzob dang ni gang yang de bzhin don dam las //
T03D3805:77a-39: bden pa gsum po cung zad yod par 'gyur ba min //
T03D3805:77a-41: nyan thos rnams las ni 'khor ba las yid byung
T03D3805:77a-42: ba'i don du gang zag gi bdag med tsam la
T03D3805:77b-0: gzhug pa'i @77b rnam pa bzhi po bstan to //
T03D3805:77b-1: de la sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal dang /
T03D3805:77b-2: rnam par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang /
T03D3805:77b-3: 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal rnams kyis sdug bsngal ba'i
T03D3805:77b-4: 'khor ba pa'i phung po rnams la sdug bsngal gyi
T03D3805:77b-6: sdug bsngal zad pa ni 'gog pa'o //
T03D3805:77b-7: de thob pa'i ye shes ni lam ste /

T03D3805:77b-9: nyid la gnas shing stong pa nyid du mthong ba'o
T03D3805:77b-10: // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:77b-11: ni nyan thos kyi gang zhig mthong ba'i lam la
T03D3805:77b-12: gnas par bya ba la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems

T03D3805:77b-16: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi //

T03D3805:77b-18: nyan thos lam 'di shes par bya //

T03D3805:77b-23: las ldog pa'i sdug bsngal ba dang mi rtag pa
T03D3805:77b-24: dang sdug bsngal dang bdag med pa dang stong pa
T03D3805:77b-25: nyid du yongs su shes pa'o //

T03D3805:77b-27: med pa can dang dus la sogs pa'i sems med
T03D3805:77b-28: pa'i rtog pa'i rgyu can dang gtso bo dang sgra'i
T03D3805:77b-29: tshangs pa la sogs pas yongs su bsgyur ba'i dngos
T03D3805:77b-31: dbang phyug la sogs pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i rgyu
T03D3805:77b-32: can zhes pa'i sgro btags pa'i gnyen por rgyu dang
T03D3805:77b-33: kun 'byung ba dang rab tu skye ba dang rkyen
T03D3805:77b-34: no // 'gog pa med cing thar pa dang sdug bsngal ba las thar pa med do ;
T03D3805:77b-35: / bsam gtan gyi bde ba kho na las gya nom pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:77b-36: grol kyang yang 'khor ba na lhung zhes pa'i gnyen
T03D3805:77b-37: por 'gog pa zhi ba gya nom pa nges par
T03D3805:77b-39: bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi lam bdag nyid kyis
T03D3805:77b-40: rtag par yod pa'i lam ngan pa las 'dir gzhan
T03D3805:77b-41: du med pa dang las yang dag par ldog pas
T03D3805:77b-42: so zhes pa'i gnyen por lam rigs pa bsgrub pa
T03D3805:77b-43: nges par 'byung ba ste 'dir de gzung bar mi
T03D3805:77b-44: bya la / gang du yum chen mo las gsungs pa de 'dir gzung bar bya ste /
T03D3805:77b-45: re bar 'gyur na nyan thos kyi byang chub kyang tshegs chung ngu de rnams kyis thob pa'i phyir ro//
T03D3805:78a-0: @78a * // de la sdug bsngal ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis yid la byed pa de snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3805:78a-1: mi rtag pa las byung ba 'jig pa dang bral bar sbyor ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:78a-2: sdug bsngal ba la so sor mi mthun pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:78a-3: bdag med pa la bdag gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:78a-4: zhi pa la bdag gis stong pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:78a-5: bdag gis stong pa ni zhi ba ste /

T03D3805:78a-11: sdug bsngal gzengs bstod pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:78a-13: 'di'i dang gzhan pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu nyid kyis na sdig pa dang chos mthun pa'o //
T03D3805:78a-14: yang bzhi rnams kyis ni nus pa nyid du yongs su shes pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:78a-19: bdag ni bcom par mi nus pas 'dir pha rol
T03D3805:78a-20: la so sor skad cig la 'jig pa'i phyir na
T03D3805:78a-22: dgra bcom pa rnams kyi drungs 'byin pa'i phyir g-yo ba'o //
T03D3805:78a-23: rang bzhin gyi lam gyis rab tu bcom pa'i phyir rab tu 'joms pa nyid do //
T03D3805:78a-24: gdung bar mi byed pa'i don du yang gsum rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:78a-27: nye bar bsgyur ba nyid de /
T03D3805:78a-28: kun tu 'dus pa la sogs pa bzhin du 'jigs pa'i rgyu'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:78a-29: 'byung po dang srin po la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa dang /
T03D3805:78a-30: mu ge dang phas kyis dgra bo la sogs pa dang chos mthun pa zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:78a-31: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang mi mthun
T03D3805:78a-32: pa ni ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
T03D3805:78a-33: ces pa de nas brtsams te /
T03D3805:78a-34: ji srid du de bzhin nyid du sdug bsngal gyi
T03D3805:78a-35: phung po 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i
T03D3805:78a-36: bar du'o // de la bkag pas 'gag ces pas 'gog pa'i bden pa la /
T03D3805:78a-37: 'dis 'gag pa 'gyur zhes pa ni 'gog pa'i lam gyi bden pa ste /
T03D3805:78a-38: de la 'gog pa'i bden pa la ni rnam pa bdun gyis te /
T03D3805:78a-43: mtshan ma med pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:78b-0: smon pa @78b med pa nyid dang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:78b-1: bdag ni rnal 'byor pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bdag nyid
T03D3805:78b-2: kyi phung po rnams la 'dir sdug bsngal med pas
T03D3805:78b-3: bdag med pa'o // nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bas zhi ba'o //
T03D3805:78b-4: sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa'i mi gtsang ba dag
T03D3805:78b-5: nye bar zhi bas dben pa ste zhes pa'i don
T03D3805:78b-6: to // bdag dang bdag gi dang bral bas stong pa'o //
T03D3805:78b-7: 'dus byas pa'i mtshan ma thams cad med pa'o //
T03D3805:78b-8: de'i khams gsum pa la smon pa'i smon pa zad pas smon pa med pa'o //

T03D3805:78b-12: med pa dang zhi ba dang dben pa la sogs
T03D3805:78b-13: pa'i thob par byed pa po'i phyir na lam yang

T03D3805:78b-16: pa med pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba med

T03D3805:78b-19: de'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:79a-30: bcom ldan 'das ma 'dir ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i

T03D3805:79b-1: mi sdug pa ni mi gtsang ba'o //

T03D3805:79b-5: 'di nyid ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //

T03D3805:79b-13: // de yang nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs rgyas

T03D3805:79b-36: mya ngan las 'das pa dag la mi gnas pa des na /

T03D3805:80a-5: du'o // yul med pa la dgag pa mi srid
T03D3805:80a-6: pas gnyi ga la mi mthun par mi gnas pa'o
T03D3805:80a-7: du'o // // lhag ma ni go sla'o zhes pa ni chos kyi mchog go /
T03D3805:80a-8: ji ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'di rnams nyan thos thams kyi ni /
T03D3805:80a-9: de la 'dir 'phags pa'i lam la ched du byed pa bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:80a-10: bse ru'i lam bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /

T03D3805:80a-16: ji ltar gnod sbyin gyi skad la sogs pa ni des smra ba'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:80a-28: tshig gnyis kyis kun tu brtags pa'i phyir 'dir de
T03D3805:80a-29: rnams las gzhan gyi nye bar bstan pa'i don med
T03D3805:80a-30: do // 'dir zhes pa ni phung po dang /

T03D3805:80a-35: chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te /

T03D3805:80a-37: rnams la chos rton par byed pa'i ston pa po

T03D3805:80a-42: spros pa med pa'i phyir phra ba'o /

T03D3805:80a-44: nyan thos kyi ma las ches ring ba dang /

T03D3805:80b-1: ston par byed cing ni gzhung ngo //

T03D3805:80b-14: bse ru rnams kyis gzhan gyi don gyi bya ba ji lta bu zhe na /
T03D3805:80b-15: 'dod pa tsam gyis don grub la ji ltar de

T03D3805:80b-19: ji lta ji ltar nyan de dang //
T03D3805:80b-20: de la sgra med kyang don te //

T03D3805:80b-23: gdul bar bya ba gang dang gang gi don gang dang gang la ste /

T03D3805:80b-28: zhes pa ni de lta bu ni 'dir med ces pa la sogs pa bshad de /
T03D3805:80b-29: gzung ba med pa'i shes pas thob bya thos pa med ces pa'i don to //

T03D3805:80b-31: nas gsum ka'i 'bras bu yang bzod pa 'di lam
T03D3805:80b-32: brten par zhes pa dang 'brel bar bya'o zhes pa'i
T03D3805:80b-33: don to // 'dir yang nyan thos rnams kyis kyang rang gi shes pa dang /

T03D3805:81a-4: rigs pas ni sems can la sogs pa yang sgyu ma dang /

T03D3805:81a-13: par byed pa la de rnams med pa ni yid

T03D3805:85b-20: de la dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:85b-21: tu phyin pa la yang chen po nyid ces pa
T03D3805:85b-22: ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'o //
T03D3805:85b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:85b-24: shes pa 'di rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang ro
T03D3805:85b-25: gcig pas mngon par zhen pa med par blta bar
T03D3805:85b-26: byas pas mngon par zhen pa med pa zhes bshad
T03D3805:85b-27: de / gzugs la sogs pa rnams nam mkha' lta
T03D3805:85b-28: bu'i stong pa nyid pas gang yang tshad kyis yongs
T03D3805:85b-29: su mchod pas tshad med ces pa ni sdug bsngal
T03D3805:85b-30: la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:85b-31: gzugs la sogs pa rnams la grangs kyis yongs su
T03D3805:85b-32: ma chod pas gzhal du med ces pa ni sdug
T03D3805:85b-33: bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:85b-34: mtha' nyid ni mtha' la gzugs la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:85b-35: la mtha' med pa nyid de yul gyis yongs su
T03D3805:85b-36: mchod pa dang / rtsom pa mtha' med de /
T03D3805:85b-37: rtsom pa'i chos de rnams thams cad la mtha' yod
T03D3805:85b-38: pa ma yin pa la bgrang ba las shin tu
T03D3805:85b-40: med pa nyid kyis na skye ba dang 'jig pa'i mtha' dag med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:85b-41: de'i phyir na dbus gnas pa med la sems can
T03D3805:85b-42: la dmigs pa gnyi ga la yang bdag med pa'i
T03D3805:85b-43: shes pa la de yang mtha' med kyi /
T03D3805:86a-1: zhig bgrang ba dang lhan cig sbyor bas med pa'i
T03D3805:86a-2: bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa nyid kyis na
T03D3805:86a-4: mi brjod pa ni grangs med pa'o //
T03D3805:86a-5: chos kyi tshig bla dgas zhes pa ni chos ni
T03D3805:86a-6: phung po la sogs pa la bdag dang rdzas ni
T03D3805:86a-7: med pas tshig bla dgas te med pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:86a-8: // chos nyid kyi rang gi don mngon par brjod
T03D3805:86a-9: pa'i chos kyi tshig bla dgas ni ma yin gyis
T03D3805:86a-10: // // rmongs pa rnams kyi rab tu spros pa
T03D3805:86a-11: dang ldan pa gang zhig glo bur bar yod pa
T03D3805:86a-12: ni rnam par brtags na g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:86a-13: gang du dngos po med pa can ni bdag dang rdzas ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:86a-14: bdag tu btags pa'i yul phung po la sogs pa
T03D3805:86a-15: la bdag gir byed pa gang de yang med pas
T03D3805:86a-16: bdag gi bya ba med pa la rtsom pa'i yul
T03D3805:86a-17: de la med pas rtsom pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:86a-18: 'di la zhes pa ni ston pa'i bstan pa la ste /
T03D3805:86a-19: 'dis ni tshig thob nas kyang grub pa med par grub pa ston par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:86a-20: ci ltar sems can mtha' yas zhes pa ni bgrang
T03D3805:86a-21: ba las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyis dang
T03D3805:86a-22: / gang du yang bdag med par tshad mas grub
T03D3805:86a-23: pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:86a-24: / / dbyangs kyis ni tshig la mtha' yas pa ni 'jig rten te /
T03D3805:86a-25: rnam par rig pa ni don shes par byed pa'i sgra dbyangs so //
T03D3805:86a-26: sgra zhes pa ni de ltar brjod pas so //
T03D3805:86a-27: de ltar shin tu dbyangs che ba'i phyir na zab mo'i dbyangs te /
T03D3805:86a-28: rnga phran gyi dbyangs bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'o //
T03D3805:86a-29: sgra yis zhes pa la de ltar brjod do //
T03D3805:86a-30: ma zhugs pa ni ngal ma bsos pas so //
T03D3805:86a-31: zin kyang ni cung zhig go //
T03D3805:86a-32: gdod nas dag pa'i phyir ni gdod nas de ltar med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:86a-33: yongs su dag pa nyid ni thams cad mu med pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:86a-34: rnam grangs 'dis zhes pa ni bye brag 'dis so //
T03D3805:86a-35: sems can mtha' med pa zhes pa ni sems can
T03D3805:86a-36: la skye ba dang 'gag pa'i mtha' dang bral ba'i
T03D3805:86a-37: phyir ro // 'di ltar yang zhes pa ni de lta bu nyid do //
T03D3805:86a-38: bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa nyid min zhes
T03D3805:86a-39: pa ni kun 'byung ba'i chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o
T03D3805:86a-40: // de'i zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa shes
T03D3805:86a-41: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
T03D3805:86b-0: la sangs rgyas nyid du @86b 'dzin pas so //
T03D3805:86b-1: sangs rgyas nyid du blta bar bya //
T03D3805:86b-2: zhes pa ni skad cig ma drug pa ste /
T03D3805:86b-3: de'i gnas skabs su gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:86b-4: skye dgu'i bdag po ni 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi rnams te /
T03D3805:86b-5: khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos thos nas rab tu
T03D3805:86b-6: mgu nas 'bad pa med par tshig gis ched du
T03D3805:86b-7: brjod pas ched du brjod do //
T03D3805:86b-8: chos bstan pas ni chos la yang chos ni chos rab tu gsal bar byas pa ste /
T03D3805:86b-10: chos de rnams kyi chos nyid ni rang bzhin te /
T03D3805:86b-12: de'i phyir na gsol ba ni gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:86b-13: rab tu 'byung zhes pa ni skye ba zag pa
T03D3805:86b-14: med par ye shes kyi mtshan nyid la smos pa
T03D3805:86b-15: ni de'i tshig las thog mar cung zhig yid ches
T03D3805:86b-16: pa'o // de nas rim gyis gsal zhing gsal bar
T03D3805:86b-17: gyur nas gsal ba dang yid ches par gyur pa
T03D3805:86b-18: la bstan par gyur pa dang /
T03D3805:86b-19: rab tu bshad par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3805:86b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ni skad cig ma drug po de nyid gsol ba'o //
T03D3805:86b-22: de nas zhes pa ni de nas brtsams nas so //
T03D3805:86b-23: ma bral ba ni thob pa las ma nyams pas so //
T03D3805:86b-24: gnas par 'gyur zhes pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:86b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T03D3805:86b-26: zhes pa ni gang zhig bshad pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T03D3805:86b-27: pa nyid du nges pa'i khyad par des thob pas
T03D3805:86b-28: so // de thob pas lung bstan pa thob la /
T03D3805:86b-30: gang du bdag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:86b-31: lo nyung ba'i gtsang sbra can la bram ze'i khye'u zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:86b-32: chos rnams ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du rtogs pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T03D3805:86b-33: dgra ni nyon mongs pa la de bcom pa dang ldan pas dgra bcom pa'o //
T03D3805:86b-34: yang dag par phyin ci log ma lus par rtog
T03D3805:86b-35: pa 'dis ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T03D3805:86b-36: te / de nyid kyis ni stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:86b-38: phyin ci ma log par gsungs pas ston pa yin te /
T03D3805:86b-39: phyin ci log gi tshig ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis sam /
T03D3805:86b-40: mi shes pa las byung la de gnyi ga yang
T03D3805:86b-41: 'di la med pas go rims bzhin du dgra bcom
T03D3805:87a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:87a-2: 'khor ba pas ji ltar 'di 'dra ba can du nus she na /
T03D3805:87a-4: bde bar gshegs pa ni yang srid pa las grol ba'o //
T03D3805:87a-5: bde ba'i sgra ni bkra shis pa dang yang phyir mi ldog pa dang /
T03D3805:87a-7: gzugs mdzes pa lta bu dang /
T03D3805:87a-8: rims nad legs par byang ba lta bu dang /
T03D3805:87a-9: bum pa legs par gang ba lta bu ste /
T03D3805:87a-10: phyi rol gyi slob pa dang /
T03D3805:87a-11: mi slob pa rnams rnam par bcad pa go rims bzhin no //
T03D3805:87a-12: de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis gshegs
T03D3805:87a-13: pa'i phyir bkra shis par gshegs pas bde bar gshegs
T03D3805:87a-14: pa'o // de bzhin du phyi rol pa rnams kyis ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:87a-15: dus mtshams dang bcas pa nyid kyis de'i thar pa ni thar pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:87a-16: yang mi ldog ces bshad pa ni slob pa de rnams la skye ba'i skyon kun tu 'byung la /
T03D3805:87a-17: bcom ldan 'das la ni slob pa med de /
T03D3805:87a-18: de'i phyir yang mi ldog par gshegs pas bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T03D3805:87a-19: nyon mongs pa'i rims nad kyi lhag ma ma lus pa med pas lus dang /
T03D3805:87a-21: blo la lam bshad pa'i yon tan thams cad la gsal ba dang mi ldan pa med pas so //
T03D3805:87a-22: de la slob pa rnams kyi theg pa rnams kyi
T03D3805:87a-23: theg pa dman pa la ni dgra bcom pa rnams
T03D3805:87a-24: ji ltar srid cing yod pa ni ma yin te
T03D3805:87a-25: / bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de ma lus pa la gshegs pas bde bar gshegs pa'o //
T03D3805:87a-26: bde ba'i sgra ni gcig pu gcig gis don gsum 'grel ba'i tshul gyis brjod do //
T03D3805:87a-27: ji ltar bde bar gshegs pa na gang du rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa ste /
T03D3805:87a-28: 'dir rig pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa la /
T03D3805:87a-30: lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa ni zhabs te /
T03D3805:87a-31: rig pa de dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:87a-32: 'dir rig pa'i spyan gyis bltas nas cig shos dag
T03D3805:87a-33: gi rkang pa gnyis bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas
T03D3805:87a-35: de la tshig 'di gnyis kyis ni ston pa po nyid kyi rgyu phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:87a-36: 'jig rten gdul bar bya ba la dus dang /
T03D3805:87b-0: dus ma yin pa yongs su mi mkhyen pa med pas 'jig @87b rten mkhyen pa'o //
T03D3805:87b-1: skyes bu 'dul ba ni gdul bya'i gdul bar bya ba 'dul ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:87b-2: de rnams kyi kha lo sgyur ba ste /
T03D3805:87b-3: yang dag par dul ba nyid de /
T03D3805:87b-7: ser skya la sogs pa bzhin no //
T03D3805:87b-8: de las lhag pa med pa ni bla na med pa ste /
T03D3805:87b-9: skyes bu 'dul ba dang kha lo sgyur ba'i tshig
T03D3805:87b-10: 'di gnyis ni ston pa phun sum tshogs pa nyid
T03D3805:87b-12: de lta bu'i las kyi yul ci ngan song du song ba'am zhe na /
T03D3805:87b-13: min ces gsungs pa de lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa zhes pa ste //
T03D3805:87b-14: rang nyid mngon par byang chub pas shin tu ba'i
T03D3805:87b-15: blo 'di la yod ces pas ni sangs rgyas so
T03D3805:87b-16: // drang srong gi thog ma'i phyir dang de dang
T03D3805:87b-17: 'dra ba'i rang rgyal ba yang med ces rnam par
T03D3805:87b-18: bcad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes smos pa ste
T03D3805:87b-19: // / rnam pa drug dang ldan pa dang bcom pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:87b-20: de la ni mi ldan pa'i phyir zhes pa ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'o //
T03D3805:87b-21: ngo mtshar ba ni skyes pa nyid la'o //
T03D3805:87b-22: mchog tu ngo mtshar ba ni rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa la ste /
T03D3805:87b-23: ji srid kyi sgra ni mtha' thug pa'i don te /
T03D3805:87b-24: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas ji srid
T03D3805:87b-25: du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar
T03D3805:87b-27: skyed par byed pa ni 'gugs par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:87b-28: rjes su yongs su 'dzin pa po zhes pa'i rjes su'i sgra ni ched du'i don la /
T03D3805:87b-29: ched du dang ldan pa dag ni rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:87b-31: ma btang ba dag sgrub par byed pa'i rgyur yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3805:87b-32: ji ltar yongs su blang ba med cing dor ba
T03D3805:87b-33: med pa de ltar yongs su blang ba zhes pa'i
T03D3805:87b-35: blang med dor ba med sogs dang //
T03D3805:87b-37: blang ba med pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:87b-38: 'di ni blang ba med pa'i don to //
T03D3805:87b-39: dor ba med pa nyid ni mi dor ba ste /
T03D3805:87b-40: 'dir ni mi gtong ba'i don to //
T03D3805:87b-41: kun tu len pa ni thog ma nas yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3805:87b-42: mi 'jig pa dang mi gtong ba nyid ni thog ma nas de ltar ro zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:87b-43: de ltar mi len pa dang /
T03D3805:87b-44: mi 'dor bdag la ni byang chub sems dpas blang
T03D3805:87b-45: du med ces pa'i don to zhes pa ni kun
T03D3805:87b-46: 'byung ba la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:88a-1: skabs phye ba'i phyir nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u ni brgya byin gyi le'u'o //
T03D3805:88a-2: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:88a-3: brgyad stong pa'i 'grel ba gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od
T03D3805:88a-4: ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung
T03D3805:88a-5: gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u gnyis pa'o /
T03D3805:88a-8: // / byams pa la sogs zhes pa ni byams pa dang /
T03D3805:88a-11: btang snyoms te tshad med pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:88a-12: de'i bdag nyid can mthong ba'i skad cig ma brgyad pa la zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:88a-14: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ni sdud pa pos smras pa ste /
T03D3805:88a-15: dpang du byas pa ni skad cig ma brgyad pa
T03D3805:88a-16: na theg pa dman pa ltung ba'i gnyen po la
T03D3805:88a-17: shin tu gus pa bskyed pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:88a-18: skad cig ma de nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:88a-19: gang la la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:88a-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa
T03D3805:88a-21: ni rab tu 'byed pa'i mthong ba'i skad cig ni
T03D3805:88a-22: shes rab la de nyid kyis theg pa dman par
T03D3805:88a-23: ltung ba'i sa las pha rol tu 'gro ba ni
T03D3805:88a-24: gang 'dir gang zhig tshad med pa bzhi'i bdag nyid
T03D3805:88a-25: can du mthong ba la de ltar ni byang chub
T03D3805:88a-26: sems dpa' des thob pa ste /
T03D3805:88a-27: sems can thams cad la bdag nyid dang mnyam pa nyid du bltas nas /
T03D3805:88a-29: phan pa'i bdag nyid kyi phan pa 'ga' zhig gis
T03D3805:88a-30: 'dir de gang yang theg pa dman par mi ltung
T03D3805:88a-31: bas de'i phyir byams pa la sogs pa'i mthong ba
T03D3805:88a-32: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste
T03D3805:88a-33: / de nyid skad cig ma brgyad pa'o //
T03D3805:88a-34: de rnams kyis gang zhig ces pa nas ji srid du kun chub par byed pa'i bar te ;
T03D3805:88a-35: mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:88a-36: rab tu 'don par byed pa ni gzhan dag las
T03D3805:88a-37: rab tu ston pa'i phyir de rnams la des 'dzin
T03D3805:88a-38: pa nas ji srid du 'chang ba'i bar gyi phyir
T03D3805:88a-39: ro // de'i zhes pa la sogs pa ni phan yon te /
T03D3805:88a-40: rab tu 'don par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar te /
T03D3805:88a-41: glags tshol ba ni 'jug pa la skabs ni skyon te /
T03D3805:88a-42: de dang ldan pa ni glags lta ba'i bsam pa
T03D3805:88a-43: ni glags tshol ba'o zhes pa ni kun 'byung la
T03D3805:88a-45: 'gog pa la bcu drug ces pa bstan bcos su bshad de /
T03D3805:88a-46: stong pa nyid bcu drug rnams kyis thob pa ni mthong ba'i skad cig ma dgu pa la ste /
T03D3805:88b-1: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:88b-2: 'dir yang mthong ba'i skad cig ma ni shes rab la /
T03D3805:88b-3: pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa nyid bcu drug rnams kyang kun tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:88b-4: grong las gzhu 'dom lnga brgya'i pha rol gyi gnas ni dgon pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-5: thog ma phub pa'i sa phyogs ni bla gab med pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-6: dgon pa las grong du 'brog dgon pa ste /
T03D3805:88b-7: de nyal ba ni nyal ba'o //
T03D3805:88b-8: 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni rgyun gyis 'jug pa la bsrung ba dang /
T03D3805:88b-9: bskyab pa dang bcas pa ni sba ba'o //
T03D3805:88b-10: de la sngags la sogs pa ni bsrung ba'o //
T03D3805:88b-11: srung ba po nges par sbyor ba ni bskyab pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-12: rang nyid nye bar son nas byin gyis brlab pa ni sbed pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-13: yang na lus kyi bde ba nye bar sgrub pa
T03D3805:88b-14: ni bsrung ba la phyi rol gyi nye bar 'tshe
T03D3805:88b-15: ba bzlog pa ni bskyab pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-16: nang gi nad la sogs pa las bzlog pa ni sbed pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-17: de rnams kyi bgyi ba ni yang dag pa'i sbyor ba ste /
T03D3805:88b-18: ngag dang yid do zhes pa nye bar son nas byin gyis brlab pa ni sbed pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-19: sangs rgyas kyi dngos po nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid
T03D3805:88b-20: la gang gis sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
T03D3805:88b-21: yongs su 'dzin te mtshan dang 'od dang dbyangs dang
T03D3805:88b-22: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs la sogs pa phun sum
T03D3805:88b-23: tshogs pas sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing rnams su sangs
T03D3805:88b-24: rgyas kyi gzugs su bdag nyid kyis ston te /
T03D3805:88b-26: de nas yang brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:88b-27: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes
T03D3805:88b-28: pa ni mthong ba'i skad cig ma bcu pa la'o
T03D3805:88b-29: // de la ni khyad par du 'phags pas so //
T03D3805:88b-30: mthong ba'i chos ni skye bas thob pa'o//
T03D3805:88b-31: de las byung ba'i yon tan gyis mtshan phun sum
T03D3805:88b-32: tshogs pa la sogs pa thob ces pa ni bstan
T03D3805:88b-33: pa'o // bshad pa ni yongs su 'dzin par gyur zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:88b-35: rnam par byang ba byed pas na rnam par byang ba ste /
T03D3805:88b-36: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-37: des ni thams cad yongs su bsdus pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-39: yang ci zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:88b-40: ma ni zhes pa ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:88b-41: klan ka dang gnod par byed pa'i mu stegs rnams dang lhan cig rtsod pa dang /
T03D3805:89a-2: de ltar yang de zhi nas ji ltar de rnams
T03D3805:89a-3: kyis phyis theg pa gsum po 'di thos pa dang
T03D3805:89a-4: ldan pa rnams kyis nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3805:89a-6: 'khor bar bsgrags pa'i nad zad par 'gyur la /
T03D3805:89a-7: de'i phyir gnod pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed
T03D3805:89a-8: pa ni mthong ba'i skad cig ma bcu gnyis la
T03D3805:89a-10: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:89a-11: chos ston pa la rtsod pa byed pa ni bzhad gad kyis so //
T03D3805:89a-12: rgol bar byed pa ni 'thab mos so //

T03D3805:95b-8: kun rdzob ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T03D3805:95b-9: de'i phyir na de ni chos kyi skus kun tu bsdus zhes bshad do //
T03D3805:95b-10: de lta bu'i de kho na nyid dang /
T03D3805:95b-11: de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i brjod pa po nyid
T03D3805:95b-12: kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
T03D3805:95b-13: shin tu yang gus pa'i yul yin zhes brgya byin
T03D3805:95b-14: gyis bstan shes pa ni gzhan gyi don gyi mod
T03D3805:95b-16: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:95b-17: 'on kyang gi sgra ni khyad par gyi don to /
T03D3805:95b-18: gang yang de rnams la yang gus te /
T03D3805:95b-19: de lta na yang zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:95b-20: chos ston pa'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir chos bzangs lha'i 'dun sa yin pa'i phyir lha'i 'dun sa ste /
T03D3805:95b-21: shin tu yang yangs pa lha'i grong khyer blta na sdug pa'i bden bral gyi phyogs su'o //
T03D3805:95b-22: 'dod ces pas na dbang po ste /
T03D3805:95b-23: skyes bu chen po des kun du bsgrags pa la blta bar 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:95b-24: shin tu dbang che bar grags pas 'dir dbang che bar grags pa ste /
T03D3805:95b-25: bsam pa chen po'i zhes pa'i don te /
T03D3805:95b-26: de yang 'dir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T03D3805:95b-27: de'i ye shes kyi sku'i rgyu'i ngo bo dang rkyen gyi ngo bo ste /
T03D3805:95b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:95b-30: de la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni brgya
T03D3805:95b-31: byin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ni 'dir rgyu
T03D3805:95b-32: dang rkyen du gyur pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:95b-33: brgya byin gyi stan bzhin te /
T03D3805:95b-34: sngon du chos kyi sku'i rten du gyur pas gzugs kyi sku la yang sku nyid du bshad do //
T03D3805:95b-35: 'dir ni dbang che bar grags pa'i ye shes kyi
T03D3805:95b-36: sku'i gdan lta bu'o zhes pa'i don 'di la gang
T03D3805:95b-37: zhig dad pa dang < dang bas bla lhag par
T03D3805:95b-38: spyod ces pa ni chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
T03D3805:95b-39: zhog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:95b-40: 'dir bcom ldan 'das mar bshad pa'i bdag nyid chen
T03D3805:95b-41: po la gang zhig dad pa dang dang ba dang
T03D3805:95b-42: bcas pa nyid kyis bla lhag par spyod ces pa
T03D3805:96a-1: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:96a-2: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba nyid la /
T03D3805:96a-3: skyed pa po de bas na gdung bas de mchod
T03D3805:96a-4: pa la smos kyang ci dgos zhes pa ni 'dir
T03D3805:96a-5: dad pa la sogs bla lhag par spyod pa'o zhes
T03D3805:96a-7: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:96a-8: gzung bar mi 'gyur zhes pa ni go rims ji
T03D3805:96a-9: lta ba bzhin du dman par byas nas mi 'phel
T03D3805:96a-10: bar byas shing rtsa ba dang bcas pa gsal bar
T03D3805:96a-12: ji ltar phyung yang nor bu rin po che de'i
T03D3805:96a-13: za ma tog de la snying du sdug par 'gyur
T03D3805:96a-14: ro // de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi de snyed
T03D3805:96a-15: kyi yon tan rnams kyis yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3805:96a-16: 'das kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel mchod pa
T03D3805:96a-17: bya ba 'gyur zhes pa'i don 'di la bla lhag
T03D3805:96a-18: par spyod ces pa ni 'bring gi 'bring ngo //
T03D3805:96a-19: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:96a-20: ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:96a-21: las skyes pa'i phyir bstan pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyis
T03D3805:96a-22: kyang ston par byed pas na mchod pa'i 'os su
T03D3805:96a-23: 'gyur ba de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:96a-24: phyin pa las skyes pa'i phyir de'i mthus ring bsrel
T03D3805:96a-25: yang mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhes pa'i dad pa
T03D3805:96a-26: la sogs pa can gyis spyod pa bla lhag pa'i
T03D3805:96a-28: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:96a-29: bcom ldan 'das la mchod pas dus gsum gyi de
T03D3805:96a-30: bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyur zhes pa'i dad
T03D3805:96a-31: pa la sogs pa can gyis spyod pa bla lhag
T03D3805:96a-32: pa spyod ces pa ni chen po'i chung ngu'o //
T03D3805:96a-33: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:96a-34: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang chos
T03D3805:96a-35: de ston par byed pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i don
T03D3805:96a-36: 'di nyid la bla lhag pa'i dad pas bla lhag
T03D3805:96a-37: par spyod de chos nyid ni chos kyi sku ste
T03D3805:96a-38: / de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:96a-39: bcom ldan 'das ma chos sku nyid du gsal bar
T03D3805:96a-40: byed pa la yang brgya byin gyis gsol pa ni
T03D3805:96a-41: pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'i zhes pa la
T03D3805:96a-42: sogs pa ste / yang dag par rab tu shes pa dang /
T03D3805:96a-43: spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyis rig pa'o //
T03D3805:96a-44: yang dag par rab tu mthong ba ni rnam pa
T03D3805:96a-45: thams cad kyis yang dag par kun tu mthong zhes
T03D3805:96b-1: de nas yang brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:96b-2: theg pa chen po thams cad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rab tu bsdus la /
T03D3805:96b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma ni de rnams kyi gtso bo dang sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:96b-4: kun tu sdud pa'i phyir zhes pa 'di la dad
T03D3805:96b-5: pa la sogs pas bla lhag par spyod pa ste
T03D3805:96b-6: / thabs kyis zhes pa la sogs pa ni bstan
T03D3805:96b-7: pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:96b-8: dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos
T03D3805:96b-9: pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:96b-10: de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi dpe'i
T03D3805:96b-11: shing de rnams kyi grib ma mnyam du ro gcig
T03D3805:96b-12: pa ni thabs la mkhas pas yongs su ma zin
T03D3805:96b-14: yon tan chen po dang ldan pa'i phan yon mang
T03D3805:96b-15: po ni rang gi don gyi mos pa rdzogs par
T03D3805:96b-17: gzhal du med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni grangs med cing tshad med pa ni yul te /
T03D3805:96b-18: rang dang gzhan gyi mos pa la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:96b-19: mu med pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni mtha'
T03D3805:96b-20: yas pa'i sems can gyi khams kyi ched du gzhan
T03D3805:96b-21: gyi don gyi mos pa 'byung ba'i phyir zhes pa
T03D3805:96b-23: rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:96b-24: tu phyin pa'i gang zhig gi yon tan de rnams
T03D3805:96b-25: yongs su bsgrags pa ste le'u bzhi pa'o /
T03D3805:96b-27: // / de ltar mos pa nyi shu rtsa bdun sgom
T03D3805:96b-28: pa po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spro ba
T03D3805:96b-29: skyes pa'i phyir sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis
T03D3805:96b-30: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du de nyid la
T03D3805:96b-31: nyi shu rtsa bdun gyi bstod pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:96b-34: bkur bas na bkur ba la /
T03D3805:96b-35: bsngags pas na bsngags pa zhes pa'i don te /
T03D3805:96b-37: shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi //
T03D3805:96b-38: mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni //
T03D3805:96b-39: dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang //
T03D3805:96b-40: bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod //
T03D3805:96b-42: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gang
T03D3805:96b-43: zhig mos pa sngon du bshad pa'i mos pa gsum
T03D3805:96b-44: dgur byas pa de'i yon tan 'byung ba snyed kyi
T03D3805:96b-45: dbye ba rnams kyi gsum po la dgur byas pa
T03D3805:96b-46: rnams la go rims bzhin du bstod pa dang bkur
T03D3805:96b-49: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-0: gang zhig lhag par mos zhes pas 'brel @97a * //
T03D3805:97a-2: ji ltar tshul dang ma bral ba zhes bya ba'i bar ro //
T03D3805:97a-3: mngon par dad pas zhes pas 'di'i bshad pa ni rab tu rtogs pas zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-4: 'di nyid kho na la dad par bya zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:97a-5: bsam pa la la de'i dge ba'i chos rnams 'dir bsam pas bsam pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-6: chu yi zam pa lta bu'o //
T03D3805:97a-7: de yang dad pa dang 'dun pa dag ste /
T03D3805:97a-8: lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa des so //
T03D3805:97a-9: nyan par byed pa ni don dang gzhung dag go //
T03D3805:97a-10: gzung bar byed pa ni rjod par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-11: 'chang bar byed pa ni sems la gzhag par byed
T03D3805:97a-12: pa la klog par byed pa ni 'don par byed
T03D3805:97a-13: pa'o // kun chub par byed pa ni rnam pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa la /
T03D3805:97a-14: rab tu 'don par byed pa ni gzhan rnams la kun tu spel bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-15: 'di'i rgyas par bshad pa ni gzhan dag la ston
T03D3805:97a-16: par bye pa ni gzhung gis smra bar byed pa'i
T03D3805:97a-17: phyir la / nye bar ston par byed pa ni don no //
T03D3805:97a-18: lung 'bogs par ni don smra ba'o //
T03D3805:97a-19: kha ton tu byed pa ni shin tu goms par
T03D3805:97a-20: byed pa'i phyir yang nas yang du kha ton byed
T03D3805:97a-21: pas so // rgya cher bcas pa ni mang po rnams la kun tu ston pas so //
T03D3805:97a-22: yang dag par rab tu ston pa ni bya ba
T03D3805:97a-23: rtag par rab tu ston par byed pas te gzhung
T03D3805:97a-24: gis so // rnam par 'grel ba ni rgya chen pos so //
T03D3805:97a-25: yid kyis rjes su rtog pa ni sems kyis rjes
T03D3805:97a-26: su brtags pa las kun tu sbyor bar byas nas
T03D3805:97a-28: zhi gnas skyed par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-29: yongs su dpyod par byed pa ni rnam par brtags pa rnams kyis lhag mthong skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:97a-31: 'di las med pas na chung ngu na zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-32: 'chang bar byed pa ni mi 'jigs par byed pa la /
T03D3805:97a-33: 'jog pa ni rang gi khyim la sogs par te /
T03D3805:97a-34: bstod pa gsum po rnams kyis zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-35: tshul dang ma bral bar zhes pa'i bar gyis so //
T03D3805:97a-36: 'phags pa dam pa rnams kyi lam gyi chos ni dam pa'i chos la /
T03D3805:97a-37: de yun ring du gnas par byed pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-39: dam pa'i chos zhes pa dang po'i bstod pa ni theg pa thams cad pa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-40: sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul ni rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:97a-41: phal che ba can gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:97a-42: de la sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma
T03D3805:97b-0: gyur cig ces pas @97b 'di gzhag par bya zhes
T03D3805:97b-1: pa'i bstod pa gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dbang
T03D3805:97b-2: du byas pa'o // tshul dang ma bral bar zhes
T03D3805:97b-3: pa 'di gzhag par bya zhes pa ni bstod pa
T03D3805:97b-4: du byas pa'o // gsum pa ste / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-5: 'dir don chen po dang 'bras bu chen po zhes pa ni don du gnyer ba po 'dis te /
T03D3805:97b-6: 'di ni bstan pa la gzhan ni bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-7: phan yon chen po ni ji skad bshad pa'i phan yon rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:97b-8: 'bras bu chen po ni rgyun du zhugs pa nyid la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03D3805:97b-9: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:97b-10: rnam par smin ba che ba ni 'phags pa rnam
T03D3805:97b-11: pa thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:97b-12: // de bzhin du mang po zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T03D3805:97b-13: yongs su mi gtang bar bya ba ni yongs su gzung zhing gtang bar mi bya ba'o //
T03D3805:97b-14: bsrung bar bya ba ni me dang byi ba la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T03D3805:97b-15: sba bar bya ba ni rkun po la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T03D3805:97b-17: shin tu rnyed par dka' bas so //
T03D3805:97b-18: lhag par mos pa ni de bzhin du de ltar sems par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-19: bden pa ma yin pa la rab tu 'jug pas ni mos pa brtan par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:97b-20: don du gnyer bas don te mchod pa 'dod pas
T03D3805:97b-21: der gnyer ba la shin tu der sbyor bas na
T03D3805:97b-22: 'dun pa'o // sbyin par byed pa ni khas len par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-23: gtod pa ni nye bar byed pa la /
T03D3805:97b-24: 'bul ba la ni len du 'jug par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-25: yongs su gtong ba ni yid la gcags pa med pa ste blo ni 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-26: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ni yon tan dang ngo bo nyid la'o //
T03D3805:97b-27: sbyin par byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyir la ;
T03D3805:97b-28: yang dag par 'byed pa ni dran pas de rnams kyi lhag par ro myang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:97b-29: rgya che ba ni yangs pa ste /
T03D3805:97b-30: des spyod ces pas na yangs pa can no //
T03D3805:97b-31: so so rang gi bdag nyid kyis zhes pa ni bstod pa chung ngu'i chung ngu'o //
T03D3805:97b-32: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni bstod pa chung ngu'i 'bring ngo //
T03D3805:97b-33: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:97b-34: yang dag par len du gzhug pa ni yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa'o //
T03D3805:97b-35: rab tu gzhog par byed pa ni rim pa las mi 'da' bas so //
T03D3805:97b-37: bcom ldan 'das ma'i yon tan la'o //
T03D3805:97b-38: gzhan du na ni yang dag pa'i sbyin pa por mi 'gyur ro//
T03D3805:98a-0: @98a * // mngon par dad pa las gzhan du na ni rtag
T03D3805:98a-1: par yang dag par len pa'i snod du mi 'gyur
T03D3805:98a-2: ro // snyom las ni ngan la zhen pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-3: snyom las med pa ni brtson 'grus so //
T03D3805:98a-4: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' la bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:98a-5: ma 'dzin du 'jug pa ni byang chub sgrub pa'i
T03D3805:98a-7: yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-9: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ni klog pa
T03D3805:98a-10: dang mchod pa la sogs pa rnams la rab tu
T03D3805:98a-12: rab tu zhugs pa na gzengs stod par byed pa ste spro bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:98a-13: brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams la ni bstod pa rnams
T03D3805:98a-14: kyis yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa'o
T03D3805:98a-15: // 'jig rten phyin ci log pas de yis mi
T03D3805:98a-16: nus so zhes gsungs pa ni tshig gis mtshon pa
T03D3805:98a-17: ni dad pa can la des mthu dang ldan pa'i
T03D3805:98a-18: ngang nyid du gyur pas so //
T03D3805:98a-19: kha phyir phyogs pa rnams la rnam par mtshon pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-20: lta ba ngan pa rnams la rigs pa rnams kyis gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:98a-21: btang snyoms pa la rjes su mtshon pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-22: rjes su chags par byed pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ma de'i yon tan brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:98a-23: de ltar snod du byas pa la don zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:98a-24: rnam par sbyong bar byed pa ni lta ba ngan pa rnams la gnod par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:98a-25: 'di ltar ni the tshom can rnams the tshom med par byed par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:98a-26: rigs pa gzhan rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:98a-27: slobs shig pa ni bslab pa gsum po rnams kyis slob par byed pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-28: bsam pas spyad pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
T03D3805:98a-29: 'bad pa ni lhag mthong gis la sems can gyi khams ni sems can gyi phung po'o //
T03D3805:98a-30: shin tu mthar thug par 'gyur ba'i phyir bla na med pa la /
T03D3805:98a-31: phung po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-32: zag pa dang bcas pa rnams so //
T03D3805:98a-33: de rnams ma lus par zad par byed pa ni
T03D3805:98a-34: de'i rgyu mtshan gyi mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba'i
T03D3805:98a-35: sgrib pa rnams zad pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:98a-36: yang dag pa'i mtha'i rab tu dbye ba ni chos
T03D3805:98a-37: kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid dang
T03D3805:98a-38: ro gcig pa nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i phung
T03D3805:98a-39: po lnga tsam lhag pa nyid do //
T03D3805:98a-40: de yis de ltar zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:98a-41: dge ba bcu la rab tu dgod pa la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni chung ngu'i chen po'o //
T03D3805:98b-0: bstod pa lnga po rnams kyi zhog ces pa la @98b sogs pa ni snga ma'i cha la /
T03D3805:98b-1: de ji snyam du sems zhes pa la sogs pa ni phyi ma'i cha ste /
T03D3805:98b-2: 'di rnams mdo las bshad pa las bsod nams bla
T03D3805:98b-3: lhag pa dang dad pa la sogs pa'i mthu bstan
T03D3805:98b-4: nas bla lhag pa'i cha rkyen gyis bla lhag par
T03D3805:98b-5: spyod pas so // rnam grangs kyis ni bye brag gis te //
T03D3805:98b-6: dngos po gsum gyi mos pas gnas //
T03D3805:98b-8: 'di rnams go rims bzhin du 'bring gi chung ngu dang /
T03D3805:98b-13: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa lnga dang /
T03D3805:98b-14: zhog ces pa dgu mdo las bshad pas bsod nams
T03D3805:98b-15: bla lhag pa la sogs pa bla lhag pa'i spyod
T03D3805:98b-16: pa ste / snga ma dang phyi ma rnams kyi
T03D3805:98b-17: gzhung ma tshang ba yod na yang bsnan par bya
T03D3805:98b-18: pa ste / ba'o // bsam gtan bzhi la bkod
T03D3805:98b-19: ces pa ni de yang bsam gtan po ni 'dod
T03D3805:98b-20: pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams la mi sbyor zhing /
T03D3805:98b-21: 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams la dmigs pa med pa'i
T03D3805:98b-22: phyir na 'dod pa rnams kyis dben pa la nyon
T03D3805:98b-23: mongs pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyu rnams kyi lus
T03D3805:98b-24: dang ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa'i mi
T03D3805:98b-25: dge ba rnams dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par rtog
T03D3805:98b-26: pa dang bcas shing rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas
T03D3805:98b-27: mongs pa dang / pa'o // 'dod pa'i gnyen por
