T03D3805:121b-24: dmigs pa med par byed pa dang //
T03D3805:121b-25: shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung //
T03D3805:121b-26: ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni //
T03D3805:121b-27: mngon du bya la mi rtog nyid //
T03D3805:121b-28: mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang ;
T03D3805:121b-29: / dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la //
T03D3805:121b-30: shes pa skye ba med pa ni //
T03D3805:121b-31: kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma //
T03D3805:121b-33: mtha' las 'das zhes pa ni rnam par dag pa ste /
T03D3805:121b-34: skad cig ma gnyis pa la rnam par dag pas yongs su dag ces pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:121b-35: brjod pa yis zhes pa dang grol ba dang zhes
T03D3805:121b-36: pa rjes su sbyar ba'i gang phyir zhes bya ba
T03D3805:121b-37: ni rung ba'o // de ltar 'di ni thams cad
T03D3805:121b-38: shes pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthong ba'i lam gyi skad
T03D3805:121b-40: de la de ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pas ni skad cig ma gnyis gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:121b-41: gzugs la sogs pa rtag pa ma yin bcings pa
T03D3805:121b-42: ma yin grol ba ma yin la rang nyid kyis
T03D3805:121b-43: yod pa ma yin pa de ni mi rtag pa
T03D3805:121b-44: nyid la sogs pa la mi sbyor bas zhes pa'i
T03D3805:121b-45: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:121b-46: gzugs la sogs pa ni shin tu rtag cing dag
T03D3805:121b-47: pa'o zhes pa ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'o
T03D3805:121b-48: // de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122a-1: su dag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams rnam par dag pas stong pa dang /
T03D3805:122a-2: mi stong pa dang bral ba'i phyir zhes bya ba
T03D3805:122a-3: ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'o
T03D3805:122a-4: // gzugs la sogs pa rnams rnam par dag pas
T03D3805:122a-5: skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa kun nas
T03D3805:122a-6: nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par byang ba med
T03D3805:122a-7: pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes pa ni sdug bsngal la
T03D3805:122a-9: chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' bzhin du skye ba la sogs pa med pas /
T03D3805:122a-10: nam mkha' la zhes pa la sogs pa ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:122a-11: nam mkha' bzhin du chos rnams thams cad kyis gos
T03D3805:122a-12: pa med pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:122a-13: pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes pa ni kun 'byung
T03D3805:122a-15: chos rnams nam mkha' ltar yongs su 'dzin pa med
T03D3805:122a-16: pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
T03D3805:122a-17: su dag pa'o zhes pa ni kun 'byung la rjes
T03D3805:122a-19: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122a-20: smrar med cing brjod du med pa ni ji ltar
T03D3805:122a-21: nam mkha' la ri bo dang chu dang rlung gi
T03D3805:122a-22: brag cas cung zad brjod du med de /
T03D3805:122a-23: de bzhin du chos rnams thams cad ces pa ste
T03D3805:122a-24: nam mkha' la brjod du med pas shes rab kyi
T03D3805:122a-25: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes
T03D3805:122a-26: pa ni kun 'byung la rjes su shes pa'o //
T03D3805:122a-27: gang gis brjod pa'i 'dod pa'i don gzhan gyis thob
T03D3805:122a-28: par byed pa dang thob pa po'i brjod pas brjod
T03D3805:122a-29: pa ni ji ltar nam mkha' la brag cas cung
T03D3805:122a-30: zad brjod du med pa de bzhin du chos rnams
T03D3805:122a-31: thams cad nam mkha' ltar brjod du med pas shes
T03D3805:122a-32: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag
T03D3805:122a-33: pa'o zhes pa ni 'gog pa la chos shes pa'i
T03D3805:122a-34: bzod pa nye bar dmigs pa med la /
T03D3805:122a-35: gang dmigs pa med pa ni brag cas smrar med
T03D3805:122a-36: cing de brjod du med ces pa ni bsdus pa
T03D3805:122a-37: ste / de yang de'i mi dmigs pa ni de'i ngo bo de la de yis te /
T03D3805:122a-38: ji ltar nam mkha' la cung zad dmigs su med pa de ltar chos rnams te /
T03D3805:122a-39: 'dir nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs su med pas yongs
T03D3805:122a-40: su dag pa'o zhes pa ni 'gog pa la chos
T03D3805:122a-41: shes pa'o // thams cad du yang des gos pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa can dang /
T03D3805:122a-42: gos pa med pa'i rnam par byang ba can gyi
T03D3805:122a-43: chos de rnams kyis ma gos pa ni gos pa
T03D3805:122b-1: gnyi ga yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir yongs su dag
T03D3805:122b-2: pa'o zhes pa ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes
T03D3805:122b-3: pa'i bzod pa'o // de skad ces bka' stsal pa
T03D3805:122b-4: dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas 'chi ba'i dus
T03D3805:122b-5: zhes pa'i bar ni 'gog pa la rjes su shes
T03D3805:122b-6: pa'i bzod pa'o // pa'o // mang po zhes pa
T03D3805:122b-7: la sogs pa nas ji ltar zhes pa ni bla
T03D3805:122b-8: na med pa'i rin po che bsrungs pas kyang ste
T03D3805:122b-9: 'o na 'di nyid rin po che chen po la
T03D3805:122b-10: bsrung ba ste 'di las bsrung ba gzhan rnams kyis
T03D3805:122b-13: 'on kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-14: dgra ni bar chad med pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-15: ci tsam du gces par 'gyur ba ni ci tsam du rab tu gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-16: 'dir bsod nams la bstod pa gsungs pas ngan song
T03D3805:122b-17: la sogs pa chad pa don gyis gsungs pa'o zhes
T03D3805:122b-18: pa ni lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-19: bla na med pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-20: zhugs pa ni 'jug pa la 'di'i rnam par 'grel
T03D3805:122b-21: pa ni thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:122b-22: ; mi 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis zhes pa ni rtag pa'i tshul gyis so //
T03D3805:122b-23: de lta na ni rnam par rtog pa can no zhe na /
T03D3805:122b-25: skye ba med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-26: mi zhum pa ni mngon par mi zhen pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-27: kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba ni mi gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-28: yongs su mi 'dzin pa ni yang dag par mi shes pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-29: rnam pa gsum du yang rtog par mi byed pas
T03D3805:122b-30: de ltar rnam par rtog pa med pa'o zhes pa
T03D3805:122b-31: ni lam la chos shes pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-32: ma skyes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-33: 'bras bu skye ba ma dmigs pa ni ma skyes pa'o //
T03D3805:122b-34: de'i rgyus gos pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-35: 'bras bu skyed pa'i mtshan ma rnams ni dri ma rnams su gyur pas so //
T03D3805:122b-36: de ltar na ci'i phyir ma gos she na /
T03D3805:122b-37: de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:122b-38: ni rnam par rtog pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i
T03D3805:122b-39: phyir ro // ji ltar gos pa med pa nyid
T03D3805:122b-40: na gsungs pa de ni de ltar yang zhes pa
T03D3805:122b-42: skye bar byed pa'i 'bras bu rnams la yang chos
T03D3805:122b-43: thams cad kyi mtshan ma'i dri ma rnams nub par
T03D3805:122b-44: gyur pas gos pa med pa ni lam la rjes
T03D3805:122b-46: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:122b-47: de ltar yang zhes pa ni shin tu phra mo'i
T03D3805:122b-48: dngos pa yang yi ge dang mi rnams kyis te
T03D3805:123a-2: yi ge dang gnyis su snang ba rnams gsum char
T03D3805:123a-3: yang phyin ci log cing med pa'i phyir spang bar
T03D3805:123a-4: bya ba'o // phyin ci log gi spros pa de
T03D3805:123a-5: rnams ni med pa nyid pas 'dir de ltar spros
T03D3805:123a-6: par mi byed ces pa ni lam la rjes su
T03D3805:123a-7: bya ba'o // shes pa'o // thams cad shes pa
T03D3805:123a-8: nyid 'di rnams la yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan
T03D3805:123a-9: las 'das pa la rab tu mi gnas pa nyid
T03D3805:123a-10: la sogs par sbyor bar 'gyur bas ni byang chub
T03D3805:123a-11: sems dpa' rnams kyir 'gyur la de ltar ma gyur
T03D3805:123a-12: pas ni nyan thos la sogs pa rnams su 'gyur
T03D3805:123a-13: bya ba'o // shes pa'o // te / chos la
T03D3805:123a-14: bdag med pa la sogs ldog pa'i sgo nas srid
T03D3805:123a-15: pa dang zhi ba la kun tu gnas pa la
T03D3805:123a-16: sogs pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad shes pa nyid ni
T03D3805:123a-17: ji srid sems bskyed pa lnga po'i bar du ste
T03D3805:123a-18: bya ba'o // shes pa'o // te / / bcom
T03D3805:123a-19: ldan 'das ma 'bring po las de gsungs pa ni
T03D3805:123a-21: thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyis mthong nas kyang
T03D3805:123a-22: mthong ba las shin tu 'da' bar 'dod pa dang
T03D3805:123a-24: / lam shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'dod
T03D3805:123a-25: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' zhes te /
T03D3805:123a-26: de la ye shes ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi mngon par rtogs pa la /
T03D3805:123a-27: byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba'i lam nyid la nyan
T03D3805:123a-28: thos la sogs pa'i rtogs pa yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3805:123a-29: 'gyur te / rjes su dpag pa rnam par bcad pas mthong ba'o //
T03D3805:123a-30: ye shes kyis mthong ba'i tshig ni 'khrul pa gcod pa ste /
T03D3805:123a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i bsgom pa'i lam la nyan thos
T03D3805:123a-32: dang rang sangs rgyas kyis rnams bsgom lam du med
T03D3805:123a-34: shin tu 'das nas yang rnam pa kun mngon par
T03D3805:123a-35: rdzogs par rtogs pa la zhugs pa'o zhes 'phags pa
T03D3805:123a-36: rnam par grol sdes bshad la /
T03D3805:123a-37: de'i phyir na bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:123a-38: nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i lam //
T03D3805:123a-39: zhes te 'di nyid kyis na sdud pa tshigs su
T03D3805:123a-40: bcad pa'i 'grel pa las thams cad shes pa nyid
T03D3805:123a-41: sa bdun par rnam par gzhag pa'i seng ge bzang
T03D3805:123a-42: po'i bshad pa ni mi 'thad do //
T03D3805:123a-43: gzhan yang de'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T03D3805:123a-44: bdag cag gi dag ni mkhas pa rnams kyi rigs pas so sor brtag par bya ste /
T03D3805:123b-0: cung zhig bdag cag gis ni mi bden par @123b mthong nas spang byar bri bar bya'o //
T03D3805:123b-1: gzhan gyi don du ji ltar mthong ba nyid kyi
T03D3805:123b-2: don yang nas yang du mngon du byed pa ni
T03D3805:123b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgom pa'i lam mo
T03D3805:123b-4: zhas nye bar bstan pa ni go sla'o //
T03D3805:123b-5: 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i mdo sde yang /
T03D3805:123b-6: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:123b-7: kyis rab tu dga' bar nyan thos dang rang sangs
T03D3805:123b-8: rgyas kyi lam gyi mthong ba las shin tu 'das
T03D3805:123b-9: pas bsgom pa ni ma yin no zhes pa dang
T03D3805:123b-10: yang bshad de / sems bskyed pa lnga pa las
T03D3805:123b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo
T03D3805:123b-12: thams cad dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3805:123b-13: sa las shin tu 'das par gyur te /
T03D3805:123b-14: kun tu 'das par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3805:123b-15: skyon med par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T03D3805:123b-16: su nges par skye bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang
T03D3805:123b-17: / ring du song ba la ni byang chub sems
T03D3805:123b-18: dpa' rang gi yum gyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid
T03D3805:123b-19: chen po la gnas pa'i phyir nyan thos dang rang
T03D3805:123b-20: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba las shin tu 'da' bar
T03D3805:123b-22: de'i phyir na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams
T03D3805:123b-23: la chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i shes
T03D3805:123b-24: pa yang yod ces par shes par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:123b-25: de yod pa ma yin na phyi rol pa bzhin
T03D3805:123b-26: du khams gsum pa'i mngon du rgyu ba dang bag
T03D3805:123b-27: la nyal 'di rnams spong bar mi 'gyur te /
T03D3805:123b-28: gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs pas phyin ci log pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:123b-29: chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid med par yongs
T03D3805:123b-30: su shes par yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos la bdag
T03D3805:123b-31: med bsgom pa ni med la khams gsum pa'i nyon
T03D3805:123b-32: mongs pa mngon du rgyu spong ba'i thabs tsam yod
T03D3805:123b-33: pa nyid dang / gang zag gi bdag med pa
T03D3805:123b-34: ma lus par bsgom pa la de rnams kyi shes
T03D3805:123b-35: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:123b-36: rnam par gzhag go zhes pa ni slob dpon zla
T03D3805:123b-37: ba'i grags pa la sogs pa rnams kyis bzhed pa
T03D3805:123b-38: gang zag la bdag med pa'i shes pa nyid ni
T03D3805:123b-39: yod pa la chos la bdag med pa'i shes pa
T03D3805:123b-40: ni med de skad cig mas bdag med par shes
T03D3805:123b-41: pas kyang ni khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa spong
T03D3805:123b-42: bar 'gyur zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:123b-43: de ltar 'di dang yang 'di dang// yang 'di yin te rnam gsum po //
T03D3805:124a-0: 'dir ni gnas skabs gsum po dag / rdzogs par yongs @124a * //
T03D3805:124a-3: 'dir mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum nya bar bsdus ba'i
T03D3805:124a-4: phyir gsungs pa ni yang zhes pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:124a-5: ste / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:124a-6: zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:124a-7: ste / dang / lam shes pa dang /
T03D3805:124a-8: thams cad shes pa nyid la /
T03D3805:124a-9: de ltar zhes pa ni sngon du mdor bstan pa'i sems bskyed pa zhes pa la sogs pas so //
T03D3805:124a-10: 'di dang zhes pa ni gong gi de'i rgyas par bshad pas te /
T03D3805:124a-13: le'u phyed dang gnyis pa dag gis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T03D3805:124a-14: chos gang la yang med ces pa ni de'i sems kyi sbyor bas so //
T03D3805:124a-15: 'jug par byed pa ni dmigs pa la nye bar gzhag par byed pas so //
T03D3805:124a-16: nges par 'jug par byed pa ni de'i de nyid la bzhag pas zhi gnas rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:124a-17: yang dag par ston par byed pa ni mngon sum du byed pas so //
T03D3805:124a-18: nges par ston par byed pa ni yon tan khyad par rnams so //
T03D3805:124a-19: yongs su thob par byed pa ni 'bras bur gyur pa'i chos kyis 'phen par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:124a-20: nges par 'thob par byed pa ni de nyid mthar phyin pa'i tshul can no //
T03D3805:124a-21: med ces pa ni thams cad du de thams cad
T03D3805:124a-22: gang du chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pas
T03D3805:124a-23: so // 'dir bstan pa thos nas lha rnams kyis ji ltar byas pa de gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:124a-24: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:124a-25: skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i dga' ba skyes nas ku cho dang ga zha dag byed de /
T03D3805:124a-26: nyid kyis 'thor zhing gtor nas bstod pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:124a-27: 'di chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ma yin zhes
T03D3805:124a-28: pa ni gnyi ga dag mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:124a-29: // gang la yang zhes pa ni chos kyi 'khor
T03D3805:124a-30: las gzhan du yang mi chags shing ma chags pas
T03D3805:124a-31: dmigs pa dang bral ba'i phyir la /
T03D3805:124a-32: gang dmigs par 'gyur ba ni gang du mngon par byang chub par mi 'gyur ba zhig na /
T03D3805:124a-33: gang zhig ma smos pa de yod pa ma yin
T03D3805:124a-34: pas gang la yang dag par bstan par 'gyur ba'i
T03D3805:124a-35: rnam par byang ba can gyi chos cung zhig yod
T03D3805:124a-37: mngon par ma grub pa ni ma skyes pas so //
T03D3805:124a-38: chos ni kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi la /
T03D3805:124a-39: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams
T03D3805:124b-0: ni rnam @124b par byang ba rnams su brjod do
T03D3805:124b-1: // bstan pa zhes pa ni don dam par bstan pas so //
T03D3805:124b-2: sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa med pa ni gang
T03D3805:124b-3: zag med pas zhes pa la dgongs pas so zhes
T03D3805:124b-4: pa ni thams cad shes pa nyid kyi skabs rdzogs
T03D3805:124b-6: / kun mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum gyi mtshan nyid bshad nas /
T03D3805:124b-7: sbyor ba brjod par bya ste /
T03D3805:124b-8: de ni rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:124b-9: de yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:124b-10: sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T03D3805:124b-11: can de / de'i mtha'i sems bskyed pa gnyis ni
T03D3805:124b-12: srid pa dang zhi ba mnyam zhing ro gcig pa'i
T03D3805:124b-13: zhing dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid can
T03D3805:124b-14: ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi slob pa'i 'bras
T03D3805:124b-15: can de / bu ste / de ltar yang 'phags pa rnam par grol sdes /
T03D3805:124b-16: srid dang zhi pa mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3805:124b-18: 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa
T03D3805:124b-19: nyid du rtogs pa na bden pa mi slob par
T03D3805:124b-20: 'gyur zhes pa dang mdo sde dgongs pa nges par
T03D3805:124b-21: 'grel par yang nyon mongs pa dang /
T03D3805:124b-22: shes bya'i sgrib pa phra ba spangs pas shes bya
T03D3805:124b-23: thams cad la thogs pa dang chags pa med par
T03D3805:124b-24: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pas bsdus
T03D3805:124b-25: pa ni sa bcu gcig pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar
T03D3805:124b-27: seng ge bzang po'i khyad par gyi lam la rnam
T03D3805:124b-28: pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa rnam par
T03D3805:124b-29: gzhag pa ni mi 'thad pa nyid do //
T03D3805:124b-30: de ltar 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes mtshan
T03D3805:124b-31: med par rab tu sbyin la sogs pa'i tshig le'ur
T03D3805:124b-32: byas pa'i 'grel par sems bskyed pa dang po nas
T03D3805:124b-33: bzung ste / thabs la mkhas pa dang ma bral
T03D3805:124b-34: bar sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing mtshan mar ni
T03D3805:124b-35: mi byed do zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:124b-36: bcom ldan 'das ma bris shing gzhan yang rang nyid
T03D3805:124b-37: kyis dad pa la sogs pa'i thar pa'i cha dang
T03D3805:124b-38: mthun la 'jug gi / dad pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:124b-39: dbang por brjod par bya ba ni med do /
T03D3805:124b-40: dbang po'i don med pa'i phyir zhes gsungs pas ni
T03D3805:124b-41: drod la sogs pa dbang po 'di rnams nyid 'byung
T03D3805:124b-42: bar 'gyur zhes pa la dgongs pa'i phyir te khyad
T03D3805:124b-43: par gyi lam la dbang po 'di rnams med pa
T03D3805:124b-44: nyid na chos kyi sku'i dbang po yang med par
T03D3805:125a-0: snga ma'i bye brag rtogs nas 'dir phyi ma la rjes su 'jug @125a * //
T03D3805:125a-2: de'i yang thos pa dang bsam pa'i rang bzhin thams
T03D3805:125a-3: cad kyang dang po'i nyid du shes par bya ste
T03D3805:125a-4: / bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro zhes bshad la /
T03D3805:125a-5: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags bshad pa yang sdug bsngal
T03D3805:125a-6: la rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i skad cig ma
T03D3805:125a-7: rjes su shes pa dang 'brel bas nyan thos la
T03D3805:125a-8: sogs pa'i sar ltung bar srid bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:125a-9: de ni khams gsum pa'i gnyen po 'byin pa po'i phyir ro zhes gsungs la /
T03D3805:125a-10: 'di yang ltung ba 'di rtogs pa ni ji ltar
T03D3805:125a-11: khyad par gyi lam la gnas pa'i mtshan ma med
T03D3805:125a-12: pa lhun gyis grub pa la gnas pa nas gzhan
T03D3805:125a-14: gang zhig byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'og ma la
T03D3805:125a-15: gnas pa de'i yang dag par kun 'byung la rjes
T03D3805:125a-16: su shes pa la tshad med pa rnams dgos te
T03D3805:125a-17: de la las gzhan du na dgu pa la 'gog
T03D3805:125a-19: gang yang slob dpon dpa' bos kyang ring du song
T03D3805:125a-20: ba la yid kyis yongs su log pa kun tu
T03D3805:125a-22: sa mi g-yo ba la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar dgongs zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:125a-23: bstan par 'phags pa rnam par grol ba'i sdes bshad do //
T03D3805:125a-24: de ltar yang dag pa'i rtogs pa'i gnas skabs su
T03D3805:125a-25: mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i phyir snying rje chen
T03D3805:125a-27: de la 'gog pa dang yongs su ldog pa dang /
T03D3805:125a-28: yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ltung ba ni
T03D3805:125a-29: dus de srid du sems can gyi don mi 'byung
T03D3805:125a-30: ba nyid de / de ltar yang sa bcu par
T03D3805:125a-31: de nyid kyis 'dir mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur
T03D3805:125a-32: ba nyid de / ba ni / sems can thams
T03D3805:125a-33: cad kyi don rgyun chad par 'gyur ba'o zhes gsungs
T03D3805:125a-34: ba nyid de / ba ni / so // gang
T03D3805:125a-35: du bsgom pa'i lam rab kyi bye brag gis sa
T03D3805:125a-36: bcu pa can gyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi tha ma
T03D3805:125a-37: 'chad par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa zhes pa'i khyad
T03D3805:125a-38: par gyi lam dus rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs
T03D3805:125a-39: par rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:125a-40: de ni sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis la rnam par gnas pa yin zhes bya ste /
T03D3805:125a-41: de'i mdor bstan pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:125a-42: rnam par sbyor ba bcas rnams dang //
T03D3805:125a-43: yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas //
T03D3805:125a-44: thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang //
T03D3805:125a-45: slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03D3805:125b-0: srid dang @125b zhi ba mnyam nyid dang //
T03D3805:125b-1: zhi dag bla na med pa ni //
T03D3805:125b-2: rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa ste //
T03D3805:125b-3: 'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin //
T03D3805:125b-5: dngos po bcu gcig gis so //
T03D3805:125b-6: de la rnam pa'i bshad pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:125b-7: gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams //
T03D3805:125b-8: rnam pa zhes bya'i mtshan nyid de //
T03D3805:125b-9: kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir //
T03D3805:125b-10: de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod //
T03D3805:125b-12: gzhi la dmigs pa'i bden pa bzhi la sogs pa la /
T03D3805:125b-13: de'i shes pa de'i bye brag rnams te /
T03D3805:125b-14: gang gis de yongs su shes pa de rnams kyi
T03D3805:125b-15: rnam pa zhes pa ni mtshan nyid kyi ming la
T03D3805:125b-16: / de la thams cad shes pa'i rnam pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun te /
T03D3805:125b-18: med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste //
T03D3805:125b-19: mi g-yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar //
T03D3805:125b-20: bden pa so so la bzhi dang //
T03D3805:125b-21: lam la de ni bco lngar bshad //
T03D3805:125b-23: de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa la bzhi ste /
T03D3805:125b-24: med pa dang mnyam pa nyid dang dben pa nyid
T03D3805:125b-25: dang mi brdzi ba ni de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i
T03D3805:125b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa nyid do //
T03D3805:125b-27: nam mkha' ni med pa nyid la /
T03D3805:125b-28: nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs pa sogs pa yang med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:125b-29: chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid ni bde ba dang /
T03D3805:125b-30: sdug bsngal ba dag mnyam pa nyid de /
T03D3805:125b-31: gzhung kha cig tu ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid ces te /
T03D3805:125b-32: mi mnyam pa ni sdug bsngal la /
T03D3805:125b-33: de yis mnyam zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:125b-34: shin tu stong pa nyid ni gang zag dang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid do //
T03D3805:125b-35: gnod pa po sdug bsngal gyis gnod par bya ba'i phyir na brjod pa ni bdag la /
T03D3805:125b-36: brdzi ba med pa ni bdag med pa ste /
T03D3805:125b-37: de'i rnam pa'i phyir ni mi brdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid de /
T03D3805:125b-38: chos rnams thams cad la gnod bya dang gnod byed
T03D3805:125b-39: mi dmigs pa nyid kyis dmigs su med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:125b-40: ro // kun 'byung ba'i la bzhi ste /
T03D3805:125b-41: de ltar yang gnas ni rgyu ste /
T03D3805:125b-42: tha mal pa'i phung po rnams so //
T03D3805:125b-43: ngo bo nyid ni bdag nyid kyi dngos po ste /
T03D3805:125b-45: brjod pa ngag gi las dang /
T03D3805:125b-46: ming ni yid kyis te las dang nyon mongs pa
T03D3805:125b-47: la 'di rnams med pas go rims bzhin du gnas
T03D3805:125b-48: med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-3: de'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-4: ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po la
T03D3805:126a-5: phung po la ni lus te gzugs kyi phung po'o
T03D3805:126a-6: // de dag med pa ni ming med pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-8: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ni lus kyi las te /
T03D3805:126a-9: de med pa ni 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-10: brjod pa'i rgyu ni rnam par rtog pa la de med pa ni rtog pa med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:126a-11: 'gog pa'i gzhi ni de ltar yang 'dir 'gro bar 'gyur ba'am /
T03D3805:126a-14: skye ba rnams med pas go rims ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba ma mchis pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-18: de'i rnam pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-21: chos rnams thams cad la gzung du med pa nyid
T03D3805:126a-22: ni chos kyis chos la gzung du med de don
T03D3805:126a-23: dam par na med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126a-24: zad pa nyid kyis chos des de la sbyor ba
T03D3805:126a-25: med pas mi zad pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid
T03D3805:126a-26: do // mngon par 'grub pa ni skye ba ste /
T03D3805:126a-27: de la med pas mngon par ma grub pa nyid do //
T03D3805:126a-28: lam la bco lnga ni byed pa po med pa dang shes pa po dang /
T03D3805:126a-29: mthong ba po med pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-37: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-38: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
T03D3805:126a-42: g-yo ba med pa rnams te /
T03D3805:126a-43: byed pa po med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir na de'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-44: lam ni byed pa po med pa ste /
T03D3805:126a-45: de nas byed pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-46: lam la shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa ste /
T03D3805:126a-47: des na shes pa po dang /
T03D3805:126a-48: mthong ba po dmigs su med pa'o //
T03D3805:126a-49: lam la kun tu 'pho ba med de des na
T03D3805:126a-50: 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag tu mi sbyor
T03D3805:126a-52: lam la dul ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:126a-53: des na dus gsum sgyu ma'i rang bzhin pas dul ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126a-54: rmi lam la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir rmi lam la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:126a-56: gdul bya lta ba po la 'dod pa'i don ston pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-0: yod @126b pa ma yin pa'i sgra la sgrar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-1: lam ni mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang mnyam pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-2: gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-4: de ni chu'i phung po bzhin du med bzhin 'jig rten khams su snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-6: rang gi rang bzhin gyis mi snang ba'i phyir de ma skyes par shes pa nyid ces pa'o //
T03D3805:126b-7: gang du lnga po 'di rnams kyis kyang lam ma skyes pa gsal bar byed pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-8: lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-9: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T03D3805:126b-10: lam ni rnam par byang ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-11: des na sems can nyon mongs pa ci mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-12: lam ni nye bar gos pa med pas nam mkha'
T03D3805:126b-13: bzhin du nye bar gos pa med pa'i chos kyi
T03D3805:126b-14: dbyings te / des na mthong ba med pa'i sbyor bas mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-15: lam ni spros pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-16: spros pa'i gnyen po yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T03D3805:126b-17: / lam ni rlom pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-18: rlom pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-19: lam ni mi g-yo ba ste /
T03D3805:126b-20: chos dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rtag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-21: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs nyid kyis thams cad shes pa'i rnam pa ni nyan thos rnams kyi ste /
T03D3805:126b-22: zag pa med pa nyid la /
T03D3805:126b-23: lam shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi ni zag pa dang bcas pa ste /
T03D3805:126b-24: nyon mongs pa shin tu ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:126b-25: rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen
T03D3805:126b-26: pa'i rnam pa ni zag pa med pa nyid do
T03D3805:126b-27: // mdzod du ni dri ma med par bcu drug
T03D3805:126b-28: las gzhan pa'i rnam pa zhes pa ni nyon mongs
T03D3805:126b-29: pa'i sgrib pa tsam gyi gnyen po nyid pas na
T03D3805:126b-31: lam shes pa'i rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug ni gong du bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:126b-32: rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang //
T03D3805:126b-33: 'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin //
T03D3805:126b-34: de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni ;
T03D3805:126b-35: / lnga dang bcu drug ces gsungs so //
T03D3805:126b-37: lam dag ni sngon du bshad pa ni rgyu yin pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:126b-38: sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa dag ni 'bras bu'o //
T03D3805:126b-39: de la kun 'byung ba'i brgyad de /
T03D3805:127a-0: kun nas ldang ba med pa dang zhi ba dang @127a * //
T03D3805:127a-4: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-5: sems can med par brjod de /
T03D3805:127a-6: sngon du bshad pa'i phung po lnga po rnams ni kun 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:127a-7: 'dir chags par byed pas 'dod chags te /
T03D3805:127a-8: chos rnams thams cad la ngo bo nyid du sgro btags pa la /
T03D3805:127a-9: 'dir 'dod chags de dang bral zhes pas 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T03D3805:127a-10: kun 'byung ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi phyin ci
T03D3805:127a-11: log gi sgro btags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong
T03D3805:127a-12: pa nyid do // kun nas ldang ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ste /
T03D3805:127a-14: de la 'di med pa ni kun nas ldang ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:127a-15: kun 'byung ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi rnam par
T03D3805:127a-16: rtog pa med pa nyid pas 'dzin pa med pa'i
T03D3805:127a-17: phyir ro // zhi ba ni kun 'byung ba'i chos
T03D3805:127a-18: rnams thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang chos kyi khyad
T03D3805:127a-19: par rnams don dam par nye bar dmigs pa med
T03D3805:127a-20: pa nyid la de'i phyir na 'dod chags med pa'i
T03D3805:127a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-22: zhe sdang med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-23: gti mug med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3805:127a-24: skyon med pa zhes pa ni 'dir yon tan gsum gyi phyir te /
T03D3805:127a-25: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug zad pa'o //
T03D3805:127a-26: nyon mongs pa thams cad med pas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:127a-27: kun 'byung bar yongs su btags pa med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-28: 'dzin pa med pas sems can nyid du nyon mongs
T03D3805:127a-29: par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal de la med pas sems
T03D3805:127a-31: kun 'byung ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid la chos dang gang zag gis stong pa nyid do //
T03D3805:127a-32: lam gyi bdun ni tshad med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-33: mtha' gnyis rjes su rig pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-34: kun tu tha dad med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-35: gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-36: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-39: lam ni tshad med pa dang /
T03D3805:127a-40: chos rnams thams cad kyi kun nas ldang ba ni kun rdzob tu skye ba la /
T03D3805:127a-41: kun nas ldang ba med pa ni don dam par skye ba med pas nye bar bzung ba'o //
T03D3805:127a-42: lam ni mtha' gnyis rjes su rig pa ste /
T03D3805:127a-43: mngon par zhen pa med pa nyid du dngos po
T03D3805:127a-44: dang dngos po med pa gnyis rjes su rig pa
T03D3805:127a-45: med pas so // lam ni kun nas tha dad pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-0: tha dad pa @127b nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:127b-1: lam ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-2: des theg pa dman pa la mi dga' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:127b-3: lam ni rnam par rtog pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-4: rnam par rtog pa rnams rjes su mi dmigs pas so //
T03D3805:127b-5: lam ni gzhal du med pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-6: gzhal du med pa'i chos nyid la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:127b-7: lam ni chags pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-8: chos rnams thams cad la chags pa med pa nyid pas dmigs pa med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:127b-15: zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal ba ste /
T03D3805:127b-16: de la mi rtag pa ni rtag par 'gyur ba med pa nyid ces pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-17: chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa dang ma skyes pa nyid do //
T03D3805:127b-18: sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ste /
T03D3805:127b-19: rang gi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir sdug bsngal stong pa dang /
T03D3805:127b-20: sdug bsngal bdag med pa ste /
T03D3805:127b-21: 'dus byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi skye ba dang rga
T03D3805:127b-22: ba dang mi rtag pa gsum de la med pas
T03D3805:127b-23: sdug bsngal mtshan nyid med pa'o //
T03D3805:127b-25: de ltar yang 'gog pa ni stong pa nyid kho
T03D3805:127b-26: na rnam par dag pa nyid la stong pa nyid
T03D3805:127b-28: dbye ba po rnams dmigs su med pas de'i phyir
T03D3805:127b-29: na nam mkha' bzhin du 'gog pa ni mtha' med

T03D3805:127b-32: rims bzhin du de'i stong pa nyid bcu drug 'dir
T03D3805:127b-33: ro // gcig pa nyid de 'dir gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:127b-34: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:127b-35: phyin pa'o zhes pa nas ji srid du dngos po
T03D3805:127b-36: med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
T03D3805:127b-38: 'dir dngos po dang dngos po med pa rang gi
T03D3805:127b-39: dngos po dang gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid
T03D3805:127b-40: ni ji ltar rigs pa bcu drug gi nang du
T03D3805:127b-41: bsdu ba'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa rnams ni brgya rtsa bcu ste /
T03D3805:127b-43: dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung ste //
T03D3805:127b-44: tha ma sangs rgyas nyid rnam par //
T03D3805:127b-45: slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T03D3805:127b-46: sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin du //
T03D3805:127b-47: sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi //
T03D3805:128a-3: de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:128a-4: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:128a-5: byang chub kyi phyogs rnams kyi re re zhing dmigs
T03D3805:128a-6: pas med pa de'i rnam pa'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:128a-7: pa ste / lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i
T03D3805:128a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa nas ji srid du yang
T03D3805:128a-9: dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:128a-11: nyan thos kyi lam la brten pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sum cu rtsa bdun no //
T03D3805:128a-12: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po rnams dang /
T03D3805:128a-13: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
T03D3805:128a-14: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang /
T03D3805:128a-15: bden pa bzhi dang sbyin pa la sogs pa bcu
T03D3805:128a-16: rnams mi dmigs pa la re re zhing pha rol
T03D3805:128a-18: 'di'i stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:128a-19: zhes pa nas ji srid du 'di ni ye shes
T03D3805:128a-20: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa'i bar ni
T03D3805:128a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i lam la brten pa'i sum cu
T03D3805:128a-22: rtsa bzhi'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:128a-23: kyi rnam pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin zhes
T03D3805:128a-25: 'dir gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs
T03D3805:128a-26: la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa

T03D3805:128a-28: stobs kyi bar ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:128a-29: pa'o // brdzi ba med pa nyid ni stobs kyi don to //
T03D3805:128a-30: mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzhi ste /
T03D3805:128a-31: mngon par byang chub pa dang /
T03D3805:128a-33: bar chad kyi chos dang nges par 'byung ba can
T03D3805:128a-34: gyi chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu
T03D3805:128a-36: de bzhin du zhum pa med pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i don to //
T03D3805:128a-37: chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig dang spobs pa
T03D3805:128a-38: ni so so yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol
T03D3805:128a-39: tu phyin pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:128a-40: thams cad du chos dang don dang nges pa'i tshig
T03D3805:128a-41: dang spobs pa rnams mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen pa
T03D3805:128a-42: la / de ni chags pa dang thogs pa las
T03D3805:128a-43: 'das pa nyid de de ni so so yang dag
T03D3805:128a-45: de la gsung rab yang lag bcu gnyis ni chos dang /
T03D3805:128a-46: de'i brjod par bya ba'i don no //
T03D3805:128a-47: chos kyi ming gi tshogs pa la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:128a-48: kyi nges pa'i tshig dang 'gro ba drug gi skad
T03D3805:128a-50: de rnams so sor rig pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:128b-0: chos la sogs pa rnams @128b gzhan la ston pa'i
T03D3805:128b-1: phyir chos la sogs pa so so yang dag par
T03D3805:128b-2: mngon sum du 'gyur ba ni spobs pa de nyid
T03D3805:128b-3: so so yang dag par rig pa'o //
T03D3805:128b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos de thams cad la ma 'dres par spyod ces pas ma 'dres pa ste /
T03D3805:128b-5: gzhan rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:128b-6: de'i rnam pa ni bco brgyad yin pa'i phyir de'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3805:128b-10: dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba de'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni gsum mo //
T03D3805:128b-11: sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang /
T03D3805:128b-13: ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' ba ste /
T03D3805:128b-14: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa gsum mo //
T03D3805:128b-20: rnam par grol ba rnams yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' ba ste /
T03D3805:128b-21: de'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni drug go //
T03D3805:128b-22: lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thams cad kyi
T03D3805:128b-23: sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes
T03D3805:128b-24: su 'brang ba ste de'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:128b-25: ni gsum mo // dus gsum pa thams cad du
T03D3805:128b-26: ma chags shing ma thogs pa'i ye shes 'jug ste
T03D3805:128b-27: ni gsum mo // / de'i pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:128b-28: pa gsum mo zhes pa ni ma 'dres pa bco
T03D3805:128b-29: brgyad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T03D3805:128b-30: 'dra ba dang bsam pa dang gzhal ba la des sbyor ba dang /
T03D3805:128b-32: de las yang dag par 'das shing shin tu 'das pa ni ma 'dres pa'i don to //
T03D3805:128b-33: chos kyi ji lta ba bzhin de nyid du gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T03D3805:128b-34: de'i de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid
T03D3805:128b-35: la de'i rnam pa yin pa'i phyir de'i pha rol
T03D3805:128b-36: tu phyin pa'o // sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i chos
T03D3805:128b-37: rnams thams cad kyi de rnams kyi bden pa nyid
T03D3805:128b-38: tu phyin pa'o // la / rang gi sems kyi
T03D3805:128b-39: bdag nyid kyis sgom par byed cing gnas par byed
T03D3805:128b-40: pa'i chos thams cad ni rang 'byung ba la de'i
T03D3805:128b-41: rnam pa'i phyir ni de'i pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:128b-42: las byung bas 'di'i khongs su sdud pa'i don tam
T03D3805:128b-43: tu phyin pa'o // la / / rang gi 'dod
T03D3805:128b-44: pas 'dir 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa ni rang 'byung
T03D3805:128b-45: tu phyin pa'o // la / / ba'o // de'i
T03D3805:128b-46: phyir na yum chen mo las chos thams cad la
T03D3805:128b-47: dbang sgyur ba nyid nas nye bar bzung ste zhes
T03D3805:128b-48: gsungs pa de'i 'dir ni rgyur gsungs te /
T03D3805:128b-49: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med pa nyid la
T03D3805:128b-50: zhes pa ni chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:129a-1: de'i phyir na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dbang sgyur ba'o zhes pa la dgongs pa ste /
T03D3805:129a-2: chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pa
T03D3805:129a-3: ni gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i phyir chos
T03D3805:129a-4: thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'o //
T03D3805:129a-5: rang 'byung ba'i rnam pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:129a-6: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sangs rgyas kyi zhes pa ni don gcig go //
T03D3805:129a-7: 'dir sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa tha ma ni
T03D3805:129a-8: yum chen mo la 'dir ni rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:129a-11: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:129a-12: chos rnams thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang rnam
T03D3805:129a-13: pa thams cad dang de rnams kyi ye shes de'i
T03D3805:129a-14: ngo bo nyid kyis mkhyen pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam
T03D3805:129a-15: tshol bar byed ces pa'i 'bras bu'i gnas skabs la
T03D3805:129a-16: brten nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:129a-17: rnam pa ni sum cu rtsa dgu ste /
T03D3805:129a-18: med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ba'i rnam pa ni brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum mo //
T03D3805:129a-19: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa sgro
T03D3805:129a-20: btags pa ma lus par log pa'i byang chub kyi
T03D3805:129a-21: sems bskyed pa nyid kyi ngo bo la gdul bya'i
T03D3805:129a-22: bsam pa'i khyad par gyi ngor de dang de'i ldog
T03D3805:129a-23: pa'i dbye bas tha dad pa bzhin du rnam par
T03D3805:129a-24: gzhag pa ste / de ltar na shes rab kyi
T03D3805:129a-25: pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems bskyed pa nyi
T03D3805:129a-26: shu rtsa gnyis la ji ltar rigs pa'i rnam pa
T03D3805:129a-27: rnams dang 'dres pa rnams la 'di ni ji ltar
T03D3805:129a-28: gzhag pa ste / rigs pa ste / sbyor ba'i
T03D3805:129a-29: gzugs la sogs pa zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs
T03D3805:129a-30: su bcad pa bzhis bshad pa ni /
T03D3805:129a-31: rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa'i skabs
T03D3805:129a-32: la gang du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi skabs
T03D3805:129a-33: su ni gzugs la sogs pa zhes pa nas kyi
T03D3805:129a-34: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang gsum gyis sbyor bas
T03D3805:129a-35: gsungs pa ste / de ni ldog pa'i sgo nas bstan pa ni /
T03D3805:129a-36: nyan thos rnams kyi la rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo
T03D3805:129a-37: nas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par
T03D3805:129a-38: bya ba'o // de la dang po'i sems bskyed pa gsum ni /
T03D3805:129a-39: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03D3805:129a-40: yang dag bgrod la mkhas pa ni //
T03D3805:129a-41: rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la //
T03D3805:129a-42: thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod //
T03D3805:129a-44: sems bskyed pa bzhi po ni drod la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:129b-0: @129b nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi
T03D3805:129b-1: la drod la sogs pa rnams la re re bzhin
T03D3805:129b-2: du chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i dbye bas
T03D3805:129b-4: dmigs pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa tshigs su
T03D3805:129b-5: bcad pa bdun gyis bstan pa'i rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:129b-6: mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs so //
T03D3805:129b-7: de ltar tha dad ma byas pa nyid kyi dmigs
T03D3805:129b-8: pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa zhes pa ni
T03D3805:129b-9: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis bzhi pa bshad pa
T03D3805:129b-10: nyid ni de ltar rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs
T03D3805:129b-11: par rtogs pa'i skabs la ldog pa'i sgo nas ni
T03D3805:129b-13: gzugs sogs phung po zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs
T03D3805:129b-14: su bcad pa gsum gyis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3805:129b-15: yang ste / tshig le'ur byas pa dag gis ni
T03D3805:129b-16: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i drod la
T03D3805:129b-17: sogs pa rnam pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can gsungs pa
T03D3805:129b-18: yang ste / la / rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo
T03D3805:129b-19: nas ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam shes
T03D3805:129b-20: yang ste / la / pa'i skabs la'o // sems
T03D3805:129b-21: bskyed pa lnga po ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rab
T03D3805:129b-22: tu dga' ba'i sa zhes pa ni mdor bstan la
T03D3805:129b-23: yang ste / la / pa'i skabs la'o // /
T03D3805:129b-24: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skabs dang
T03D3805:129b-25: lam shes pa'i skabs kyi bzod pa zhes pa la
T03D3805:129b-26: sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa drug gis ni rgyas
T03D3805:129b-27: yang ste / la / pa'i skabs la'o // /
T03D3805:129b-28: par bshad pa'o // nyan thos rnams dang rang sangs
T03D3805:129b-29: rgyas rnams kyi mthong ba'i lam gyis mdor bstan pa'i
T03D3805:129b-30: rgyas par bshad pa ni lam shes pa'i skabs kyi
T03D3805:129b-31: chos shes pa la sogs pa tshig le'ur byas pa
T03D3805:129b-32: yang ste / la / pa'i skabs la'o // /
T03D3805:129b-33: par bshad pa'o // lnga ste / thams cad shes
T03D3805:129b-35: de ltar 'di nyid kyi don gyi rnam par gzhag
T03D3805:129b-36: pa ni legs par bzhag pas gzhan du ma yin
T03D3805:129b-37: no // kun mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum gyi rnam pa 'di rnams kyis /
T03D3805:129b-38: bcom ldan 'das ma de stod par byed pa'i le'u ni bstod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o /
T03D3805:129b-40: // / rnam pa rnams kyi sbyor ba brjod par bya ste /
T03D3805:129b-41: de la bcom ldan 'das ma ni thos par yang
T03D3805:129b-42: rnyed par dka' na ji ltar na sbyor ba gsungs
T03D3805:129b-43: zhes pa bstan pa bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:129b-44: sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen bkur bya //
T03D3805:129b-45: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun //
T03D3805:129b-46: dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon bcas pa //
T03D3805:129b-47: 'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no //
T03D3805:129b-48: sangs rgyas brten dang kun drin dang //
T03D3805:129b-49: sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pas //
T03D3805:130a-2: / snod du dam pa rnams bzhed do //
T03D3805:130a-4: sngon du sangs rgyas rnams la sman la sogs pa rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa'i bsod nams dang /
T03D3805:130a-5: de rnams la yang gnas dang skyed mos tshal dang
T03D3805:130a-6: mal stan dang ston mo la sogs pa rnams kyis
T03D3805:130a-7: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas tshul khrims dang
T03D3805:130a-8: thos pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis
T03D3805:130a-9: gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das mnyan pa de ni ma
T03D3805:130a-10: tshang ba med pa'i bsnyen bkur la /
T03D3805:130a-11: gang gis ji srid du 'dzin pa dang /
T03D3805:130a-12: de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa de ni de ltar yang sangs rgyas la sogs par yang rigs pas /
T03D3805:130a-14: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pas te /
T03D3805:130a-15: de bzhin nyid du slob pa ni zhi gnas kyis la /
T03D3805:130a-16: sgrub pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
T03D3805:130a-17: rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dag gis so //
T03D3805:130a-18: dad pa med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:130a-19: de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i phyir phyin ci ma
T03D3805:130a-20: log pa'o zhes yang dag par yid ches pa ni
T03D3805:130a-21: dad pa'o // gzung bar 'dod pa ni bzod pa spong bar mi 'dod pa'i ni 'dod pa'o //
T03D3805:130a-22: don dang gzhung dgal nyan par 'dod pa ni 'dun pa la brtson 'grus ni spro ba'o //
T03D3805:130a-23: dge ba la bar du gcod par byed pa'i chags pa dang /
T03D3805:130a-26: le lo rnams kyi gnyen por ni bag yod pa
T03D3805:130a-27: la mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa las thob
T03D3805:130a-28: pa'i tshig rnams kyis nges pa nyid kyi dngos po
T03D3805:130a-29: la de nyid 'di las gzhan du min zhes pa
T03D3805:130a-30: rtogs par byed pa ni mos pa ste /
T03D3805:130a-31: gang gis mi 'phrogs pa nyid la kun tu gnas pa ni sbyin pa'i las la gtso bo ste /
T03D3805:130a-32: phas kyi rgol ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:130a-33: yongs su ma dris pa ni the tshom gyi gnas la'o //
T03D3805:130a-34: chung ngu ba ni byas pa ste /
T03D3805:130a-35: gang gis dri ba yang de bzhin no //
T03D3805:130a-36: 'di zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:130a-37: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:130a-38: pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dag phan
T03D3805:130a-39: tshun gyi rgyu nyid du nges par bskyed pas 'di
T03D3805:130a-40: rnams la phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i don to zhes pa
T03D3805:130a-41: ni sbyor ba po rnyed par dka' ba nyid do
T03D3805:130a-42: // de nas zhes pa la sogs pas ni sbyor ba'i go skabs te /
T03D3805:130a-43: de yang bsdus na ni byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa nyid la rgyas pa ni bstan bcos su /
T03D3805:130b-0: gzugs @130b la sogs pa mi gnas phyir //
T03D3805:130b-1: de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir //
T03D3805:130b-2: de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir //
T03D3805:130b-3: de rnams gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir //
T03D3805:130b-4: de dag tshad ni med phyir dang //
T03D3805:130b-5: tshegs chen yun rings rtogs kyi phyir //
T03D3805:130b-6: lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang //
T03D3805:130b-7: nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang //
T03D3805:130b-8: byang chub nye dang myur ba dang //
T03D3805:130b-10: chos dang chos min sogs mi mthong //
T03D3805:130b-11: gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong //
T03D3805:130b-12: gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang //
T03D3805:130b-13: de yi ngo bo rnam mi rtog /'bras bu rin chen sbyin pa byed //
T03D3805:130b-14: de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas //
T03D3805:130b-16: sbyor ba dang bcas pa rnam par bshad pa rnams
T03D3805:130b-17: kyi rang bzhin las sbyor ba'i phyir na tshad med
T03D3805:130b-18: pa'i bar gyi de rnams la sbyor ba dgag pa'o
T03D3805:130b-19: zhes rjes su 'brang bar byas la /
T03D3805:130b-20: de rnams zab pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:130b-21: gting dpogs par dka' ba'i phyir dang //
T03D3805:130b-22: tshad med pa'i phyir ni de rnams la sbyor ba bkag pa'o //
T03D3805:130b-23: de'i sbyor ba gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:130b-24: koo shi ka 'dir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-25: spyod pa ni yid la byed pas so //
T03D3805:130b-26: gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa'i ni mdor bstan pa la /
T03D3805:130b-27: gzugs la sogs pa'i zhes mi gnas zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-28: mngon par zhen pa med ces pa'i don to //
T03D3805:130b-29: mi gnas zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:130b-30: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-31: mi sbyor ba ni ming dang mtshan ma dag gis
T03D3805:130b-32: yin la de ltar na mi gnas pa ni yang
T03D3805:130b-33: dag par mi shes pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-34: gnas pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:130b-35: zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa la sbyor ba
T03D3805:130b-37: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-38: zab ces pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid zab pa'i phyir zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-40: gting dpogs par dka' ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:130b-41: 'o na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:130b-42: nges par 'byed pa nus par 'dod pa ma yin
T03D3805:130b-43: nam zhe na gsungs pa ni gzung par dka' ba
T03D3805:130b-44: ste / nges par mtshan mar 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3805:130b-45: de las ni rnam par rtog pa la shes rab
T03D3805:130b-46: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rnam par
T03D3805:131a-1: dpogs par dka' ba'o zhes pa ni gting dpogs par dka' ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-2: gzugs la sogs pa la tshad med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni tshad med pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-3: gzugs zab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131a-4: mi gnas pa ni mngon par zhen pa la sbyor
T03D3805:131a-5: ba mi byed pa ni yang dag par mi shes
T03D3805:131a-6: pas so zhes pa ni zab pa nyid do //
T03D3805:131a-8: de bzhin du gting dpogs par dka' ba nyid ni sbyor ba med pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-9: de ltar tshad med pa ni sbyor ba med pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-10: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131a-12: 'dri ba la lan ni yum chen mor gsungs pa dran par byed do //
T03D3805:131a-13: de brjod pa ni de yang thos nas 'di la
T03D3805:131a-14: dad par mi byed cing so sor spong par byed
T03D3805:131a-15: pas des ngan 'gror yun ring du gnas nas tshegs
T03D3805:131a-16: chen po dang yun ring por mngon par byang chub
T03D3805:131a-17: par 'gyur zhes pa ni tshegs chen po yun rings
T03D3805:131a-18: kyis mngon par rtogs pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-19: de skad ces gsol zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131a-20: rgya chen pos lung bstan par 'gyur nas mngon par rtogs par 'gyur zhes pa'i bar du ste /
T03D3805:131a-21: gcig ma yin zhes pa ni gzhung nor pa can la /
T03D3805:131a-22: gcig ces pa ni ma nor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-23: brnyes par 'gyur ba ni thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-24: thugs byung bar byed par mi 'gyur ba ni brten
T03D3805:131a-25: par byed par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni lung bstan
T03D3805:131a-27: yun ring por theg pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131a-29: yang nas yang du ni dpe mang du'o //
T03D3805:131a-30: ming mthun pa ni kha phyir bltas pa'o //
T03D3805:131a-31: yongs su ldog pa ni rnam par ldog par 'gyur
T03D3805:131a-32: ba la rab tu thob pa la ldog pa med
T03D3805:131a-33: pa'i sbyor bas sbyor bar 'gyur zhing rnyog pa med
T03D3805:131a-34: pas rab tu rtsol bar 'gyur zhes pa ni phyir
T03D3805:131a-36: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa las /
T03D3805:131a-37: nyan pa la zhes pa'i bar ni nges par 'byung ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131a-38: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas mnyan pa zhes pa'i bar te /
T03D3805:131a-39: sdong po ni phung po la sdong po dang ri
T03D3805:131a-40: dgas kyi mtshan ma ni rtse mo la sogs pa'o
T03D3805:131a-41: // ji ltar yang na gal te yang zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:131a-42: mthar thug pa ni nges pa'o zhes pa ni bar chad med pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-0: @131b 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-1: rnying pa rnams lhags pa zhes pa ni mngon par byang chub pa las nye bar sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-2: 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-3: snyom par 'gyur ba ni ngal bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-5: smra ba nyid ni smra ba'am smra bar bya ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-7: grogs ni skyes bu dang lhan cig nyal ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-8: gang gi phyir sngon gyi zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-9: tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni
T03D3805:131b-10: 'dod chags kyi rgyu la brten pa ni kun rtog
T03D3805:131b-11: pas kun brtan pas de skyed pas so //
T03D3805:131b-12: nges par skyes pa ni 'dod chags skyes bas so //
T03D3805:131b-13: bsgoms pas ni kun tu sbyor bas so //
T03D3805:131b-14: mang du byas pa ni yang dang yang du de ltar byas pas so //
T03D3805:131b-15: dga' zhing ni rjes su yi rang ba ste zhes
T03D3805:131b-16: pa ni myur du mngon par byang chub pa'i sbyor
T03D3805:131b-17: ba'o // de skad ces gsol ba dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-18: gang du gzhan phan 'dogs par byed pa po med pa nyid de ni ngo mtshar ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-19: ci gal te zhes pa ni yang dag par bstan
T03D3805:131b-20: pa dang yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang
T03D3805:131b-21: yang dag par dga' bar byed pa dang /
T03D3805:131b-22: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa 'ba' zhig ma yin te /
T03D3805:131b-23: ji ltar zhe na legs par yongs su gzung ba
T03D3805:131b-24: ni rjes su gzung ba yang dag par khas len
T03D3805:131b-25: pa'o // legs par yongs su gtad pa ni byang
T03D3805:131b-26: chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par gtad nas
T03D3805:131b-27: thos pa la sbyor la yongs su gtad pa de
T03D3805:131b-28: la yang de rnams kyis bslab pa'i phyir sbyor ba
T03D3805:131b-29: zhes pa ni gzhan gyi don gyi sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-30: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:131b-31: ni 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa'i sbyor ba'o
T03D3805:131b-32: // chos ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T03D3805:131b-33: de ltar chos dang chos ma yin pa dang lung
T03D3805:131b-34: du ma bstan pa la sogs pa mi mthong ba'i
T03D3805:131b-35: // sbyor ba'o // rab 'byor gyis gsol ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-36: chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas mi mthong ba'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-37: de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:131b-38: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-39: rin po che'i phung po zhes pa ni 'bras bu
T03D3805:131b-40: rin po ches yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3805:131b-41: kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rnams kyi rgyu'i
T03D3805:131b-42: phyir ro zhes pa ni 'bras bu rin po che
T03D3805:131b-43: rab tu sbyin pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:131b-44: dag pa'i phung po zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-1: 'bras bu rnams ni nam mkha' bzhin du rnam par
T03D3805:132a-2: dag pa mthong bas so zhes pa ni dag pa'i
T03D3805:132a-3: sbyor ba'o // ngo mtshar to zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-4: yi ger bri ba ni bri bar nus pa'o //
T03D3805:132a-5: rab tu bsgrub par mi 'gyur ba ni /
T03D3805:132a-6: rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba la yi dam ma nyams pa ni dum bur ma gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:132a-7: mtshams las mi 'da' ba ni mtshams dang bcas pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:132a-8: yon tan ni sbyor ba'i bsngags pa rjod par byed pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-9: de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:132a-10: bdud kyi mthu bcom la sogs pa //
T03D3805:132a-11: yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi'o //
T03D3805:132a-12: zhes pa ste de la de nas yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-13: dgongs par 'gyur ba ni dran par 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:132a-14: yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ba ni rjes su mthun
T03D3805:132a-15: pas gnas pa la sogs pas zhes pa ni bdud
T03D3805:132a-16: kyi mthu rnam par bcom pa'i yon tan no //
T03D3805:132a-17: sh'a ri'i bu bar chad byed par mi nus zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-18: sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i yon tan no //
T03D3805:132a-19: de skad ces bka' stsal pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-20: mthu ni nus pa la byin gyi rlabs ni nus pa lhag par skyed ba'o //
T03D3805:132a-21: yongs su bzung ba ni khas blangs pa'o //
T03D3805:132a-22: mkhyen pa ni de la dgongs pa dang bcas pa'o //
T03D3805:132a-23: byin gyis rlob pa ni rang gis byas pa'o //
T03D3805:132a-24: gzigs pa ni sha'i mig gis so //
T03D3805:132a-25: rnam par gzigs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
T03D3805:132a-26: zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyis kun du gzigs pa'i
T03D3805:132a-27: yon tan no // byang chub sems dpa' gang de zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-28: de bzhin nyid ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3805:132a-29: chub kyi lam la zhes pa ni yang dag par
T03D3805:132a-30: rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye ba'i yon tan no
T03D3805:132a-31: // gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-32: don du gnyer ba chen po ni de nas brtsams nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:132a-33: phan yon chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i'o //
T03D3805:132a-34: 'bras bu chen po ni srid pa dga' bar spyod ces pa ste /
T03D3805:132a-35: rus dang rigs dang mtshan nyid la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:132a-36: rnam par smin pa che ba ni rjes la bla na med pa'i byang chub pa'o //
T03D3805:132a-38: yongs su dub pa ni bya bas so zhes pa
T03D3805:132a-39: ni don chen po nyid la sogs pa'i yon tan
T03D3805:132b-0: no // 'di dag @132b ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-1: mdo sde ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:132b-2: 'das nas zhes pa ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas so //
T03D3805:132b-3: bar ta ni shar phyogs kyi yul lo //
T03D3805:132b-4: mngon par gsar la gsar bas snying por byung bas snying po'o //
T03D3805:132b-5: de thob nas gdul bya rnams la 'di zhes pa ni de ltar ro //
T03D3805:132b-6: chos ni chos 'di bstan pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:132b-8: nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3805:132b-9: bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag lngar 'jig rten du gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-10: de nas nub pa'i tshe de'i dus dang nye ba
T03D3805:132b-11: na byang zhes pa ni cha gzhan rnam par gcad
T03D3805:132b-12: pa ste / bod kyi phyogs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:132b-13: bstan pa der rgyas pa nas rab tu 'jug par
T03D3805:132b-14: 'gyur zhes pa ni bstan pa rgyas pa'i yon tan
T03D3805:132b-15: no // yun ring po nas theg pa la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-16: dri bar byas pas na yongs su dris pa'o //
T03D3805:132b-17: yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes pa ni yongs su zhus pa'o //
T03D3805:132b-18: de'i phyir yongs su 'dri bar byas pas yongs su dris pa'o //
T03D3805:132b-19: tshul khrims ni tshul khrims la sogs pa zhes pa
T03D3805:132b-20: ni dkar po'i chos yongs su skyong ba'i yon tan
T03D3805:132b-21: no // de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-22: tshe rabs 'phos kyang zhes pa ni de'i byang gi
T03D3805:132b-23: tshe rabs de las 'das pa rnams las yang ngo
T03D3805:132b-24: // yang dag par spyod pa ni sbyor ba rnams so //
T03D3805:132b-25: mngon par dga' ba ni mngon par 'dod pa'o zhes pa ni skyes bu'i brjod pa'i yon tan no //
T03D3805:132b-26: de dag la zhen pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-27: 'dun pa'am sngags kyis zhes pa ni bsam pas sam
T03D3805:132b-28: brjod pas so zhes pa ni mi phyed pa nyid
T03D3805:132b-30: de dag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ni skye
T03D3805:132b-31: bo mang po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i yon
T03D3805:132b-32: tan no // de ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-33: gzhag par bya'o ni 'jug pa tsam gyis so //
T03D3805:132b-34: yang dag par bstan par bya ba ni bsgom pa rab kyi sa yang dag par bsgrub pas so //
T03D3805:132b-35: yang dag par dgod par bya ba ni brtan par
T03D3805:132b-36: byed par bya ba'o zhes pa ni dam bcas pa'i
T03D3805:132b-37: dngos po'i don bsgrubs pa'i yon tan no //
T03D3805:132b-38: de ltar yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:132b-39: de ltar ji skad du bshad pa'i gzhan gyi don sgrub par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:133a-1: pa rgya chen po can zhes te /
T03D3805:133a-2: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la sbyin pa rgya chen
T03D3805:133a-3: po sbyin pa nyid dang gzhan yang dge ba'i rtsa
T03D3805:133a-4: ba mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rnam par smin pa
T03D3805:133a-5: rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin cing sems can rnams
T03D3805:133a-6: kyi don du rgya chen po'i rnam par smin pa
T03D3805:133a-7: yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rgya
T03D3805:133a-8: chen po'i 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i yon tan
T03D3805:133a-9: no // gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133a-10: lhag par dmigs par bya ba dang yang dag par
T03D3805:133a-11: 'pho bar bya ba'o zhes pa ni gzhan gyi don
T03D3805:133a-12: gyi rgya chen po yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i yon
T03D3805:133a-13: tan no // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133a-14: chung ngu na zhes pa ni de rnams kyi yongs su dag pa'i don dang phan pa la'o //
T03D3805:133a-15: tshol bar 'gyur ba la kha cig dag gis rnyed par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:133a-16: btsal zhing ni 'di nas der song nas so //
T03D3805:133a-17: rjes su btsal ba ni 'dir thob par 'gyur zhes thos nas so //
T03D3805:133a-18: yongs su btsal ba ni yang dag par ro //
T03D3805:133a-19: nye bar 'ongs par 'gyur ba ni nye bar na'o //
T03D3805:133a-20: nye bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba ni 'bad par gyur pas rnyed pa'o //
T03D3805:133a-21: nye bar phyogs pa ni 'bad pa med pas thos
T03D3805:133a-22: zhes pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug nges
T03D3805:133a-23: par thob pa'i yon tan no //
T03D3805:133a-24: ji skad du bshad pa'i sbyor ba rnams sems la
T03D3805:133a-25: bzhag cing 'dzin pas de'i phan yon rnams kyi le'u
T03D3805:133a-28: // / sbyor ba la bar chad byed pa'i skyon gyi dbang du byas pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:133a-29: skyon ni bcu tshan bzhi bcas pa //
T03D3805:133a-30: drug tu nges par rtogs par bya //
T03D3805:133a-32: bzhi bcu rtsa drug po 'dir gsungs pa ni de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133a-33: yongs su brjod ces pa la sogs pa'i tshig gis
T03D3805:133a-34: ni sbyong pa rnam pa thams cad kyi nye bar
T03D3805:133a-35: mtshon pa'o // yun ring mo zhes pa ni yun
T03D3805:133a-36: ring pos pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rdzogs nas
T03D3805:133a-37: des yun ring mo nyid kyis byang chub par 'gyur
T03D3805:133a-38: zhes pa ni spobs pa yun ring mo'i skyon no
T03D3805:133a-39: mtshon pa'o // // de skyes na yang zhes te /
T03D3805:133a-40: rnam par g-yengs par 'gyur pa ni rgod par 'gyur ba ste /
T03D3805:133a-41: thabs la mi mkhas pas shin tu myur bar de
T03D3805:133a-42: las skyes pas nga rgyal skye la des byang chub
T03D3805:133a-43: sems dpa' gzhan la brnyas par byed nas nga rgyal
T03D3805:133b-0: gyis dman pa'i rigs su @133b skyes nas yun ring
T03D3805:133b-1: pos byang chub thob par 'gyur zhes pa ni spobs
T03D3805:133b-4: dregs pa dang bcas pas lus brkyang ba dang rgod pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-5: gad rgyangs byed pa dang bteg pa ste dregs pas
T03D3805:133b-6: ldang bar byed pa ste zhes pa ni lus kyi
T03D3805:133b-7: las kyi yon tan dang bral bas so //
T03D3805:133b-8: rnam par g-yengs pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-9: rnam par shes pa phan tshun dang ldan pas zhes pa ni gzhan rnams kyi dran par byas pa'o //
T03D3805:133b-10: rang gi ni dran pa mi 'thob ces pa ste
T03D3805:133b-11: spyod lam ji ltar bde bar gnas pas brjod pas
T03D3805:133b-12: so zhes pa ni sems kyi yon tan dang bral
T03D3805:133b-13: ba'i skyon no // phan tshun zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-14: bzhad gad byed pa ni phan tshun lta bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:133b-15: tshogs pa dang mi ldan zhes pa ni ji srid
T03D3805:133b-16: du tshogs pa nyid la glegs bam kun 'phrog par
T03D3805:133b-17: 'gyur te / de srid du tshogs pa min zhes
T03D3805:133b-18: pa ni rnal 'byor la mi phan pa'i kha ton
T03D3805:133b-20: bdag gis zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-21: de lta de ltar zhes pa ni sngon du bshad pa rnams kyis so //
T03D3805:133b-22: nges par 'gyur bar mi 'gyur ba ni gnas par
T03D3805:133b-23: mi 'gyur ba'o zhes pa kha phyir phyogs pa'i mtshan
T03D3805:133b-25: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-26: spangs pa ni sems kyis so //
T03D3805:133b-27: bor ba ni lus dang ngag gis so //
T03D3805:133b-28: nges par 'byung ba ni bslab pa mthar thug par
T03D3805:133b-29: 'gro ba'o zhes pa ni rgyu las nyams pa'i skyon
T03D3805:133b-30: no // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-34: kun chub par byed pa ni mngon par sbyor bar ro //
T03D3805:133b-35: yal ga dang lo ma ni mdo sde rnams la'o //
T03D3805:133b-36: dul ba ni dbang po rnams so //
T03D3805:133b-37: zhi ba ni sems pa dul ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:133b-38: mngon par 'du byed pa ni nges par rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:133b-39: bslab par mi bya zhes pa ni de rnams kyi
T03D3805:133b-40: bdag nyid kyis kyang mi dmigs pas zhes pa ni
T03D3805:133b-41: gya nom pa'i ro myang bas nyams pa'i skyon no
T03D3805:133b-42: // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:133b-43: snang ba ni gsal ba dang bcas par ro //
T03D3805:133b-44: der rtogs pa ni mthong nas so //
T03D3805:133b-45: kha dog dang dbyibs ni kha dog gi dbyibs so
T03D3805:133b-46: zhes pa ni bla na med pa'i theg pa las
T03D3805:134a-2: /'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:134a-3: nang du yang dag par bzhag pa ni ting nge 'dzin la ste /
T03D3805:134a-4: tshe 'di la zhes pa ni mthong ba'i chos la thob pa'o //
T03D3805:134a-5: len pa med pa ni cung zhig yongs su mi 'dzin pa ste /
T03D3805:134a-6: dus rtag tu byang chub par ma gyur pa'i rtag
T03D3805:134a-7: par de'i so sor skye ba med pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:134a-8: // rgyun du ni so sor bdag gi dngos pos
T03D3805:134a-9: so zhes pa ni ched du bya ba las nyams
T03D3805:134a-10: pa'i skyon no zhes pa ni bcu tshan dang po'o
T03D3805:134a-11: // // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste shing mkhan ni shing bzo ba'o //
T03D3805:134a-12: ri rab kyi steng du blta na sdug ces bya
T03D3805:134a-13: ba ni brgya byin gyi gser gyi grong khyer la
T03D3805:134a-14: de'i dbus su rnam par rgyal ba zhes pa'i khang
T03D3805:134a-15: bzangs te / lo gas re rer dpag tshad nyis brgya lnga bcu ste /
T03D3805:134a-16: gcig tu bsdus pas dpag tshad stong la nyi ma
T03D3805:134a-17: dang zla ba ni ri rab kyi phyed kyi thad
T03D3805:134a-18: ka'i phyi rol gyi nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i shel
T03D3805:134a-19: gyi khang pa zlum po ste /
T03D3805:134a-20: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dpag tshad lnga
T03D3805:134a-21: bcu rtsa gcig dang dpag tshad lnga bcu pa'i steng
T03D3805:134a-22: / de'i dbus kyi thad ka'i tshad kyis de dag la ste /
T03D3805:134a-23: khang bzangs kyi tshad che chung des 'dir de dag gi khang pa brjod par bya ste /
T03D3805:134a-24: de yang rnam par rgyal ba las shin tu tshad
T03D3805:134a-25: chung ba'o zhes pa ni thabs la kun tu rmongs
T03D3805:134a-26: pa'i skyon no // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:134a-27: 'jig rten du 'khor los sgyur bas na 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
T03D3805:134a-28: yang shes pa ni skyes bu med par nam mkha'
T03D3805:134a-29: la 'gro ba'i rtsibs stong pa mu khyud dang lte
T03D3805:134a-31: lcags dang zangs dang dngul dang gser gyi rnams ji ltar rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:134a-32: kha dog ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i la sogs pa
T03D3805:134a-33: bzhin la dbyibs ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
T03D3805:134a-34: cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi
T03D3805:134a-35: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o //
T03D3805:134a-36: mthu ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can la /
T03D3805:134a-37: rdzu 'phrul phun sum tshogs pa ni rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ste /
T03D3805:134a-45: rib rib por byed pa ni rmongs par byed cing yongs su mi gsal bar byed pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:134a-46: chung ba'i phyir ri bo de gang gi phyir byang
T03D3805:134b-0: chub sems dpa' la 'byung bar @134b 'gyur zhes pa
T03D3805:134b-1: ni / byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:134b-2: thob pa ni rnyed pa tsam gyis te /
T03D3805:134b-3: mdor bsdus pa la sogs pa thos pa la sogs
T03D3805:134b-4: pa rnams kyis rnam par ldog cing kha phyir bltas
T03D3805:134b-5: par 'gyur zhes pa ni 'khor los sgyur ba dang
T03D3805:134b-6: chos mthun pa sprul pa'i sku las nyams pa'i skyon
T03D3805:134b-7: no // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3805:134b-8: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:134b-9: ro ni drug ste rdzas kyi dbye bas phan tshun sbyar ba las ni brgyar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:134b-10: de'i ro brgya pa'i kha zas spangs pa ni sems
T03D3805:134b-11: kyis la bor ba ni lus kyis so zhes pa
T03D3805:134b-12: ni kha zas ro brgya dang chos mthun pa'i longs

T03D3805:137b-34: 'di rnams kyis zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa la gzhol ba'o //
