T03D3805:137b-37: gzugs med pa'i ngo bo rnams su rnam par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:137b-38: de la zag pa med pa'o zhes pa ni zag
T03D3805:137b-39: pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i sems
T03D3805:137b-40: kyis shes pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:137b-41: gang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:137b-42: sems kyi 'dod chags dang bcas pa nyid ni sems kyi rang bzhin ma yin la /
T03D3805:137b-43: de'i phyir na 'dod chags med pa dang 'dod chags dang bcas pa gnyis sems dang bral ba ste /
T03D3805:138a-0: stong pa nyid pas de ltar @138a * //
T03D3805:138a-1: 'dod chags dang bcas pa kho na 'dod chags dang
T03D3805:138a-2: bral ba nyid do zhes pa'i don to zhes pa
T03D3805:138a-3: ni sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa dang 'dod chags
T03D3805:138a-5: gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis kyis ni sems zhe
T03D3805:138a-6: sdang dang bcas pa dang zhe sdang dang bral ba'i
T03D3805:138a-7: shes pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis kyis
T03D3805:138a-8: ni gti mug dang bcas pa dang gti mug dang
T03D3805:138a-9: bral pa'i sems kyi shes pa'o //
T03D3805:138a-10: 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i gzhan gyi
T03D3805:138a-11: sems myong bas bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags la sogs
T03D3805:138a-12: pa can du ni ji ltar yang mi 'gyur te
T03D3805:138a-13: / gang du rang gi bag chags kyi mthu las
T03D3805:138a-14: 'ongs pa'i 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa
T03D3805:138a-16: gzhan gyi bag chags kyi stobs las 'ongs pas ni
T03D3805:138a-17: ma yin pas na bcom ldan 'das myong bar byed
T03D3805:138a-18: pa por nye bar gzhag par mi 'grub pa'o //
T03D3805:138a-19: tshad med pa dang zhes pa bstan bcos su rjes su dang bshad pa ni /
T03D3805:138a-20: de ltar rgya chen po ma yin pa dang rgya chen po'i shes pa dang /
T03D3805:138a-21: chen por gyur pa ma yin pa dang ste /
T03D3805:138a-22: chen por gyur pa'i shes pa rnams bsdus pa'i don to //
T03D3805:138a-23: 'dir gzhan yang tshig gnyis ni kun nas slong ba ni rgya chen po dang skye ba ste /
T03D3805:138a-24: de kho na nyid du ni de dang sbyor ba
T03D3805:138a-25: so sor bkag pas kun slong ba med pa'i sbyor
T03D3805:138a-26: ba la / shin tu 'phro zhing skye ba so
T03D3805:138a-27: sor bkag pa kun nas slong ba med pa dang
T03D3805:138a-30: mi 'bri ba ni bsal ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:138a-31: de'i phyir rgya chen po ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:138a-32: mi 'phel bas na de'i phyir rgya chen po ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:138a-33: rnam par grol ba med pa ni khyad par du 'gro ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:138a-34: rnam par bral ba med pa'i phyir dang rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:138a-36: sems kyi chos nyid la'o zhes pa ni sems rgya
T03D3805:138a-37: chen po dang rgya chen po ma yin pa'i shes
T03D3805:138a-38: pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gnyis te //
T03D3805:138a-39: rgyang ring po nas drung du 'gro ba dang 'ong
T03D3805:138a-40: pa dang drung nas rgyang ring por 'gro ba dang
T03D3805:138a-41: 'ong ba dang yongs su mi 'gro bas na ma
T03D3805:138a-42: rtogs pa ste / de rnams med pas na chen por gyur pa ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:138a-43: sems de dag mnyam pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid med par mnyam pas mnyam pa ste /
T03D3805:138b-0: mnyam pa ni de rnams dang rang @138b bzhin gyis te /
T03D3805:138b-1: de'i phyir rang bzhin gyis mnyam pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:138b-2: chen por gyur pa ma yin pa dang chen por
T03D3805:138b-3: gyur pa'i sems kyi shes pa'o //
T03D3805:138b-4: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:138b-5: rten med pa'i phyir ni sems kyi chos nyid kyis te //
T03D3805:138b-6: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i shes pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-8: rnam par shes pa rnams bzung ste /
T03D3805:138b-9: 'dir gsungs pa ni yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:138b-10: de yang rten med pa'o zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-11: tshad med pa'i zhes pa ni sems tshad med pa shes pa'o //
T03D3805:138b-12: bstan bcos su rnam shes dang zhes pa'i rang gis
T03D3805:138b-13: ni sems bstan du yod pa dang bstan du med
T03D3805:138b-15: thogs pa dang bcas pa dang thogs pa med pa'i shes pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-17: bla na med pa'i shes pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-19: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i shes pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-20: rnam par ma grol ba dang /
T03D3805:138b-21: rnam par grol ba'i shes pa rnams bzung ste /
T03D3805:138b-22: 'dir gsungs pa ni gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:138b-23: mnyam pa ni bltar med pa la blta bar bya
T03D3805:138b-24: ba de rnams de ltar bstan du med pa ste
T03D3805:138b-25: / gang du sems kyi rang bzhin ni sems kyi rang bzhin med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:138b-26: de nyid kho na 'di rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ces pa'i dbus kyi tshig phyis pas so //
T03D3805:138b-27: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir zhes pa ni sems kyi mtshan nyid yang dag par rig pa na /
T03D3805:138b-28: don dam par de gang du med pa'i phyir dang
T03D3805:138b-29: dngos po'i ngo bo la don phyin ci log tu
T03D3805:138b-30: sgro btags pa des dben pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:138b-31: spyan gsum ni sha dang lha dang shes rab kyi'o //
T03D3805:138b-32: thams cad la zhes pa ni chos dang sangs rgyas
T03D3805:138b-33: kyis kyang zhes pa ni sems bstan du yod pa
T03D3805:138b-34: dang / bstan du med pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:138b-35: gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:138b-36: med pa zhes pa ni med cing yod pa ma
T03D3805:138b-37: yin pa la yod pa nyid du rgyud las 'khor
T03D3805:138b-38: ba thog ma med par brtags pa ste /
T03D3805:138b-39: gang don dam pa stong pa nyid de de'i phyir
T03D3805:138b-40: na dmigs pa'i dbang du gyur ba ste stong pa'o
T03D3805:138b-41: // thogs pa dang bcas pa ni tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:138b-42: skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dang yod pa dang med pa dang /
T03D3805:138b-43: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis kyi rnam pa'i rtag
T03D3805:138b-44: pa dang chad pa la sogs pa dang gnyis dang
T03D3805:139a-0: yang dag pa dang bden pa nyid du @139a *
T03D3805:139a-1: // sgro btags pa de med pas gnyis su med pa yang dag pa ste /
T03D3805:139a-2: gang gi phyir don dam par ni ma byung ma
T03D3805:139a-3: skyes shing kun tu 'byung ba gzhan du rten cing
T03D3805:139a-4: 'brel bar 'byung ba ni kun rdzob tu'o //
T03D3805:139a-5: de ltar na tshad ma rnams kyis mi gnod pa'i phyir thogs pa med pa'o zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:139a-6: thogs pa dang bcas pa dang thogs pa med pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-7: gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:139a-8: gang zhes pa ni bla na yod pa yang bla
T03D3805:139a-9: na yod pa min te de la rlom pa med
T03D3805:139a-10: pa'i phyir ro // rdul phra mo tsam yang zhes pa ni gzung ba dang /
T03D3805:139a-11: 'dzin pa dang bral ba gnyis su med pa'i bden
T03D3805:139a-12: pa myong ba yod ces pa gang brtags pa de
T03D3805:139a-13: la rdul phra mo tsam yang nye bar dmigs su
T03D3805:139a-14: med de ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:139a-15: 'dir gsungs pa ni spros pa med ces pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-16: de bzhin du nye bar mi dmigs pa ni bla ma'i phyir bla na med pa ste /
T03D3805:139a-17: dbus kyi tshig phyis pa'o zhes pa ni sems bla
T03D3805:139a-18: na yod pa dang bla na med pa'i shes pa'o
T03D3805:139a-19: // gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te mnyam pa ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T03D3805:139a-20: des mnyam zhing de nyid du 'jug pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-21: de ltar min pa zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:139a-22: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i mi mnyam pa ni
T03D3805:139a-23: mi mnyam par 'gro zhing ro sna tshogs pa'i phyir
T03D3805:139a-24: te / de'i phyir mnyam par ma bzhag pa'o zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:139a-25: mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang bzhag pa'i sems kyi shes pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-26: gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:139a-27: rnam par ma grol ba ni kun rdzob tu glo bur gyi sgrib pa'i 'ching ba yod pas la /
T03D3805:139a-28: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par grol ba ste /
T03D3805:139a-29: gang du dngos po med pa dang /
T03D3805:139a-30: dngos po yod pa nyid dang bral ba'i ngo bo
T03D3805:139a-31: nyid gang dag de ni de ltar med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:139a-32: zhes ngo bo nyid dang bral bas rnam par grol
T03D3805:139a-33: ba'o zhes pa ni rnam par ma grol ba dang
T03D3805:139a-34: rnam par grol ba'i sems kyi shes pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-35: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:139a-36: bltar med pa ni don dam par so sor rang gis rig par byar med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:139a-37: rnam par rig par bya ba ma yin pa ni gzhan gyis rig par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:139a-38: gzung du med pa ni rang dang gzhan gnyi gas so //
T03D3805:139a-39: 'jig rten gyi zhes pa ni sems can gyi bdag
T03D3805:139a-40: nyid kyis 'jig rten na'o zhes pa ni bltar med
T03D3805:139b-1: gzhan yang zhes pa'i tshig gnyis te /
T03D3805:139b-2: phye ba ni yod pa la mi mthong ba'i tshul
T03D3805:139b-3: gyis kun tu gnas pa'o zhes pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:139b-5: btsums pa ni dgag pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-6: thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyis 'jig rten zhes pa ni rgyang 'phen pa'o //
T03D3805:139b-7: kun tu phye ba ni de dag 'dus pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-8: 'byung ba dang mi 'byung ba gcig tu gnas pa'i
T03D3805:139b-9: phyir dang tha dad par gnas pa'i phyir zhes pa
T03D3805:139b-11: rab tu bshad pa ni de dag dgag pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-12: 'byung ba yang ma yin la mi 'byung ba yang ma yin te /
T03D3805:139b-13: de nyid dang gzhan nyid du brjod du med pa ni gang zag smra ba'o //
T03D3805:139b-14: de ltar na btags pa la sogs pa rnams ji ltar rigs par shes par bya ste /
T03D3805:139b-15: de thams cad ni phung po lnga po la brten
T03D3805:139b-16: pa'o zhes pa ni phye ba dang btsums pa'i shes
T03D3805:139b-17: pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-18: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams ni de bzhin
T03D3805:139b-19: nyid dang de'i bdag nyid du shes pas ni de
T03D3805:139b-20: bzhin nyid kyis rnam pa'i phye ba dang /
T03D3805:139b-22: de ltar na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-23: de bzhin nyid du rab tu shes par byed cing
T03D3805:139b-24: de bzhin nyid gcig pa can du rnam par 'jog
T03D3805:139b-25: par byed de / 'di rnam pa rgya chen pos gsungs pa ste /
T03D3805:139b-26: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang du ma
T03D3805:139b-27: dang gcig nyid dang du ma nyid de dag dang
T03D3805:139b-28: bral ba nyid de de dag ni dngos pa'i chos
T03D3805:139b-29: kyi phyir ro // tha dad pa dgag pa tsam ni de'i gcig pa nyid ces pa'i don te /
T03D3805:139b-30: gang du du ma'i phyir dang sna tshogs pa med
T03D3805:139b-31: pa'i phyir zhes pa ni de kho na nyid du
T03D3805:139b-32: ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes gcig nyid dang /
T03D3805:139b-33: du ma nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:139b-34: zad pa med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:139b-36: de dang ldan pa rnams kyi mi dang glang po
T03D3805:139b-37: dang rta la sogs pa rnams su tha dad par
T03D3805:139b-38: 'gyur ba ni nam mkha' dang 'dra ba ma yin
T03D3805:139b-39: la / de bzhin nyid la ni gnas skabs tha
T03D3805:139b-40: dad pas kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur te 'gyur
T03D3805:139b-42: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la
T03D3805:139b-43: ni de la dngos po'i chos kyi dbye ba med
T03D3805:139b-44: de gnyis su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:139b-45: dbyig pa gcig bcad kyang du mar 'gyur ba bzhin
T03D3805:139b-46: du de ltar phung po la sogs pa rnams kyi
T03D3805:139b-47: de bzhin nyid kyang tha dad par 'gyur ro zhe
T03D3805:140a-1: gsungs pa ni gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir ro zhes te /
T03D3805:140a-2: ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir des gcod pa la sbyor ba med ces pa la dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:140a-3: 'jig rten kun tu ston par 'gyur zhes pa ni
T03D3805:140a-4: de gzhan la bstan pa shes pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:140a-5: de bzhin nyid mngon par byang chub pa gzhan la
T03D3805:140a-6: bstan pa'i shes pa'o zhes pa ni shes pa'i mtshan
T03D3805:140a-7: nyid nyi shu rtsa gsum mo //
T03D3805:140a-8: stong nyid mtshan ma med bcas dang //
T03D3805:140a-9: smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang //
T03D3805:140a-10: skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang //
T03D3805:140a-11: chos nyid rnam par 'khrug med dang //
T03D3805:140a-12: 'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog / rab dbye mtshan ma med nyid la //
T03D3805:140a-13: lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyis ni //
T03D3805:140a-14: shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yin //
T03D3805:140a-16: lam shes nyid kyi shes pa ni rgyu la /
T03D3805:140a-17: shes pa la ltos pa ni 'dun pa ste /
T03D3805:140a-19: de nas yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:140a-20: chos zhes pa ni shes pa'o //
T03D3805:140a-21: 'dir shes pa rnams kyis de'i dmigs bya gzhan brjod de /
T03D3805:140a-22: de bshad pas kyang de rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:140a-23: stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams la gcig pa'i tshig ni dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:140a-24: mtshan nyid rnams zhes pa ni mang ba'i tshig ste /
T03D3805:140a-25: mtshan nyid tha dad par phye bas so //
T03D3805:140a-26: gzhag ces pa ni rnam par gzhag pa ste /
T03D3805:140a-27: 'jig rten gyi brda las don dam par yod pa
T03D3805:140a-28: ni ma yin no zhes pa ni stong pa nyid
T03D3805:140a-29: dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
T03D3805:140a-30: smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgro'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:140a-31: skye ba med pa la sogs pa brgyad ni gcig tu byas te /
T03D3805:140a-32: stong pa nyid tsam gyi phyir la /
T03D3805:140a-33: stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:140a-34: ngo bo nyid med pa la ni stong pa nyid skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
T03D3805:140a-36: kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'am /
T03D3805:140a-37: rnam par byang bar gyur pa yod pa ma yin
T03D3805:140a-38: zhing srid pa med pa nyid mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:140a-39: pa la / stong pa nyid ni chos kyi dbyings te /
T03D3805:140a-40: 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:140a-41: rtag par de bzhin no zhes pas de bzhin nyid de /
T03D3805:140b-0: stong pa nyid la sogs pa can ji ltar min zhes pa ni @140b 'bri ba la /
T03D3805:140b-1: de ci'i phyir zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:140b-2: gang gi phyir mi gnas shing nam mkha' dang 'dra bas bsdus kyang ma bzhag pa ste /
T03D3805:140b-3: gzugs la sogs pa'i grangs kyis ma yin zhing gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ma yin te /
T03D3805:140b-4: gzugs la sogs pa rnams ni rang nyid kyis med
T03D3805:140b-5: pa'i phyir na de rnams la yang gzugs la sogs
T03D3805:140b-6: pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:140b-7: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa
T03D3805:140b-8: ni gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid du de
T03D3805:140b-9: la brten pa ma yin zhes pas de bzhin du
T03D3805:140b-11: byis pas yongs su brtags pa'o zhes pas gzung du
T03D3805:140b-12: med do zhes pa ni skye ba med pa dang
T03D3805:140b-14: 'di dag ma bzhag ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:140b-15: bskyod pa zhes pa ni rnam par dkrugs pa'am gnod
T03D3805:140b-16: par ro zhes pa ni chos nyid rnam par 'khrug
T03D3805:140b-18: 'di dag ni gang gis kyang lag gis ma bzhag
T03D3805:140b-19: ces pa la sogs pas ni 'dus ma byas pa'i
T03D3805:140b-20: shes pa'o // de nas tshe dang ldan pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:140b-21: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ni rnam par rtog par ma byas pa'o //
T03D3805:140b-22: de'i phyir zab mo'o zhes pa ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:140b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams zhes pa'i chags pa med
T03D3805:140b-24: pa'i ye shes dang thams cad la thogs pa med
T03D3805:140b-26: gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:140b-27: nyid ni kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba
T03D3805:140b-28: byas pa'o zhes pa ni rab tu dbye ba'i shes
T03D3805:140b-29: pa'o // chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:140b-30: chags pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes ni dmigs pa med pa'i spyod yul te /
T03D3805:140b-31: de la gnas pa rnams kyang don dam par gzugs
T03D3805:140b-32: la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni dmigs pa med
T03D3805:140b-33: pa'o zhes pa ni mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:140b-34: shes pa'o // de ni nyid kyi chos brten nas //
T03D3805:140b-35: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang //
T03D3805:140b-36: bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang //
T03D3805:140b-37: de la mchod dang byed med dang //
T03D3805:140b-38: kun 'jug mkhyen pa gang yin dang //
T03D3805:140b-39: ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang //
T03D3805:140b-40: 'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang //
T03D3805:140b-41: brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum mdzad //
T03D3805:140b-42: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
T03D3805:141a-2: shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
T03D3805:141a-4: shes pa zhes pa ni thams cad 'brel lo //
T03D3805:141a-6: rab 'byor ji ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:141a-7: chos zhes pa ni mdor bstan la /
T03D3805:141a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa ni rgyas par bshad pa ste /
T03D3805:141a-9: mi gnas pas zhes pa ni mngon par zhen pa
T03D3805:141a-10: med pas so zhes pa ni rang gi chos la
T03D3805:141a-11: brten cing gnas pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:141a-12: chos la zhes pa ni chos la gus par byed pa'i shes pa'o //

T03D3805:141a-35: byed pa ni gdul bar bya ba rnams la go

T03D3805:141a-37: pa dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas skyed
T03D3805:141a-38: par byed do zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi

T03D3805:141b-0: pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i @141b ston pa'i
T03D3805:141b-1: shes pa'o // de ltar zhes pa ni zhi ba nyid ston pa'i shes pa'o //
T03D3805:141b-2: de ltar 'jig rten dben pa ni stong pa la

T03D3805:141b-4: rnam par dag cing 'gags pa ste /

T03D3805:141b-6: gyi dbye ba 'di rnams gzung ba 'di rnams yod

T03D3805:141b-9: mnyam par bstan te zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi
T03D3805:141b-11: de ltar shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis so //

T03D3805:141b-13: gshegs pa rnams la 'jig rten kun tu ston pa

T03D3805:141b-19: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //

T03D3805:141b-21: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //

T03D3805:141b-33: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste //
T03D3805:141b-34: gang gis lam 'di gzhan dag las //
T03D3805:141b-35: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //

T03D3805:141b-38: sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang /
T03D3805:141b-40: rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa'o //

T03D3805:141b-42: ba bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang
T03D3805:141b-44: gzhal du med pa nyid dang /

T03D3805:142a-0: @142a * // gang du de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la /

T03D3805:142a-2: 'dir lnga ka'i khyad par gyi bya ba bstan pa ni ma yin no //

T03D3805:142a-4: sangs rgyas nyid ni rang nyid mngon par byang chub pa'o //

T03D3805:142a-13: kyi sems dang bcas pa rnams te /

T03D3805:142a-16: mngon sum dang cig shos so //

T03D3805:142a-26: pa'i 'bras bu'i phyir na bsam gyis mi khyab pa

T03D3805:142a-32: zhes pa ni re re bzhin du gzugs dang tshor
T03D3805:142a-33: ba la sogs pa rnams la'o zhes pa'i don to
T03D3805:142a-34: // gzhan du na bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag dbye ba med par bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:142a-39: de ma lags zhes pa ni kho na nyid du
T03D3805:142b-0: na ngo bo nyid @142b med pa'i phyir zhes pa

T03D3805:142b-8: // mi mnyam par 'gro ba zhes pa dang 'di
T03D3805:142b-9: dang 'di mnyam zhes pa ni gnyis mnyam par nye

T03D3805:142b-25: bar 'gyur zhing shes pa'i skad cig rnams kyis ni

T03D3805:143a-1: gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:143a-11: bgrod par dka' ba'i phyir te /

T03D3805:143a-39: nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba'am gang ba med do //

T03D3805:143b-5: / // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:145a-22: kyi pha rol ni stong pa nyid de de la

T03D3805:145a-26: rol stong pa nyid de ltar gzugs so zhes pas

T03D3805:145a-28: stong pa nyid dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:147a-36: yod pa dang med pa la'ang ma yin /
T03D3805:147a-37: gnyi ga ma yin pa'ang sgom pa min zhes pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i sgom pa'o //
T03D3805:147a-38: nye bar brtag par bya ba ni shes par bya
T03D3805:147a-39: ba'o zhes pa ni nye bar dmigs pa med pa'i
T03D3805:147a-41: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:147a-42: mngon par zhen pa med pa ni ngo bo nyid du'o //
T03D3805:147a-43: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:147a-44: rnam par brtags pa nyid ni dmigs pa med do //
T03D3805:147b-0: gzhol ba dang bab pa dang 'bab @147b pa ni sgra'i rten gyi don la ste /
T03D3805:147b-1: sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi dang rjes kyi dbye bas so //
T03D3805:147b-2: rgyud ces pa ni sems kyi rgyud do //
T03D3805:147b-3: nam mkha' la gzhol ba zhes pa ni nam mkha' lta bu'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la'o //
T03D3805:147b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la'o zhes pa ni lhag ma'o //
T03D3805:147b-6: de ltar nam mkha' lta bu nyid la gang du
T03D3805:147b-7: yul dang dus kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus pa'i
T03D3805:147b-9: de nyid tshad dang bral bas tshad med pa ste /
T03D3805:147b-10: de ni gzugs nas ni srid du mi gnas pa yang ma yin zhes pa'i bar ro //
T03D3805:147b-11: thob pa ni tshigs kyi lam la mngon par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba'i lam mo//
T03D3805:147b-12: khong du chud pa ni mthong ba'i lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-13: lam ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T03D3805:147b-14: gzugs med pa la dmigs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i bsgom pa'i lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-15: lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsgom pa'i lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-16: ye shes ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:147b-17: ngo bo'i chung ngu'i lam mo rnam par shes pa
T03D3805:147b-18: ni chung ngu'i 'bring la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T03D3805:147b-20: skye ba ni chen po'i chung ngu'i la sogs pa'i ngo bo chen po'i lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-21: 'jig pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i thabs kyi sbyor ba'i lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-22: 'byung ba ni nyon mongs pa spangs pas rnam par
T03D3805:147b-23: grol ba thob pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam mo
T03D3805:147b-24: // 'grib pa ni nyon mongs pas dben pa'i ye
T03D3805:147b-25: shes mngon sum du byed pa'i rnam par grol ba'i
T03D3805:147b-26: // lam mo // 'gags pa ni sgrib pa bag
T03D3805:147b-27: chags dang bcas pa spong bar byed pa'i sbyor ba
T03D3805:147b-28: // lam mo // dang / bar chad med pa dang /
T03D3805:147b-29: rnam par grol ba'i lam gyi bdag nyid kyi khyad par gyi lam mo //
T03D3805:147b-30: sgom pa ni rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:147b-31: te 'joms par bya ba'i sgrib pa thams cad kyi
T03D3805:147b-32: 'joms pa po'o // rnam par sgom pa ni mthar
T03D3805:147b-33: phyin pa'i lam mi skye ba dang zad pa shes
T03D3805:147b-34: 'joms pa po'o // pa'o // yul ni yul thun mong la'o //
T03D3805:147b-36: 'di rnams la yul dang dus kyis mi khyab pa nyid kyis tshad dang mi ldan pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:147b-37: gzhal du med pa ni de'i ngo bo dang mi sbyor pa'i sbyor ba'o //
T03D3805:147b-38: gzhan du na zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid la ste /
T03D3805:147b-39: gzugs la sogs pa ni tshad dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:148a-1: nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces pa ni /
T03D3805:148a-2: gang gi phyir rnal 'byor ba'i kun rdzob tu gzugs
T03D3805:148a-3: la sogs pa nyid stong pa nyid dang ro gcig
T03D3805:148a-4: par rtogs pas sangs rgyas nyid la /
T03D3805:148a-5: gzhan du ni 'di dang gzugs zhes pa'i sgras gzugs la sogs pa'i chos nyid brjod pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-6: de'i phyir 'gal ba med do zhes pa ni de ltar dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:148a-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-8: zab mo zhes pa ni mos par dka' ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:148a-9: gting dpag par dka' ba ni bsam pa'i shes rab kyis kyang ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:148a-10: blta bar dka' ba ni 'jig rten pa'i sgom pas kyang ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:148a-11: rtogs par dka' ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pas so //
T03D3805:148a-12: don gyi dbang du ni de'i rgyus brtson pa chung
T03D3805:148a-13: ba nyid la gzhol bar mdzad pa ni dman pas
T03D3805:148a-15: gang du sus kyang min zhes pa ni bya ba dgag pa'o //
T03D3805:148a-16: nam mkha' zhes pas ni las so //
T03D3805:148a-17: bdag ces pas ni byed pa po'o //
T03D3805:148a-18: chos thams cad ni thob par bya ba rnams la 'ong ba med pas so //
T03D3805:148a-19: 'gro ba med pa ni spang bya rnams la'o //
T03D3805:148a-20: mi mthun pa'i zhes pa ni phyin ci ma log pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-21: gang du gzung du med pa la rnam par rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:148a-22: de ltar 'jig rten pas phyin ci log la yid
T03D3805:148a-23: ches pa'o zhes pa ni mi mthun pa'i ngo bo
T03D3805:148a-24: nyid do // lha rnams ni brgya byin la sogs pa rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-25: de'i le'u ni lha'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o /
T03D3805:148a-27: // / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-28: thogs pa ma mchis pa ni gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:148a-29: 'dir mtshan nyid ni thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T03D3805:148a-30: dngos po thams cad ces pa ni dngos po rnams
T03D3805:148a-31: thams cad la rjes su mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:148a-32: // gnyis pa'i 'dra ba'i so sor 'gran pa po'i
T03D3805:148a-33: mtshan nyid 'di'o zhes pa ni so so'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:148a-34: la de med pas 'gal ba dang bral ba'i phyir
T03D3805:148a-35: ro zhes pa ni thogs pa med pa'i ngo bo
T03D3805:148a-36: // nyid do ; / gnas ni rab tu gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-37: bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das pa de la med pas na gnas med pa'o //
T03D3805:148a-38: mngon par 'grub pa ma mchis pa zhes pa ni gang du yang mi gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:148a-39: gang yang mngon par grub pa med cing gang la skye ba med pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-0: lam thams cad ces pa ni @148b 'dir yod pa
T03D3805:148b-1: dang med pa la sogs pa rnams kyi skye ba
T03D3805:148b-2: la mi sbyor ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:148b-3: bde 'gro dang ngan 'gro dang mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:148b-4: pa'i lam rnams med pa'i phyir lam med pa'o zhes
T03D3805:148b-5: pa ni gzhi med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:148b-6: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-7: rjes su skyes zhes pa ni pha dang bu dag
T03D3805:148b-8: ma skyes pas don dam du 'dra ba'i phyir la
T03D3805:148b-9: / gal te ma skyes pa na de dag ji ltar pha dang bu dag tu 'gyur zhe na /
T03D3805:148b-10: kun rdzob tu zhes pa la dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-11: ma 'ongs pa ni ma skyes pa la 'ong ba ni rnam par gzhig pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-12: rjes su skyes zhes pa ni rjes su rtogs pa las skyes pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-14: de bkag pa ni 'gro ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:148b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-16: de bzhin nyid du chos thams cad gnas pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir na /
T03D3805:148b-17: de nyid gnas pa nyid do //
T03D3805:148b-18: sngon du med pa'i ngo bo nyid bskyed du med pas 'gyur ba med do //
T03D3805:148b-19: ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'jug pas rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-20: rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid med pas rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-21: rtog pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir rtog pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:148b-22: gang la yang thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du song ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:148b-23: de la thogs pa med pa ni gang du na
T03D3805:148b-24: yang de bzhin nyid de nyid yod na de las
T03D3805:148b-25: gzhan du thogs pa nyid do zhe na /
T03D3805:148b-26: lan ni ji ltar zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-27: gcig tu ba las gang du nyid med pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-28: gnyis kyi dbye ba de la med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:148b-29: gcig la yang 'brel pa can gyi dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:148b-30: dper na sngon gyi nam mkha' dang phyi ma'i nam mkha' lta bu ste /
T03D3805:148b-31: de bzhin du gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang tshor
T03D3805:148b-32: ba'i de bzhin nyid do zhes 'gyur ro zhe na
T03D3805:148b-34: gnyis su byar med ces pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-35: 'dir yang yang rtag tu de ltar zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:148b-36: gnyis su med pa ni rang nyid kyis dbyer med pa dang /
T03D3805:148b-37: de bzhin nyid ni gzhan gyis kyang dbyer med ces
T03D3805:148b-38: pa ni gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid de
T03D3805:148b-39: gtan tshigs gsungs pa ni med ces pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-41: rgyur gyur pa de ni de yis nges par gyur pa ste /
T03D3805:148b-42: dper na khron pa'i chu nas kyi ljang bu bzhin zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:148b-43: de bzhin nyid ni gang nas kyang ma yin zhing gang gi yang yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3805:149a-1: phyir na gang du yang 'brel pa med pa'i phyir gang gi yang ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:149a-2: de'i phyir rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes pa'o zhes pa grub pa la /
T03D3805:149a-3: gtan tshigs gzhan gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:149a-4: de lta bas na zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:149a-5: ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid ces pa yang ma
T03D3805:149a-6: byas pa'i de bzhin nyid 'dir rtag pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:149a-7: // nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi
T03D3805:149a-8: 'gyur zhes pa ni rtag par de bzhin nyid kyi
T03D3805:149a-10: gnyis su med pa ni dus kyi dbye bas kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:149a-11: rnam pa thams cad du zhes pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams rnams thams cad do //
T03D3805:149a-12: chos thams cad ni dngos po thams cad la'o //
T03D3805:149a-13: mi rtog pa ni de rnams thams cad la mi rtog pa'i phyir /
T03D3805:149a-14: rnam par mi rtog pa ni de bzhin nyid la
T03D3805:149a-15: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:149a-16: // de bzhin du zhes pa ni thams cad du
T03D3805:149a-17: rtogs pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pas
T03D3805:149a-18: // so // bskal pa ma yin pas ni ma bcad pa'o //
T03D3805:149a-19: tha mi dad pas ni gzhan du 'byed pa po ma dmigs pas so //
T03D3805:149a-20: gnyis pa med pas 'di ni gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid la /
T03D3805:149a-21: de'i rjes su bgrod cing nye bar son pas de
T03D3805:149a-22: bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes pa ni kun rdzob la don
T03D3805:149a-23: dam par ni ma yin zhing zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:149a-24: 'dir zhes pa ni de ltar song ba la song
T03D3805:149a-25: ba med pa'i chos dang gang zag la bdag med
T03D3805:149a-26: pas mthong bas zhes pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa
T03D3805:149a-27: ni skye ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:149a-28: de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:149a-29: 'dir de bzhin nyid la thams cad du rab tu
T03D3805:149a-30: dbye ba rnams med kyi tha dad pa med par
T03D3805:149a-31: bstan pas dbye ba dgag pa ni gzugs la sogs
T03D3805:149a-32: pa 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid rnams la dmigs
T03D3805:149a-33: pa med pas de bzhin nyid dmigs pa ni bcu
T03D3805:149a-34: drug gi ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:149a-35: de bzhin nyid 'di rnams kyi che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:149a-36: 'di bstan zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:149a-37: de bzhin nyid du gshegs shing mkhyen pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa la /
T03D3805:149a-38: sdug ces pa la sogs pa ni bya ba'i khyad par te /
T03D3805:149a-39: 'dir khams gsum g-yo ba'i don du gsungs dang sgra'i don la ste /
T03D3805:149b-0: sdug la chung ngu dang @149b 'bring dang chen po
T03D3805:149b-1: bya ba'i dbye bas te ltas chen po bco brgyad
T03D3805:149b-2: du 'gyur ro // de la 'gul ba ni mtha' dag go //
T03D3805:149b-3: g-yo ba ni cha shas so //
T03D3805:149b-4: ma lus pa shin tu 'gul ba ni 'khrugs pa'o //
T03D3805:149b-6: 'ur 'ur ni dbyig pas brdungs pa'i khar rnga bzhin no //
T03D3805:149b-7: kun tu 'ur 'ur ni 'brug sgra chen po bzhin no //
T03D3805:149b-8: rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa ni ji ltar sa
T03D3805:149b-9: gzhi'i shar phyogs mtho na ni nub phyogs dma' la
T03D3805:149b-10: / shar phyogs dma' na ni nub phyogs mtho ba'o //
T03D3805:149b-11: lho phyogs mtho na ni byang phyogs dma' la byang phyogs mtho na ni lho phyogs dma' ba'o //
T03D3805:149b-12: dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' la //
T03D3805:149b-13: mtha' mtho na ni dbus dma'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:149b-14: 'di rnams g-yo ba la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:149b-15: lha rnams bcom ldan 'das la mnyan pa dang ldan
T03D3805:149b-16: pa rnams dga' zhing rang sa nas spro ba 'di
T03D3805:149b-17: nas de ru yongs su bskyod pa dang /
T03D3805:149b-18: bstan pa spang ba bskyod pa ni /
T03D3805:149b-19: chos rin po che'i bdag nyid chen por zhes par byed pa dang /
T03D3805:149b-21: yod pa ma yin pa ni 'dir nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
T03D3805:149b-22: gang gis zhes pa ni rang gi chos rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:149b-23: byed pa po dang gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3805:149b-24: chos kyi rjes su skye bar bya ba'i las kyi
T03D3805:149b-25: de bzhin nyid la ji ltar spyad de /
T03D3805:149b-26: de tsam la gnas pa'i phyir /
T03D3805:149b-27: rigs yin pas 'dab chags la lus chen po'i phyir na bya chen no //
T03D3805:149b-28: bar du zhes pa ni ji srid du sa'i dbus kyi 'du shes kyis te /
T03D3805:149b-29: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa brjod par byas pas na de gsal bar byed par 'dod nas /
T03D3805:149b-30: sh'a ri'i bus gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:149b-31: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par
T03D3805:149b-32: bya zhes pa ni chos thams cad don dam par
T03D3805:149b-33: shes nas spyod pa byed pa ste /
T03D3805:149b-34: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:149b-35: la mtshan ma med par byed pa'i don du thabs
T03D3805:149b-36: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rtag
T03D3805:149b-38: bsod nams thams cad kyang byang chub tu yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba dang /
T03D3805:149b-40: de'i thabs la mkhas pa ni 'dir bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:149b-41: mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs //
T03D3805:149b-42: yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa ni //
T03D3805:149b-43: rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la //
T03D3805:150a-0: thar ba'i cha dang mthun par @150a * //
T03D3805:150a-2: / ces pa ste mtshan ma thun mong ma yin pa'i ngo bo'i rang gi mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3805:150a-3: mtshan mar mngon par zhen pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3805:150a-4: mtshan mar ma dmigs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pas sbyin
T03D3805:150a-5: pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thams
T03D3805:150a-6: cad rang gi rgyud las 'byung bar yang dag par
T03D3805:150a-7: sgrub par byed pa ni mkhas pa la /
T03D3805:150a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T03D3805:150a-9: thar pa'i cha ni snod de /
T03D3805:150a-10: de thob pa la phan pa'o //
T03D3805:150a-11: de'i rab tu dbye ba ni yum chen mor lnga gsungs te /
T03D3805:150a-12: de ltar yang bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:150a-13: sangs rgyas sogs dmigs dad pa dang //
T03D3805:150a-14: sbyin sogs spyod yul brtson 'grus dang //
T03D3805:150a-15: bsam pa phun sum tshogs dran dang //
T03D3805:150a-16: rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin dang //
T03D3805:150a-17: chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du //
T03D3805:150a-18: shes pa'i shes rab rnam pa lnga //
T03D3805:150a-19: zhes te thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'o //
T03D3805:150a-21: de skad ces gsol pa dang zhes te /
T03D3805:150a-23: rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnon po yis //
T03D3805:150a-24: rtogs bla rtul pos rtogs dkar bzhed //
T03D3805:150a-25: ces te 'di rnams kyi go skabs ni /
T03D3805:150a-26: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:150a-27: 'dir tshogs chen pos kun tu 'byung zhes pas na 'byung bar dka' ba'o //
T03D3805:150a-28: shes rab 'chal ba la sogs pa'i tshig rnams kyis
T03D3805:150a-29: ni thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rtul po'i khyad
T03D3805:150a-31: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnon po rnams kyis
T03D3805:150a-32: ni rang nyid mngon par byung nas yang dag par
T03D3805:150a-33: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so
T03D3805:150a-34: zhes pa'o // rnam grangs 'dis zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
T03D3805:150a-35: bdag nyid mngon par byang chub ces pa ste /
T03D3805:150a-36: sems can rnams gdod ma nyid nas de bzhin zhes pa ni rgol ba la /
T03D3805:150a-37: rab 'byor la de ma bsgrubs par thob pa'i gang
T03D3805:150a-38: dag thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa chung ngu la
T03D3805:150a-39: de ni de rnams yod pa ma yin zhing 'dir
T03D3805:150a-40: thob par mi srid pas 'byung bar dka' ba'o //
T03D3805:150a-41: de yang byis pas ni kun nas sgro btags pa
T03D3805:150a-42: de nyid kyi dngos pos byang chub par rlom la
T03D3805:150a-43: / de yang yang dag pa ma yin pa'i phyir
T03D3805:150a-44: thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes pa la dgongs pa
T03D3805:150b-0: / ste / de ltar yang byang chub ni rnam par @150b rtog pas sam /
T03D3805:150b-1: gzhan du rnam par rtog pas sprul pa'i dngos po'i
T03D3805:150b-2: phyogs gnyis char gyis kyang rigs pa ma yin te
T03D3805:150b-3: / byang chub ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:150b-4: rnam par rtog pa ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:150b-5: de bzhin du zhes pa ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pas kyang ngo //
T03D3805:150b-6: de ni ma yin zhes pa ni de nyid min te /
T03D3805:150b-7: phyir mi ldog pa bsgrub par 'dod nas gsungs pa
T03D3805:150b-8: ni gang phyir ldog pa'i chos de zhes pa la
T03D3805:150b-9: sogs pa ste / chos thams cad la gnas med pa nyid du sbyor ba'i rigs pas /
T03D3805:150b-10: de chos nyid la gnas shing /
T03D3805:150b-11: chos nyid kho na ni dag pa'i byang chub ste /
T03D3805:150b-12: de yang rang bzhin nyid kyis dag pa'o zhes dgongs pa'o //
T03D3805:150b-13: chos rnams kyi tshul du skye ba'i de kho na
T03D3805:150b-14: nyid kyi bye brag gi de bzhin nyid la de
T03D3805:150b-15: bzhin nyid ces pa ni de kho na nyid du
T03D3805:150b-16: ma skyes pas na yod pa ma yin la /
T03D3805:150b-17: rab tu 'byed par byed pa rnams la zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:150b-18: brtag par bya ba rnams la'o //
T03D3805:150b-19: de la khyad par med pa ni byang chub sems
T03D3805:150b-20: dpa'i dbye ba rnam pa gsum mi dmigs pas so
T03D3805:150b-21: // bye brag med pa nyid ni de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig par kun tu rtogs so //
T03D3805:150b-22: tha dad du byar med pa ni ji skad du
T03D3805:150b-23: bshad pa'i bye brag las bzlog nas tha dad du
T03D3805:150b-24: byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:150b-25: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dis nges
T03D3805:150b-26: par 'byung ba'o zhes pa'i bar gyi rgya chen pos
T03D3805:150b-27: ni rnon po rnams kyis thar pa'i cha dang mthun
T03D3805:150b-28: pas bdag nyid rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung ba'o
T03D3805:150b-29: zhes bshad pa'o // nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ni bzhi ste /
T03D3805:150b-30: de la drod kyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:150b-31: dro ba rnams kyi dmigs pa ni //
T03D3805:150b-32: sems can thams cad yin par bsngags //
T03D3805:150b-33: de dag la ni sems mnyam sogs //
T03D3805:150b-34: rnam pa dag ni bcur bshad do //
T03D3805:150b-37: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:150b-38: gnas par bya ba ni spro bas so //
T03D3805:150b-39: bslab par bgyi ba ni goms pas so //
T03D3805:150b-40: sems can rnams la sems mnyam zhes pa la sogs pas ni sems gzhan bcu gsungs te /
T03D3805:150b-41: dge ba ni g-yo med pa'i sems so //
T03D3805:150b-42: rnam par 'tshe ba med pa ni snying rje'o //
T03D3805:150b-43: ma dang pa'i sems dang bu dang bu mo'i sems
T03D3805:150b-44: dang mgon med pa rnams kyi mgon byed pa'i phyir
T03D3805:151a-0: dang / rang nyid sdig pa las @151a * //
T03D3805:151a-2: sbyin la sogs la gnas pas gzhan //
T03D3805:151a-3: de dag la ni 'god pa dang //
T03D3805:151a-4: bsngags pa brjod dang mthun pa nyid //
T03D3805:151a-5: rtser 'gyur zhes par bstan bcos las te de dag dang ma bral bar gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:151a-7: bdag nyid ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:151a-8: sdig pa ni mi dge ba bcu yongs su rgyal ba ni goms pa'o //
T03D3805:151a-9: ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed ces pa la sogs pa ni lugs dang mthun pa'o //
T03D3805:151a-10: de la bden pa gnyis ma rtogs pa'i shes pa
T03D3805:151a-11: dang phyin ci log tu shes pa dang the tshom
T03D3805:151a-13: des mi dge ba 'dod pa na kun tu spyod pa dang /
T03D3805:151a-14: dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa'i khams gsum gyi las 'du byed par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:151a-15: des yid kyi rnam par shes pa skye ba dang /
T03D3805:151a-16: 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid can dang 'chi ba dang skye
T03D3805:151a-17: ba'i ngang du gyur pa'i srid pa bar ma do
T03D3805:151a-19: srid pa ma son pa'i thogs pa med pas bar du yul der sbyor bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:151a-20: ma'i lto bar mtshams sbyor ba'i skad cig la ma zhig pa dang /
T03D3805:151a-21: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang bcas pa rnams kyi
T03D3805:151a-22: 'dus byas pas skye ba 'dzin pa'i nur nur po'i
T03D3805:151a-23: gnas skabs kyi phung po lnga'i nang du gtogs pa
T03D3805:151a-24: ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes te /
T03D3805:151a-26: de las rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs te /
T03D3805:151a-30: rnam par shes pa ni khyer zhes pas ni yang srid par skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:151a-31: gzugs ni nur nur po'i gnas skabs so //
T03D3805:151a-32: de las mig la sogs pa ni skye mched drug go //
T03D3805:151a-33: de las dbang po dang yul dang rnam par shes
T03D3805:151a-34: pa rnams 'dus nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por
T03D3805:151a-35: gnas pa rnams phan tshun du rig nas tshor ba
T03D3805:151a-36: dang bskyed pa la mngon du byed pa ni rig
T03D3805:151a-37: pa'o // de las bde ba la sogs pa'i tshor ba'o //
T03D3805:151a-38: de las mngon par 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yang
T03D3805:151a-39: srid pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ngo bo ni
T03D3805:151a-40: srid pa'o // de las 'dod pa dang /
T03D3805:151a-43: brtul zhugs kyi bdag nyid kyi dngos po len pa'i
T03D3805:151a-44: dbye ba dga' ba'i ngo bo'i ngo bo de dang
T03D3805:151a-45: bral bar ma gyur zhes pa la sogs pa'i rnam
T03D3805:151b-0: pa bzhis khyad par gyi srid pa la mngon @151b
T03D3805:151b-1: par 'dod pa'i ngo bo ni nye bar len pa'o
T03D3805:151b-2: // de las 'du byed pa'i sa bon ma rig pa dang /
T03D3805:151b-4: len pas mi slu bas skye ba skyed pa la mngon par phyogs pas srid pa'o //
T03D3805:151b-6: ming dang gzugs kyis rim gyis skye ba'o //
T03D3805:151b-7: des rga shi la sogs pa'o zhes phan tshun gyi rgyun can gyi yan lag bcu gnyis te /
T03D3805:151b-8: de ni gang zhig 'chi ba'i bar ma dor yang mi 'gyur zhing /
T03D3805:151b-9: rdzus te skye ba la yang mi 'gyur la /
T03D3805:151b-10: gzugs dang gzugs med par yang ma yin no //
T03D3805:151b-11: de la yan lag dang po gnyis ni skye ba snga ma'i'o //
T03D3805:151b-12: bar gyi brgyad po ni da ltar byung ba'i skye ba'i'o //
T03D3805:151b-13: skye ba dang rga shi ni ma 'ongs pa'i skye
T03D3805:151b-14: ba'i 'o zhes pa ni snga ma dang phyi ma
T03D3805:151b-15: dang bar ma rnams su rnam par gzhag pa ni
T03D3805:151b-16: kun tu rmongs pa med pa ni mi 'jug go
T03D3805:151b-17: // dang po dang gzhan brgyad pa dang dgu pa ni nyon mongs pa'o //
T03D3805:151b-18: gnyis pa dang bcu pa ni las kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa'o //
T03D3805:151b-19: lhag ma ni skye ba'i nyon mongs pa'o //
T03D3805:151b-20: nyon mongs pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis las dang skye ba kun tu 'phen la /
T03D3805:151b-21: bden pa mthong ba ni bden pas las dang yang
T03D3805:151b-22: srid pa mi 'phan pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni
T03D3805:151b-23: yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i rten cing 'byung ba'o //
T03D3805:151b-24: nyon mongs pa las dang skye ba'i rgyun gyi ngo bo'i 'khor ba la thog ma med de /
T03D3805:151b-25: thog ma yod na thog ma la rgyu med ba can du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:151b-26: tha ma ni rgyu zad pas rigs te /
T03D3805:151b-27: sa bon zad pas myu gu bzhin te /
T03D3805:151b-28: skye ba ni rgyu la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:151b-29: de'i phyir sangs rgyas so sor bskyed pa'i stong pa dang /
T03D3805:151b-30: snying rje ro gcig pa'i byang chub kyi bdag nyid
T03D3805:151b-31: kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan
T03D3805:151b-32: nyid can gyi ma rig pa'i gnyen po bsgoms pas
T03D3805:151b-33: ma rig pa rim gyis zad nas 'khor ba pa'i
T03D3805:151b-34: sems can grangs med pa yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3805:151b-35: 'da' ba'i phyir thams cad rgyun chad pa nyid du
T03D3805:151b-36: 'gyur te / 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes lung las gsungs te /
T03D3805:151b-37: 'dir ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed ces pa nas ji srid du skye ba dang /
T03D3805:151b-44: de la phung po yongs su smin pa ni rgas pa'o //
T03D3805:152a-0: @152a * // phung po rnying pa zhig pa shi ba'o //
T03D3805:152a-1: shi bar gyur pa las rmongs pas mngon par chags pas snying mi bde ba ni mya ngan no //
T03D3805:152a-2: mya ngan gyis kun nas bslangs nas ngag tu 'don pa ni smre sngags so //
T03D3805:152a-3: dbang po rnams mi gsal ba ni sdug bsngal lo //
T03D3805:152a-4: yid la gcags pa ni yid mi bde ba'o //
T03D3805:152a-5: sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba las byung ba ni 'khrug pa ste /
T03D3805:152a-10: shes pa de ni bsgom pas so //
T03D3805:152a-11: mod phal cher yang lugs las bzlog pa gsungs te /
T03D3805:152a-12: skye ba 'gags pas rga shi la sogs pa 'gag ces pa nas ji srid du /
T03D3805:152a-13: ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag ces pa la sogs pa ni lugs las bzlog pa'o //
T03D3805:152a-14: yang dag par bskul ba ni yang dag par 'dzin pa la'o //
T03D3805:152a-15: bsngags pa brjod pa'i yon tan brjod pa'o //
T03D3805:152a-16: mthun par dka' ba'i rjes su mthun pas so zhes pa ni rtse mor gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:152a-17: rang bzhin rten can bden shes pa'i //
T03D3805:152a-18: chos mchog de bzhin sems can rnams //
T03D3805:152a-19: smin byed sogs kyis shes par bya //
T03D3805:152a-20: zhes pa bstan bcos las te /
T03D3805:152a-22: de bzhin du bden pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:152a-23: sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i yul rnams la
T03D3805:152a-24: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes
T03D3805:152a-27: bsgom pa rnams la rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs
T03D3805:152a-28: pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i bya ba
T03D3805:152a-29: la ji srid du yang dag par bskul ba la
T03D3805:152a-30: sogs pa nas byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
T03D3805:152a-32: de ltar sems can zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:152a-33: de ltar bzod par gyur pa dang chos mchog tu gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:152a-34: de ltar 'dod cing zhes pa la sogs pas nges
T03D3805:152a-35: par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams kyi 'bras
T03D3805:152a-36: bu gsungs pa'o // de bzhin nyid gtso bor bstan pa'i le'u ni de bzhin nyid kyi le'u'o //
T03D3805:152a-37: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:152a-38: brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od
T03D3805:152a-39: ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung
T03D3805:152a-40: gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u bcu drug pa'o
T03D3805:152b-0: / // / tshogs kyi @152b dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:152b-1: nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung ste //
T03D3805:152b-2: mthong dang bsgom pa'i lam dag la //
T03D3805:152b-3: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas //
T03D3805:152b-4: de 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs //
T03D3805:152b-5: zhes te phyir ldog par 'gyur ba ni phyir ldog pa la /
T03D3805:152b-6: de ltar ma yin zhes pa ni phyir mi ldog pa ste /
T03D3805:152b-7: phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun no //
T03D3805:152b-8: 'dir dbang po rab kyi byang chub sems dpa' ni
T03D3805:152b-9: tshogs kyi sa nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:152b-10: tu phyin pa nges pa dang snying rje chen po
T03D3805:152b-11: la sbyar nas tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed pa la
T03D3805:152b-12: / rtag par mngon par sbyor bar dga' bas phyir mi ldog pa can no //
T03D3805:152b-13: dbang po 'bring ni rab tu dga' ba las sngon
T03D3805:152b-14: du de'i nges pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:152b-15: ro // dbang po rtul pos ni yang sa brgyad
T03D3805:152b-16: pa la sngon du bla na med pa'i de kho
T03D3805:152b-17: na nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i bya ba la
T03D3805:152b-18: nges par brtan po med pa'i ldog pa'i dogs pa
T03D3805:152b-20: nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung zhes pa ni tshogs
T03D3805:152b-21: kyi lam la shin tu mi zad pa'i nges pa
T03D3805:152b-22: can la ltos nas gsungs pas mngon par 'dod pa
T03D3805:152b-23: ni tshogs kyi sa la yang ste /
T03D3805:152b-24: sogs zhes pa mthar med kyang dngos po la rnam
T03D3805:152b-25: par brtags nas mthar gnas pa nyid pas phyir mi
T03D3805:152b-26: ldog pa'i rigs phyir mi ldog pa can de rnam
T03D3805:152b-27: pa bzhi ste / rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T03D3805:152b-28: 'byung ba shin tu de la srid pas zhes pa
T03D3805:152b-31: gzugs la sogs las ldog sogs rtags //
T03D3805:152b-32: rnam pa nyi shu bskyed pa yis //
T03D3805:152b-33: nges 'byed yan lag la gnas pa'i //
T03D3805:152b-34: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid ni //
T03D3805:152b-35: zhes te 'dir ni phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa'i rtags rnams te /
T03D3805:152b-36: gzugs la sogs las ldog pa dang //
T03D3805:152b-37: the tshom mi dal zad pa dang //
T03D3805:152b-38: bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing //
T03D3805:152b-39: gzhan dag de la 'dzud pa dang //
T03D3805:152b-40: gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang //
T03D3805:152b-41: zab mo'i don la som nyi med //
T03D3805:152b-42: byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni //
T03D3805:152b-43: rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang //
T03D3805:152b-44: bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang //
T03D3805:152b-45: dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang //
T03D3805:152b-46: gos la sogs pa gtsang ba dang //
T03D3805:152b-47: lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung //
T03D3805:152b-48: gya gyu med sems sbyangs pa ni //
T03D3805:153a-0: @153a * // len dang ser sna med pa dang //
T03D3805:153a-1: chos nyid ldan bar 'gro nyid dang //
T03D3805:153a-2: sems can don du dmyal tshol dang //
T03D3805:153a-3: gzhan gyis bkri bar mi 'dod dang //
T03D3805:153a-4: lam gzhan nye bar ston 'dud la //
T03D3805:153a-5: 'dud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang //
T03D3805:153a-6: sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste //
T03D3805:153a-7: rtags ni nyi shu de rnams kyis //
T03D3805:153a-8: drod dang rtse mo bzod pa dang //
T03D3805:153a-9: chos mchog rnams la gnas pa ni //
T03D3805:153a-10: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog / ces pa bstan bcos las te /
T03D3805:153a-13: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:153a-14: 'di rnams kyis rnam par byed cing gsal par byed pas na rnam pa la /
T03D3805:153a-15: 'di rnams kyis mtshon par byed pas na rtags so //
T03D3805:153a-16: 'di rnams kyis gsal bar byed cing brtag par byed ce na mtshan ma ste /
T03D3805:153a-17: don gcig kyang gsum po rnams kyis brjod pa ni
T03D3805:153a-18: don dag gzhan gyi dogs pa gcod pa'i don du'am
T03D3805:153a-19: rnam grangs kyis bshad pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:153a-20: gang gi phyir ni gnyis su med pa ste /
T03D3805:153a-21: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi chos rnams thams cad
T03D3805:153a-22: ni don dam pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid
T03D3805:153a-23: de / de bzhin nyid la ni gcig pa nyid dang gnyis dang mang po med pa ste /
T03D3805:153a-24: de'i phyir na de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su med
T03D3805:153a-25: pas dbyer med pa dang gnyis su byar med pas
T03D3805:153a-26: ma bcad pa'o // rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo dang bral bas rtog pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:153a-27: rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:153a-28: de ltar zhes pa ni de ltar de bzhin nyid
T03D3805:153a-29: mtshan nyid du gnas shing de bzhin nyid dang ro
T03D3805:153a-31: mi rtog pa ni yang dag par ro //
T03D3805:153a-32: rnam par mi rtog pa ni phyin ci log tu'o //
T03D3805:153a-33: thos nas kyang zhes pa ni thos pa'i rjes la'o //
T03D3805:153a-34: song nas zhes pa ni dus phyis kyang ste /
T03D3805:153a-35: nem nur mi byed pa ni gnod par mi byed pa'o //
T03D3805:153a-36: yid gnyis mi byed pa zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:153a-37: rnam pa sna tshogs blo ni yid gnyis te ;
T03D3805:153a-38: de nyid mi byed ces pa'o //
T03D3805:153a-40: the tshom mi byed ces pa dang /
T03D3805:153a-41: rmongs par mi byed ces pas ni mi bsgrub pa dgag pa'o //
T03D3805:153a-42: de kho na nyid ltar zhes pa ni thams cad don dam par te /
T03D3805:153a-43: kun rdzob tu ni gzugs la sogs pa de ltar lhag par mos shing ste dad pas so //
T03D3805:153b-0: @153b khong du chud par byed pas ni shes rab kyis so //
T03D3805:153b-1: 'di rnams de ltar shes pa ni gtso che ba'i rtags te /
T03D3805:153b-2: 'di'i yongs su gcod pa gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:153b-3: mi lta zhes pa la sogs pa ste de ltar de nyid la de dag ces te /
T03D3805:153b-4: gzugs la sogs pa la ldog pa'i rtags shes pa'o //
T03D3805:153b-5: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:153b-6: gzhan dag ste chos 'di la phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:153b-7: ngor blta ba ni gus par blta ba'o //
T03D3805:153b-8: shes pa ni 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis so //
T03D3805:153b-9: mthong ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pas so //
T03D3805:153b-10: sbyin pa ni gus par sbyin pa'o //
T03D3805:153b-11: mi rten pa ni rten nam skyabs su 'gro ba ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:153b-12: de'i bden pa dang dkon mchog rnams la yid gnyis
T03D3805:153b-13: the tshom zad par gyur pas 'di rnams thams cad
T03D3805:153b-14: mi byed pa'o zhes pa ni the tshom zad pa'i
T03D3805:153b-15: rtags so // rab 'byor yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:153b-16: ngan song ste dmyal ba dang /
T03D3805:153b-18: dud 'gro ni ngan song gis gzung la /
T03D3805:153b-20: lha tshe ring por skyes pa dang /
T03D3805:153b-21: sangs rgyas kyi gsung mi thos pa dang /
T03D3805:153b-23: dbang po ma tshang ba'i mtshan nyid kyis mi khom
T03D3805:153b-24: pa rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pa ni dud med
T03D3805:153b-25: kyi dngos po ste bud med nyid phal cher gzhan
T03D3805:153b-26: gyi dbang du gyur pa nyid kyis dge ba'i las
T03D3805:153b-27: la mthu med pas mi khom pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:153b-28: mi khom pa zad pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:153b-29: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:153b-30: srog gcod pa ni srog chags gzhan dang srog chags su 'du shes pa dang /
T03D3805:153b-31: de la gsod par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3805:153b-33: de bsad pa'o zhes pa ni yan lag lngas so //
T03D3805:153b-34: rdzas gzhan gyis bdag tu byas pa la /
T03D3805:153b-35: bltas nas yid kyis bzung na mthus rku bas /
T03D3805:153b-36: de'i rgyu sems kyis gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa ni ma byin par len pa ste /
T03D3805:153b-38: der 'du shes pa dang de 'phrog par 'dod pa dang /

T03D3805:153b-45: de la mngon par bgrod par 'dod pa dang /
T03D3805:154a-1: dang bgrod pa'o zhes pa'i yan lag lngas so //

T03D3805:154a-37: rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kun gyis gsungs //

T03D3805:154b-19: phyir na las kyi lam bcu gcig tu ma bstan

T03D3805:157a-16: lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni //

T03D3805:157a-18: rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa dang //
T03D3805:157a-19: 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang //
T03D3805:157a-20: phung sogs bar chad med nyid dang //
T03D3805:157a-21: tshogs dang dbang sogs bcas pa yi //
T03D3805:157a-22: g-yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la //
T03D3805:157a-23: sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi //
T03D3805:157a-24: gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang //
T03D3805:157a-25: chos ni rdul tsam mi dmigs nyid //
T03D3805:157a-26: rang gi sa la nges pa nyid //
T03D3805:157a-27: sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang //
T03D3805:157a-28: chos kyi don du srog gtong ba //
T03D3805:157a-29: de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
T03D3805:157a-30: blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas kyi //
T03D3805:157a-31: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin //
T03D3805:157a-32: ces pa ste mtshan nyid kyi rtags rnam pa bcu drug la rim pa bzhin du gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:157a-33: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157a-34: 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ni 'dun pa dang /
T03D3805:157a-35: rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin no //
T03D3805:157a-36: chos ni gzugs la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:157a-37: mi skye ba shes pa'i bzod pa 'dis de ltar
T03D3805:157a-38: ro zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes
T03D3805:157a-39: las ldog pa'i sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod
T03D3805:157a-40: pa'i rtags so // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157a-41: 'dun pa zlog par byed pa ni 'dun pa dang bral bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:157a-42: shes par 'gyur zhes pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyis so //
T03D3805:157a-43: don med par nyon mongs pa ni byang chub kyi
T03D3805:157a-44: sems dang bral bar byed pa la kun tu sbyor
T03D3805:157a-45: ba'o // de la zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T03D3805:157a-46: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi nges pa
T03D3805:157a-47: brtan pas te sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i rtags
T03D3805:157b-0: ba'o // @157b so // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-1: de ltar ni theg pa dman pa la rnam par
T03D3805:157b-2: log pa'i sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i bzod
T03D3805:157b-3: pa'i rtags so // de dag 'dod na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-4: de ltar na bsam gtan la sogs pa'i yan lag yongs su zad pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-5: 'dod pa skye pa'i rnam par 'ching ba'i 'dod chags
T03D3805:157b-6: la sogs pa dang bral ba thob pas stobs chung
T03D3805:157b-7: ba ni sdug bsngal la rjes su shes pa'i rtags
T03D3805:157b-8: so // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-9: 'dir ming la ched cher byed pa ma yin zhes
T03D3805:157b-10: pa la sogs pa ni sems yang ba nyid pas
T03D3805:157b-11: so // de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba zhes pa
T03D3805:157b-12: la sogs pa can ni lus yang ba nyid do
T03D3805:157b-13: so // // de gnyi gas ni kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:157b-14: gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-15: ji skad du bshad pa nyid kyi rnam shes la
T03D3805:157b-16: thabs kyis des ldog pa ni 'dod pa la spyod
T03D3805:157b-17: pa dang thabs la mkhas pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-18: de ni chos shes pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:157b-19: don du mi gnyer zhes pa ni nges par yid bde ba bskyed pas dga' ba rnams la'o //
T03D3805:157b-20: shin tu bde ba skyed pa ni rang bzhin gyis
T03D3805:157b-21: dga' ba rnams la ste stong pa'i rang bzhin gyis
T03D3805:157b-22: so // mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa ni rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:157b-23: kun tu 'joms pa ni gnod pa'o //
T03D3805:157b-24: thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dad pa la sogs pa lnga rnams dang /
T03D3805:157b-25: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi po
T03D3805:157b-26: rnams mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bdun po
T03D3805:157b-27: rnams la / skyes bu dam pa la sogs pa'i tshig bcu drug po rnams der sbyar bar bya'o //
T03D3805:157b-28: gang du seng ge bzang pos mthong ba'i lam gyi
T03D3805:157b-29: skad cig ma bcu drug thob pa la go rims
T03D3805:157b-30: ji lta ba bzhin du skyes bu dam pa la
T03D3805:157b-31: sogs pa'i tshig bcu drug go zhes bshad de /
T03D3805:157b-32: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:157b-33: skad cig ma bdun pa'i bar du rtogs pa'i skabs su bab pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:157b-34: rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid ni rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:157b-35: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:157b-36: sngags kyi rigs pa ni sngags kyi khyad pa te /
T03D3805:157b-38: rtsi ni 'bras bu sbyin pa'i nang rnams so //
T03D3805:157b-39: lha mo'i sngags ni rigs pa'o //
T03D3805:157b-41: stsogs pas ni 'khrul 'khor dang rgyud la sogs pa can bzung ngo //
T03D3805:158a-2: rtsod pa ni ngag gi'o zhes pa ni 'tsho ba
T03D3805:158a-3: rnam par dag pa'i ste rjes su shes pa'i rtags
T03D3805:158a-4: so // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:158a-5: sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor bas rjes su sbyor ba ste /
T03D3805:158a-6: des lhan cig sbyor ba ste /
T03D3805:158a-7: 'di'i 'thad pa ni yum chen mor de ltar yang
T03D3805:158a-8: de stong pa nyid la gnas pas chos gang la
T03D3805:158a-9: yang dman pa'am khyad par can du yang dag par
T03D3805:158a-10: rjes su mi mthong zhes gsungs te /
T03D3805:158a-11: 'di rnams 'dir tshig gnyis kyis gsungs so //
T03D3805:158a-12: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs las 'byung ba nyid
T03D3805:158a-13: ni 'du 'dzi'i yul yin pa'i phyir te 'du 'dzi
T03D3805:158a-15: de nyid med pa nyid la gtam tsam yang med pa'i phyir gtam mo //
T03D3805:158a-16: khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir rgyal po'i la /
T03D3805:158a-17: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'gog pa'i de nyid gtam ste /
T03D3805:158a-18: mngon sum du ma byas pa nyid kyi gtam tsam gyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:158a-19: de ltar gtam gyi don ni 'dir ji ltar rigs
T03D3805:158a-20: pas so zhes pas ni phung po la sogs pa
T03D3805:158a-21: la sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la gnas
T03D3805:158a-22: pa dang bral ba'i phyir 'gog pa la chos shes
T03D3805:158a-24: rkun po zhes pa ni sgrib pa rnam pa lnga ste /
T03D3805:158a-25: dge ba'i nor 'phrog pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni chos shes pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:158a-26: dmag mi zhes pa ni dge ba'i chos kyi tshogs te rjes su shes pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:158a-27: 'thab mo ni de'i sde'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnams
T03D3805:158a-28: kyis gnod pa ste 'thabs na thob par 'gyur ba
T03D3805:158a-29: ni 'gog pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rnam par
T03D3805:158a-30: grol ba'o // de'i yang gnas gzhan du mi 'jug
T03D3805:158a-31: pa ni de'i phyir mig la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3805:158a-32: rnam par rtog pa med pas grong zhes pa la
T03D3805:158a-33: grol ba'o // sogs pa ste / grong ni mig la sogs pa lnga po ste /
T03D3805:158a-34: lus la dbang po bsags pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:158a-35: sems can gyi 'jig rten no zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:158a-36: grong khyer ni sems can rnams kyi rten yin pa'i phyir snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T03D3805:158a-37: grong rdal ni dbang pos nges par bgrod bya yin pa'i phyir yul lnga rnams so //
T03D3805:158a-38: ljongs la sogs pa ni snod kyi bye brag go //
T03D3805:158a-39: bdag dang bdag gi rnam par rtog pa zad par
T03D3805:158a-40: gyur pa ni thar pa'o zhes pa gsungs pa ni
T03D3805:158a-41: / bdag med ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:158a-42: 'di yang gong du bshad pa rnams kyi bye brag gi rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-0: dbang @158b po la sogs pa'i 'thab mo'i gtam gyi
T03D3805:158b-1: sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la gnas pa
T03D3805:158b-2: dang bral ba la rjes su shes pa'i rtags so
T03D3805:158b-3: // yum chen mor ni de sbyin pa la sogs
T03D3805:158b-4: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pas
T03D3805:158b-5: rjes su sbyor ba la sogs pas mi gnas so
T03D3805:158b-6: // zhes gsungs te / de la gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:158b-7: ma bral zhes pa la sogs pa ste shes rab
T03D3805:158b-8: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyi gtam ni
T03D3805:158b-9: so sor rtogs pa la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:158b-10: ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T03D3805:158b-11: mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi phyir 'thab mo ste /
T03D3805:158b-13: gnyen po'i phyir mtshang 'dru ba ste sbyin pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-14: de dag gnyi ga sems la rgyu ba'i stobs mnyam pa nyid ni rtsod pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-15: gang du gnyen pos mi mthun pa'i phyogs stobs chung bar byas pa ni rgol ba'o //
T03D3805:158b-16: mi 'byed pa ni mnyam pa nyid du shes pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-17: 'byed pa ni sna tshogs pa nyid kyi rnam par
T03D3805:158b-18: rtog pa'o zhes pa ste lam la chos shes pa'i
T03D3805:158b-19: bzod pa'o // gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:158b-20: gal te zhes pa ni 'dir snga nas te /

T03D3805:158b-22: ldog pa'am min pa'i chos rdul tsam yang yang dag
T03D3805:158b-23: par rjes su mi mthong ste /

T03D3805:158b-25: zhum pa ni spro ba dman pa nyid do //
T03D3805:158b-26: nem nur ni rnam pa thams cad du stong pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-27: rnam par sel ba ni dman par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-28: phyir mi ldog pa ni sems kyis bdag nyid phyir mi ldog pa nyid du nges pa'o //
T03D3805:158b-29: gzhan gyis bkri ba'i dbang du mi 'gro zhes pa
T03D3805:158b-30: ni rang nyid phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la brtan
T03D3805:158b-31: zhing nges pa ste chos shes pa'i rtags so //
T03D3805:158b-32: gal te yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:158b-33: 'di nyid ces pa ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
T03D3805:158b-34: gzhan du ma gsungs pa ni mkhas pa ni rig pa ste /
T03D3805:158b-35: drug cu rtsa bzhi'i cha rnams dang rgyu rig pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:158b-36: skar ma'i shes pa rnams so zhes pa ni don rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:158b-37: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
T03D3805:158b-38: chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid do zhes pa'o
T03D3805:158b-39: // sangs rgyas su byin gyis brlab pa ni sprul ba'o //
T03D3805:158b-40: gnyis su med ces pa ni de kho na nyid du'o //
T03D3805:158b-41: de ltar ni bdud kyi las so //
T03D3805:159a-0: skye ba med pa'i chos zhes te de ltar de bzhin gshegs @159a * //
T03D3805:159a-1: pas gsungs pa'i theg pa chen po las /
T03D3805:159a-2: gzhan ma yin pa nyid la bsgom pa dang ldan
T03D3805:159a-3: pa'i bdag nyid can gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
T03D3805:159a-4: byang chub par 'gyur zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:159a-5: gnas gsum ni sa gsum la /
T03D3805:159a-6: der mi gnas pa'i shin tu ba la bdud kyis
T03D3805:159a-7: kyang mi phyed par nges par ni rjes su shes
T03D3805:159a-9: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:159a-10: bdag yongs su gtong ba ni 'tshong ba la sogs pas so //
T03D3805:159a-11: srog yongs su gtong ba ni 'chi ba'o //
T03D3805:159a-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa'i chos ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid pa ste /
T03D3805:159a-13: de la rang dang gzhan gyis 'dzin pa'i phyir srog kyang gtong ba dang /
T03D3805:159a-14: de yang sangs rgyas rnams la ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3805:159a-15: du dga' ba dang gus pa chos la byed de
T03D3805:159a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'o zhes shes shing
T03D3805:159a-17: bdag nyid kyis kyang 'dod na sangs rgyas nyis mthong
T03D3805:159a-18: ba'i phyir ro // nyan thos kyi yang zhes pa
T03D3805:159a-19: ni nye bar mtshon pa ste byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3805:159a-20: yang lha la sogs pa'i yang ngo zhes pa ni
T03D3805:159a-21: chos kyi don du srog gtong ba ste rjes su
T03D3805:159a-23: phyir mi ldog pa ni rnam pa dang rtags dang
T03D3805:159a-24: mtshan ma bcu drug gsal bar byed pa'i le'u 'phags
T03D3805:159a-25: pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
T03D3805:159a-26: stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kye zla ba'i 'od ces
T03D3805:159a-27: bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas
T03D3805:159a-28: sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u bcu bdun pa'i 'grel
T03D3805:159a-30: / nges par 'byed pa dang mthong ba'i lam dag
T03D3805:159a-31: gi phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags grangs dang khyad par
T03D3805:159a-32: gyis bshad nas bsgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste
T03D3805:159a-33: de la gnyi gas kyang ji ltar brjod par mi
T03D3805:159a-35: bsgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste //
T03D3805:159a-36: zhes pa de la gsungs pa ste /
T03D3805:159a-37: gsol to zhes pa ni yon tan chen po'i tshogs te /
T03D3805:159a-38: mchog tu zab pa ste gang yang bskal pa grangs
T03D3805:159a-39: med pa gnyis su bar ma chad par 'bad pas
T03D3805:159a-40: thob ste / de'i phyir dang khyad par du shes par mi nus pa'i phyir na tshad med pa'o //
T03D3805:159a-41: kun tu brjod par mi nus pa'i phyir na dpag tu med pa'o //
T03D3805:159a-42: grangs las shin tu 'das pas mtha' yas pa'o //
T03D3805:159a-43: mchog tu rgya che ba'i phyir na mu med pa'o //
T03D3805:159a-44: mi 'phags pa ni yang dag par gzung du med pa'o //
T03D3805:159a-45: yang dag par shes par mi nus zhes pa ni
T03D3805:159b-0: bsgom @159b pa'i lam gyi zab pa nyid pas so
T03D3805:159b-1: // rab 'byor gyis gsol pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:159b-2: spyod de zhes pa ni bstan par nus kyang cung
T03D3805:159b-3: zhig sems can gyi don du mi 'gyur ro zhes
T03D3805:159b-5: thams cad zab ces pa ni khyab pa'i don to //
T03D3805:159b-6: gnas zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi dmigs pa la'o //
T03D3805:159b-7: bstan du gsol zhes pa ni gsal bar brjod pa zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:159b-8: brtsams pa ni bstan par bya ba la'o //
T03D3805:159b-9: shes par 'dod pa ni bsgom pa'i lam la sbyor bar 'dod pa ste /
T03D3805:159b-11: zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs //
T03D3805:159b-12: zab pa de ni sgro 'dogs dang //
T03D3805:159b-13: skur ba'i mtha' las grol ba nyid //
T03D3805:159b-15: lam gyi zab pa dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
T03D3805:159b-16: sogs pas zab mo zhes pa la dgongs pa ste
T03D3805:159b-18: zab ces pa ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo
T03D3805:159b-19: nyid med pa stong pa nyid la de nyid mtshan
T03D3805:159b-21: de nyid rig pas mtshan ma'i sgro btags pa 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-22: de nyid smon pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:159b-23: de rig pas khams gsum pa la smon pa med do //
T03D3805:159b-24: de nyid ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa ste
T03D3805:159b-25: de rnams kyi yang srid par 'gyur ba'i las mi
T03D3805:159b-27: de nyid ma byung ste de rnams su las kyis mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-28: de nyid ni skye ba med pa ste de rnams
T03D3805:159b-29: la rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa des shes
T03D3805:159b-30: pa'i phyir ro // de nyid dngos po med pa ste /
T03D3805:159b-31: rdzas su med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-32: de nyid ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ste /
T03D3805:159b-33: de rigs pas nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal kun tu 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-34: de nyid 'gog pa ste de rnams su yang srid pa 'gog pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-35: de nyid ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3805:159b-36: de rnams kyi bag chags yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:159b-37: de nyid bral ba ste de rnams kyi zag pa
T03D3805:159b-38: dang bcas pa'i phung po dang mchog tu bral ba'o
T03D3805:159b-39: zhes pa'i stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i'o //
T03D3805:159b-40: rab 'byor gyis gsol ba 'debs shing 'dri ba ni
T03D3805:159b-41: chos rnams ni stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:159b-42: kyi'o // chos thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:159b-43: byis pa la gzung bya gzugs la sogs pa ji
T03D3805:159b-44: ltar zab pa 'di rang nyid kyis 'dri ba ni
T03D3805:160a-0: gang la zhes pa ni gang du gzugs la sogs @160a * //
T03D3805:160a-1: ba'i de bzhin nyid de gzugs la sogs pa rten
T03D3805:160a-2: cing 'brel ba las skye bar byed pa ni kun
T03D3805:160a-3: rdzob la de nyid don dam par ni yod pa
T03D3805:160a-4: ma yin te / 'dir gzugs la sogs pa'i zab
T03D3805:160a-5: pa nyid ni zhib mo mkhas pa rnams kyis rig
T03D3805:160a-6: par bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa rnams las
T03D3805:160a-8: de rnams la sgyu ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa rnams bzhin du /
T03D3805:160a-9: bden pa nyid du sgro btags pa rnams med pa'i
T03D3805:160a-10: phyir ro zhes pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' las
T03D3805:160a-12: mya ngan las 'das pa yang bstan zhes pa ni
T03D3805:160a-13: rten cing 'brel pa las skyes pa rnams kyi de
T03D3805:160a-14: rnams bzhin du yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo
T03D3805:160a-15: bo rnams su yod pa nyid la /
T03D3805:160a-16: don dam par ni stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pas /

T03D3805:160a-18: skur ba'i mtha' las grol ba nyid do zhes pa ni stong pa nyid zab pa'o //
T03D3805:160a-19: de'i lam gsungs pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:160a-20: nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i //

T03D3805:160a-23: 'jal dang nges rtog bsgom pa'i lam //
T03D3805:160a-24: zhes te myur ba ni rgyun la'o //

T03D3805:160a-26: bo'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi stong pa nyid la sogs
