T03D3805:163b-4: rten cing 'brel ba las 'byung ba'i sems nyid la de bzhin nyid ces brjod do //
T03D3805:163b-5: de bzhin nyid las gzhan du zhes pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pas so //
T03D3805:163b-6: ma lags pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa ni ldog pa'i dbye ba tsam gyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:163b-7: de nyid la de bzhin nyid du tha mi dad
T03D3805:163b-8: pa dang tha dad pa med par sems kyis shes
T03D3805:163b-9: par bya'i zhes pa ni shes bya zab pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-10: yang dag par zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:163b-11: ma lags zhes pa ni de bzhin nyid kyi ngo
T03D3805:163b-12: bo nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin
T03D3805:163b-13: nyid du de kho na nyid yang dag par rjes
T03D3805:163b-15: 'di mthong ba med pa nyid mthong ba ni shes pa thab pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-16: zab pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la'o //
T03D3805:163b-17: yang dag par spyod pa ni dmigs pa'i rgyu mtshan la'o //
T03D3805:163b-18: mi 'jug pa ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:163b-19: yang dag par spyod pa med par 'gyur pa ni snang bar mi 'gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-20: de'i phyir chos des thams cad du spyod pa ni spyod pa zab pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-21: mtshan ma zhes pa ni gnyis kyi mtshan ma la 'am gnyis med pa'i mtshan ma la'o //
T03D3805:163b-22: mtshan ma ni gnyis dang gnyis med pa'i mtshan ma'i 'byung bar 'gyur ba ma zhig pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-23: ma lags zhes pa ni 'di nyid spangs zhes pa'i
T03D3805:163b-24: don to zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa zab
T03D3805:163b-25: pa'o // ji ltar zhes pa ni cung zhig go //
T03D3805:163b-26: mtshan ma spangs zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3805:163b-27: rnams yongs su ma rdzogs par zhes pa la dgongs
T03D3805:163b-28: pa'o // 'di nyid du zhes pa ni skye ba 'di nyid la'o //
T03D3805:163b-29: mtshan nyid gang zhes pa ni gang zhig chos kyi mtshan ma dang /
T03D3805:163b-30: gang yang chos nyid kyi mtshan ma de thams cad shes pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-31: mtshan ma med pa la yang zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings la'o //
T03D3805:163b-32: yongs su 'dris pa ni goms pa tsam byed pa'o zhes pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'i zab pa'o //
T03D3805:163b-33: de la zab pa brgyad pa ni byang chub la ring la lhag ma rnams ni nye ba ste /
T03D3805:163b-35: chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir //
T03D3805:163b-36: srid dang zhi bar mi rtog la //
T03D3805:163b-37: zhes te mi slob pa'i dge 'dun gyis mtshan nyid
T03D3805:163b-38: yongs su gsal bar byed pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang
T03D3805:164a-1: 'das pa mnyam pa nyid ces 'phags pa rnam par grol sdes bshad de /
T03D3805:164a-3: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:164a-4: bsgom pa'i lam gyi yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam
T03D3805:164a-5: par rtog pa med pa ni nyon mongs pa dang
T03D3805:164a-6: 'dra ba'i phyir na nyon mongs pa la langs pa'i
T03D3805:164a-7: tshe ni ye shes la rmi lam lta bu'i phyir
T03D3805:164a-9: 'di nyid nyin mo'i shin tu goms pas ni rmi
T03D3805:164a-10: lam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:164a-12: rnam par rtog pa la bye brag ste rnam par
T03D3805:164a-13: rtog pa med pa la ni bye brag med do
T03D3805:164a-14: // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:164a-15: ma gos pa la zhes pa ni bsgom pa'i lam
T03D3805:164a-16: la goms pas so zhes pa ni 'khor ba dang
T03D3805:164a-17: // / mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid do //
T03D3805:164a-18: sh'a ri'i bu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:164a-19: 'dir rmi lam dang sad pa ni grags pa kho na gsungs par bya'o //
T03D3805:164a-20: chos rnams rmi lam lta bu nyid ni dper na
T03D3805:164a-21: rmi lam du sbyin pa dang rnam par 'tshe ba
T03D3805:164a-22: la sogs pa rnams la bsod nams dang sdig pa
T03D3805:164a-23: mi 'byung ba de bzhin du sad pa na yang
T03D3805:164a-24: mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni rgal ba la gal
T03D3805:164a-25: te gnyid log pa'i las dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i
T03D3805:164a-26: phyir legs par sad do zhes pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:164a-27: sad pa'i rnam par rtog pas byas na ni sad
T03D3805:164a-28: pa la yang 'bras bu dang bcas par 'gyur la
T03D3805:164a-29: ngas legs par sad do zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:164a-30: sad pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyid kyis dmigs pa'i
T03D3805:164a-31: phyir shin tu yang bras bu dang bcas pa'o zhes
T03D3805:164a-32: pa'i lan no // sad pa'i gnas skabs su yang
T03D3805:164a-33: dngos po rmi lam lta bu la de dang rjes
T03D3805:164a-34: su mthun pa'i don du dngos po la sogs par
T03D3805:164a-35: mngon par zhen pa rnams kyi dge ba la sogs
T03D3805:164a-36: pa rnam par gzhag pa ste cung zhig gnyid log
T03D3805:164a-37: pa ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu nyid kyis mi gsal zhes
T03D3805:164a-38: 'khrul pas 'bras bu chung bar bsgrubs la /
T03D3805:164a-39: rmi lam du yang las dang 'bras bu'i dngos por
T03D3805:164a-40: bden pa ni dge slong la sogs pa med pa'i
T03D3805:164a-42: bslab pa byin pa can bzhin du sdom pa dang
T03D3805:164a-43: sdom pa ma yin pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:164a-44: kyis bcas pa'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag par byas
T03D3805:164a-45: pa'i phyir ro // zad pa'i 'du shes zhes pa
T03D3805:164a-46: ni zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa la
T03D3805:164a-47: pa'i phyir ro // / de'i 'du shes pa ni 'dzin pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-0: yang dag pa'i @164b don du brtags pa ni brtags pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-1: phyin ci log tu brtags pas ni rnam par rtog
T03D3805:164b-2: pa'o de bzhin du zhes pa ste nam mkha' bzhin
T03D3805:164b-3: du'am / de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du'o //
T03D3805:164b-4: sems dang sems pa dang blo dang rnam par rtog pa zhes pa rnams ni don gcig go //
T03D3805:164b-5: dben pa zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:164b-6: phyin ci log ni blos yod pa ma yin pa
T03D3805:164b-7: nyid la mtshan mar byas shing dmigs par byas nas
T03D3805:164b-8: so // lus kyis mngon sum du byed ces pa
T03D3805:164b-9: ni lus kyi gnas des gzhan du mi 'jug nas
T03D3805:164b-10: lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa can ni lus
T03D3805:164b-12: don 'di zhes pa ni rgol ba 'di rnams kyi'o //
T03D3805:164b-13: lan 'don pa ni lan btab pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-14: chos gang zhes pa ni byams pa'i 'dri bar bya ba la lan ldon par bya ba'o //
T03D3805:164b-15: chos gang gis ni tshig gis so //
T03D3805:164b-16: chos gang ni sh'a ri'i bu'i'o //
T03D3805:164b-17: 'jigs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ni sdang ba'o //
T03D3805:164b-18: kun tu byung nas skrag pa ni kun tu skrag pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-19: de'i rgyun ni kun tu skrag pa dang ldan pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-20: stobs bskyed pa ni bsgom pa la zhes pas bag chags rgyas pa ste /
T03D3805:164b-22: las med la sogs klan ka yi //
T03D3805:164b-23: lan ni ji skad bshad par zad //
T03D3805:164b-24: ces pa ni 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:164b-25: pa mnyam pa nyid la brgal ba dang lan rnams
T03D3805:164b-26: te / de ltar bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:164b-27: sems can 'jig rten ji bzhin du //
T03D3805:164b-28: snod kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa //
T03D3805:164b-29: de la dag par bsgrub pa yi //
T03D3805:164b-30: sangs rgyas zhing ni dag pa nyid //
T03D3805:164b-31: ces te bstan pa gcig la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:164b-32: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ste sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten dag pa'o //
T03D3805:164b-33: de'i yongs su dag pa ni gang zhes na /
T03D3805:164b-34: ma dag pa ni gcan gzan gyi dgon pa la sogs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:164b-35: mtho dman la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi la /
T03D3805:164b-36: de rnams la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:164b-37: bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rnam par thams cad du de ltar ma gyur ces pa ni /
T03D3805:164b-38: bgrod dka' ba'i sa'i dgon pa dang /
T03D3805:164b-39: gcan gzan rnams kyi dgon pa dang /
T03D3805:164b-40: chus spangs pas chu'i dgon pa dang /
T03D3805:164b-41: gal te 'dod pa'i sgra ni gang gi don du'o //
T03D3805:165a-2: dri zhim pa dang ro zhim dang //
T03D3805:165a-3: bsil dang yang dang dangs pa dang //
T03D3805:165a-4: gtsang dang mgrin pa bde ba dang //
T03D3805:165a-5: lto bar nad mi byed ces pa'i //
T03D3805:165a-6: chu ni yan lag brgyad srid pa'o //
T03D3805:165a-7: bde ba dang phrad pa ni bde ba dang sbyor bas so //
T03D3805:165a-8: bde ba dang ldan pas ni kun tu phan pas
T03D3805:165a-9: 'di rnams la zhes pa ni bde ba dang ldan
T03D3805:165a-10: pa'o // thams cad du ni kun la'o //
T03D3805:165a-11: nad kyi dgon pa la ni nad kyis nye bar 'tshe ba'o //
T03D3805:165a-12: 'di ltar zhes pa ni sems kyi skad cig gzhal
T03D3805:165a-13: na sngon ni 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas mtha' med
T03D3805:165a-14: pa ste / de kho na nyid du ngo bo
T03D3805:165a-15: nyid med pa cha shas med pa'i skad cig ma'i
T03D3805:165a-16: mtha' ni yod pa ma yin pa'o //
T03D3805:165a-17: mang zhes pa ni gang dag gis don med par 'gyur ba rnams so //
T03D3805:165a-18: sngon gyi mtha' med pas gang du mngon par byang
T03D3805:165a-19: chub par 'gyur ba'o zhes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3805:165a-21: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165a-22: chags pa med par zhen pa ni ma rig par ro //
T03D3805:165a-23: bar snang gi nam mkha' la zhes pa ni 'di nyid nam mkha' 'ba' tshig la'o //
T03D3805:165a-24: yongs su grub pa ni yongs su grub pa bzhin du dbang du gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:165a-25: nges pa ni tshad chad pas so //
T03D3805:165a-26: ma legs pa ni sdug bsngal lo //
T03D3805:165a-27: sring mo gang g'a'i lha mo'i kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o /
T03D3805:165a-29: // / thabs la mkhas pa brgyad par bshad pa'i bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:165a-30: de yi yul dang sbyor ba dang //
T03D3805:165a-31: dgra rnams las ni 'das pa dang //
T03D3805:165a-32: mi gnas ji bzhin shugs dang ni //
T03D3805:165a-33: thun mongs ma yin mtshan nyid dang //
T03D3805:165a-34: ma chags pa dang mi dmigs dang //
T03D3805:165a-35: mtshan ma smon dang zad pa dang //
T03D3805:165a-36: de yi rtags dang tshad med pa //
T03D3805:165a-37: thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa bcu //
T03D3805:165a-38: zhes te thabs la mkhas pa 'di'i yul dang /
T03D3805:165a-39: de'i sbyor ba la dang po goms pa la dgra
T03D3805:165a-40: rnams las shin tu 'das pa la sogs pa'i dbye
T03D3805:165a-41: ba bcu ste / gang dag gi mtshan ma dang
T03D3805:165a-42: smon lam zad par byas pa la de bzhin du
T03D3805:165a-43: ba bcu ste / bshad de / mtshan ma zad
T03D3805:165a-44: pa dang smon lam zad pa de la gsungs pa
T03D3805:165a-45: ba bcu ste / bshad de / ni / de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165a-46: stong pa nyid la zhes pa ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la'o //
T03D3805:165a-48: de la ni stong pa nyid la'o //
T03D3805:165b-0: chos nyid @165b ni chos kyi rang bzhin la /
T03D3805:165b-1: chos nyid kyis ni chos kyi snying pos so //
T03D3805:165b-2: stong pa nyid kho na sgrib pa med pa nyid
T03D3805:165b-3: pas dri ma med pas yang dag pa'i mtha'o zhes
T03D3805:165b-4: pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'i yul lo //
T03D3805:165b-5: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165b-6: mnyam par ma bzhag pa nyid ces pa ni mngon
T03D3805:165b-7: sum du bya bar des dmigs pa med pa la
T03D3805:165b-9: dmigs pa las ni de nyid la'o //
T03D3805:165b-10: bar skabs der zhes pa ni ji srid du 'dis
T03D3805:165b-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su ma smin pa'i bar
T03D3805:165b-12: du'o // bsten pa ni nye bar sgrub pa nyid
T03D3805:165b-13: kyis so zhes pa ni thabs la mkhas pa'i sbyor
T03D3805:165b-14: du'o // ba'o // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165b-15: dpa' ba ni 'jigs pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-17: brtan pa ni rab tu gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-18: spobs pa ni mngon par sems pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-19: sgrub pa ni rjes su gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-20: gang gi dus la sogs pa gang dang ldan pa de shes pas dus la sogs pa shes pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-21: rtogs pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems sbyangs pa nyid can no //
T03D3805:165b-22: des song ba ni thob pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-23: mtshon cha ni sgrib yol dang go cha la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-24: dran pa ni mi brjed pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-25: blo gros ni mngon par 'jal ba'o //
T03D3805:165b-28: chos lugs ni chos lugs shes pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-29: 'jigs pa med pa ni mkhas pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-30: de ltar dgra bo nyid ni phyir rgol ba bar
T03D3805:165b-31: chad byed pa de rnams las 'das pa ni tshad
T03D3805:165b-32: med bzhi rnams kyis zhes pa ni thabs la mkhas
T03D3805:165b-33: pa dang po'o // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165b-36: de la yang mi rten mi gnas pa ni der yang mi gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:165b-37: der yang mi gnas pa ni gnas der mi gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:165b-38: stong pa nyid la sogs par mi ltung zhing mi
T03D3805:165b-39: gnas zhes pa'i don to zhes pa ni mi gnas
T03D3805:165b-40: pa'i thabs so // 'di lta ste dper na zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:165b-41: mda' steng du 'phangs pa nyid la mda' gzhan dag gis phul bas yun ring du mi ltung ste /
T03D3805:165b-42: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su ma smin bar du mngon sum du mi byed la /
T03D3805:165b-43: sems la sems gzhan gyi shugs de las mi 'da'
T03D3805:165b-44: bas 'phel ba ni ji ltar shugs kyi thabs so
T03D3805:166a-0: // de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang zhes pa la @166a * //
T03D3805:166a-2: spyod pa ni zhi gnas kyis so //
T03D3805:166a-3: gnas pa ni lhag mthong gis so //
T03D3805:166a-4: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog pa ni gnyi gas so //
T03D3805:166a-5: bdag gis zhes pa ni nga yis so //
T03D3805:166a-6: mngon par sgrub pa ni nges par rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-7: ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste /
T03D3805:166a-8: grol ba'i sgo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:166a-9: sems bskyed pa ni sems mngon par sgrub pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-10: des 'di ltar ni dka' ba spyod pa po'o //
T03D3805:166a-11: 'di nyid ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i thabs so //
T03D3805:166a-12: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:166a-13: yod pa ni chos thams cad don dam par yod pa nyid du'o //
T03D3805:166a-14: de'i 'du shes ni sgro btags pas te /
T03D3805:166a-15: yod pa sgro btags nas zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-16: de spong ba ni sems can rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-17: chos bstan par bya'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i sgro btags pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-18: de nyid ni dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sogs
T03D3805:166a-19: par kun tu sems pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la
T03D3805:166a-21: de dang sbyor ba ni ma chags pa'i thabs so //
T03D3805:166a-22: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:166a-23: chos kyi 'du shes ni phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i sgro btags pa'o //
T03D3805:166a-24: de nyid ni dmigs pa la stong pa nyid la
T03D3805:166a-25: sogs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la ni dmigs pa
T03D3805:166a-26: med pa ste / de dang sbyor ba ni mi dmigs pa'i thabs so //
T03D3805:166a-27: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste bud med
T03D3805:166a-28: dang skyes pa dang gzugs dang sgra zhes pa ni
T03D3805:166a-29: de ltar mtshan ma'i 'du shes la mtshan ma med
T03D3805:166a-30: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni mtshan ma med pa
T03D3805:166a-31: ste / de dang sbyor ba ni mtshan ma med pa'i thabs so //
T03D3805:166a-32: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:166a-33: lha dang brgya byin dang 'khor los sgyur bar bya'o
T03D3805:166a-34: zhes pa la sogs pa srid pa'i longs spyod la
T03D3805:166a-35: dga' ba ni smon pa la /
T03D3805:166a-36: de'i rtsa ba can gyi phyin ci log rnams la
T03D3805:166a-37: smon pa med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ni smon
T03D3805:166a-39: de dang sbyor ba ni smon pa med pa'i thabs so //
T03D3805:166a-40: gang de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste mi
T03D3805:166a-41: dmigs pa la sogs pa'i thabs kyis rnam par thar
T03D3805:166a-42: ba'i sgo gsum gyi yul brjod nas rigs pas 'di
T03D3805:166a-43: rnams mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la sogs
T03D3805:166b-0: pas lhag par yul du byed na don @166b yod
T03D3805:166b-1: par byed pas de brjod par rigs zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:166b-2: mngon par 'du byed pa med par lhung zhes pa ni dman pa'i byang chub dag tu'o //
T03D3805:166b-4: 'di skad ces zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:166b-5: 'dri bar byas zhes pa ni mkhas pa la'o //
T03D3805:166b-6: gal te dris pa na stong pa nyid la sogs pa can kho na bsgom pa'o //
T03D3805:166b-7: de yang yongs su dris ba las mngon sum du mi byed pa ste /
T03D3805:166b-8: de la thabs ni sems can thams cad yongs su
T03D3805:166b-9: mi gtong ba'i sems la sogs pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:166b-10: 'di rnams de'i phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags su bshad
T03D3805:166b-11: do // de'i phyir de'i rtags 'dis zhes pa ni de'i rtags kyi thabs so //
T03D3805:166b-12: rab 'byor zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:166b-13: gang de ltar lan ldon pa nyung ba ni 'dir
T03D3805:166b-14: ches nyung ba'o zhes pa ni tshad med pa'i thabs
T03D3805:166b-15: so // le'u dgu pa de nyid kyi phyed nas
T03D3805:166b-16: brtsams te nyi shu pa'i phyed kyi bar gyi le'u
T03D3805:166b-17: bcu gcig po ni rnam pa kun tu mngon par
T03D3805:166b-20: // /'di las gong du rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa /
T03D3805:166b-21: khyad par gyi lam la brjod par bya ste /
T03D3805:166b-22: de ltar yang sa bcu po'i gnas skabs kyi khyad
T03D3805:166b-23: par la bco lnga pa la sogs pa nas kyi
T03D3805:166b-24: sems bskyed pa drug ni khyad par gyi lam gyis

T03D3805:166b-28: 'bring dang chen po'i chen po dbye ba ste /

T03D3805:166b-40: cig car skye ba dgag pa rjod par byed pas /

T03D3805:166b-42: pa'i cha dang mthun pa med pa med ces pa

T03D3805:166b-44: dang mthun pa'i bdag nyid can la gsum dang /

T03D3805:167a-2: nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi po
T03D3805:167a-3: rnams ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa bshad pa'i
T03D3805:167a-4: rigs pas nges par byas la /

T03D3805:167a-7: dngos gzhi'i gnas skabs su gnyis so //
T03D3805:167a-8: bsgom pa'i lam gyi yang sbyor ba'i gnas skabs su

T03D3805:167a-11: 'dir mthong ba'i lam gyi sbyor ba'i bye brag dag

T03D3805:167a-13: byed la / dngos gzhi'i gnas skabs kyi bye brag
T03D3805:167a-14: dag la ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag
T03D3805:167a-15: byed la / go // bsgom pa'i lam gyi yang
T03D3805:167a-16: sbyor ba'i bye brag dag la ni gzung ba'i rnam
T03D3805:167a-17: par rtog pa dag la gnyis spong bar byed la
T03D3805:167a-18: dngos gzhi'i bye brag dag la ni 'dzin pa'i rnam
T03D3805:167a-19: par rtog pa gnyis po spong bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:167a-20: so sor gnyen po'i bye brag re res rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag gnyis spong ste /

T03D3805:167a-26: te gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya zhes bshad
T03D3805:167a-27: pas so // 'di rnams su rnam par rtog pa
T03D3805:167a-28: rnams kyis bsgom pa nyid pas rnam par rtog pa
T03D3805:167a-29: pas so // brjod do // rgyu las 'bras bu nye bar btags pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:167a-30: dngos po nyid kyi dri ma phra mo drungs byung
T03D3805:167a-31: ba la shin tu 'bad par bya'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:167a-32: slob pa rnams la dgongs pas /
T03D3805:167a-33: mngon du rgyu'i rnam par rtog pa rnams ni mi
T03D3805:167a-34: g-yo ba la sogs pa rnams la srid pa ma
T03D3805:167a-36: 'o na 'di nyid du rnam par rtog pa brgyad
T03D3805:167a-37: po rnams spong ba ni gzugs khams kyi bshad pa
T03D3805:167a-38: dang / 'phags pa rnam par grol pa'i sdes ni
T03D3805:167a-39: khams gsum gyis bsdus pa rnams spong zhes pa dang
T03D3805:167a-40: dang / / ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na khams
T03D3805:167a-41: gsum gyis bsdus pa ni 'jig rten pa'i nges par
T03D3805:167a-42: 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i gnas skabs kyis kun
T03D3805:167a-43: tu sbyor ba can gyi gang zhig gi rnam par
T03D3805:167a-44: rtog pa yod pa rnams te /
T03D3805:167b-0: 'di gzugs kyi @167b khams su ni ji ltar rigs

T03D3805:167b-4: bsdus pa rnams ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa la
T03D3805:167b-5: sngar bshad pa bzhin du ma rig pa'i nang 'dus
T03D3805:167b-6: pa rnams ni ma rig pa spangs pas spong ba
T03D3805:167b-7: nyid las rab tu phye nas ma rig pa spong
T03D3805:167b-8: bar ni mi 'dod pa nyid do //
T03D3805:167b-9: bsgom pa'i lam gyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi dgu po
T03D3805:167b-10: rnams ni dri ma med pa la sogs pa'i gnyen
T03D3805:167b-11: po'i bye brag rnams kyis spong la /

T03D3805:167b-13: chags kyi bye brag bco lnga gdul bya'i ngor byas
T03D3805:167b-14: pa'i de bzhin nyid la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:167b-15: pa'i bag chags kyis dbye ba rnam pa bdun cu
T03D3805:167b-16: rtsa gnyis ni gnyen po'i bye brag bco lnga rnams
T03D3805:167b-17: kyis spong zhing de las gzhan pa'i ma rig pa'i
T03D3805:167b-18: bag chags kyis bye brag ma bshad pa'i gzung ba
T03D3805:167b-19: dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags kyi
T03D3805:167b-20: bye brag rnams ni gzhan pa'i gnyen po'i bye brag
T03D3805:167b-21: rnams kyis spong bas bsam gtan bzhi pa dang gzugs
T03D3805:167b-22: med pa'i khams zhes pa rnam par gzhag pa ni
T03D3805:167b-23: 'phags pa'i dgongs pa dang 'gal ba med de /
T03D3805:167b-24: de yang rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni bstan bcos kyis mdor bstan la /
T03D3805:167b-25: de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang //
T03D3805:167b-26: bstan dang sems kun gnas pa dang //
T03D3805:167b-27: mthong zhes bya dang sgom pa zhes //
T03D3805:167b-28: bya ba'i lam ni so so la //
T03D3805:167b-29: rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi //
T03D3805:167b-30: gnyen po rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
T03D3805:167b-31: bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin //
T03D3805:167b-32: log par sgrub dang bcas pa ni //
T03D3805:167b-33: rtse mo'i mngon rtogs zhes te /
T03D3805:167b-34: de rgyas par bshad pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:167b-35: rmi lam na yang chos rnams kun //
T03D3805:167b-36: rmi lam lta bu'i mthong la sogs //

T03D3805:168a-3: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:168a-6: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:168a-7: zin pa ni byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-9: byin gyi rlabs ni bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs so //
T03D3805:168a-10: gal te bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis song bar gyur na zhes pa ni brgyad pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-11: thabs la mkhas pa la sogs pa rnams kyis spyad pa ni yongs su shes pa ste /
T03D3805:168a-12: de'i don gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o /
T03D3805:168a-14: // / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa log pa'i
T03D3805:168a-15: nga rgyal skyed par byed pa'i phyir bdud nye bar
T03D3805:168a-16: 'ong bar 'gyur ba 'dir bdud kyi las kyi gnas
T03D3805:168a-17: skabs ni / yang de la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:168a-20: stobs ni spro ba'i nus pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-21: gzi brjid ni mthu'i nus pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-22: mdangs ni gsal par gyur pas gzi brjid du gyur pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-23: brtson pa zhes pa ni bdag nyid la nga rgyal ba'o //
T03D3805:168a-24: brnyas pa ni ma gus pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-25: rngan chen byed pa ni nang du bzhad gad byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-26: sting bar byed pa ni yid kyis so //
T03D3805:168a-28: smod pa ni skyon ston par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-29: skyed pa ni skyed par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-30: 'phel ba ni sngon du 'gro bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-31: rton pa ni brtan par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-32: rgyas par ni yongs su gang bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:168a-33: 'byung ba ni dmigs mthon por blta ba'o //

T03D3805:168a-36: mnyam pa nyid ni che ba'i nga rgyal lo //
T03D3805:168a-37: khyad par du 'phags pa ni nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal lo //
T03D3805:168a-38: ma thob par phyir mi ldog pa nyid bdag gis
T03D3805:168a-39: thob po snyam pa ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal lo
T03D3805:168a-40: // phyir mi ldog pa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan
T03D3805:168a-41: ma yin pa rnams dang ldan pa la yon tan
T03D3805:168a-42: dang ldan snyam pa ni log pa'i nga rgyal lo
T03D3805:168a-43: // // bdud kyi 'ching ba ni nga rgyal lo //

T03D3805:168b-3: de nyid du gnas pa ni dgon pa la'o //

T03D3805:168b-5: phyag dar khrod pa nyid la dgon pas phyag dar khrod pa'o //
T03D3805:168b-6: gcig par du ma du ma lus par zan la

T03D3805:168b-10: chos gos gsum las lhag pa thams cad gtong bas chos gos gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:168b-11: dur khrod la nye bar gnas pas dur khrod pa'o //
T03D3805:168b-12: shing rtsa nyid du gnas pas shing drung pa'o //

T03D3805:168b-17: nyung du tshol bas 'dod pa nyung ba'o //
T03D3805:168b-18: de tsam nyid kyis chog shes pa'o //
T03D3805:168b-19: gcig pu nyid kyi phyir rab tu dben pa'o //
T03D3805:168b-20: mthong ba'i chos ni skye ba nyid la myong ba ni mthong pa'i chos la'o //
T03D3805:168b-21: byin gyis brlabs pa ni mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:168b-22: sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi sdom pa'i bsngags pa ste /
T03D3805:168b-23: yid kyis gzhan la nga rgyal bar byed ces pa ni don to //

T03D3805:168b-28: rjes su brtags pa ni bdag gi ming ji zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes pas so //
T03D3805:168b-29: rjes su dpyad pa ni bdag gi ming 'di zhes bya bar 'gyur zhes pas so //
T03D3805:168b-30: lung ston par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni bdud kyis so //
T03D3805:168b-31: rjes su 'brang ba ni kun tu 'dod pa'i'o //

T03D3805:168b-36: phra mo phra ba ni mtshon par dka' ba'o //
T03D3805:168b-37: dben pa'i gnas ni dben par gnas pa'o //

T03D3805:169a-2: yid la byed pas dben zhes pa ni yid la byed pa rnams kyis dben pa'o //
T03D3805:169a-3: chung ngus ni mngon par zhen pas gnas pa'o //

T03D3805:169a-7: 'dres pa ni rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa'o //
T03D3805:169a-8: ma 'dres pa ni rab tu byung ba kho na'o //
T03D3805:169a-9: byang chub sems dpa' gdol pa ni de dang 'grogs par mi bya ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:169a-10: byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa ni rang gi skyon gyi sde rnams sun 'byung ba'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:169a-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zhes
T03D3805:169a-29: pa ni rtogs par bya ba'i gtso bo'i phyir te

T03D3805:169a-41: mi g-yo ba la sogs pa rnams la'o //
T03D3805:169b-0: @169b ma ni gzung zhing gsos pas so //

T03D3805:169b-8: 'di la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:169b-11: pa la sogs pas ni gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog

T03D3805:173a-7: phyir ro // bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags pa

T03D3805:173a-10: chos ni kun tu rtogs par bya ba la sogs pa'o //

T03D3805:173a-15: dgongs pa'o // ji ltar ni min pa nyid de /
T03D3805:173a-16: shin tu dben pa la sgrub pa'i sbyor ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:173a-17: de nyid kyi phyir zhes pa ni 'bras bu ni rgyu dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:173a-18: yod pa shes pa ni de'i rnam par rtog par
T03D3805:173a-19: 'gyur bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:173a-20: ma yin no // de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ni nye bar bsdu ba'o //
T03D3805:173a-21: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang med ces
T03D3805:173a-22: pa ni mngon par byang chub pa la rnam par
T03D3805:173a-23: rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:173a-24: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas zhes pa ni dngos
T03D3805:173a-25: por sgro btags pa rnam pa gsum 'di la med
T03D3805:173a-26: la / de'i stong pa nyid kyi yang dag pa'i
T03D3805:173a-27: kun rdzob tshul gyis yod ces pa la dgongs pa'o
T03D3805:173a-28: la / // 'di dag ni kun rdzob la stong pa nyid ni don dam pa'o //
T03D3805:173a-29: zab mo la zhes pa ni gang 'di'i don gzhan gyis dpyod par mi nus pas so //
T03D3805:173a-30: dka' ba byed pa ni gang zhig mngon sum du
T03D3805:173a-31: byed par zhugs kyang sems can la ltos nas mngon

T03D3805:173a-33: gsungs pa'i don zhes bya ba ni dgongs pa can no //

T03D3805:173a-37: de nyid gsungs pa ni de ltar na zhes pa
T03D3805:173a-39: gang zhig ni byang chub sems dpa' la /

T03D3805:173a-42: mi zhum pa ni gzhol bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
T03D3805:173a-43: 'di'i ched du bya ba drug ste /
T03D3805:173b-0: mi 'gong @173b ba ni 'di la mos pa 'bring du mi 'gyur ba'o //

T03D3805:173b-8: 'dir ngo bo nyid la sogs pa'i don dgu rnams ni 'jug pa'i phyogs te /

T03D3805:174b-4: shing gi skyes bus bya ba byed cing rnam par

T03D3805:174b-19: nyi tshe ba dang sna tshogs nyid //
T03D3805:174b-20: gnas dang 'jug la rmongs pa dang //
T03D3805:174b-21: rjes la 'gro zhes bya ba yi //
T03D3805:174b-22: rnam rtog dgu yi bdag nyid ni //
T03D3805:174b-23: ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can gyi //
T03D3805:174b-24: nyan thos la sogs yid las byung //
T03D3805:174b-25: zhes te rtogs pa dman pa la sogs pa'i skyon
T03D3805:174b-26: ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu spang bar bya
T03D3805:174b-27: ba'i dngos po bas ldog pa'i phyogs kyi rten can

T03D3805:174b-32: 'dir ni gnyen po'i phyogs rnams brjod par 'gyur la /

T03D3805:174b-34: khyad par can gyi 'bras bu bla na med pa

T03D3805:174b-43: gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa lngas ni 'khor bar ltung ba'am /

T03D3805:175a-5: 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:175a-6: la dga' ba nyid kyi spyod pa ni shes rab
T03D3805:175a-7: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bcas pas yongs

T03D3805:175a-10: mtshon cha dang bcas pa bzhin no zhes pa ni

T03D3805:175a-12: bar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni yongs su 'dzin
T03D3805:175a-13: pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:175a-14: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:175a-15: phyag bya ba ni gang la ni sgrub pa mtha'
T03D3805:175a-16: dag ste gzhan la rag ma las pa'i phyir dang

T03D3805:175a-18: par sgrub pa nyid ni sgrub pa ste pha rol
T03D3805:175a-19: tu phyin pa lnga rnams so //

T03D3805:175a-22: po la de la 'jug pa nyid kyi lam dang
T03D3805:175a-24: de'i de la bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis shin tu 'gyed par mi 'gyur te /
T03D3805:175a-25: go cha ma byas pa'i 'thab mo pa la pha
T03D3805:175a-26: rol 'thab mo rnams kyis bzhin no zhes pa ni

T03D3805:175a-28: pa'o // de ltar zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T03D3805:175a-34: de ltar gang zag gi bdag med pa'i dbang gis
T03D3805:175a-35: yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi byed nas

T03D3805:175a-37: pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum
T03D3805:175a-38: du byed par 'gyur ba nyid do zhes pa ni

T03D3805:175a-40: / // 'dis kyang zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'chad par 'gyur bas so //
T03D3805:175a-41: ji ltar mngon sum du mi byed na /

T03D3805:182a-24: zhes te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

T03D3805:182a-27: rgyas zhes gsungs pa ni thog ma'i shes bya la

T03D3805:182a-29: rgya chen po ni rgya che la rmongs pa'i rnam

T03D3805:182a-32: sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ji srid du stobs la sogs pa rnams la'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:182a-33: mdor bsdus pa la rmongs pa ni mdor bsdus pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste /

T03D3805:182a-36: nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid gcig
T03D3805:182a-37: pa nyid do // rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan
T03D3805:182a-38: pa ni gang yongs su ma bzung ba la de
T03D3805:182a-39: med pa ni rnam par rtog pa ste /
T03D3805:182a-40: de'i gnyen po ni gang shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:182a-41: tu phyin pa la slob pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i
T03D3805:182a-42: pha rol tu phyin pa nas ji srid du rnam
T03D3805:182a-43: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par
T03D3805:182a-44: 'gyur la / des 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
T03D3805:182b-0: phyogs @182b bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstang bas bdag yongs su ma bzung ba ste /
T03D3805:182b-1: rang gi yum la de rnams kyis bka' drin gzo bar byed do zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:182b-2: yon tan ni bsngags pa la /

T03D3805:182b-4: dus gsum pa can gyi de'i rnam par rtog pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:182b-5: de rnams kyi gnyen po ni rjes su bsngags pa med pa rjes su gsungs pa'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:182b-6: de'i rjes su bsngags pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la dang /
T03D3805:182b-7: sbyor ba dang mngon par sgrub pa dang /
T03D3805:182b-8: sgom par byed ces pas go rims bzhin du legs pa'i lam ste /
T03D3805:182b-9: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la sbyor ba la
T03D3805:182b-10: sogs pa'i dbye bas phye ba rnam pa gsum gyi
T03D3805:182b-12: de rnams kyi gnyen po ni go rims bzhin du
T03D3805:182b-13: gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa zhi ba dang
T03D3805:182b-14: / dbang du gyur pa dang stong zhing snying po
T03D3805:182b-15: med pas de rnams la spyad par bya ba dang
T03D3805:182b-16: / / nam mkha' stong pa nyid du mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang /

T03D3805:182b-18: gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:182b-19: gnyis pa sems dang sems byung rnams //
T03D3805:182b-20: 'jug pa'i yul can yin bzhed de //

T03D3805:182b-24: rdzogs pa'i byang chub yid mi byed //
T03D3805:182b-25: bsgom dang bsgom pa med pa dang //

T03D3805:182b-27: ji bzhin don min rnam rtog pa //
T03D3805:182b-28: bsgom pa'i lam las shes par bya //

T03D3805:182b-30: du spyod par 'gyur ba yin zhes pa'i 'dri ba
T03D3805:182b-31: ni byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i rnam par

T03D3805:182b-33: ji srid du byang chub snying po'i bar du yid
T03D3805:182b-34: la byed ces pa ni 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs

T03D3805:182b-38: bar du yid la byed pa ste rnam par rtog
T03D3805:182b-39: pa'o // theg pa dman pa yid la byed pa

T03D3805:182b-41: gnyen po la theg pa dman pa dag yid la

T03D3805:183a-1: la byed pa rab tu rnam par mi 'jog pa

T03D3805:183a-4: de ltar na ni rnam par mi 'jug pa nyid

T03D3805:183a-20: de ji ltar na des rjes su thob par 'gyur na /

T03D3805:183a-23: zhing de phyin ci log la mngon par zhen pa

T03D3805:183a-25: // rnam par rtog pa dgu tshan gsum pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:183a-26: sems can btags pa'i spyod yul dang //
T03D3805:183a-27: chos btags pa dang stong min nyid //
T03D3805:183a-28: chags dang rab 'byed bdag nyid dang //
T03D3805:183a-29: dngos por byed dang theg par ni //

T03D3805:183a-32: spyod pa rnam par 'khrugs pa la //
T03D3805:183a-33: 'dzin pa dang por shes par bya //
T03D3805:183a-34: zhes te sems can nye bar mi dmigs pas gdags
T03D3805:183a-35: par mi bya'o zhes pa ni 'di'i mi mthun pa'i
T03D3805:183a-36: phyogs ni rjes su yod pa'i sems can du gdags
T03D3805:183a-37: par bya'o zhes pa ste sems can du btags pa'i
T03D3805:183a-39: gzugs la sogs pa nas ji srid du rnam pa

T03D3805:183b-0: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas chos thams cad @183b 'jig pa'o zhes pa ni /
T03D3805:183b-1: 'di mi mthun pa'i phyogs la chos thams cad rang
T03D3805:183b-2: gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ma yin zhes pa
T03D3805:183b-3: ni stong pa nyid ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:183b-4: pa'o // chos rnams dang chos rnams la dmigs pa
T03D3805:183b-5: dag la 'dir spyod pa de yang mi dmigs pa'i
T03D3805:183b-6: dmigs pa med pa'o ni shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:183b-8: 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni chos rnams nye bar
T03D3805:183b-9: dmigs pas chos rnams nye bar mi dmigs pa'o zhes
T03D3805:183b-10: pa ni / chags pa'i bdag nyid can gyi chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:183b-11: chos rnams la rab tu rnam par 'byed par bya ste /
T03D3805:183b-12: de yang ngo bo nyid dmigs pa med pa'i sbyor bas te /
T03D3805:183b-13: 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni ngo bo nyid nye bar dmigs pas 'di'i gzugs so zhes pa nas /
T03D3805:183b-14: ji srid du 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
T03D3805:183b-15: pa'i bar ro zhes pa ni rab tu 'byed pa'i
T03D3805:183b-16: bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa'o //

T03D3805:183b-21: 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por byas nas /

T03D3805:183b-28: don dam par ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa

T03D3805:183b-31: ni don dam par rnam par gzhag pa'o zhes pa

T03D3805:183b-36: gang zhig chos nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i de nyid sprul pa'i yang ste /
T03D3805:183b-37: 'di'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni gal te de bzhin
T03D3805:183b-38: gshegs pa sprul pa lta bu ni ji ltar de'i
T03D3805:183b-39: yon dag par 'gyur zhes pa ni yon yongs su

T03D3805:184a-6: rnam par 'khrug par ni mi byed do zhes pa
T03D3805:184a-7: ni spyod pa rnam par 'khrug pa'i rnam par rtog

T03D3805:184a-9: sems can btags dang de rgyu ba'i //
T03D3805:184a-10: yul can bsgom pa'i lam 'brel pa //
T03D3805:184a-11: de la gnod pa byed pa yi //
T03D3805:184a-12: mi mthun phyogs gzhan rnam pa dgu //
T03D3805:184a-13: thams cad mkhyen nyid gsum dag gis //
T03D3805:184a-14: bdag nyid ji bzhin sgrib rnam gsum //
T03D3805:184a-15: zhi lam de bzhin nyid sogs dang //
T03D3805:184a-16: mtshungs par ldan dang mi ldan dang //
T03D3805:184a-17: mi mnyam sdug bsngal la sogs dang //
T03D3805:184a-18: gnyis su med la kun rmongs pa //
T03D3805:184a-19: rnam par rtog pa tha mar bzhed //
T03D3805:184a-20: ces te sems can du btags pa dang /
T03D3805:184a-21: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs par btags pa dang /
T03D3805:184a-22: de'i rgyu'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la sogs
T03D3805:184a-23: pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi yul dag la mi mthun
T03D3805:184a-24: pa'i phyogs rnam pa gsum gyi sgrib pa ni gsum
T03D3805:184a-25: du kun tu rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:184a-26: rnam pa thams cad kyis chos rnams rjes su rtogs
T03D3805:184a-27: pa 'dis na de bzhin gshegs pa ni rnam pa
T03D3805:184a-28: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do zhes pa ni rnam
T03D3805:184a-29: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la kun tu rmongs
T03D3805:184a-31: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T03D3805:184a-32: dpa'i lam rnams byang chub sems dpas rdzogs par bya
T03D3805:184a-33: zhing de rnams kyi lam gyi bya ba yang bya
T03D3805:184a-34: la / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mngon sum du
T03D3805:184a-35: mi byed pa des na lam shes pa ni byang
T03D3805:184a-36: chub sems dpa'i lam shes pa'o zhes brjod pa ni
T03D3805:184a-37: lam shes pa la kun tu rmongs pa'o //
T03D3805:184a-38: gang zhig phyi dang nang gi chos 'di rnams thams
T03D3805:184a-39: cad ni des kyang shes la lam thams cad dang

T03D3805:184a-43: ni thams cad shes pa la kun tu rmongs pa'o
T03D3805:184a-44: // gang la gnas nas zhi pa mngon sum du
T03D3805:184a-45: byed pa de ni zhi ba'i lam mo zhes bya
T03D3805:184b-0: ba ni zhi ba la kun du @184b rmongs pa
T03D3805:184b-1: // la / gang la yang mi gnas pa nyid
T03D3805:184b-2: kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o
T03D3805:184b-4: 'di nyid kyis na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:184b-5: phyin pa nyid bzhin du zhi ba la gang du
T03D3805:184b-6: yang mi gnas pa nyid ces brjod do zhes pa
T03D3805:184b-7: ni lam la kun tu rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:184b-8: pa'o // 'di ni de bzhin nyid dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:184b-9: de ltar yang 'di ni ngo bo nyid med pa
T03D3805:184b-10: bstan du med la thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:184b-12: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir la zhes pa 'di'i mi
T03D3805:184b-13: mthun pa'i phyogs ni de bzhin nyid la sogs pa
T03D3805:184b-14: dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i shes
T03D3805:184b-15: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:184b-16: de bzhin nyid la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan
T03D3805:184b-17: pa dang mi ldan pa'i rnam pa ste /
T03D3805:184b-18: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lam
T03D3805:184b-19: gzhan dang mnyam pa nyid ni 'di'i gnyen po la
T03D3805:184b-20: / bdud dang mu stegs dang theg pa gzhan gang gis kyang sgrib par mi nus te /
T03D3805:184b-21: de'i phyir thun mong ma yin no zhes pa ni
T03D3805:184b-22: mi mnyam pa nyid la kun tu rmongs pa'i rtog
T03D3805:184b-23: pa'o // spyod pa 'dis sdug bsngal ba dang kun
T03D3805:184b-24: 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:184b-25: don du spyad par bya'o zhes pa ni 'di mi
T03D3805:184b-26: mthun pa'i phyogs te spyad par mi bya'o zhes pa
T03D3805:184b-27: ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa kun tu rmongs pa'i
T03D3805:184b-29: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i don dang ldan pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:184b-30: de dag gi rang bzhin ni de bzhin nyid de
T03D3805:184b-31: 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams la de bzhin nyid
T03D3805:184b-32: kyis gang du yang phan pa'am gnod pa byed pa
T03D3805:184b-33: ma yin no zhes pa ni de la kun tu
T03D3805:184b-34: rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:184b-35: ji ltar gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su med pa ma yin pa'i chos nye bar dmigs te /
T03D3805:184b-36: de ltar na gnyis su med pa dang gnyis su
T03D3805:184b-37: med pa'i chos kyi rjes su thob par 'gyur ro
T03D3805:184b-38: zhes pa ni 'di'i gnyen po la gnyis dang gnyis
T03D3805:184b-40: de med pa ni kun tu rmongs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:184b-41: 'o na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i rnam par rtog
T03D3805:184b-42: pa rnams snga nas spangs pas ji ltar na 'dir
T03D3805:184b-43: rtogs pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs su
T03D3805:184b-44: spong bar bstan par 'gyur zhe na /

T03D3805:184b-46: ring por zhugs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po'i
T03D3805:184b-47: gegs byed pa po'i kun tu rmongs pa'i sa bon
T03D3805:185a-0: ni bcu pa la rab tu @185a * //
T03D3805:185a-1: spong bar 'gyur zhes dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa'i mdo las gsungs pas so //
T03D3805:185a-2: yang dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las drug pa dang bdun pa nas bzung ste /
T03D3805:185a-3: nyon mongs pa mngon du rgyu stobs chung nas bag
T03D3805:185a-4: la nyal la sa brgyad pa la ni bag la
T03D3805:185a-5: nyal las nyon mongs pa'i mngon du rgyu ni shes
T03D3805:185a-6: bya'i sgrib pa la kun tu gnas pa tsam nyid
T03D3805:185a-7: nas nye bar bzung ste zhes pa dang /

T03D3805:185a-9: chub sems dpa' la ni nyon mongs pa'i mngon du

T03D3805:185a-15: kun nas ldang ba'i gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa
T03D3805:185a-16: la sogs pa yang spong bar 'gyur ro //

T03D3805:185a-19: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nges par bsgom par bya
T03D3805:185a-20: ba bstan to // kha cig gis yang de ltar

T03D3805:188a-45: gal te rtogs par byed ces pas sangs rgyas na
T03D3805:188a-46: thams cad mkhyen pa de la mi 'grub ste gzung
T03D3805:188a-47: ba dang 'dzin pa dag gis so //
T03D3805:188a-48: de nas rtogs bya med na de ltan ni ci zhig rtogs par byed pas sangs rgyas zhes te /
T03D3805:188b-0: 'di'i lan ni rtogs @188b bya dang rtogs byed rab
T03D3805:188b-1: tu rtogs pa'i yang dag pa'i ye shes de la
T03D3805:188b-2: shin tu yod pa min zhes pa ni rtogs pa
T03D3805:188b-4: yang dag pa'i don ni sangs rgyas zhes te /
T03D3805:188b-5: de ltar yang kun rdzob kyi phung po lnga'i ngo
T03D3805:188b-6: bo nyid don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa'o
T03D3805:188b-7: zhes pa ni bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ni

T03D3805:188b-10: mngon sum pa de ni de ltar brjod du med
T03D3805:188b-11: pa ste / gzhan yang de brjod pa ni /
T03D3805:188b-12: chos rnams thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du mngon
T03D3805:188b-13: par sangs rgyas pas de ltar sangs rgyas zhes pa
T03D3805:188b-14: ste / ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin nyid
T03D3805:188b-15: dang ro gcig pa'i rnam pa thams cad du ma
T03D3805:188b-16: lus pa yang dag par sgrib pa dang bcas pas
T03D3805:188b-17: dben pa'i ye shes nyid kyis sangs rgyas nyid 'di
T03D3805:188b-18: la shin tu yod pas sangs rgyas so //
T03D3805:188b-19: rtogs par byed ces pas kyang sangs rgyas te /
T03D3805:188b-20: byed pa po dang de lta ba la'o //
T03D3805:188b-21: 'dir chos rnams thams cad la don dam par ngo
T03D3805:188b-22: bo nyid med pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pas gzung
T03D3805:188b-23: ba rnam pa thams cad du mi srid la kun
T03D3805:188b-24: rdzob tu ni ma brtags pa na nyams dga' ba'i
T03D3805:188b-25: ji lta ba de ltar ro zhes pa ni sangs
T03D3805:188b-27: chos ni chos nyid ngo bo nyid med pa nyid
T03D3805:188b-28: du phung po lnga po rnams kyi rang bzhin don
T03D3805:188b-29: dam pa'i phyir sgrib pa gnyis kyi bag chags dang
T03D3805:188b-30: bcas pa spangs nas rnam par dag pa bla na
T03D3805:188b-31: med pa'i byang chub kyi yang gnas yin pa'i phyir
T03D3805:188b-32: dkon mchog go zhes pa ni chos dkon mchog ste
T03D3805:188b-33: / gtso bo rtogs par 'gyur zhes pas byang chub ces brjod de /
T03D3805:188b-34: gang du ngo bo nyid med par rtogs par 'gyur
T03D3805:188b-35: ba ni de'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de
T03D3805:188b-36: kun rdzob pa'i chos thams cad las khyad par 'phags
T03D3805:188b-37: pa'i phyir chos dkon mchog la /
T03D3805:188b-38: gtso bo'i chos 'di'i yul nyid pas kyang nye bar brtags pas bla na med pa'i byang chub bo //
T03D3805:188b-39: de la chos nyid kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas

T03D3805:188b-41: dang de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos
T03D3805:188b-42: nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:188b-43: stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3805:188b-44: de bzhin nyid ni 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:189a-0: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de kho na nyid kyi rtse mo'i @189a * //
T03D3805:189a-2: chos nyid ni chos kyi rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:189a-3: chos kyi dbyings ni 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyu'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:189a-4: ye shes kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:189a-5: byang chub ni de bzhin nyid dang phyin ci ma
T03D3805:189a-6: log pa'i de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa'i
T03D3805:189a-7: de bzhin nyid dang gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin
T03D3805:189a-8: pa'i dngos po ni byang chub bo zhes pa la
T03D3805:189a-9: / byang chub ni rtogs pa'i de bzhin nyid de /
T03D3805:189a-10: de nyid don dam par ngo bo nyid med de /
T03D3805:189a-11: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i dngos po la ni dngos po'i ngo bo yod pa ma yin pas so //
T03D3805:189a-12: phyin ci log ni yod pa dang med pa nyid
T03D3805:189a-13: la sogs pa'i phyin ci log de bzhin nyid de
T03D3805:189a-15: gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid ni kun rdzob
T03D3805:189a-16: tu gzhan du ma rig pas dben pa'i ngo bo
T03D3805:189a-17: sgro btags pas de ltar gzhan du ma yin pa
T03D3805:189a-18: ste / kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid kho na de'i de bzhin nyid dang don dam pa ste /
T03D3805:189a-19: bden pa nyid dang mi bden pa nyid la sogs pa'i spros pas stong pa nyid do //
T03D3805:189a-20: gzhan dang ldan pa'i dngos po ma yin zhes pa
T03D3805:189a-21: ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin ni don dam par
T03D3805:189a-22: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:189a-23: de la bden pa'i dngos po dang bden pa'i dngos
T03D3805:189a-24: por shes pa nyid kyi ma rig pa'i bag chags
T03D3805:189a-25: kyis byas pa ni gzhan dang ldan pa'i dngos po
T03D3805:189a-26: la / ma rig pa'i bag chags zad pas de
T03D3805:189a-27: dang bral ba ni gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin
T03D3805:189a-29: 'khrul pa thams cad kyis dben pa'i kun rdzob dang
T03D3805:189a-30: don dam par ro gcig pa'i ye shes ni byang
T03D3805:189a-31: chub bo zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:189a-33: sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtogs pa la byang chub ces pa ste /
T03D3805:189a-34: yang chos nyid kyi phyogs kyi dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:189a-35: sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rtogs par bya bas
T03D3805:189a-36: de'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba ni rtogs par
T03D3805:189a-37: 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi las la ste /
T03D3805:189a-38: rab kyi mthar son pa ni de bzhin gshegs par gzung bar bya la /
T03D3805:189a-39: de yang phung po lnga po rnams kyis stong pa nyid kho na'o //
T03D3805:189a-40: 'o na phung po lnga po ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:189a-41: de'i stong pa nyid kyang gzung du med la /
T03D3805:189a-42: byang chub ni de'i de rnams dang rang rang gis
T03D3805:189a-43: kyang stong pa nyid pas 'dzin pa ma yin pa
T03D3805:189a-44: la gang yang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dbye ba
T03D3805:189a-45: med cing dbye ba med pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:189b-0: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med @189b pa dag ni dngos po'i chos kyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:189b-1: de'i phyir na rnam pa med pa ma yin la /
T03D3805:189b-2: rnam pa dang bcas pa yang ma yin zhes pa
T03D3805:189b-3: ji ltar brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub bo
T03D3805:189b-4: zhes pa ni legs par sgrub pa la /
T03D3805:189b-5: bden pas ma rig pa'i bag chags dang bcas pa
T03D3805:189b-6: spong gi / don dam pa ni phung po la
T03D3805:189b-7: sogs pa rnams kyi gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i tha
T03D3805:189b-8: dad dang tha dad la sogs pa'i spros pa mtha'
T03D3805:189b-9: dag pa'i log pa'i rnam par rtog pa med pa
T03D3805:189b-10: la yongs su dag pa'i kun rdzob ma brtags na
T03D3805:189b-11: nyams dga' ba'i de kho na nyid rtogs pa ni
T03D3805:189b-12: byang chub ste / kun rdzob tu yang gdul bya
T03D3805:189b-13: kha cig la yang ldog pas phye nas rnam par
T03D3805:189b-14: byang chub ste / gzhag pa'o // ma rig pa

T03D3805:189b-16: don dam par ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir
T03D3805:189b-17: gzung ba la sogs pa ldog pas rang rig pa
T03D3805:189b-18: la sogs pa ldog par tshad mas nges pas ma
T03D3805:189b-19: brtags nyams gzung ba la sogs pa dang rang rig
T03D3805:189b-20: pa la sogs pa ni kun rdzob tu rnam par
T03D3805:189b-21: byang chub ste / gzhag pa'o // gzhag par bya'o
T03D3805:189b-22: // ma rtogs pa la ni dngos po la cung
T03D3805:189b-23: zhig rtogs pa'i tshad ma dang ldan pa la ni
T03D3805:189b-24: gzhan du 'dir cung zhig ni kun rdzob pa la
T03D3805:189b-25: cung zhig ni dngos po'o zhes te /
T03D3805:189b-26: rgya cher spros pas dgos pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:189b-27: de'i phyir stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i stong
T03D3805:189b-28: pa nyid kyis yul la rnam par dag pa'i blos
T03D3805:189b-29: stong pa nyid du rtogs pa de nyid chos dkon
T03D3805:189b-30: mchog ces pa ni chos dkon mchog go //
T03D3805:189b-31: 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ste /
T03D3805:189b-32: de yang sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3805:189b-33: las thams cad de'i khongs su gtogs par 'gyur ro
T03D3805:189b-34: zhes pa de ni mi 'thad de /
T03D3805:189b-35: yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:189b-36: mi 'bral ba dang mi byed pa dang mi 'phrogs pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'i don te /
T03D3805:189b-37: gang gi phyir gang gis rtogs zhes pa ni log par sgrub pa la /
T03D3805:189b-38: lan ni yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni lha
T03D3805:189b-39: dang bcas pa bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis
T03D3805:189b-40: gzhom du med cing dman pa'i byang chub kyi chos
T03D3805:189b-41: rnams dang mi dge ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa
T03D3805:189b-42: ste / ji skad du bshad pa'i nges par 'byed
T03D3805:189b-43: pa'i yan lag nas bzung ste zhes pa la sogs
T03D3805:189b-44: pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog la'o //
T03D3805:190a-0: tshig le'ur byas pa las thabs la mkhas pa @190a * //
T03D3805:190a-2: yul gyis yul can bstan pa ste /

T03D3805:190a-4: de ltar na yang de srid du dman pa'i byang chub dag las ldog pa med de /
T03D3805:190a-5: sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams ni dmigs pa med
T03D3805:190a-6: pas med do zhes pa ni log par sgrub pa
T03D3805:190a-7: la lan ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis sbyin
T03D3805:190a-8: pa la sogs pa rnams la spyod pa'i kun rdzob
T03D3805:190a-9: dang / don dam par 'khor gsum mi dmigs shing
T03D3805:190a-10: sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin
T03D3805:190a-11: par sems can thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyir
T03D3805:190a-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su

T03D3805:190a-14: ni thabs la mkhas pa'o zhes pa ni thabs la

T03D3805:190a-16: thub pa zhes pa ni thub pa nyid kyi rtogs
T03D3805:190a-17: pa la mngon du phyogs pa'i yang dag par rtogs
T03D3805:190a-18: ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang /
T03D3805:190a-19: gnyi ga'i ngo bor rtogs pa bkag pas de la
T03D3805:190a-20: mngon par rtogs pa med do zhes pa ni log
T03D3805:190a-22: lan ni mngon par rtogs pa yod de /
T03D3805:190a-23: gang du spros pa med pa'i dngos po ma yin
T03D3805:190a-24: zhing dngos po med pa ma yin no zhes pa
T03D3805:190a-26: gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:190a-27: ni phyin ci log bzhi'i spros pa dang bral ba'i
T03D3805:190a-28: phyir de ni nyan thos kyi lam du 'gyur gyi
T03D3805:190a-29: sangs rgyas kyi lam ni ma yin no zhes pa'i
T03D3805:190a-30: lan ni / ji srid du rnam par rtog pa'i
T03D3805:190a-31: spros pa dang bcas pa de thams cad ni phyin
T03D3805:190a-32: lan ni / ci log ste / de'i gnyen po
T03D3805:190a-33: ni spros pa med pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par
T03D3805:190a-34: rtog pa med pa'i phyir de spro bar mi byed
T03D3805:190a-35: cing rnam par rtog par mi byed la dngos po
T03D3805:190a-36: dang dngos po med pa'i spros pa med de /
T03D3805:190a-37: gnyi ga yang ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni phyin ci log pa'o //
T03D3805:190a-38: 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i lam shes pa nyid kyis
T03D3805:190a-39: lam rnams thams cad kyi 'bras bu dang bcas par
T03D3805:190a-40: byed cing / de'i lam de'i yongs su rdzogs par
T03D3805:190a-41: byed pas de'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed nas
T03D3805:190a-42: brgyad pa dang dgu rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs
T03D3805:190a-43: par thal bar 'gyur zhes pa'i lan ni /
T03D3805:190b-0: sems can gang zhig gang gis 'bras bu la @190b
T03D3805:190b-1: rnam par dgod par bya ba de de'i la rnam
T03D3805:190b-2: par dgod de srid du sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar
T03D3805:190b-3: la ste / rang bzhin nyid ni theg pa dman
T03D3805:190b-4: pa'i sa thams cad ye shes kyis mthong nas mi
T03D3805:190b-5: gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la
T03D3805:190b-6: gnas par 'gyur ro zhes pa ni lam la'o //
T03D3805:190b-7: gal te mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyon mongs pa
T03D3805:190b-8: de rnams 'dul ba'i chos 'dul ba de gal te
T03D3805:190b-9: yod na / de ltar na sems can nyon mongs pa med de /
T03D3805:190b-10: des de rnams kyi ldan pa 'am mi ldan par khas blang bar mi bya'o zhes pa'i lan ni /
T03D3805:190b-11: de ltar 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams thams cad de
T03D3805:190b-12: nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa la
T03D3805:190b-13: sogs pa rnams dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa
T03D3805:190b-14: yang min la bral ba yang ma yin pa'i mtshan
T03D3805:190b-16: 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes pa la 'di ni de bzhin du chos 'dul ba ste /
T03D3805:190b-17: gang chig ldan pa dang bral ba'i rtog pa 'dul
T03D3805:190b-18: bas so zhes pa la dgongs pa'o zhes pa ni

T03D3805:190b-24: nyid tha dad par bstan par bstan pa ni sems

T03D3805:190b-30: mtshan nyid kyi dbyings 'di ni de bzhin du gnas so zhes pa ni mtshan nyid la'o//
T03D3805:190b-31: gal te rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid med pas chos
T03D3805:190b-32: rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pas na ji ltar
T03D3805:190b-33: de ltar de rnams sgom par byed par 'gyur na

T03D3805:190b-35: chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pas shes rab
T03D3805:190b-36: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med de
T03D3805:190b-37: phyin ci log gi phyir la /

T03D3805:190b-39: lan ni chos kyi 'du shes kyis bsgom pa dang
T03D3805:190b-40: bral bas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:190b-42: bden pa mthong ba ni chos rnams thams cad dngos
T03D3805:190b-43: po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsgom par 'gyur
T03D3805:190b-44: bas / dngos po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin zhing /
T03D3805:191a-1: po med pa'i 'du shes kyis kyang ma yin te /
T03D3805:191a-2: dngos po dang dngos po med pa'i 'du shes thams cad rab tu bkag pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:191a-4: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spros
T03D3805:191a-5: pa med pa'o zhes pa ni bsgom pa la ste
T03D3805:191a-6: / le'u nyi shu pa'i phyed phyi ma nas brtsams
T03D3805:191a-7: nas ji srid du le'u phyed dang dgu rnams ni
T03D3805:191a-8: rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ste lnga pa'o //
T03D3805:191a-9: me tog bkram pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub
T03D3805:191a-10: sems dpa'i gnas skabs su le'u 'dir lung bstan pa
T03D3805:191a-11: ste / 'dir des nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u'o //
T03D3805:191a-12: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

T03D3805:191a-20: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ste /

T03D3805:191a-22: sum cu rtsa gcig pa nas brtsams te cig car

T03D3805:191a-27: pa'i lam la bye brag dgu'o zhes pas na bye

T03D3805:191a-33: mthar gyis bya ba dang mthar gyis bslab pa dang
T03D3805:191a-34: / mthar gyis bsgrub pa rab tu shes par bya

T03D3805:191a-40: mngon par rtogs par bshad do //

T03D3805:191a-43: sangs rgyas la sogs dran dang chos //
T03D3805:191a-44: dngos med ngo bo nyid kyis te //
T03D3805:191a-45: mthar gyis pa yi bya bar bzhed //
T03D3805:191b-0: bya ba dang bslab pa dang sgrub @191b pa'o zhes pa ni don to //
T03D3805:191b-2: gzhan yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:191b-3: 'di ltar ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi

T03D3805:191b-7: chags pa med pa ni gegs med pa nyid de /

T03D3805:191b-9: sems dang po bskyed pa la sogs pa rnams la
T03D3805:191b-10: ste / 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' sems

T03D3805:191b-35: pas sems can thar par byed pa med do //

T03D3805:194b-15: pa'o // khur rnams su sgro 'dogs pa med de /

T03D3805:194b-17: sems can gdul bar bya ba rnams kyi phyir phyogs
T03D3805:194b-18: bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba'i dka' ba'i
T03D3805:194b-19: 'du shes bzlog pa'i phyir gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:194b-21: gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi de
T03D3805:194b-22: bzhin nyid ni de'i ngo bo nyid du med pas
T03D3805:194b-23: / de'i yul du gyur pa'i chos med pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:194b-25: cha med pa'i phyir nam mkha' bzhin no //
T03D3805:194b-26: 'khor ba'i bden pa la dga' ba'i 'du shes bzlog
T03D3805:194b-27: pa'i don du gsungs pa ni chos rnams thams cad
T03D3805:194b-28: la 'khor ba rnams kyis 'gog pa rab tu tshim
T03D3805:194b-29: pa nyid dang bde ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa nyid
T03D3805:194b-30: la de / kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag / skye dang 'jig pa'i chos can la //
T03D3805:194b-32: de rnams nye bar zhi ba bde //
T03D3805:194b-33: zhes pa ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o //
T03D3805:194b-34: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:194b-35: dga' ba med ces pa ste /
T03D3805:194b-36: dga' ba ni shin tu myur bas mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T03D3805:194b-37: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de med pa ni dga' ba med pa'o //
T03D3805:194b-38: dga' ba dang bral ba ni 'khor ba la shin tu yid byung ba ste /
T03D3805:194b-39: de med pa ni de rnams kyi dga' ba dang bral ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:194b-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor ba
T03D3805:195a-0: dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la @195a *
T03D3805:195a-1: // rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir so sor kun tu rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:195a-2: chags pa med ces pa la sogs pas ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir so sor rtog pa'o //
T03D3805:195a-3: chos thams cad la chags pa med ces pa ni mngon par zhen pa rnams med pa ste /
T03D3805:195a-4: chags pa dang ma chags pa dang de dag la
T03D3805:195a-5: chags pa dang bral ba de dag dmigs su med
T03D3805:195a-6: pas so zhes pa ni rnam par spong ba'i phyir
T03D3805:195a-8: chos thams cad ni lam thams cad de /
T03D3805:195a-9: mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi sa la /
T03D3805:195a-10: byang chub ni snga nas bshad zin to //
T03D3805:195a-11: de'i phyir na gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:195a-12: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed ces pa ste /
T03D3805:195a-13: khong du chud pa thob pas de ltar byang chub
T03D3805:195a-14: thob par bslang ba'i phyir rtog pa'i don du so
T03D3805:195a-15: sor rtog pa'o // chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:195a-18: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba dang /
T03D3805:195a-19: mtshan ma thams cad nub pa dang /
T03D3805:195a-20: khams gsum la smos pa med pas go rims ji lta ba zhes pa ni lam mdor bsdus pa'o //
T03D3805:195a-21: gal te rnam par thar pa'i sgo las gzhan pa yang de rnams kyi lam ni /
T03D3805:195a-22: de ltar na de bsgoms na dman pa'i byang chub tu ltung bar 'gyur bas so //
T03D3805:195a-23: thams cad med ces pa ni chos rnams thams cad
T03D3805:195a-24: de thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi
T03D3805:195a-25: sman te / theg pa dman pa la mos pa'i
T03D3805:195a-26: nad chen po sel bar byed pa ni gang du
T03D3805:195a-27: byams pa ste de rnams kyi sngon du 'gro ba
T03D3805:195a-28: sman te / can la / 'on kyang de rnams thams cad la ste /
T03D3805:195a-29: byams pa la sogs pa'i tshad med pa bzhi la gnas pa ni tshangs par 'gyur ba ste /
T03D3805:195a-30: tshangs pa dang 'dra ba la de'i skyon mi skye
T03D3805:195a-31: bar byed pas so zhes pa ni 'di rgyas par
T03D3805:195a-32: bshad pa'o // thams cad ces pa ni skyon thams
T03D3805:195a-33: cad de byams pa la sogs pa rnams kyi mi
T03D3805:195a-34: mthun pa'i phyogs go rims ji lta ba bzhin du
T03D3805:195a-35: gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba dang dga' ba
T03D3805:195a-36: med pa dang khong khro ba'i bag la nyal lo
T03D3805:195a-37: bshad pa'o // // smon pa med pa ni mya
T03D3805:195a-38: ngan las 'da' ba la spro ba dang bral ba'i
T03D3805:195a-39: bshad pa'o // // phyir ro // khong khro ba
T03D3805:195a-40: med pa ni 'khor ba la shin tu yid byung
T03D3805:195a-41: ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni mthar gyis
T03D3805:195a-42: pa'i mngon par rtogs pa bcu gsum pa zhar la
T03D3805:195b-0: skad cig @195b gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub //
T03D3805:195b-1: mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi //
T03D3805:195b-2: ces pa ni mdor bstan pa ste /
T03D3805:195b-3: de ni khyad par gyi lam gyi sems bskyed pa
T03D3805:195b-4: bcu drug po'i bdag nyid kyi bye brag bdun cu
T03D3805:195b-5: rtsa gcig pa ni bag la nyal thams cad bcom
T03D3805:195b-6: pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu yang dag pa'i don
T03D3805:195b-7: bsgom pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i gnas skabs te
T03D3805:195b-8: / cig car du rnam par smin pas rmi lam
T03D3805:195b-9: ltar gnyis kyi de kho na nyid ro gcig tu
T03D3805:195b-10: rtogs pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam dang sangs rgyas
T03D3805:195b-11: kyi sa'i rnam par grol ba'i sems bskyed pa'i ngo
T03D3805:195b-12: / bo ste / des ma 'ongs pa'i sems skyed
T03D3805:195b-13: par byed pa la mi slob cing sgrib pa rnams
T03D3805:195b-14: las rnam par grol bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:195b-15: de'i sgrib pa skyes pa ni 'gag par byed la
T03D3805:195b-16: des da ltar byung ba ni lam gyis spong ba'o
T03D3805:195b-17: zhes pa'i rnam pa 'di ni snga nas bshad pa'o
T03D3805:195b-18: // 'dir skad cig ma gcig la mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyas par bshad pa ni /
T03D3805:195b-19: sbyin la sogs pa re re yis //
T03D3805:195b-20: zag med chos kun bsdus pa'i phyir //
T03D3805:195b-21: thub pa'i skad cig gcig pa yi //
T03D3805:195b-22: rtogs pa 'di ni shes par bya //
T03D3805:195b-23: ji ltar skyes bu zo chun rgyud //
T03D3805:195b-24: rdog thabs gcig gis bskyod pa ni //
T03D3805:195b-25: thams cad cig car 'gul ba ltar //
T03D3805:195b-26: skad cig gcig shes de bzhin no //
T03D3805:195b-28: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thub pa dang /
T03D3805:195b-29: byang chub smes dpa'i snying pa la sogs pa re
T03D3805:195b-30: res kyang sems kyi skad cig gis stong pa nyid
T03D3805:195b-31: kyi ngo bo la dmigs par byed pas zag pa
T03D3805:195b-32: med pa'i chos thams cad bsdus pas 'phags nas skad
T03D3805:195b-33: cig la rtogs pa'i sems gcig gis skad cig ma
T03D3805:195b-35: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i sems zag pa med pa
T03D3805:195b-36: gcig la dmigs par byed pas kyang ni zag pa
T03D3805:195b-37: med pa'i chos kyi tshogs rnams cig car sngon du
T03D3805:195b-38: byed de sngon gyi 'phen pa'i mthus drangs nas zo
T03D3805:195b-39: chun la rtog pa bzhin no //
T03D3805:195b-41: rgya mtsho mu med ces pa ste /
T03D3805:195b-42: gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:195b-43: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa
T03D3805:195b-44: dang ma bral ba'i phyir stong pa nyid dang ro
T03D3805:195b-45: gcig pa'i zab pa dang rgya che ba'i sbyin pa
T03D3805:195b-46: la sogs pa'i sems kyi skad cig re re la
T03D3805:195b-47: ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
T03D3805:196a-0: brjod de / de'i mu med pa ni mu med pa'i @196a * //
T03D3805:196a-1: zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kun tu drangs pa nyid la /
T03D3805:196a-2: de la yang de rnams kyi phan tshun du 'brel
T03D3805:196a-3: pa yun ring por yongs su 'dris pa'i phyir te
T03D3805:196a-4: / de ji ltar shes par bya na /
T03D3805:196a-5: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i rgya mtsho mu med
T03D3805:196a-6: pa nyid ni cig car gzhol bar 'gro ba'i chu
T03D3805:196a-7: rnams kyi 'dren pa ngo bo nyid kyis de'i de
T03D3805:196a-8: rnams kyang phan tshun 'brel ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:196a-9: de ltar na rgya mtsho mu med pa'i dpes so
T03D3805:196a-10: zhes pa'i don te zhes pa ni zag pa med
T03D3805:196a-11: pa'i chos thams cad sems kyi skad cig gis mngon
T03D3805:196a-12: par rtogs pa ste dang po'o //
T03D3805:196a-14: gang tshe chos dkar thams cad kyi //
T03D3805:196a-15: rang bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin //
T03D3805:196a-16: rnam smin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes //
T03D3805:196a-17: de tshe skad cig gcig ye shes //
T03D3805:196a-19: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i chos ni rnam par smin pa'i chos te /
T03D3805:196a-20: de'i gnas skabs su ni 'di'i 'o zhes te de ltar bshad de /
T03D3805:196a-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang
T03D3805:196a-22: mi g-yo ba'i gnas skabs nas brtsams pa ni thams
T03D3805:196a-23: cad dge ba'i chos rnams te /
T03D3805:196a-24: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa
T03D3805:196a-25: rnams gang 'dis sngon du ngo bo nyid med pa
T03D3805:196a-26: nyid du bsgoms nas gang yang phyis mi mthun pa'i
T03D3805:196a-27: phyogs thams cad dang bral nas /
T03D3805:196a-28: rnam par byang ba ma lus pa'i phyogs rnam par
T03D3805:196a-29: smin nas skyes pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i
T03D3805:196a-30: chos rnams la / de rnams ngo bo nyid med
T03D3805:196a-31: par yang dag par rig pa can gyi dkar po'i
T03D3805:196a-32: rang bzhin can thams cad gang du skyes pa de
T03D3805:196a-33: nyid sems kyi skad cig gcig la de nyid kyi
T03D3805:196a-34: chos rnams la lhun gyis grub pa ste /
T03D3805:196a-37: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rnam
T03D3805:196a-38: par smin pa'i chos nyid kyis gnas skabs dang thams
T03D3805:196a-39: cad dkar po'i rang bzhin can te /
T03D3805:196a-40: de'i phyir na mu med pa ste /
T03D3805:196a-41: chos de rnams kyang ngo bo nyid med pa dang
T03D3805:196a-42: ro gcig par lhun gyis grub pa'i rnam par smin
T03D3805:196a-43: pa las skyes pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:196a-44: de'i mu med pa nyid ji ltar zhe na /
T03D3805:196a-45: nam mkha' mu med pa'i dpe ste /
T03D3805:196a-46: ji ltar nam mkha' la mu med do //
T03D3805:196a-47: ngo bo nyid med pa dang lhun gyis grub pa
T03D3805:196a-48: yongs su 'gyur ba med do zhes pa ni rnam
T03D3805:196a-49: par smin pa las byung ba'i dkar po'i chos rnams
T03D3805:196a-50: thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gi sa la
T03D3805:196b-1: gnyis pa ni bstan bcos su /
T03D3805:196b-2: chos rnams rmi lam ltar gnas pa'i //
T03D3805:196b-3: sbyin la sogs la spyod pa yis //
T03D3805:196b-4: mtshan nyid med nyid chos rnams ni //
T03D3805:196b-5: skad cig ma ni gcig gis rtogs //
T03D3805:196b-7: rtogs pa ni blos te shes zhes bya ba'i don to //
T03D3805:196b-8: rmi lam lta bu dang dri za'i grong khyer lta
T03D3805:196b-9: bu dang gzugs brnyan lta bu rnams la'o zhes pa
T03D3805:196b-10: ni yum chen mor gsungs la /
T03D3805:196b-11: bstan bcos su tshig gcig nyid de /
T03D3805:196b-12: 'di rnams thams cad don gcig pa'i phyir la /
T03D3805:196b-13: de yang don rang bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs
T03D3805:196b-14: pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyis so sor snang par byed
T03D3805:196b-15: pa rnams la / 'di dag ni ji ltar mtshan
T03D3805:196b-16: nyid med cing ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir mtshan
T03D3805:196b-18: de'i chos phung po lnga po rnams ni sgyu ma
T03D3805:196b-19: dang rmi lam la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi
T03D3805:196b-20: phyir mtshan nyid med pa nyid la gnas nas pha
T03D3805:196b-21: rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed
T03D3805:196b-22: cing chos rnams thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs
T03D3805:196b-23: pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i ngo bo rnams
T03D3805:196b-24: la mtshan nyid med pa nyid du skad cig ma
T03D3805:196b-27: ri rab ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:196b-28: ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid ni kha dog bzhi'i rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:196b-29: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni //
T03D3805:196b-30: stong pa nyid pas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin rnams kyi
T03D3805:196b-31: chos rnams ro gcig pa nyid pas rnam pa sna
T03D3805:196b-32: tshogs pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes pa ni
T03D3805:196b-33: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos thams cad sems kyi skad
T03D3805:196b-34: cig gcig la mngon par rtogs te /
T03D3805:196b-37: rmi lam na ni de mthong nyid //
T03D3805:196b-38: gnyis kyi tshul du mi mthong ltar //
T03D3805:196b-39: chos rnams gnyis su med pa nyid //
T03D3805:196b-40: skad cig ma ni gcig gis mthong //
T03D3805:196b-42: rmi lam du mthong ba'i mi dang glang po dang rta la sogs pa can ni rmi lam ste /
T03D3805:196b-44: sad pa la tha dad du mi mthong ste /
T03D3805:196b-45: don dam par de dag ma skyes pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:196b-46: de'i 'di ltar thams cad du chos rnams kyi chos
T03D3805:196b-47: la yang ngo zhes pa ni chos rnams ni gzugs
T03D3805:196b-48: la sogs pa rnams la gzung ba dang 'dzin pa
T03D3805:196b-49: dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang /
T03D3805:196b-50: thog ma dang tha ma gnyis su med pa'i stong
T03D3805:197a-0: pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med pa @197a *
T03D3805:197a-1: // nyid du skad cig gcig la mthong ba ste /
T03D3805:197a-3: gzugs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:197a-4: mu med pa ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i ste /
T03D3805:197a-6: yod ces bya ba dang med ces bya ba gnyi ga yang mtha' la /
T03D3805:197a-7: dag ces bya ba dang ma dag ces bya ba 'di yang mtha' nyid de /
T03D3805:197a-8: de'i phyir gnyi ga'i mthar ni rnam par spang ba nyid byas shing /
T03D3805:197a-9: mkhas pas dbus la yang ni /
T03D3805:197a-10: gnas par byed pa yod pa ma yin zhes te /
T03D3805:197a-11: de rnams dang bral ba'i phyir mu med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:197a-12: gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang shes rab kyi pha
T03D3805:197a-13: rol tu phyin pa phung pos yang dag par bsdus
T03D3805:197a-14: pa rnams la'o zhes pa ni chos thams cad gnyis
T03D3805:197a-15: su med pa'i de kho na nyid sems kyi skad
T03D3805:197a-16: cig la mngon par rtogs pa ste bzhi pa'o gdul
T03D3805:197a-17: bar bya ba'i ngor ldog pa'i dbye bas rnam pa
T03D3805:197a-18: bzhir phye yang skad cig gis mngon du byed de
T03D3805:197a-19: / dper na snod tha dad kyang der son pa'i nam mkha' la ni tha dad med de /
T03D3805:197a-20: sgrib pa med pa nyid du mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:197a-21: de bzhin du gzugs dang tshor ba la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:197a-22: dngos po tha dad kyang der son pa'i de kho
T03D3805:197a-23: na nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid la ni
T03D3805:197a-24: tha dad pa med pas de kho na nyid ni
T03D3805:197a-25: gcig pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
T03D3805:197a-26: de yang shes pa'i skad cig ma gcig pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:197a-27: mngon par rtogs pa bdun pa'o //
T03D3805:197a-28: mngon par rtogs pa brgyad pa ni chos kyi sku
T03D3805:197a-29: ste 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi chung
T03D3805:197a-30: ngu'i chung ngu'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi bye brag
T03D3805:197a-31: la / gnyen po'i bye brag chen po'i chen po
T03D3805:197a-32: dngos gzhi dang rjes kyi ngo bo'i sems bskyed pa
T03D3805:197a-33: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa dang /
T03D3805:197a-34: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'i ngo bo'i kun du 'od
T03D3805:197a-35: ces bsgrags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sa der gnas pa'i
T03D3805:197a-36: dngos po'i sku gsum dang mdzad pa dang bcas pa
T03D3805:197a-37: ni sngon du mdor bstan las /
T03D3805:197a-38: ngo bo nyid yongs rdzogs bcas dang //
T03D3805:197a-39: sprul pa zhes dang rnam gsum dang //
T03D3805:197a-40: chos sku mdzad dang bcas pa ste //
T03D3805:197a-41: rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod //
T03D3805:197a-43: chos kyi lam ste mngon par rtogs pa bdun gyi
T03D3805:197a-44: ngo bo'i chos kyis thob par bya ba'i sku ni
T03D3805:197a-46: sku ni lus te sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:197a-47: bcom ldan 'das ma yum chen mor rnam pa thams
T03D3805:197a-48: cad du yongs su dag pa'i zag pa med pa'i
T03D3805:197b-0: chos rnams kyi gang zhig rang @197b bzhin de ni
T03D3805:197b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa yin par shes par bya la
T03D3805:197b-2: / de dag nyid kyi chos rnams rtogs pa'i phyir
T03D3805:197b-3: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po
T03D3805:197b-4: brgyad cus brgyan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus byang
T03D3805:197b-5: chub sems dpa' rnams la theg pa chen po'i mchog
T03D3805:197b-6: gi chos bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu
T03D3805:197b-7: ba dang sems pa dang bde ba la nye bar
T03D3805:197b-8: longs spyod pa ston par byed la /
T03D3805:197b-9: de dag nyid kyi chos rnams thams cad rtogs pas
T03D3805:197b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu
T03D3805:197b-11: med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su dus thams cad
T03D3805:197b-12: du rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sprin rnams
T03D3805:197b-13: kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do zhes gsungs
T03D3805:197b-14: pa dang / mdo sde rgyan las kyang /
T03D3805:197b-15: sangs rgyas rnams sku mdor bsdus nas //
T03D3805:197b-16: rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste //
T03D3805:197b-17: rten dang rang gzhan don du 'dir //
T03D3805:197b-18: sku gsum rnams ni bstan pa yin //
T03D3805:197b-20: 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis kyang sku gsum du bstan te /
T03D3805:197b-21: gang zhig gcig min du ma yin zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:197b-22: 'phags pa rnams par grol ba'i sdes kyang chos kyi sku ni gsum ste /
T03D3805:197b-23: ngo bo nyid dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3805:197b-25: gang zhig sgrib pa'i bag chags ma lus pa dang
T03D3805:197b-26: bcas pa'i rten gyi phung po lnga gzhan du mi
T03D3805:197b-27: 'jug pa'i rnam pa thams cad du yongs su dag
T03D3805:197b-28: pa'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i spros pa med pa
T03D3805:197b-29: rtogs pa'i bdag nyid byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs
T03D3805:197b-30: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos de rnams ni ngo bo
T03D3805:197b-31: nyid kyi skus yang dag par bsdus pa ste /
T03D3805:197b-32: chos dang chos nyid dag la dbye ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:197b-33: kun rdzob tu chos rnams ni chos nyid kyi yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:197b-34: mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba ni de rnams kyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba ste /
T03D3805:197b-36: gzhan dag gis chos kyi tshogs 'di rnams sangs rgyas
T03D3805:197b-37: rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o zhes bshad pa
T03D3805:197b-38: ni de'i lung ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:197b-39: sngags kyi tshul du yang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T03D3805:197b-40: chos kyi tshogs ni chos kyi sku'i yul gyi gtso
T03D3805:197b-41: bo nyid pas chos kyi skur nye bar btags kyi
T03D3805:197b-42: gang du yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur 'dod pa
T03D3805:197b-43: ni med do // de nyid kyi chos kyi tshogs
T03D3805:197b-44: la sku bzhi pa nyid du pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:197b-45: pa'i tshul du seng ge bzang pos rang bzos rnam
T03D3805:198a-1: pa ni spang bar bya ba nyid do //
T03D3805:198a-2: de la ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kho na nyid kyis te /
T03D3805:198a-3: gdul bar bya ba la sogs pa rnams la khyab pa'o //
T03D3805:198a-4: ngo bo nyid dam srid pa rnam par dag pa
T03D3805:198a-5: gzhan du rab kyi mthar son pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:198a-6: kyi sku ni spros pa mtha' dag rnam par log
T03D3805:198a-7: pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis mya ngan
T03D3805:198a-9: 'dir rnam par rtog pa thams cad de ltar zad
T03D3805:198a-10: cing sgrib pa'i 'ching ba rab tu spangs nas rnam
T03D3805:198a-11: par grol ba'i sku dang chos nyid kyi sku ni
T03D3805:198a-12: chos kyi skur yang brjod de /
T03D3805:198a-13: mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:198a-14: de la ni lam gyis thob par bya ba dang byed pa po med de /
T03D3805:198a-15: bcos ma ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:198a-17: thub pa'i ngo bo nyid sku ni //
T03D3805:198a-18: zag med chos rnams rnam kun du //
T03D3805:198a-19: rnam par dag 'gyur gang dag yin //
T03D3805:198a-20: de dag rang bzhin mtshan nyid can //
T03D3805:198a-22: rang bzhin ni ma skyes pa'i chos nyid chos kyi dbyings la /
T03D3805:198a-23: de nyid ni 'dir 'bras bu'i gnas skabs kyi chos
T03D3805:198a-24: kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la de nyid shin
T03D3805:198a-25: tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis te
T03D3805:198a-26: / shin tu rnam par dag ces pa dang /
T03D3805:198a-27: chos rnams kyi chos nyid ces pa dag don la
T03D3805:198a-28: tha dad med par 'dir gsungs pa ni nyi ma'i
T03D3805:198a-29: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T03D3805:198a-30: / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi shin tu rnam
T03D3805:198a-31: par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings ni nyi ma lta
T03D3805:198a-32: bu la de'i rang bzhin gyi shes rab kyi pha
T03D3805:198a-33: rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa'i ye shes kyi
T03D3805:198a-34: ngo bos phyogs bcur khyab pa'i ni 'od kyi tshogs
T03D3805:198a-35: / bzhin te / des gang zhig gi mu med pa'i shes bya snang bar byed la /
T03D3805:198a-36: de'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis mu med pa'i shes
T03D3805:198a-37: bya kun du snang bar byed pa bzhin no zhes
T03D3805:198a-38: pa ni ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o//
T03D3805:198a-39: kun du longs spyad pas longs spyod de nyams su myong ba'o //
T03D3805:198a-40: longs spyod pa las rab du byung bas so zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:198a-41: longs spyod pa po dang longs spyad par bya bas
T03D3805:198a-42: kyang sku la longs spyod pa'i phyir yang sku de
T03D3805:198a-44: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos bstan pa rjes su myong ba'i phyir na /
T03D3805:198a-46: zhes pas kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste /
T03D3805:198a-47: de'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:198a-48: sgra thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:198a-49: ston pas bstan pa la nyan pa nyid kyis byang
T03D3805:198a-50: chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang zhig theg pa chen
T03D3805:198a-51: po mchog gi chos rtogs pa de la /
T03D3805:198a-52: 'dir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la longs spyod par brjod do //
T03D3805:198b-0: gang @198b yang de skye ba rnams la chung ngu
T03D3805:198b-1: dang 'bring dang chen po'i yid bde ba'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:198b-2: rnams kyi dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rab tu
T03D3805:198b-3: sem pa rnams kyi bde ba'i nyams su myong ba
T03D3805:198b-4: de yang longs spyod pa ste /
T03D3805:198b-5: de'i mu med pa nyid ni sgra thams cad mu med pa nyid pas de'i rgyur gyur pas so //
T03D3805:198b-6: gang du de dag la ston pa byang chub sems
T03D3805:198b-7: dpa'i rtogs pa dag la go rims ji lta ba
T03D3805:198b-8: bzhin du mu med pa nyid du mkhyen pa dang
T03D3805:198b-9: bskyed pa bstan pa'i sgra dang bskyed bya dang skyed
T03D3805:198b-10: byed kyang ste / de ji ltar na thams cad
T03D3805:198b-11: ces ni bya sna tshogs pa la rjes su mthun
T03D3805:198b-12: pa rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad kyi gsal bar
T03D3805:198b-14: mu med pa ni tha ma med pa'i skus ston
T03D3805:198b-15: par byed pas mu med pa'i phyir la de bzhin
T03D3805:198b-16: gshegs pa'i yang dag par rtogs pa yang mu med
T03D3805:198b-17: pa nyid de / gang du zhe na /
T03D3805:198b-19: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:198b-20: ji skad du bshad pa'i ston pa nyid ni 'dir
T03D3805:198b-21: theg pa chen po'i chos yang dag par rtogs pa'i
T03D3805:198b-22: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
T03D3805:198b-23: de'i mu med pa nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3805:198b-24: rnams thams cad kyi yang dag par sgrub pa mu
T03D3805:198b-26: chos de rnams ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum chen mor gsungs la /
T03D3805:198b-28: byang chub phyogs mthun tshad med dang //
T03D3805:198b-29: rnam par thar dang mthar gyis ni //
T03D3805:198b-30: snyoms 'jug dgu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03D3805:198b-31: zad par bcu yi bdag nyid dang //
T03D3805:198b-32: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched ni //
T03D3805:198b-33: rab tu dbye bas rnam brgyad dang //
T03D3805:198b-34: nyon mongs med dang smon med mkhyen //
T03D3805:198b-35: mngon shes so sor yang dag rig / rnam pa thams cad dag bzhi dang //
T03D3805:198b-36: dbang bcu dang ni stabs bcu dang //
T03D3805:198b-37: mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi dag dang //
T03D3805:198b-38: srung ba med pa rnam gsum dang //
T03D3805:198b-39: dran pa nyer gzhag rnam gsum dang //
T03D3805:198b-40: bsnyel ba mi mnga'i chos nyid dang //
T03D3805:198b-41: bag chags yang dag bcom pa dang //
T03D3805:198b-42: skye la thugs rje chen po dang //
T03D3805:198b-43: thub pa kho na'i ma 'dres chos //
T03D3805:198b-46: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid ni //
T03D3805:198b-47: chos kyi sku zhes brjod pa yin //
T03D3805:198b-49: mthar gyis ni mthar gyis te gzhan dang 'brel ba'o //
T03D3805:198b-50: srung ba med pa ni srung bar byed pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:198b-51: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni 'dir zag pa med pa'i chos kyi tshogs la /
T03D3805:199a-0: bzhi zhes pa ni gnas yongs su @199a * //
T03D3805:199a-2: dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T03D3805:199a-3: sems yongs su dag pa dang /
T03D3805:199a-4: ye shes yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3805:199a-5: de dag la nyon mongs pa'i phyogs rnams thams cad
T03D3805:199a-6: kyi bag chags rnams kyi gnas ngan len rnams la
T03D3805:199a-7: mi gnas pa mthar thug pas /
T03D3805:199a-8: rang gi bdag nyid kyi lus ji ltar 'dod par
T03D3805:199a-9: len cing gnas pa dang 'chi 'pho ba la dbang
T03D3805:199a-10: sgyur ba ni thams cad du gnas par yongs su
T03D3805:199a-11: dag pa'o // dmigs pa rnam pa thams cad du
T03D3805:199a-12: sprul pas yongs su bsgyur ba'i kun du brtags pa
T03D3805:199a-13: rnams la dbang sgyur ba ni rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:199a-14: du dmigs pas yongs su dag pa'o //
T03D3805:199a-15: snga ma bzhin du sems kyi gnas ngan len thams
T03D3805:199a-16: cad dang bral zhing sems la rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:199a-17: kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i nye bar bsags pa ni
T03D3805:199a-18: rnam pa thams cad du sems yongs su dag pa'o
T03D3805:199a-19: // snga ma bzhin du ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi
T03D3805:199a-20: gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral bas shes bya
T03D3805:199a-21: dang shes pa la dbang sgyur ba nyid ni rnam
T03D3805:199a-22: pa thams cad du ye shes yongs su dag pa'o
T03D3805:199a-23: // // bcu zhes pa'i tshe la dbang ba ni
T03D3805:199a-24: ji ltar 'dod par tshe gnas pa dang gtong bas
T03D3805:199a-25: // // so // sems la dbang ba ni ji
T03D3805:199a-26: ltar 'dod par bsam gtan la sogs pa la snyoms
T03D3805:199a-27: par 'jug pa dang ldan pas so //
T03D3805:199a-28: yo byad la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa'i nye bar mkho ba'i rjes su gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:199a-29: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du du ma'i bkod
T03D3805:199a-30: pa'i rgyan gyis so sor brgyan par byin gyis brlabs
T03D3805:199a-31: pa la sogs pa kun du ston pas so //
