T03D3805:199a-32: las la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod par lus dang ngag gis las 'grub pa'o //
T03D3805:199a-33: skye ba la dbang ba ni thams cad du skye
T03D3805:199a-34: ba'i skye mched rnams ji ltar 'dod par skye ba'o
T03D3805:199a-35: // rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa rnams mngon par shes pa'o //
T03D3805:199a-36: smon lam la dbang ba ni smon lam thams cad yang dag par 'phel ba'o //
T03D3805:199a-37: mos pa la dbang ba ni gang du ji ltar
T03D3805:199a-38: mos par 'gyur ba de de nyid du 'gyur ba
T03D3805:199a-39: ste / ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T03D3805:199a-40: sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gang bar rtogs pa la
T03D3805:199a-41: ste / sogs pa'o // ye shes la dbang ba
T03D3805:199a-42: ni gang zhig shes par 'dod pa de shes pa'o
T03D3805:199a-43: ste / sogs pa'o // // chos la dbang ba
T03D3805:199a-44: ni mdo sde la sogs pa chos kyi rnam par
T03D3805:199a-45: gzhag pa rnams la mkhas pa'o //
T03D3805:199a-46: bcu po de rnams kyang mi g-yo ba la sogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:199b-0: srung ba med pa @199b gsum ni /
T03D3805:199b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste /
T03D3805:199b-2: de la ma dag pa'i kun du spyod pa rtsa bar bya ste /
T03D3805:199b-3: gzhan gyis gshe bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam pa med pa'o zhes pa ni dang po'o //
T03D3805:199b-4: de bzhin du gsung gi las ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:199b-5: de bzhin du thugs kyi phrin las ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:199b-6: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam pa gsum ni
T03D3805:199b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa la gus pa
T03D3805:199b-8: nyan pa rnams la rjes su chags pa med cing
T03D3805:199b-9: mi nyan pa rnams la yang khong khro ba med
T03D3805:199b-10: pa / gnyi ga dag la yang med pa de thams cad du btang snyoms su gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:199b-11: dran pa dang ldan la shes bzhin dang ldan pa'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:199b-12: bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid ni sangs rgyas
T03D3805:199b-13: rnams kyi sems can gyi don gyi bya ba dus
T03D3805:199b-15: nyon mongs pa spangs kyang gang du nyon mongs pa'i
T03D3805:199b-16: bag chags ma spangs pa dang bcas pa nyon mongs
T03D3805:199b-17: pa ma spangs pa bzhin du 'dod de /
T03D3805:199b-18: ji ltar spre'ur sngon gyur pa'i dgra bcom pas mchongs
T03D3805:199b-19: pas yur ba la rgal ba dang sngon du bram
T03D3805:199b-20: zer gyur pa'i 'phags pa pu lin da bad pas
T03D3805:199b-21: gang g'a'i lha mo la dmangs rigs mor brjod pa
T03D3805:199b-22: de lta bu dang ni de bzhin gshegs pa la
T03D3805:199b-24: thugs rje chen po'i bsam pa gang gis bcom ldan
T03D3805:199b-25: 'das dus thams cad dus drug tu byas pa'i 'jig
T03D3805:199b-26: rten la rnam par gzigs te su zhig nyams par
T03D3805:199b-27: 'gyur zhing su zhig 'phel bar 'gyur zhes pa la
T03D3805:199b-28: sogs pa'o // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
T03D3805:199b-29: ni chos thams cad ngo bo nyid khyad par dang
T03D3805:199b-30: sogs pa'o // / mtshan nyid kyi dbye ba'i mthar thug pa'i ye shes la /
T03D3805:199b-31: nyon mongs pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa la
T03D3805:199b-32: sogs pa 'dir nyon mongs pa'i rgyu de nyon mongs
T03D3805:199b-34: bdag tu dmigs pa las 'di rnams skye bar 'gyur
T03D3805:199b-35: ro zhes pas ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par
T03D3805:199b-36: zhugs nas de las langs nas grong la sogs par
T03D3805:199b-37: zhugs pa na de dmigs par byed pa la /
T03D3805:199b-38: de la de rnams kyi nyon mongs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
T03D3805:199b-39: nyon mongs pa med pa de ni byams pa gtso bo'o //
T03D3805:199b-41: nyan thos nyon mongs med pa'i lha //
T03D3805:199b-42: mi yi nyon mongs yongs spong nyid //
T03D3805:199b-43: rgyal bas grong sogs de rnams kyi //
T03D3805:199b-44: nyon mongs rgyun gcod nyon mongs med //
T03D3805:199b-45: ces te nyan thos kyi nyon mongs pa med pa
T03D3805:199b-46: ni nyan thos des sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs
T03D3805:200a-0: @200a * // pa'i rgyun mthong ba yongs su spangs kyi /
T03D3805:200a-1: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa mngon sum du byas pa ni ma yin la /
T03D3805:200a-2: bde bar gshegs pas ni rang gi yang mthong la
T03D3805:200a-3: gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa rab tu 'byung bar rgyun
T03D3805:200a-4: gcod de ma mthong ba'i yang ngo zhes pa'i don
T03D3805:200a-5: to // 'di shes par bya'o zhes smon nas bsam
T03D3805:200a-6: gtan la snyoms par 'jug pas 'jig rten gyi sngon
T03D3805:200a-7: byung ba la sogs pa la ye shes skye bar
T03D3805:200a-8: 'gyur ba ni de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi smon
T03D3805:200a-9: to // nas mkhyen pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang du byas nas /
T03D3805:200a-11: sangs rgyas smon nas mkhyen pa ni //
T03D3805:200a-12: lhun gyis grub dang chags spangs dang //
T03D3805:200a-13: thogs pa med dang rtag gnas dang //
T03D3805:200a-16: lhun gyis grub pa ni rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-17: chags pa spangs pa ni ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-18: thogs pa med pa ni thams cad du bar chad med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-19: rtag tu gnas pa ni rtag par thugs mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-20: 'dri ba kun len 'debs pa ni 'dri ba kun gyi len 'debs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-21: 'dir byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos kyi
T03D3805:200a-22: phung po 'di rnams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang
T03D3805:200a-23: / sprul pa'i sku ro gcig pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi sku nyid bdag por gyur nas /
T03D3805:200a-24: sems can gyi don gyi dbang gis khyab pa nyid rtag pa nyid de /
T03D3805:200a-25: de'i dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:200a-26: rgyu ni yongs su smin gyur nas //
T03D3805:200a-27: gang dang gang don gang tshe la //
T03D3805:200a-28: gang tshe bya ba phan gyur pa //
T03D3805:200a-29: de dang de la de snang ngo //
T03D3805:200a-30: lha yi rgyal pos char phab kyang //
T03D3805:200a-31: sa bon mi rung mi 'khrungs ltar //
T03D3805:200a-32: sangs rgyas rnams ni byung gyur kyang /
T03D3805:200a-33: skal ba med pas bzang mi myong //
T03D3805:200a-34: de ltar mdzad pa rgya cher phyir //
T03D3805:200a-35: sangs rgyas khyab par nges par brjod //
T03D3805:200a-36: de nyid zag pa med pa'i phyir //
T03D3805:200a-37: rtag pa zhes kyang brjod pa yin //
T03D3805:200a-39: de ltar ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03D3805:200a-40: de snang ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /
T03D3805:200a-41: sprul pa'i sku ste snang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:200a-42: ci'i phyir na dus rtag tu phan pa ma yin zhe na /
T03D3805:200a-45: sa bon du mi rung bar gyur pa'i s'a lu la sogs pa lta bu la /
T03D3805:200a-46: sangs rgyas rnams kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul
T03D3805:200b-0: pa'i sku rnams kyi skal @200b ba med de rang
T03D3805:200b-1: gi las kyi gnod pa byas nas skye ba'i rgyu
T03D3805:200b-3: bzang po de ni phan pa la /
T03D3805:200b-4: mdzad pa rgya che ba ni /
T03D3805:200b-5: skal ba dang ldan pa thams cad la phan par byed pa ste /
T03D3805:200b-6: de nyid mdzad pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sangs
T03D3805:200b-7: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la 'og min
T03D3805:200b-8: la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs shing bsam gyis
T03D3805:200b-9: mi khyab cing mtha' yas pa'i rin po che'i rang
T03D3805:200b-10: bzhin gyi gzhal yas khang du 'khor la sogs pa
T03D3805:200b-12: nam mkha' ji srid gnas par kun tu gnas te /
T03D3805:200b-13: de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji srid lta bu /
T03D3805:200b-14: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang de la gtso bo nyid du ji ltar 'thad na /
T03D3805:200b-16: sems can gyi 'jig rten dang snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T03D3805:200b-17: sems can yongs su dag pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:200b-18: sems can thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:200b-19: de la snod du sems can gang cung zhig skye
T03D3805:200b-20: bar gyur pa de thams cad 'phags pa'i sa thob
T03D3805:200b-21: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ste /
T03D3805:200b-22: de'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can
T03D3805:200b-23: gyi phung po de'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi
T03D3805:200b-24: tshogs dag mu med pa nyid kyis la /
T03D3805:200b-25: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ni 'dir
T03D3805:200b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis gang sems can de rnams rtogs
T03D3805:200b-27: pa'i phyir nam mkha' ji srid du yongs su smin
T03D3805:200b-29: sa'i khams zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T03D3805:200b-30: ji srid du rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar ro //
T03D3805:200b-31: de ltar yang de la snod kyi 'jig rten ni sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam ba la /
T03D3805:200b-35: dpag bsam gyi ljon pa la sogs pas yongs su
T03D3805:200b-36: bskor ba'i sems can rnams kyi gnas mchog tu 'bar
T03D3805:200b-37: ba'i gser la sogs pa'i rin po che sna bdun
T03D3805:200b-38: gyi rang bzhin gyis 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du
T03D3805:200b-39: mas gsal bar byed pa'i 'od zer chen po rab
T03D3805:200b-40: tu byung nas steng du nam mkha'i mthil dang rjes
T03D3805:200b-41: su mthun pa'i snang bar byed pa dang /
T03D3805:200b-42: 'phags pa'i dge slong dag khams drug gi sems can
T03D3805:200b-43: gyi khams drug car la ni 'dir skyes bu'o zhes
T03D3805:200b-45: 'dir de rnams kyi yang lus mdangs dang ldan zhing
T03D3805:200b-46: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can des dang rjes su mthun
T03D3805:200b-47: pa kha dog dang dbyibs te /
T03D3805:201a-0: de la kun tu 'bad pa med par longs spyod cing yongs su longs spyod @201a * //
T03D3805:201a-1: pa'i sems can rnams kyi lha'i 'jig rten las kyang khyad par du 'phags shing /
T03D3805:201a-2: gang dag 'di rnams la nye bar longs spyod pas
T03D3805:201a-3: nges par dge ba dang bde ba dang nges par
T03D3805:201a-4: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang nges par
T03D3805:201a-6: 'di 'dra bar khams drug yongs su dag pa mu med cing mthar thug pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:201a-7: shin tu rol pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:201a-8: 'dir de mu med pas de'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir /
T03D3805:201a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab la mu med pa nyid du rjes su rig par bya'o //
T03D3805:201a-10: de skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas /
T03D3805:201a-11: sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba bsags pa gzhom par bya ba dang /
T03D3805:201a-12: de'i gnyen po dge ba bsags par shes pa de
T03D3805:201a-13: rnams la tshad med pas de'i yongs su gcod pa
T03D3805:201a-14: po'i de rnams kyi shes rab las tshad med pa
T03D3805:201a-15: gsungs pa ni / dge ba zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:201a-16: ji srid du des de rnams la chos ston par
T03D3805:201a-17: byed pa de rnams thams cad kyis dge ba'i chos
T03D3805:201a-18: kun du bsags pa de rnams tshad med pas so
T03D3805:201a-19: // de'i rnam par gzhag pa po de rnams kyi
T03D3805:201a-20: shes rab la tshad med do zhes bya ba gsungs
T03D3805:201a-21: // pa ni / chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:201a-22: chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin ces pa la sogs
T03D3805:201a-23: pa ni chos rnams 'dzin pa dang ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:201a-24: la sems gnas pa nyid de mu med pa nyid
T03D3805:201a-26: thob pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de
T03D3805:201a-27: skyes pa po'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab
T03D3805:201a-28: la mu med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:201a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:201a-30: sangs rgyas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la de'i
T03D3805:201a-31: chos thams cad ni mtshan dang dpe byad rnams te
T03D3805:201a-32: de rnams kyi mu med pa nyid de yongs su
T03D3805:201a-33: mi chod par mnyam pa ste /
T03D3805:201a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa las gzhan la de 'dra ba rnams med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:201a-35: des bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab de dang 'dra
T03D3805:201a-36: ba mu med pa nyid kyi gang gang gis de'i
T03D3805:201a-37: rgyu shes pa nyid la rjes su gnas pas so
T03D3805:201a-39: mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis dang //
T03D3805:201a-40: dpe byad brgyad cu'i bdag nyid ni //
T03D3805:201a-41: theg chen nye bar longs spyod pas //
T03D3805:201a-42: thub pa'i yongs spyod rdzogs skur bzhed //
T03D3805:201a-43: phyag zhabs 'khor los mtshan dang rus sbal zhabs //
T03D3805:201a-44: phyag dang zhabs sor dra bas 'brel ba dang //
T03D3805:201b-0: phag ni zhabs bcas @201b 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags //
T03D3805:201b-1: 'di yi sku yi bdun dag mtho ba dang //
T03D3805:201b-2: sor mo ring dang rting yangs sku che drang //
T03D3805:201b-3: zhabs long mi mngon spu ni gyen du phyogs //
T03D3805:201b-4: byin pa ae n+ya ya 'dra phyag ring mdzes //
T03D3805:201b-5: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i mchog / phyags pa gser mdog pags pa srab pa dang //
T03D3805:201b-6: spu ni re re nas g-yas legs 'khrungs dang //
T03D3805:201b-7: zhal mdzod spus brgyan ro stod seng ge 'dra //
T03D3805:201b-8: 'di yi dpung pa'i mgo zlum thal gong rgyas //
T03D3805:201b-9: 'di la ro mi zhim par ro mchog snang //
T03D3805:201b-10: sku ni n+ya gro dha ltar chu zheng gab //
T03D3805:201b-11: gtsug tor yar 'phags ljags rings mdzes pa dang //
T03D3805:201b-12: tshangs dbyangs 'gram pa seng ge 'dra dang tshems //
T03D3805:201b-13: shin tu dkar dang thags bzang tshad mnyam dang //
T03D3805:201b-14: grangs ni bzhi bcu tham pa tshang ba dang //
T03D3805:201b-15: spyan ni mthon mthing spyan rdzi ba mchog gi /'dra ba 'di dag sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan //
T03D3805:201b-18: phyag dang zhabs dag mnyam zhing 'khor los mtshan pa'o //
T03D3805:201b-19: shin tu rab tu gnas pa'i phyir rus sbal lta bu'i zhabs so //
T03D3805:201b-20: ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar phyag dang zhabs dag la dra bas sbrel ba'o //
T03D3805:201b-21: phyag dang zhabs dag gi rgyab dang phrag pa dag
T03D3805:201b-22: dang mgul pa la sku sha nye bar bsags pa'i
T03D3805:201b-23: phyir te sku'i bdun mtho pa'o //
T03D3805:201b-24: che ba ni che ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:201b-25: zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang /
T03D3805:201b-26: de yang spu gyen du phyogs pa dang shin tu
T03D3805:201b-27: sbas pa'i zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa la
T03D3805:201b-29: 'dir brla'i rtsa ba man chod ni thams cad zhabs su de ltar gtang bar bya'o //
T03D3805:201b-30: phyag ring ba nyid ni yongs su brkyang ba ni
T03D3805:201b-31: brlabs ring ba nyid pus mo'i lha nga khebs pa'i
T03D3805:201b-32: phyir ro// mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa
T03D3805:201b-33: ni mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste
T03D3805:201b-34: phyir ro// / sbubs kyis g-yogs shing rab tu bkab
T03D3805:201b-35: pas 'di'i mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa'i
T03D3805:201b-36: phyir ro// / mchog go // mdzod spu ni thig
T03D3805:201b-37: le'i gnas su dkar po'i g-yas su 'khyil ba rtse
T03D3805:201b-39: 'di'i ro stod ni seng ge lta pu'o //
T03D3805:201b-40: zlum pa ni mgrin pa shin tu yongs su zlum pa ste /
T03D3805:201b-41: legs par 'byor ba'i mgrin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:201b-42: 'di'i thal gong dag ni nang gi bar gang ba dang bcas pa ste /
T03D3805:201b-43: der nye bar bsags pa'o zhes pa ni thal gong rgyas pa'o //
T03D3805:201b-44: n+ya gro dha ni 'dom gang ba ste /
T03D3805:202a-0: lte ba'i gong dang 'og gi rkang pa'i mthil @202a * //
T03D3805:202a-1: nas ji srid du mgo bo'i bar dang lag pa gnyis kyi bar 'dom gang mnyam pa'i sku'o //
T03D3805:202a-2: gtsug tor ni dbu la dkris pa'i rnam pa can no //
T03D3805:202a-3: 'gram pa seng ge ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tshes bcu gnyis pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:202a-4: 'di'i bcu'i tshad rnams kun du bsgyur bas so zhes pa ni bzhi bcu pa rnams so //
T03D3805:202a-5: ba mchog ni khyu mchog ste ba lang gi mchog go //
T03D3805:202a-6: 'di la mtshan ni gang gang gis //
T03D3805:202a-7: sgrub par byed pa'i rgyu gang yin //
T03D3805:202a-8: de dang de ni rab rdzogs par //
T03D3805:202a-10: ces pa bstan bcos las te /
T03D3805:202a-11: sgrub byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste ;
T03D3805:202a-13: bla ma skyel la sogs pa dang //
T03D3805:202a-14: yang dag blang ba bsten pa dang //
T03D3805:202a-15: bsdu ba bsten dang gya nom pas //
T03D3805:202a-16: dngos po sbyin dang gsad bya ba //
T03D3805:202a-17: thar par byed dang dge ba ni //
T03D3805:202a-18: yang dag blangs pa spel la sogs //
T03D3805:202a-19: sgrub byed rgyu yi mtshan nyid de //
T03D3805:202a-20: mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin//
T03D3805:202a-22: bla ma rnams la bsu ba dang bskyal ba dang
T03D3805:202a-23: chos mnyan nas 'khor lo la sogs pa sbyin pa
T03D3805:202a-24: ni dang po'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3805:202a-25: blangs pa yang dag bsten pa ni gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:202a-26: bsdu ba'i dngos po bsten pa ni gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:202a-27: gya nom pa ni bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa sbyin pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:202a-28: bcings pa dgrol ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:202a-29: srog rjes su gzung pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:202a-30: srog gcod pa las ldog pa bsten pa ste gsum pa'o //
T03D3805:202a-31: chos yang dag par blangs pa dag spel ba ste /
T03D3805:202a-33: bsnyen bkur dang rig pa bzo ba la sogs pa
T03D3805:202a-34: sbyin pa dang yod cing bdog pa la slong ba'i
T03D3805:202a-35: skye bo mi spong ba dang /
T03D3805:202a-36: skye bo thams cad la tshangs par spyod pa lan du bcug pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-37: gsang bar bya ba'i tshig bsrung pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-38: gya nom pa'i stan gyi gding g-yogs la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-40: gos la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-41: 'du 'dzi la sogs pa spangs pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-42: skye bo thams cad bla ma ji lta ba'i gnas la 'jog pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-43: rnam pa thams cad du ngag rtsub po'i tshig gis mi smod pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-44: snyan par smra ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:202a-45: legs par smra ba nyid kyis rjes su mthun pa dang /
T03D3805:202a-46: sman sbyin pa dang nad pa'i nye gnas dang /
T03D3805:202a-47: kun dga' ra ba'i gnas la sogs pa byed du 'jug pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-0: gnas gzhi la sogs pa rnams @202b la lhag par rab tu sbyin pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-1: 'jam po la sogs par smra ba dang /
T03D3805:202b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can rnams
T03D3805:202b-3: dam pa'i chos rnam par shes par byed pa dang
T03D3805:202b-4: / ngag 'khyal pa spangs pas skye bo thams cad rin po che la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-5: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa nyid dang bden par smra ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:202b-6: phra ma'i tshig la sogs pa med pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-7: sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du blta ba dang /
T03D3805:202b-8: khong khro ba la sogs pas dben par ston pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-9: byin pa ae n+ya ya 'dra ba la sogs pa
T03D3805:202b-10: rnams kyi rgyu ni go rims ji lta ba bzhin
T03D3805:202b-11: du nyi shu rtsa gnyis so //
T03D3805:202b-12: mtshan rnams las gzhan pa'i mjes par byed pa'i dpe
T03D3805:202b-13: byad rnams kyi dbang du byas nas bstan bcos las
T03D3805:202b-14: / thub pa'i sen mo zangs mdog dang //
T03D3805:202b-15: mdog snum mtho dang sen mo rnams //
T03D3805:202b-16: zlum rgyas byin gyis phra ba dang //
T03D3805:202b-17: rtsa mi mngon dang mdud pa med //
T03D3805:202b-18: long bu mi mngon zhabs mnyam dang /
T03D3805:202b-19: seng ge glang chen bya dang ni //
T03D3805:202b-20: khyu mchog stabs gshegs g-yas phyogs dang //
T03D3805:202b-21: mdzes gshegs drang dang 'khril bag chags //
T03D3805:202b-23: gtsang dang 'jam dang dag pa'i sku //
T03D3805:202b-24: dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa nyid //
T03D3805:202b-25: sku yi kho lag yangs shing bzang //
T03D3805:202b-26: gom snyoms spyan ni dag pa dang /
T03D3805:202b-27: shin tu gzhon mdog can nyid dang //
T03D3805:202b-28: sku zhum med dang rgyas pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-29: yan lag shin tu rnam dbyes dang //
T03D3805:202b-30: gzigs pa mu med dag pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-31: dku zlum skabs phyin ma rnyongs dang //
T03D3805:202b-32: phyam me ba dang lte ba ni //
T03D3805:202b-33: zab dang g-yas su 'khyil pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-34: kun nas blta na sdug pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-35: kun spyod gtsang dang sku la ni //
T03D3805:202b-36: sme ba gnag bag med pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-37: phyag ni shing bal ltar 'jam dang //
T03D3805:202b-38: phyag ris mdangs yod zab rings dang //
T03D3805:202b-39: zhal ni ha cang mi ring dang //
T03D3805:202b-40: mchu ni bim pa ltar dmar dang //
T03D3805:202b-41: ljags mnyen pa dang srab pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-42: dmar dang 'brug gi sgra nyid dang //
T03D3805:202b-43: gsung mnyen mnyam dang mche ba ni //
T03D3805:202b-44: zlum dang dkar dang rno ba dang //
T03D3805:202b-45: byin gyis phra dang shangs mtho dang //
T03D3805:202b-46: mchog tu dag pa nyid dang ni //
T03D3805:202b-47: spyan yangs pa dang rdzi ma stug / pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang //
T03D3805:202b-48: smig tshugs ring dang 'jam pa dang //
T03D3805:202b-49: snum dang spu ni g-yas phyogs dang //
T03D3805:202b-50: phyag ring rgyas dang snyan mnyam dang //
T03D3805:203a-2: dpral ba legs par dbyes pa dang //
T03D3805:203a-3: dbyes che ba dang dbu rgyas dang //
T03D3805:203a-4: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag dang //
T03D3805:203a-6: mi bshor skyes bu'i yid 'phrog dang //
T03D3805:203a-7: dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis ni //
T03D3805:203a-8: g-yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan pa ste //
T03D3805:203a-9: sangs rgyas dpe byad bzang por bzhed //
T03D3805:203a-11: gzugs rnams kyi gzugs brnyan 'di 'char ba de ltar 'di'i sku la 'dir gzugs brnyan shar ba'o //
T03D3805:203a-12: spu mnyam pa dang de la sen mo zangs kyi mdog nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-14: sen mo mtho ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-15: sen mo zlum pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-16: sor mo byin gyis phra ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-17: rtsa mi mngon pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-18: rtsa'i mdud pa med pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-19: long bu mi mthong ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-21: seng ge'i 'gros kyis gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-22: glang po che'i 'gros kyis gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-23: ngang pa'i stabs kyis gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-24: khyu mchog gi stabs kyis gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-25: g-yas phyogs su bskor zhing gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-26: mdzes par gshegs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-27: yon po ma yin pa'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-28: 'khril bag chags pa'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-29: byi dor byas pa lta bu'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-30: rim par 'tsham pa'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-34: dpe byad yongs su rdzogs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-35: yangs shing mdzes pa'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-36: gom pa snyoms pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-37: spyan rnam par dag pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-38: shin tu gzhon mdog can gyi sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-39: ma zhum pa'i sku nyid dang //
T03D3805:203a-41: shin tu rnam par phye ba'i sku nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-42: yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-43: gzigs pa rab rib med pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-45: dku skabs phyin pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-46: dku ma rnyongs pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-48: lte ba zab pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-49: lte ba g-yas phyogs su 'khyil pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-50: kun nas blta na sdug pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-51: kun du spyod pa gtsang ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-52: sku la sme ba'i gnag bag med pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-53: phyag shing ba la ltar 'jam pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-54: phyag gi ri mo snum pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-55: phyag gi ri mo ring ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203a-56: zhal ha cang mi ring ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-0: mchu bim pa @203b ltar dmar ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-7: rdzi ma stug pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-8: dkar ba dang gnag pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i spyan nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-10: smin ma snum pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-12: phyag ring zhing rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-14: dpral ba legs par mdzes pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-15: dpral ba'i dbyes che ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-16: dbu yongs su rgyas pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-17: dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-18: dbu skra stug pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-20: dbu skra ma 'dzings pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-21: dbu skra mi bshor ba nyid dang /
T03D3805:203b-24: g-yung drung 'khyil pa rnams phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil
T03D3805:203b-25: rnams la'o zhes pa'i dpe byad brgyad cu rnams dang
T03D3805:203b-26: / mtshan rnams ni gdul bar bya ba'i dad pa
T03D3805:203b-27: mngon par 'phel ba'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa nyid
T03D3805:203b-28: / de / 'di dag la ni 'di 'dra ba zhes bya bar mi nus pa nyid do //
T03D3805:203b-29: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dag la
T03D3805:203b-30: ni rnam pa sna tshogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab
T03D3805:203b-31: pa'i kha dog dang dbyibs la sogs pa rnams su
T03D3805:203b-32: bla na med pa'i tshul du mang du bstan pa'i
T03D3805:203b-33: phyir dang mdo sde yang ste /
T03D3805:203b-34: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag po dang /
T03D3805:203b-35: rang gi mos pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3805:203b-36: gser gyi kha dog la sogs pa'i sku mthong bar
T03D3805:203b-38: mtshan dang po 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3805:203b-39: rnams dang 'khor los sgyur ba rnams la yang yod
T03D3805:203b-40: mod kyi / cung zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yul na gnas pa dang /
T03D3805:203b-41: gsal ba dang rdzogs pa rnams kyis bla na med pa'o //
T03D3805:203b-42: sprul pa ni sprul pa ste des na sprul pa'i
T03D3805:203b-43: sku de ni mya ngan las 'da' zhing thams cad
T03D3805:203b-44: nas thams cad du nam mkha' ji srid bar dus
T03D3805:203b-45: ji lta ba dang bsam pa ji lta bar mtha'
T03D3805:203b-46: dag gi mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs
T03D3805:203b-47: pa yang dag par sgrub pa'i sprul pa'i las rnams
T03D3805:203b-48: la sh'a kya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa la
T03D3805:203b-49: sogs pa'i skur sprul byed do zhes pa ni sprul
T03D3805:203b-50: pa yang yin la sku yang yin pas sprul pa'i
T03D3805:204a-0: sku ste / de'i dbang du byas nas bstan @204a * //
T03D3805:204a-2: gang gis srid pa ji srid par //
T03D3805:204a-3: 'gro la phan pa sna tshogs dag / mnyam du mdzad pa'i sku de ni //
T03D3805:204a-4: thub pa'i sprul sku rgyun mi 'chad //
T03D3805:204a-5: de bzhin las kyang rgyun mi 'chad //
T03D3805:204a-8: de ltar sems can mnyam po la mi mnyam par
T03D3805:204a-9: so sor snang ba ni sems can rnams kyi bdag
T03D3805:204a-12: chos thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:204a-14: thang dang bar snang la rgyu ba'i brtan pa dang
T03D3805:204a-15: g-yo ba rnams kyi lus ngag gis kun du bsdus
T03D3805:204a-16: pas ni chos rnams la sems can rnams gdul ba'i
T03D3805:204a-17: phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten
T03D3805:204a-18: gyi khams sprul pa nyid ni chos thams cad de
T03D3805:204a-19: / de rnams mu med pa nyid pas bcom ldan
T03D3805:204a-20: 'das kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:204a-21: la mu med pa ste des sprul pa nyid do
T03D3805:204a-22: / // stong pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:204a-23: ni ji ltar sprul pa'i sku rnams mtha' yas pa
T03D3805:204a-24: de ltar de rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyang mtha'
T03D3805:204a-26: gang gi stong pa nyid na rang gi ngo bo
T03D3805:204a-27: nyid kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin
T03D3805:204a-28: rgyud pa'i blo rnams kyis te /
T03D3805:204a-29: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin te /
T03D3805:204a-30: mu med pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T03D3805:204a-31: ji ltar de rnams kyi lus dang ngag sprul pa
T03D3805:204a-32: de bzhin du sems dang sems las byung ba yang
T03D3805:204a-33: ji ltar sprul par ma gyur na /
T03D3805:204a-34: de'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir te /
T03D3805:204a-35: snga na med pa'i sems can rnams 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:204a-36: 'o na sangs rgyas rnams ni sku dang gsung dang
T03D3805:204a-37: thugs sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i thabs kyi las can zhes
T03D3805:204a-38: gsungs pa ni bden par 'dod de /
T03D3805:204a-39: 'on kyang bden pa'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu can te /
T03D3805:204a-40: lha'i byin gyis brlabs nas rmi lam mthong ba bzhin te /
T03D3805:204a-41: ngag gi don shes par byed pa bzhin te /
T03D3805:204a-43: sems zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:204a-44: sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtha' yas
T03D3805:204a-45: pa'i sems can gyi spyod pa rnams la rnam par
T03D3805:204a-46: gzigs nas sprul pa sna tshogs pa rnams kyis bcom
T03D3805:204a-47: ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chos ston par byed
T03D3805:204a-49: sems kyi spyod pa zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:204a-50: sems can de rnams kyis ji ltar nye bar bstan
T03D3805:204b-0: pa'i chos la kun du @204b dmigs par byed pa'i
T03D3805:204b-1: gnyen po dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skye bar
T03D3805:204b-2: gyur nas mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi mi dge ba'i
T03D3805:204b-3: chos rnams rab tu spong bar byed de /
T03D3805:204b-5: dge ba zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:204b-6: sprul pa nyid ni ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ste /
T03D3805:204b-7: sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i glang po che la
T03D3805:204b-8: sogs pa'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa ni de'i skur 'gyur
T03D3805:204b-9: ba med do // rang gi lus nyid du byin
T03D3805:204b-10: gyis brlabs shing sprul nas rang gi lus bzhin du
T03D3805:204b-11: ba med do // 'gro ba dang / tha snyad
T03D3805:204b-12: la sogs pa dang dka' spyad rnams su rnam par
T03D3805:204b-13: spros pa de'i bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'o zhes pa
T03D3805:204b-15: de la sku gsum po 'di rnams kyang ni rtag pa ste /
T03D3805:204b-16: ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis rtag pas rtag pa ste /
T03D3805:204b-17: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:204b-18: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni de rten pas rtag pas rtag pa ste /
T03D3805:204b-19: thog ma 'dod kyang tha ma med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:204b-20: de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa'i chos kyi tshogs kyang ngo //
T03D3805:204b-21: sprul pa'i sku ni rgyun rtag pa ste rtag tu 'byung zhing nub pa dang /
T03D3805:204b-22: nub nas yang nas yang du yul tha dad par
T03D3805:204b-23: rtag tu 'jug pas na de ltar mdzad pa yang
T03D3805:204b-25: de la dhring ni kun tu gnas pa ste /
T03D3805:204b-26: zhes pa nyid la gang du yang 'jig par 'gyur ba med do zhes pa ni chos so //
T03D3805:204b-27: chos kyang 'di la sku yang 'di lta ste /
T03D3805:204b-28: lus yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:204b-29: chos kyi sku ni bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'dus ma byas pa'i don dam pa ste /
T03D3805:204b-30: de la brten pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:204b-31: longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku dang gsum
T03D3805:204b-32: ni de ltar kun rdzob kyi ngo bo ste 'jig
T03D3805:204b-33: rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis 'dus byas pa'i don
T03D3805:204b-34: dam par ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:204b-35: can chos kyi sku'i ngo bo ste go rims ji
T03D3805:204b-36: lta ba bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
T03D3805:204b-37: rgyas rnams dang / sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T03D3805:204b-38: de las cig shos kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T03D3805:204b-39: la sogs pa rnams la yang so sor snang bar
T03D3805:204b-40: byed de / ji ltar chos kyi sku la brten
T03D3805:204b-41: pa nyid na ni chos kyi sku nyid mngon par
T03D3805:204b-42: byang chub par gyur nas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i
T03D3805:204b-43: rtse mo la 'di las sprul pa'i sku yang de
T03D3805:204b-45: cung zhig chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T03D3805:204b-46: sku dang sprul pa de'i 'od zer dag las kyang
T03D3805:205a-1: dngos gzhi dang rjes ni ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid de /
T03D3805:205a-2: de ltar yang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdor sangs rgyas
T03D3805:205a-3: kyi sa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi
T03D3805:205a-4: dbyings kyis bsdus pa'i me long lta bu dang /
T03D3805:205a-6: so sor kun du rtog pa dang /
T03D3805:205a-7: bya ba nan tan no zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:205a-8: de la bag chags dang bcas pa'i sgrib pa gnyis
T03D3805:205a-9: las grol ba'i snying rje dang shes rab gnyis su
T03D3805:205a-10: med pas chos kyi dbyings kun du rtogs pa ni
T03D3805:205a-11: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi
T03D3805:205a-12: ye shes so // me long lta bu'i ye shes
T03D3805:205a-13: ni gang du nam mkha' ji srid pa'i rdul phra
T03D3805:205a-14: rab kyi mu med pa'i khams gsum pa'i sems can
T03D3805:205a-15: ye shes so // dang / cig shos kyi dngos
T03D3805:205a-16: po thams cad ji ltar ring ba dang nye ba'i
T03D3805:205a-19: da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi so sor gnas pa
T03D3805:205a-20: me long bzhin du gzugs brnyan gsal bar so sor
T03D3805:205a-21: snang ba'o // mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes ni
T03D3805:205a-22: gang gis de ltar mthong ba'i 'gro ba de rnams
T03D3805:205a-23: chos la bdag med par mnyam par nges shing sems
T03D3805:205a-24: can thams cad rtog par bdag dang mnyam pa nyid
T03D3805:205a-25: kyi sems de rnams kyis thob pa'o //
T03D3805:205a-26: so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes ni gang
T03D3805:205a-27: gis de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa nyid kyis bcom
T03D3805:205a-28: ldan 'das la rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid
T03D3805:205a-29: kyang rang gi sngon gyi smon lam dang /
T03D3805:205a-30: sems can gyi bsod nams kyi dbang gis sems can
T03D3805:205a-31: thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa so sor brtags
T03D3805:205a-32: pa'o // bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni
T03D3805:205a-33: de ltar so sor brtags pa nyid kyis 'gro ba
T03D3805:205a-34: la ji ltar rigs par mdzad pas gnas pa'o //
T03D3805:205a-35: ye shes lnga po 'di rnams dang //
T03D3805:205a-36: gzhan yang mngon par shes pa dang /
T03D3805:205a-37: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i grangs las
T03D3805:205a-38: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun rdzob pa
T03D3805:205a-39: la rnam par rtog pa med pa de rnams ni
T03D3805:205a-40: gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3805:205a-41: bde ba'o zhes bcom ldan 'das ma las gsungs pa
T03D3805:205a-42: na bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin te /
T03D3805:205a-43: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang lhan cig spyod de /
T03D3805:205a-44: gzugs dang ro gcig bzhin du tshogs pa gcig la
T03D3805:205a-45: brten pa'i 'brel pa dang gzhan pa'i cha med pas
T03D3805:205a-46: gnas pa cig car ba'i rgyud la phan tshun dbye
T03D3805:205a-47: bas rnam par gzhag pa ni gang du yang dbye
T03D3805:205a-48: ba med de / ldog pa'i dbye ba rnams kyi
T03D3805:205a-49: phye bas rnam par gzhag pa la dgongs pa ste
T03D3805:205a-50: ba med de / / don dam pa ni dbye
T03D3805:205b-0: ba dang @205b dbye ba med pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:205b-1: spros pa mtha' dag gis stong pa nyid do //
T03D3805:205b-2: dbu ma pa gzhan gyis 'dod pas de nyid de ltar yod pa ma yin pa nyid de /
T03D3805:205b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes na ni /
T03D3805:205b-4: de ltar rnam par dag pa'i kun rdzob chad pa'i lta bas smod par byed pa nyid de /
T03D3805:205b-5: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis kun rdzob kyi ngo
T03D3805:205b-6: bo'i so sor rang gis rig pa ni chad pa
T03D3805:205b-8: sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:205b-9: kyi rten gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i rang gi bsod
T03D3805:205b-10: nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dbang gis sgrib
T03D3805:205b-11: pa med pa'i phung po lnga po rnams kun rdzob
T03D3805:205b-12: tu gzhan du yod pa nyid de /
T03D3805:205b-13: 'dir rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa nas brtsams nas /
T03D3805:205b-14: mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:205b-15: mun pa 'grib pa nyid kyis mu med pa'i mngon
T03D3805:205b-16: par shes pa la sogs pa ye shes kyi snang
T03D3805:205b-17: ba bsags pa nyid kyi rim gyis mun pa med
T03D3805:205b-18: nas sa bcu pa la mu med pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:205b-19: bdag nyid can du byed pas bcu gcig pa la
T03D3805:205b-20: med ces ci'i phyir 'dir rigs te /
T03D3805:205b-21: de la ni ma rig pa la sogs pa ma lus pa'i mun pa'i 'khrul pa spangs nas dang /
T03D3805:205b-22: ma 'dres pa'i bla na med pa'i bsam gyis mi
T03D3805:205b-23: khyab pa'i mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i ye
T03D3805:205b-24: shes kyi snang ba mu med pa'i khams gsum pa
T03D3805:205b-25: rnams na mtshams med pa 'phro ba nyid du rigs
T03D3805:205b-26: kyi chad par ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:205b-27: shin tu rnam par dag pa rtogs pa'i rgyud la
T03D3805:205b-28: kun rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid med na mu med
T03D3805:205b-29: pa'i sems can rnams kyi rgyud kyi rig pa dang
T03D3805:205b-31: stobs dang ma 'dres pa la sogs pa'i chos kyi
T03D3805:205b-32: phung po yang ye shes lnga rnams gang gis mkhyen
T03D3805:205b-33: cing gang gis chos bstan pa rnams kyi gzhan du
T03D3805:205b-34: don byed pa snying rje chen pos smon lam btab
T03D3805:205b-35: pa rab tu sad pa'i dbang gis gang du gzugs
T03D3805:205b-36: kyi sku snang bar 'gyur ba'o zhe na /
T03D3805:205b-37: gang yang bcom ldan 'das ma 'di'i yongs su bsngo
T03D3805:205b-38: ba'i le 'ur rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba
T03D3805:205b-39: zhes pa des gnod par 'gyur te /
T03D3805:205b-40: de'i phyir yang myong ba'i bdag can ni bcom ldan 'das so //
T03D3805:205b-42: 'tshe ba med pa'i yang dag don //
T03D3805:205b-43: rtogs pa shin tu rgyas rnams kyi //
T03D3805:205b-44: chad pa med de bde gzung dang //
T03D3805:205b-45: snying brtse ba'i bdag nyid kyis //
T03D3805:205b-46: ji ltar gsungs pa'i rigs pas ni //
T03D3805:206a-0: ji ltar na des yongs su gcod par @206a * //
T03D3805:206a-1: byed pa'i dngos po rnams la ni mtha' med de /
T03D3805:206a-2: dper na bden pa'i rmi lam gyi shes pas mi slu ba ste /
T03D3805:206a-3: de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi shes pa shes
T03D3805:206a-4: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas
T03D3805:206a-5: pa la goms pa'i mthus ma rig pa la sogs
T03D3805:206a-6: pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas phyogs bcur nam mkha' ji
T03D3805:206a-7: srid par byung zin pa dang 'byung ba dang 'byung
T03D3805:206a-8: bar 'gyur ba'i kun rdzob kyi ngo bo'i snod kyi
T03D3805:206a-9: 'jig rten dang / sems can gyi 'jig rten dang /
T03D3805:206a-10: grangs med pa nyid kyi mtha' yas pa la de
T03D3805:206a-11: ltar de'i mngon sum ni gang yang slu ba med
T03D3805:206a-12: pas mngon sum gyi tshad mas rnam par gzhal bar
T03D3805:206a-13: bya ste / ngo bo nyid kyi dngos por ni
T03D3805:206a-14: des cung zhig kyang nye bar dmigs pa med do
T03D3805:206a-15: bya ste / // de yang chos yang dag par sdud par /
T03D3805:206a-16: mthong ba med pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi mthong ba dam pa'o zhes gsungs te /
T03D3805:206a-17: ji ltar na chos thams cad la bdag med pa rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mngon sum ste /
T03D3805:206a-18: de ni dngos po med pa'o zhe na /
T03D3805:206a-20: gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po rnams kyis
T03D3805:206a-21: bdag med pa'i de kho na nyid mngon sum du
T03D3805:206a-22: byed pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te /
T03D3805:206a-23: de nyid la mthong ba med par brjod kyi /
T03D3805:206a-24: med pa dgag pa'i tshul gyis ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:206a-25: de ltar yang blo gros chen po byang chub sems
T03D3805:206a-26: dpas sgyu ma dang rmi lam bzhin du chos thams
T03D3805:206a-27: cad nye bar bstan par bya ste /
T03D3805:206a-28: mthong ba dang mthong ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
T03D3805:206a-29: phyir ro zhes te de la mthong ba'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:206a-30: ni kun rdzob la mthong ba med pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3805:206a-31: ni don dam pa nyid do zhes pa ni mdo'i
T03D3805:206a-32: don to // gang yang chos rnams thams cad don
T03D3805:206a-33: dam par skye ba med pa dang ro gcig pa
T03D3805:206a-34: nyid du mngon sum pas don dam par ngo bo
T03D3805:206a-35: nyid med kyang kun rdzob tu mngon sum la sogs
T03D3805:206a-37: de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum nyid
T03D3805:206a-38: la ma lus pa'i dngos por skyes pa'i rnam pa
T03D3805:206a-39: thams cad lag mthil du skyu ru ra bzhag pa
T03D3805:206a-40: bzhin du gsal bar rig ste /
T03D3805:206a-41: rnal 'byor pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:206a-43: mkhyen pa'i skad cig gcig la ni //
T03D3805:206a-44: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor kun khyab pa'i //
T03D3805:206a-45: yon tan rin chen bsam mi khyab //
T03D3805:206a-46: chu bo'i 'khor ba ji srid 'jug / ces pa
T03D3805:206a-47: ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:206a-48: mkhyen pa nyid ye shes su rnam par gzhag ste
T03D3805:206b-0: / ma lus @206b pa'i phyin ci log spangs kyang
T03D3805:206b-1: thugs rje chen po'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang
T03D3805:206b-2: gis ji srid du sems can gyi las dang nyon
T03D3805:206b-3: mongs pa dang nam mkha' ji srid par gnas pa
T03D3805:206b-4: / nyid do // bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang
T03D3805:206b-5: chub sems dpar gyur pa na smon lam bskyed par
T03D3805:206b-6: / nyid do // byas te / ji ltar sangs
T03D3805:206b-7: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ltar bdag gis rnam par
T03D3805:206b-8: rtog pa med pa'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin
T03D3805:206b-9: du ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i sems can gyi
T03D3805:206b-10: don sgrub par byed pa'i mchog tu yongs su mthar
T03D3805:206b-11: thug pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang ji srid
T03D3805:206b-12: nam mkha' gnas kyi bar du gnas nas phan par
T03D3805:206b-14: 'dir de ltar sgyu ma la sogs pa rnams sngags
T03D3805:206b-15: dang sman la sogs pa'i rang gi rgyu tshogs pa'i
T03D3805:206b-17: de ltar rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi ye shes la
T03D3805:206b-18: sogs pa yang sgyu ma ste ma brtags na nyams
T03D3805:206b-19: dga' ba rnams kyi rab tu 'jug pa nyid de
T03D3805:206b-20: / rkyen sna tshogs pa'i dbang gis sgyu ma rnams kyang sna tshogs par ston pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:206b-22: sgyu ma'i mkhan po bzhin du des sgyu ma ji
T03D3805:206b-23: ltar yang dag par yongs su shes nas de kho
T03D3805:206b-24: na nyid du mngon par zhen par mi byed de
T03D3805:206b-25: / gang zhig de'i skye ba la sogs pa'i sgyu
T03D3805:206b-26: ma rnams la byis pas rtogs ldan gyi skye bo
T03D3805:206b-27: bzhin du ji ltar mthong ba la bden pa mngon
T03D3805:206b-28: par zhen pas de ni byis pa zhes brjod la
T03D3805:206b-29: / / de la rnal 'byor ba'i ye shes la
T03D3805:206b-30: sogs pa sgyu ma ni ji ltar rang dang rjes
T03D3805:206b-31: su mthun pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs
T03D3805:206b-32: / / kyi rgyu ste / bcom ldan 'das rnams
T03D3805:206b-33: kyi mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu
T03D3805:206b-34: ni snying rje dang shes rab bo //
T03D3805:206b-35: de'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thabs
T03D3805:206b-36: dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i bgrod pa'i lam
T03D3805:206b-37: gsungs pa'o // 'o na chos thams cad stong pa
T03D3805:206b-38: nyid kyi de kho na nyid mthong ba can gyi
T03D3805:206b-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar phyi rol gyi don
T03D3805:206b-40: dang rnam par shes pa dag kha cig tu ji
T03D3805:206b-41: skad du bshad pa'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can
T03D3805:206b-42: gyi chos kyi sku de'i kha cig tu yod ces
T03D3805:206b-43: pa dang kha cig tu dgag par byed na kun
T03D3805:206b-44: rdzob tu yod par byed de kun rdzob ces ni
T03D3805:206b-45: mi brjod pa ni bden par mngon par zhen pa
T03D3805:206b-46: can gyi gdul bar bya ba 'jug pa'i don du'o
T03D3805:206b-47: gsungs pa'o // // don dam par dgag pa byed de /
T03D3805:207a-0: bden pa nyid du sgro btags pa'i rjes @207a * //
T03D3805:207a-1: su brjod pa ji ltar na rjes su brjod pa
T03D3805:207a-2: de stong pa nyid mthong ba la ni sgro btags
T03D3805:207a-3: kyi snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:207a-4: 'jig rten gyi blo nyid kyi rjes su brjod pa ste /
T03D3805:207a-5: 'jig rten gyi blo de lta bu blo ni thog ma med pa'i ma rig pa'i dbang gis te /
T03D3805:207a-6: des 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i sems
T03D3805:207a-7: bzhin du shes pa nyid kyis rjes su brjod nas
T03D3805:207a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgag pa mdzad do //
T03D3805:207a-9: rnam par rtog pa med kyang 'khor lo 'khor ba
T03D3805:207a-10: bzhin du sngon gyi 'phen pa'i shugs kyis skal ba
T03D3805:207a-11: dang ldan pa'i gdul bya rnams la ston par byed
T03D3805:207a-12: pa'i ston pa po nyid du dmigs pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:207a-13: // skyes bu nor bu rin chen bzhin //
T03D3805:207a-14: kun du dmigs pa tsam gyis te //
T03D3805:207a-15: ji ltar 'dod pa'i rtsig sogs las //
T03D3805:207a-17: de la rtog pa med kyang ni //
T03D3805:207a-19: kun du sems can kun don la //
T03D3805:207a-20: phyogs rnams kun du tha dad do //
T03D3805:207a-21: zhes te zhar la 'ongs pa spros pas dgos pa med do //
T03D3805:207a-22: ji skad du bshad pa'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid
T03D3805:207a-23: can gyi chos kyi sku de'i mdzad pa mdor bsdus
T03D3805:207a-25: seng ge'i sgra zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:207a-26: ri dags rnams kyi mchog ni seng ge la de
T03D3805:207a-27: dang chos mthun pas lha dang mi la sogs pa
T03D3805:207a-28: rnams thams cad kyi skyes bu'i mchog ni de bzhin
T03D3805:207a-29: gshegs pa ste / des na seng ge zhes brjod do //
T03D3805:207a-30: de'i chos ni bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T03D3805:207a-31: pha rol gyi rgol ba'i ri dags rnams 'jigs par byed pas seng ge'i sgra zhes brjod de /
T03D3805:207a-32: seng ge'i rgyal mtshan bzhin la /
T03D3805:207a-33: de'i sgra ni ston pa po ste /
T03D3805:207a-35: des shes rab kyis dgongs par byas nas pha rol tu 'gro bas na /
T03D3805:207a-36: pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o //
T03D3805:207a-37: de yang seng ge'i sgras ni mdzad pa nyi shu rtsa bdun bstan pa la /
T03D3805:207a-38: de ni rgyas par yum chen mor blta bar bya ste /
T03D3805:207a-41: 'gro rnams zhi ba'i las dang ni //
T03D3805:207a-42: bsdu rnams bzhi la 'god pa dang //
T03D3805:207a-43: kun nas nyon mongs bcas pa yi //
T03D3805:207a-44: rnam par byang ba rtogs pa dang //
T03D3805:207a-45: sems can rnams don ji bzhin du //
T03D3805:207a-46: don dang pha rol phyin drug dang //
T03D3805:207a-47: sangs rgyas lam dang rang bzhin gyi //
T03D3805:207a-48: stong pa nyid dang gnyis zad dang //
T03D3805:207b-0: brda dang dmigs pa @207b med pa dang //
T03D3805:207b-1: lus can rnams ni yongs smin dang //
T03D3805:207b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ni //
T03D3805:207b-3: mngon par zhen pa bzlog pa dang //
T03D3805:207b-4: byang chub thob dang sangs rgyas zhing //
T03D3805:207b-5: yongs su dag par bya ba dang //
T03D3805:207b-6: tshad med pa dang sems can don //
T03D3805:207b-7: sangs rgyas rten sogs yon tan dang //
T03D3805:207b-8: byang chub yan lag lam rnams ni //
T03D3805:207b-9: chud mi za dang bden mthong dang //
T03D3805:207b-10: phyin ci log ni spangs pa dang //
T03D3805:207b-11: de gzhi med pa'i tshul dang yang //
T03D3805:207b-12: rnam par byang dang tshogs dang ni //
T03D3805:207b-14: tha dad yongs su mi shes dang //
T03D3805:207b-15: mya ngan 'das la dgod pa ste //
T03D3805:207b-16: chos kyi sku yi phrin las ni //
T03D3805:207b-17: rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod //
T03D3805:207b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams gzung ba'i don du sprul pa ste /
T03D3805:207b-20: gang dmyal ba rnams kyi dmyal ba'i me zhi ba dang /
T03D3805:207b-21: dud 'gro rnams la rang gi sha la sogs pa'i sbyin pa dang /
T03D3805:207b-22: yi dags la bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs
T03D3805:207b-23: pa sbyin pa nyid kyis chos ston pa la sems
T03D3805:207b-24: mngon par dad par byed pas de rnams lha dang
T03D3805:207b-25: mi rnams su skye bar byed pa nas lha nas
T03D3805:207b-26: yang theg pa dman pa la mos pa'i chos bstan
T03D3805:207b-27: pas mngon par dad par byed pas mi rnams su
T03D3805:207b-28: skye bar byed pa nas ji srid du nyan thos
T03D3805:207b-29: kyi byang chub kyi bar la 'god par byed do
T03D3805:207b-30: zhes pa ni 'gro ba rnams zhi ba'i phrin las
T03D3805:207b-31: so // gang yang mi rnams la nang dang phyi
T03D3805:207b-32: rol gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa rnams dang 'jig
T03D3805:207b-33: rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi
T03D3805:207b-34: sbyin pa rnams kyi don spyod pa dang /
T03D3805:207b-35: don mthun pa rnams kyis slob par byed do zhes
T03D3805:207b-36: pa ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'god pa'i
T03D3805:207b-37: phrin las so // kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
T03D3805:207b-39: rnam par byang ba ni de dag 'gags pa'i rang bzhin /
T03D3805:207b-40: de yang gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i
T03D3805:207b-41: shes pas so zhes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs
T03D3805:207b-42: pa dang rnam par byang ba shes pa la 'god
T03D3805:207b-44: dper na sgyu ma mkhan gyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dngos po sprul te /
T03D3805:207b-45: de yang 'jig rten pas de thams cad rdzas med pa'o zhes mi shes te /
T03D3805:207b-46: gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:207b-47: la spyod pa des rang gi ngo bo stong pa
T03D3805:207b-48: nyid dang ro gcig pa nyid du phung po la
T03D3805:207b-50: don dam par ni sems can yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:208a-0: btags pa'i chos rnams ni ngo bo nyid med pas so zhes pa ni @208a * //
T03D3805:208a-1: sems can gyi don la ji lta ba bzhin du bdag nyid 'god pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:208a-2: de sbyin pa sbyin par byed cing gzhan rnams kyang sbyin pa la 'god par byed pa ni /
T03D3805:208a-3: de bzhin du tshul khrims srung bar byed ces pa
T03D3805:208a-4: la sogs pa'i tshig gis ni de ltar pha rol
T03D3805:208a-5: tu phyin pa drug la 'god pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:208a-6: // de dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang
T03D3805:208a-7: dag par blangs so zhes pa la sogs pa ni
T03D3805:208a-8: sangs rgyas kyi lam la 'god pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:208a-9: // // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos rnams te /
T03D3805:208a-10: de rnams kyi 'khor gsum dang 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid du bstan cing /
T03D3805:208a-11: de de rnams kyi ji srid du bla na med
T03D3805:208a-12: pa'i byang chub rtogs par 'gyur gyi bar sgom par
T03D3805:208a-14: stong pa nyid la mngon par 'god pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:208a-15: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid la
T03D3805:208a-16: rang bzhin gyi stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang
T03D3805:208a-17: rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces pa ni gnyis
T03D3805:208a-18: su med pa'i chos la 'god pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:208a-19: // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T03D3805:208a-20: 'das rnams kyis chos gang yang don dam par ma
T03D3805:208a-21: // dmigs la / kun rdzob tu ni chos rnams
T03D3805:208a-22: mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa ste
T03D3805:208a-23: // dmigs la / / phung po khams la sogs
T03D3805:208a-24: pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T03D3805:208a-25: dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs
T03D3805:208a-26: pa'o zhes pa ni brda can gyi ye shes la
T03D3805:208a-28: gal te pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:208a-29: chos rnams la de rnams kyi 'khor gsum dang 'bras
T03D3805:208a-30: bu nye bar mi dmigs dang de yang dag par
T03D3805:208a-31: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par nus so zhes pa ni
T03D3805:208a-32: dmigs pa med pa la 'god pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:208a-33: // gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab
T03D3805:208a-34: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems
T03D3805:208a-35: can rnams don dam par dmigs su med pa de
T03D3805:208a-36: ltar na yang kun rdzob tu sems can la lta
T03D3805:208a-37: // ste / sems can rnams ni dngos por mngon
T03D3805:208a-38: par zhen nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba
T03D3805:208a-39: // ste / ste / de de rnams kyis te
T03D3805:208a-40: spong ba'i phyir theg pa gsum po rnams kyis yongs
T03D3805:208a-41: su smin par byed do zhes pa ni sems can
T03D3805:208a-42: yongs su smin pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:208a-43: de pha rol tu phyin pa re re la sogs
T03D3805:208a-44: pa la spyod pa'i dkar po'i chos rnams la sems
T03D3805:208b-1: chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob par byed
T03D3805:208b-2: do zhes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la
T03D3805:208b-4: de de ltar stong pa nyid la yongs su brtags
T03D3805:208b-5: te chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid la stong
T03D3805:208b-6: pa nyid du mngon par zhen par mi byed cing
T03D3805:208b-7: sbyin pa la sogs pa la spyod par byed la
T03D3805:208b-8: de rnams dang de'i 'bras bu rnams la bzlog par
T03D3805:208b-9: bya'o zhes pa ni mngon par zhen pa thams cad
T03D3805:208b-10: spong ba la 'god pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:208b-11: byang chub nyid ni lam la lam nyid ni byang chub ste /
T03D3805:208b-12: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas su
T03D3805:208b-13: 'gyur te de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
T03D3805:208b-14: yongs su rdzogs pas gang du byang chub rtogs par
T03D3805:208b-15: 'gyur te de nyid gshegs pas so zhes pa ni
T03D3805:208b-16: byang chub thob pa la 'god pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:208b-17: // de phung po dang khams la sogs pa'i chos
T03D3805:208b-18: thams cad kyi 'du shes kyi gnas ngan len bzlog
T03D3805:208b-19: cing rang dang gzhan rnams pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:208b-20: la sogs pa'i dge ba rnams thams cad la 'god
T03D3805:208b-21: // de / de'i dge bas rang dang gzhan rnams
T03D3805:208b-22: rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rang gis sangs rgyas kyi
T03D3805:208b-23: zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba
T03D3805:208b-24: dang smon lam 'debs par byed do zhes pa ni
T03D3805:208b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba la 'god
T03D3805:208b-27: de ltar sems dang po bskyed pa can gyi byang
T03D3805:208b-28: chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3805:208b-29: tu nges la nges pa ji ltar na ngan 'gror
T03D3805:208b-31: gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas /
T03D3805:208b-32: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:208b-33: la spyod pa de la ni mi khom pa brgyad
T03D3805:208b-34: mi srid do // de lta na ni ji ltar dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su skye na /
T03D3805:208b-35: des zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med
T03D3805:208b-36: pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pas sems
T03D3805:208b-37: can gyi don du skye ba la dbang bas bsams
T03D3805:208b-38: bzhin du len gyi dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor
T03D3805:208b-39: ba rnams myong ba ni ma yin no //
T03D3805:208b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa ni mchog la dbang ba nyid
T03D3805:208b-42: du thob pas 'jig rten gyi khams rnams thams cad
T03D3805:208b-43: kyi rdul phra rab kyi dkyil 'khor du rab tu
T03D3805:208b-44: zhugs nas / cig car du mtha' yas pa'i bdag
T03D3805:208b-45: gi lus gzhan gyi don du sprul bar byed do
T03D3805:208b-46: zhes pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
T03D3805:208b-47: la nges par 'god pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:209a-0: de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig @209a * //
T03D3805:209a-1: rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams ni sems can
T03D3805:209a-2: rnams kyi don byed kyang gos pa med de stong
T03D3805:209a-3: pa nyid la gnas nas dkar po'i chos rnams thams
T03D3805:209a-5: chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid las gzhan na
T03D3805:209a-6: med pas so zhes pa ni gzhal du med pa'i
T03D3805:209a-7: sems can gyi don la dgod pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:209a-8: // des 'di ltar bstan par bya ste /
T03D3805:209a-9: gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung
T03D3805:209a-10: g'i bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gang
T03D3805:209a-11: de rnams thams cad kyang rang gi ngo bos stong
T03D3805:209a-12: pa ste / gal te de stong pa nyid du
T03D3805:209a-13: ma gyur na de phyogs gcig par 'gyur bas de'i
T03D3805:209a-14: chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo zhes
T03D3805:209a-15: pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:209a-16: pa ste / gnas shing / mngon par shes pa
T03D3805:209a-17: drug mngon par bsgrubs nas de ltar yang phyogs bcu'i
T03D3805:209a-18: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sems can rnams
T03D3805:209a-19: kyi don skad cig ma gcig la 'gro ba drug
T03D3805:209a-20: gi sems can gyi gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i
T03D3805:209a-21: kha dog tu sprul pa rnams kyis yang dag par
T03D3805:209a-23: lha la sogs pa nyan thos dang byang chub sems
T03D3805:209a-24: dpa'i 'khor ji srid du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3805:209a-25: khams grangs med pa rnams la sprul pa'i dbyangs kyis
T03D3805:209a-27: dbyangs des kyang rnam pa du ma'i chos rnams ston par byed la /
T03D3805:209a-28: gzhan sprul pa rnams la byed du 'jug pa'am /
T03D3805:209a-29: nam mkha' la yang chos ston pa'i sgra 'byung bar
T03D3805:209a-30: byed pas yul dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang
T03D3805:209a-31: bzhon pa dang gos dang rin po che la sogs
T03D3805:209a-32: pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa sems can gyi don
T03D3805:209a-33: du sprul pa de rdzu 'phrul gyis phyogs bcu'i de
T03D3805:209a-34: bzhin gshegs pa rjes su nye bar song ba de
T03D3805:209a-35: rnams la bsnyen bkur byed cing de rnams la chos
T03D3805:209a-36: mnyan nas dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan skyed par byed
T03D3805:209a-37: de / mngon par zhen pa ni mi byed de /
T03D3805:209a-38: stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3805:209a-39: de'i lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3805:209a-40: rnams kyi sems can rnams mthong nas rdzu 'phrul gyis
T03D3805:209a-41: mngon par shes pas der song nas khyab bdag thob
T03D3805:209a-42: par byas nas de rnams la chos ston par byed
T03D3805:209a-43: do // lha'i rna bas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams
T03D3805:209a-44: la chos nyan cing 'dzin par byas nas de rnams
T03D3805:209b-0: sems kyi rnam grangs @209b shes shing sems can rnams
T03D3805:209b-1: kyi spyod pa shes nas ji ltar sems pa de
T03D3805:209b-2: la de bstan pa rnams kyi chos ston par byed
T03D3805:209b-3: de / des rnam pa du ma'i bdag nyid kyis
T03D3805:209b-4: sngon gyi gnas dang gzhan dag gis rjes su dran
T03D3805:209b-5: pa nas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang
T03D3805:209b-6: chos kyi rjes su dran nas de'i gdul bya'i sems
T03D3805:209b-7: can rnams la ston par byed do //
T03D3805:209b-8: de'i zag pa shes pa'i bdag nyid dang gzhan gyi
T03D3805:209b-9: nyon mongs pa zad nas ji srid du chos rnams
T03D3805:209b-10: thams cad ni chos rnams thams cad kyis stong ngo
T03D3805:209b-11: zhes pa'i bar du yang dag pa ji lta ba
T03D3805:209b-12: bzhin du mkhyen nas sems can rnams la rjes su
T03D3805:209b-13: mthun pa'i chos ston par byed do //
T03D3805:209b-14: gang yang de'i tshig la gnas par mi 'dod pa
T03D3805:209b-15: de rnams kyi mgo bo 'gas pa la sogs pas
T03D3805:209b-16: bsdigs nas bskul ba rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi gsung
T03D3805:209b-18: de'i mngon par shes pa de rnams kyis gang du
T03D3805:209b-19: 'dod par sems can gyi don bdag gis lus 'dzin
T03D3805:209b-20: par byed do // de la bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rjes su chags pa dang /
T03D3805:209b-21: khong khro ba rnams kyis gos pa med de /
T03D3805:209b-22: 'di'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang skye bo so so la kun tu 'byung bar 'gyur la /
T03D3805:209b-23: dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'chi ba yang
T03D3805:209b-24: yod pa ma yin no zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'i
T03D3805:209b-25: sangs rgyas bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i phrin las so
T03D3805:209b-26: // byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gang zhe na /
T03D3805:209b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar te /
T03D3805:209b-28: gal te de rnams la spyod na 'khor gsum du
T03D3805:209b-29: dmigs pa med pas rang dang gzhan la yang dag
T03D3805:209b-30: par rtog par byed pa'i phyir der yongs su sngo
T03D3805:209b-31: bar byed de / gal te 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos yin na /
T03D3805:209b-32: de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin zhe na /
T03D3805:209b-33: de'i phyir gang 'di rnams nyid kyi bag chags kyi
T03D3805:209b-34: mtshams sbyor bar thams cad rab tu spangs par gyur
T03D3805:209b-35: nas / chos thams cad la mngon par byang chub pa na /
T03D3805:209b-36: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ma yin no zhes
T03D3805:209b-37: pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag la 'god pa'i
T03D3805:209b-38: phrin las so // gal te yang chos rnams thams
T03D3805:209b-39: cad don dam par rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong
T03D3805:209b-40: pa ste de ltar na yang kun rdzob tu las
T03D3805:209b-41: yod cing las kyi 'bras bu yod de /
T03D3805:210a-1: rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos rnams shes par ma gyur la /
T03D3805:210a-2: ma shes pas gang zag dang chos rnams su rtogs par byas nas las mngon par 'du byed de /
T03D3805:210a-3: de'i ngan du spyod pa des ngan 'gro gsum du
T03D3805:210a-4: ltung bar byed cing legs par spyad pas ni lha
T03D3805:210a-5: dang mi rnams su skye bar 'gyur la /
T03D3805:210a-6: kha cig gis ni gang zag gi bdag med pa yongs su shes nas bde 'gro dang /
T03D3805:210a-7: ngan 'gro spangs nas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:210a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni /
T03D3805:210a-9: gnyi ga'i bdag med pa shes shing pha rol tu
T03D3805:210a-10: phyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i tshogs rnams yongs
T03D3805:210a-12: rim gyis sa bcu rtogs nas skad cig ma gcig
T03D3805:210a-13: la yang dag par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos
T03D3805:210a-14: rnams thams cad mngon par byang chub nas sangs rgyas
T03D3805:210a-15: bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes pa ni las
T03D3805:210a-16: dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa chud mi za ba la
T03D3805:210a-18: byang chub sems dpa' bden pa'i shes pa rnams kyis mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:210a-19: ji ltar na bden pa bzhi yang ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:210a-20: med pas des chos cung zad kyang bden pa'am mi
T03D3805:210a-22: des chos rnams thams cad stong pa'o zhes mthong bas sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa dang /
T03D3805:210a-24: 'gog pa mngon du byed pa dang lam sgom par
T03D3805:210a-25: byed na bden par dmigs pa'i sems bskyed pa med
T03D3805:210a-26: pa'i chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du mthong
T03D3805:210a-27: ba'i thabs la mkhas pas chos ston par byed do
T03D3805:210a-28: zhes pa ni bden pa bzhi la 'god pa'i phrin
T03D3805:210a-29: las so // byams pas gsol pa /
T03D3805:210a-30: gal te chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo
T03D3805:210a-31: bo nyid ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phung
T03D3805:210a-32: po rnams nas ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi chos
T03D3805:210a-33: rnams kyi bar du bslab par bya la /
T03D3805:210a-34: gal te 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po de
T03D3805:210a-35: nyid brjod du med pa'i dbyings zhes pa rnam par
T03D3805:210a-37: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3805:210a-38: gang brjod du med pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi rgyu bas nye bar dmigs par gyur nas /
T03D3805:210a-39: de 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po'am /
T03D3805:210a-40: gsol pa de ni ma lags so zhes pa dang /
T03D3805:210a-41: byams pa mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T03D3805:210b-0: kun brtags pa'i @210b ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3805:210b-1: rnam par brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3805:210b-2: chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi ngo bo nyid do zhes te /
T03D3805:210b-3: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du kun du brtags pa dang /
T03D3805:210b-5: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:210b-6: de la sgyu ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa nyid
T03D3805:210b-7: yin pa'i phung po lnga rnams la gang du don
T03D3805:210b-8: dam par yod pa nyid dam /
T03D3805:210b-9: med pa nyid dang gnyi ga ma yin pa dang /
T03D3805:210b-10: gzhan yang rtag pa la sogs pa nyid du sgro
T03D3805:210b-11: 'dogs pa de thams cad ni brtags pa'i ngo bo
T03D3805:210b-12: nyid de brtags pa'i rang bzhin no //
T03D3805:210b-13: phung po lnga la sogs pa de rnams kyang sgyu
T03D3805:210b-14: ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa bzhin du kun rdzob
T03D3805:210b-15: tu rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa la skyes
T03D3805:210b-17: de rnams kun rdzob kyi ngo bor gnas shing /
T03D3805:210b-18: brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba ni rnam par brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T03D3805:210b-19: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid do //
T03D3805:210b-20: de rnams nyid kyi phung po lnga la sogs pa
T03D3805:210b-21: rnams la sgyu ma'i skyes bu la sogs pa bzhin
T03D3805:210b-22: pa gang zhig ni rang bzhin nyid kyis don dam
T03D3805:210b-24: rtag par ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ni stong
T03D3805:210b-25: pa nyid dang bdag med pa nyid dang yang dag
T03D3805:210b-26: pa'i mtha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi don dam pa ste /
T03D3805:210b-27: de ni yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid /
T03D3805:210b-29: de ltar yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
T03D3805:210b-30: brtags pa'i ngo bo med pa dang //
T03D3805:210b-31: gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa nyid //
T03D3805:210b-33: mtha' la rtog pa brlag par 'gyur //
T03D3805:210b-35: 'dir gang zhig ji skad du bshad pa'i kun tu
T03D3805:210b-36: brtags pas dngos po la ngo bo nyid du sgro
T03D3805:210b-37: 'dogs par byed de de'i sgro 'dogs pa dgag pa'i
T03D3805:210b-39: brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med do zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:210b-40: gang yang kun rdzob ces pa'i ji skad du bshad
T03D3805:210b-41: pa'i gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid ni med
T03D3805:210b-43: de'i don du gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:210b-44: gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa nyid ces pa'o //
T03D3805:210b-45: gang yang ji skad bshad pa'i 'di ltar mtha' gnyis
T03D3805:210b-46: su brtags pas zhes pas dbu ma sgrub pa la
T03D3805:210b-48: g-yang sa'i gnas na gnas pa'i phyir //
T03D3805:210b-49: brlag par 'gyur ba gsungs pa ni //
T03D3805:210b-51: mtha' la rtog pa brlag par 'gyur //
T03D3805:211a-0: @211a * // 'dir gang zhig de dang der gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid yod par bstan pa dang /
T03D3805:211a-1: dngos po rnams kyi skye ba la sogs pa bstan
T03D3805:211a-2: pa de thams cad ni kun rdzob pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:211a-3: ngo bor skye bo'i dbang du byas nas skrag pa'i
T03D3805:211a-4: gnas yongs su spang ba'i don du ste /
T03D3805:211a-5: byis pa rnams gzhug pa la dgongs nas gsungs pa nyid du rig par bya'o //
T03D3805:211a-6: don dam par ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:211a-7: mdo sde rnams la de bkag ste ji skad du 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las /
T03D3805:211a-8: blo yis rnam par phye byas nas //
T03D3805:211a-9: gzhan dbang med cing kun brtags med //
T03D3805:211a-10: grub pa'i ngo bo yod min na //
T03D3805:211a-11: ji ltar blo ni rnam brtags min ;
T03D3805:211a-12: / ngo bo nyid dang rnam shes dang //
T03D3805:211a-13: dngos po dang ni gnas med de //
T03D3805:211a-14: rtog ge ngan pa'i dbang gyur pa'i //
T03D3805:211a-15: byis pa rnams kyis 'di rnams brtag / ces gsungs te /
T03D3805:211a-17: stong nyid bdag nyid gcig dngos la //
T03D3805:211a-18: sems kyis 'di rnams brtags pa ste //
T03D3805:211a-19: brtags pa dang ni gzhan dbang dang //
T03D3805:211a-20: de bzhin yongs su grub nyid de //
T03D3805:211a-21: ma skyes pas na chos rnams ni //
T03D3805:211a-22: stong pa nyid ces rab tu bsgrags //
T03D3805:211a-23: phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na //
T03D3805:211a-24: chos rnams thams cad ces su brjod //
T03D3805:211a-26: de ltar na don dam par ro gcig pa'i kun
T03D3805:211a-27: rdzob kyi ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid med
T03D3805:211a-28: pa'i phyir tha dad pa dang tha mi dad pa
T03D3805:211a-29: dang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang rtag pa dang
T03D3805:211a-30: chad pa la sogs pa gnyis kyi sgro btags pa
T03D3805:211a-31: dang bral ba'i dag pa'i gnas skabs kyi phung po
T03D3805:211a-32: lnga ni ji srid nam mkha'i bar du gnas te
T03D3805:211a-33: / de ltar mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam
T03D3805:211a-34: la gnas pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3805:211a-35: dbang thob pa gang zhig thabs la mkhas pas 'khor
T03D3805:211a-37: de 'khor ba 'di yongs su mi gtong la /
T03D3805:211a-38: gang stong pa nyid du yang nye bar mi dmigs
T03D3805:211a-39: pa la rab tu gnas pa nyid de de ni
T03D3805:211a-40: 'di'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su mi gtong
T03D3805:211a-41: ba'o // gsol pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ma lus pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar 'dod /
T03D3805:211a-42: gang gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams thams cad gang
T03D3805:211a-43: yang de rnams kyi stong pa nyid dang gang yang
T03D3805:211a-44: de rnams kyi de ltar dngos po dang dngos po
T03D3805:211a-46: gang yang spros pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:211a-47: 'di rnams su rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ma lus pa'i mtshan nyid do//
T03D3805:211b-1: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos rnams
T03D3805:211b-2: la ji ltar las dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag
T03D3805:211b-3: ces pa la / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T03D3805:211b-4: chos rnams thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du ma shes nas /
T03D3805:211b-5: sems can rnams phyin ci log gis kun nas bslang
T03D3805:211b-6: ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis las byas pas
T03D3805:211b-7: ji ltar las kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur te
T03D3805:211b-8: / de la rtag pa dang bde ba dang bdag
T03D3805:211b-9: dang gzhan gyi phyin ci ma log bzhi ni gang
T03D3805:211b-10: zag la bdag med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs la
T03D3805:211b-11: / / dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni
T03D3805:211b-12: chos la bdag med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs so
T03D3805:211b-13: zhes pa ni phyin ci log spang ba la 'god
T03D3805:211b-15: phyin ci log gi sems can rnams las mngon par
T03D3805:211b-16: 'du byed la des kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur
T03D3805:211b-17: ba ni tha snyad du las dang don dam par
T03D3805:211b-18: ma yin no // dngos po skra'i rtse mo bye
T03D3805:211b-19: bar gshegs pa'i cha shas tsam cung zad kyang yod
T03D3805:211b-20: pa ma yin la gang la gnas pa nyid kyis
T03D3805:211b-21: las byed pa de ni ji ltar rmi lam dang
T03D3805:211b-22: sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin zhes pa ni phyin
T03D3805:211b-23: ci log dang dngos po med pa nyid du shes
T03D3805:211b-24: pa la 'god pa'i phrin las so //
T03D3805:211b-25: gang chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid de bzhin nyid
T03D3805:211b-26: dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:211b-27: pa la de yang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis
T03D3805:211b-28: tha snyad du byed kyi don dam par ni ma
T03D3805:211b-29: yin te / brjod du med pa'i phyir ro zhes
T03D3805:211b-30: pa ni rnam par byang ba la 'god pa'i phrin
T03D3805:211b-31: yin te / las so // gal te yang chos
T03D3805:211b-32: thams cad rmi lam lta bu ste dngos po med
T03D3805:211b-33: pa de ltar na yang de ma shes nas sems
T03D3805:211b-34: can rnams dngos po la mngon par zhen pas las
T03D3805:211b-35: byas nas bde 'gro dang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur
T03D3805:211b-36: yin te / las so // te / de rnams
T03D3805:211b-37: kyi phyin ci log spong ba'i phyir byang chub sems
T03D3805:211b-38: dpa'i tshogs la spyod pa de srid du mngon par
T03D3805:211b-39: byang chub pa'i bar du sems can rnams yongs su
T03D3805:211b-40: smin par byed do zhes pa ni rnam par byang
T03D3805:211b-41: ba'i tshogs la 'god pa'i phrin las so ;
T03D3805:211b-42: / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T03D3805:211b-43: 'di dag nyid ni mngon par rtogs pa ste /
T03D3805:211b-44: gang du gnyis dang gnyis med pa'i spros pa med pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid de /
T03D3805:211b-45: de nyid chos thams cad la de nyid so so'i skye bo dang 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la /
T03D3805:212a-0: de nyid sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang @212a * //
T03D3805:212a-1: chos dkon mchog dang dge 'dun dkon mchog ste /
T03D3805:212a-2: mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir chos nyid la /
T03D3805:212a-3: chos nyid la ni tha dad pa nyid yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3805:212a-4: de ni 'dus byas ma yin la 'dus ma byas pa yang ma yin te /
T03D3805:212a-5: gang 'dus byas kyi khams dang 'dus ma byas gnyi gar ldan pa yang ma yin la /
T03D3805:212a-6: mi ldan pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes
T03D3805:212a-7: pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa tha
T03D3805:212a-8: mi dad do // mi shes pa la 'god pa'i 'phrin las so //
T03D3805:212a-9: rab 'byor chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste /
T03D3805:212a-10: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ma mdzad pa ste /
T03D3805:212a-11: gang yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid des
T03D3805:212a-12: dngos po dang dngos po med pa la mchog tu
T03D3805:212a-13: brtags nas zad pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o
T03D3805:212a-14: zhes pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa la 'god
T03D3805:212a-16: mdzad pa khyab pa nyid du bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:212a-17: chos thams cad la 'khrug pa med pa nyid pas zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:212a-18: mdzad pa'i kun tu spyod pas so //
T03D3805:212a-19: chos thams cad ni phrin las kyi mdzad pa nyi
T03D3805:212a-20: shu rtsa bdun te de 'khrug pa med pa nyid
T03D3805:212a-21: ni gnod byed med pa nyid de des shes nas
T03D3805:212a-22: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na gnas pa'i
T03D3805:212a-23: sems can thams cad la rnam pa thams cad kyis
T03D3805:212a-24: ji ltar snod la rgyun chad pa med pas nam
T03D3805:212a-25: mkha' ji srid bar du rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir
T03D3805:212a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:212a-27: phyin pa la 'khrug pa med pa nyid de de
T03D3805:212a-28: 'dra ba can du rtogs par bya'o zhes pas gsungs
T03D3805:212a-29: pa ni chos kyi sku'i mdzad pa'o //
T03D3805:212a-30: rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid phas kyi ngag la
T03D3805:212a-31: sogs pa rnams ni 'khrug pa med pa'i ngag gi
T03D3805:212a-33: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhes pa ni khyad par gsungs pa'o //
T03D3805:212a-34: de rnams don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid du mthar gyis bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:212a-35: de ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:212a-36: 'dir rgya mtsho ni mu med pa nyid la de
T03D3805:212a-37: ltar phung po lnga rnams rgya mtsho dang 'dra ba
T03D3805:212a-38: ste / de bzhin du phung po'i nang du son
T03D3805:212a-39: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
T03D3805:212a-40: gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa ji srid de
T03D3805:212a-41: rnams thams cad stong pa nyid de /
T03D3805:212a-42: de nas ldan pa yang ma yin bral ba yang ma yin te mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
T03D3805:212b-0: mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes pa la sogs @212b pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-1: de bzhin du nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la sogs pa la yang shes par bya ste /
T03D3805:212b-2: ji srid du mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-3: 'khrug pa med pa ni mi shes pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-4: de ltar zhes pa ni ji ltar 'dod pas mngon
T03D3805:212b-5: par rtogs pa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rnams rgyas
T03D3805:212b-6: par bstan pa de ltar 'dir rjes su tshor bar
T03D3805:212b-7: bya ba'o // rjes su rig par byed pa ni yi ge'i tshogs kyis mnyan par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-8: rnam par dpyod par byed pa ni don gyi khog gis shes par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-9: 'jug pa ni dang bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-10: rtogs par byed pa ni rab tu shes par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-11: sems pa ni rig pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags par byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-12: 'jal ba ni de lta bu nyid des gnod pa med ces pa ste /
T03D3805:212b-13: gang du gnas pa la byis pa nus pa zad
T03D3805:212b-14: nas dub nas myos pa dang brgyal ba 'am 'chi
T03D3805:212b-15: bar 'gyur bas / de la gnas nas gzhan du sems pas de rnams la 'jal bar byed pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-16: ji ltar 'di rnams ni bcom ldan 'das mchog tu
T03D3805:212b-17: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis gzigs pa de ltar
T03D3805:212b-18: bstan pa ste / bdag cag gis 'di las gzhan du mi bsam ste /
T03D3805:212b-19: rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T03D3805:212b-20: nye bar rtog pa ni 'di rnams la de ltar
T03D3805:212b-21: thams cad gcod pa'i phyir 'di lta bu nyid kyis
T03D3805:212b-22: kun du rtog par byed pa'o zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:212b-23: de ltar shin tu the tshom chod nas sgom par byed pa'i sgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:212b-26: zhi gnas lhag mthong la mngon par dga' bas so //
T03D3805:212b-27: ji lta bar yid la byed ce na /
T03D3805:212b-28: gsungs pa ni rgyu thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:212b-31: gzugs zhes pa nas ji srid du rnam par shes
T03D3805:212b-32: pa'i bar zhes pa nyid la sogs pa thams cad
T03D3805:212b-33: kyi spros pa la mngon par zhen pas yid la
T03D3805:212b-34: byed pa thams cad ni rab tu smra ba rnams
T03D3805:212b-35: dang bdud rnams dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyod
T03D3805:212b-36: pa'o // yon tan thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i'o //
T03D3805:212b-37: de ltar mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyis rgyas par bstan nas /
T03D3805:212b-38: de ltar mdor bstan pa ni bstan bcos las /
T03D3805:212b-39: mtshan nyid de yi sbyor ba dang //
T03D3805:212b-40: de rab de yi go rims dang //
T03D3805:212b-41: de mtha' de yi rnam smin ni //
T03D3805:213a-1: gzhan de rnam pa drug / ces te /
T03D3805:213a-2: yang na mdo'i don rnam pa drug ste /
T03D3805:213a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
T03D3805:213a-5: thams cad shes pa nyid dang /

T03D3805:213a-7: pa'i mtshan nyid la rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs
T03D3805:213a-8: pa rtogs pa ni 'di la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'o
T03D3805:213a-9: // rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'di'i rab kyi'o //
T03D3805:213a-10: mthar gyis pa'i mngon par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'di'i go rims so //
T03D3805:213a-11: skad cig ma gcig la mngon par rtogs pa ni sbyor ba 'di'i mthar thug pa'o //
T03D3805:213a-12: chos kyi sku ni 'di'i rnam par smin pa'o //
T03D3805:213a-14: rnam pa gsum ni yul gyi rgyu //
T03D3805:213a-15: sbyor ba bzhi yi bdag nyid dang //
T03D3805:213a-16: chos sku phrin las 'bras bu ni //
T03D3805:213a-17: gzhan du don bsdus rnam pa gsum //
T03D3805:213a-19: yang na mdo'i don ni gsum ste /
T03D3805:213a-22: de la sbyor ba'i rgyu'i yul ni kun mkhyen pa rnam pa gsum la /
T03D3805:213a-23: de'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T03D3805:213a-25: rgyu'i 'bras bu ni chos kyi sku dang phrin las so //
T03D3805:213a-26: 'di las gzhan pa'i rtag par rab tu ngu ba la sogs pa'i le'u gsum ni /
T03D3805:213a-27: go sla ba'i phyir mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi tshig le'u byas pas ma bshad do //

T03D3805:213a-32: gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las rjes su rig pa'i

T03D3805:213a-36: bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par bshad pa gsungs

T03D3805:213a-44: don to // gang la yang smon par mi byed
T03D3805:213a-45: ces pa la sogs pa ni rnam par g-yeng ba
T03D3805:213a-46: don to // dgag pa ste / smon par mi byed pa ni zhen par mi byed pa'o //
T03D3805:213a-47: g-yon phyogs nas dang de bzhin du zhes pa la

T03D3805:213b-0: pa yid la @213b byed pa dgag pa'o //

T03D3805:213b-2: zhes pa ni 'jig par 'gyur bas 'jig pa la
T03D3805:213b-4: mi rtag pa'i gzugs la sogs pa ni 'jig tshogs te /
T03D3805:213b-5: 'jig tshogs ni gang zag tu brtags pa la ste /

T03D3805:213b-29: bsten par zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshig gsum ni

T03D3805:214a-35: khyams rnams kyi ra ba'i bar du gnyi ga gnas byung ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:214a-36: ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa ni de la sna tshogs pas rmad du gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:214a-37: lta bu ni grong dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:214b-31: tu phyin pa ste de la ri mor byed pa

T03D3805:216a-7: mngon par sgrub pa ni sgra sna tshogs pa dang
