T03D3805:216a-10: gzugs la sogs pa'i stong pa nyid las sgrub pa la kun du rmongs pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:216a-11: de ston pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin du tha snyad med de /
T03D3805:216a-12: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin
T03D3805:216a-13: dang gang zag la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i tha snyad
T03D3805:216a-14: du byar med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:216a-15: sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa
T03D3805:216a-16: ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi bdag la
T03D3805:216a-17: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnams kyi sgrib pa las rnam
T03D3805:216a-18: par grol ba'o // rdul dang bral ba ni stong
T03D3805:216a-19: pa nyid la yang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i mngon
T03D3805:216a-20: par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:216a-21: ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang yig 'bru ni ming
T03D3805:216a-22: ni brda la bsam pas rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyin
T03D3805:216a-23: pa la sogs pa ni tshig rnams sam dus la
T03D3805:216a-24: sogs pa'i yig 'brus rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:216a-25: // chos thams cad la lhag mthong ni 'dus byas
T03D3805:216a-26: pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar mthong ba'i phyir ro
T03D3805:216a-27: // // chos thams cad yul dang bral ba ni
T03D3805:216a-28: chos rnams thams cad kyi yul la gzung ba dang
T03D3805:216a-29: 'dzin pa gnyis su yod pa nyid la sogs pa'i
T03D3805:216a-30: phyir ci log tu mi mthong ste /
T03D3805:216a-31: chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:216a-32: chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i mtha' ni
T03D3805:216a-33: 'dus ma byas pa rnams su yang mtshan mar mi
T03D3805:216a-35: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ni chos rnams thams cad
T03D3805:216a-36: la stong pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i nam mkha'
T03D3805:216a-37: dang mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:216a-38: rdo rje lta bu ni chos thams cad stong pa
T03D3805:216a-39: nyid du dmigs pa la rtse gcig pa nyid kyis
T03D3805:216a-40: te / sgrib pa thams cad kyi dben pa po nyid kyis ni rdo rje dang 'dra ba'o //
T03D3805:216a-41: gzugs kyi rdul sel ba ni gzugs kyi rdul bsal
T03D3805:216b-0: ba'i mtshan dang dpe byed kyis 'bar ba'i gzugs @216b
T03D3805:216b-1: kyi sku ste / gang yang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3805:216b-2: phun sum tshogs pas mdzes par byas pa ni phun
T03D3805:216b-3: sum tshogs pa'i mi mthun phyogs kyis gang zag dang
T03D3805:216b-4: chos su sgro 'dogs pa de la med pas phun
T03D3805:216b-5: sum tshogs pas mdzes pa ste /
T03D3805:216b-6: gnyi ga bdag med pa'i dri ma med pas mdzes pa'o //
T03D3805:216b-7: rgyal ba thob pa ni mtshan ma med pa nyid
T03D3805:216b-8: kyis yang dag pa'i chos rnams thams cad stong pas
T03D3805:216b-9: sems can gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa'i rgyal
T03D3805:216b-11: phyir mi ldog pa'i mig rnam pa thams cad kyi
T03D3805:216b-12: chos sgrub pa'i mig la bar chad med pa'i phyir
T03D3805:216b-13: ro// chos kyi dbyings su nges pa ni chos kyi
T03D3805:216b-14: dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid la the tshom gyi phyin
T03D3805:216b-15: ci log dang bral ba'i phyir nges pa brtan pos
T03D3805:216b-17: chos kyi dbyings su nges par 'byung ba ni thugs
T03D3805:216b-18: rje chen pos bsgom pa rnams kyi chos rnams thams
T03D3805:216b-19: cad chos kyi dbyings mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis
T03D3805:216b-21: dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das
T03D3805:216b-22: pa'i mtshan ma'i gnyen po nyid kyis mi gnas pa'i
T03D3805:216b-23: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i dbugs 'byin pa
T03D3805:216b-25: seng ge mngon par sgrogs pa ni rang dang gzhan
T03D3805:216b-26: gyi bya ba'i yang dag pa'i don la lus la
T03D3805:216b-27: sogs pa rtse gcig pas sbyor bas bstan pa la
T03D3805:216b-28: sogs pa'i gnas skabs rnams su skrag pa dang bral
T03D3805:216b-29: ba nyid kyis seng ge bzhin du mngon par sgrogs
T03D3805:216b-30: pa'i phyir ro // sems can thams cad zil gyis
T03D3805:216b-31: gnon pa ni chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin
T03D3805:216b-32: pas bdud la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad zil
T03D3805:216b-34: rdul dang bral ba ni byang chub kyi sems la
T03D3805:216b-35: nga rgyal la sogs pa'i rdul dang bral ba'i phyir
T03D3805:216b-36: ro // kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni
T03D3805:216b-37: ming la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa'i kun
T03D3805:216b-38: nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:216b-39: padma bkod pa ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
T03D3805:216b-40: pa'i chos rnams thams cad la bsam pa dang bral
T03D3805:216b-41: ba nyid kyis yongs su longs spyod kyang nyon mongs
T03D3805:216b-42: par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir padma la chus bzhin no
T03D3805:216b-43: // nem nur gcod pa ni chos thams cad kyi
T03D3805:216b-44: de kho na nyid sgrub pa la thams cad du
T03D3805:217a-2: snying po thams cad kyi rjes su son pa ni
T03D3805:217a-3: byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rnam par dag
T03D3805:217a-4: pa'i snying po'i rjes su son pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-5: chos thams cad la mngon par 'phags pa chos thams
T03D3805:217a-6: cad la yod pa nyid la sogs pa brtags pa
T03D3805:217a-7: rnams par dag pa'i byams pa la sogs pa'i tshad
T03D3805:217a-8: med pa rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir
T03D3805:217a-9: ro // mngon par shes pa dang /
T03D3805:217a-11: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa thob pa ni chos
T03D3805:217a-12: rnams thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i ting
T03D3805:217a-14: chos thams cad nges par 'bigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings so sor 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-15: chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i rgya mtsho ni bla
T03D3805:217a-16: na med pa'i gzhi ste mthong ba las rnam par
T03D3805:217a-17: log pa kun du 'dzin pa ni nyid kyis de
T03D3805:217a-18: rgya mtshor gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-19: chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni chos thams cad
T03D3805:217a-20: kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams kyis 'byor pa
T03D3805:217a-21: ste / srid pa dang zhi bar mi gnas pa'i
T03D3805:217a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa des rgyas btab pas rdzogs
T03D3805:217a-23: pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang dga' ba 'byin
T03D3805:217a-24: ste / par byed pa'o // 'byor ba ni bden
T03D3805:217a-25: pa ma yin pa sgro btags pa dang bral ba'i
T03D3805:217a-26: stong pa nyid de nyid yang dag pa'i kun rdzob
T03D3805:217a-27: kyi ngo bo'i chos rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T03D3805:217a-28: chos thams cad la khyad par med par ston pa
T03D3805:217a-29: ni chos rnams thams cad la gang zag gi bdag
T03D3805:217a-30: med par mnyam par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-31: lta bar 'gyur ba'i thibs po thams cad rnam par spangs pa ni /
T03D3805:217a-32: rtag pa dang chad pa la sogs pa'i lta ba dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-33: mun pa dang bral ba ni brtags pa thams cad
T03D3805:217a-34: kyi mun pa dang 'dres pa bcom pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:217a-35: // chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba
T03D3805:217a-36: ni chos rnams thams cad la mtshan mar sgro btags
T03D3805:217a-37: pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217a-38: chags pa thams cad las grol ba ni phyi dang
T03D3805:217a-39: nang gi chos rnams thams cad la chags pa med
T03D3805:217a-40: pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa la rab tu 'jug
T03D3805:217a-41: pa'o // le lo thams cad dang bral ba ni
T03D3805:217a-42: gnas skabs thams cad du gzhan gyi don bya ba
T03D3805:217a-44: chos zab mo 'od byed pa ni chos thams cad
T03D3805:217a-45: stong pa nyid kyis gdul bar bya ba rnams la
T03D3805:217a-47: ri rab 'dra ba ni spros pa med pa'i shes rab kyis ma g-yos pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217b-0: mi @217b 'phrogs pa'i kun du bzang po'i dngos po rnams las rnam par mi ldog pa'o //
T03D3805:217b-1: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa ni stong
T03D3805:217b-2: pa nyid dang ro gcig pa'i phyir 'dod pa kun
T03D3805:217b-3: la longs spyod kyang zhen pa dang bral bas bdud
T03D3805:217b-4: thams cad rnam par bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217b-5: 'jig rten gsum la mngon par ma zhen pa ni
T03D3805:217b-6: spros pa med pa'i shes rab mngon du byas pas
T03D3805:217b-7: mngon par zhen pa spang ba'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:217b-8: 'od zer sgrub pa ni ma lus pa'i brtags pa'i
T03D3805:217b-9: rtog pas ma gos pa nyid kyis thams cad du
T03D3805:217b-10: bsal ba'i shes rab kyi 'od zer bsgrub pa'i phyir
T03D3805:217b-11: ro // de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba ni de
T03D3805:217b-12: bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku
T03D3805:217b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba ni thun
T03D3805:217b-15: mong ma yin pa'i shes rab kyis ma lus pa'i
T03D3805:217b-16: rang dang gzhan dag la yongs su gsal bar byed
T03D3805:217b-17: pas kun du rmongs pa thams cad dang bral nas
T03D3805:217b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i gnas
T03D3805:217b-20: ting nge 'dzin 'di rnams la drug cu rtsa gnyis nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T03D3805:217b-21: grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams te /
T03D3805:217b-22: ting nge 'dzin de rnams yang mos pas spyod pa'i
T03D3805:217b-23: sa kun du spyod pa na 'phags pa chos 'phags
T03D3805:217b-24: kyi byin gyi rlabs dang rang gi bsod nams dang
T03D3805:217b-25: ye shes kyi stobs las skyes pas rmi lam gyi
T03D3805:217b-26: gnas skabs bzhin du dus de ji srid du mthong
T03D3805:217b-27: ba'o // gang yang dkon mchog sprin las mos pas
T03D3805:217b-28: spyod pa'i sa las grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:217b-29: rnams rtogs par bshad pa de yang dus de srid
T03D3805:217b-31: thams cad du yang ting nge 'dzin rnams rgyun du
T03D3805:217b-32: mthong ba ni kha cig rab tu dga' ba la
T03D3805:217b-33: sogs pa'i sa rnams la ste /
T03D3805:217b-34: rnam pa thams cad nas thams cad du ni bskal
T03D3805:217b-35: pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sangs rgyas kyi sa
T03D3805:217b-36: la ste / thabs la mkhas pa ni rab tu
T03D3805:217b-37: dga' ba'i sa la yang grangs med pa'i ting nge
T03D3805:217b-38: 'dzin rnams dus de srid du mthong ba'o //
T03D3805:217b-39: gang 'dir 'di dag gis bstan par rab tu mthong
T03D3805:217b-40: ba de nyid na sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro
T03D3805:217b-41: zhes pa'i thal 'gyur de ni yid 'phrog pa ma
T03D3805:217b-42: yin te / gal te thabs la mkhas pas thams
T03D3805:217b-43: cad du mthong bar gyur kyang de rnams kyi de
T03D3805:217b-44: lta na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyi rab tu spang
T03D3805:218a-0: bar bya ba'i dri ma rnams kyis gsal @218a *
T03D3805:218a-1: yin te / // ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang
T03D3805:218a-2: shin tu ring du 'phro ba'i rab kyi mthar ma
T03D3805:218a-3: phyin pa'i phyir na de nyid du sangs rgyas su
T03D3805:218a-5: de de rnams la zhes pa ni de mos pas
T03D3805:218a-6: spyod pa'i sa la gnas par byed pa ni 'di
T03D3805:218a-7: rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rim gyis skye ba rnams
T03D3805:218a-8: la gnas shing / ting nge 'dzin gzhan gyi yon
T03D3805:218a-9: tan sngon gyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su ma btang
T03D3805:218a-11: phyogs bcu'i 'dir zhes pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten te /
T03D3805:218a-12: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:218a-13: sangs rgyas zhes pa ni sa bcu pa las rab
T03D3805:218a-14: tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa la sangs rgyas
T03D3805:218a-15: brgya la sogs pa mthong zhes gsungs pa nges par
T03D3805:218a-17: 'dir ni gdams pa po de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
T03D3805:218a-18: gyi rlabs dang 'phags pa chos 'phags kyi mthus mos
T03D3805:218a-19: par spyod pa'i sa pas grangs med pa'i de bzhin
T03D3805:218a-20: gshegs pa mthong bar gyur to //
T03D3805:218a-21: 'gro ba zhes pa ni 'gro ba ni khong khro ba med pa des thob pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-22: bslabs pa ni bslab pa rnams thob pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-23: de'i byas pa ni gang nyid sngon des byas pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-24: gsung bar bya ba ni sems kyis dran par bya'o //
T03D3805:218a-26: de'i gdung ba ni mgo rdebs pa'o zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:218a-27: mi dga' ba ni mya ngan gyis so //
T03D3805:218a-28: yongs su gdung ba ni yid mi dga' ba'o //
T03D3805:218a-29: mi g-yo ba nas brtsams nas zag pa zad pa'i
T03D3805:218a-30: mngon par shes pa srid kyang rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:218a-31: du ma lus pa ni sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o
T03D3805:218a-32: zhes pa ni sa bcu'i dbang phyug chos 'phags la
T03D3805:218a-33: mngon par shes pa lngar bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-36: yon tan bzhin du legs par sems pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-37: rnyog pa med pa ni dad pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-38: de'i yon tan rnams la ngo mtshar ba ni ri mor byed pa'o //
T03D3805:218a-39: mngon par dga' ba ni gus pa nyid do //
T03D3805:218a-40: des zhes pa ni bdag gi lus dus yun thung ngur btsongs pa'i rin gyis so //
T03D3805:218a-41: mngon par shes pa yod par srid kyang de'i rin
T03D3805:218a-42: gyis chos nyan pa don du gnyer ba nyid ni
T03D3805:218a-43: mngon par shes pa la longs spyod pa'i dran pa
T03D3805:218a-45: tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa rnams kyang
T03D3805:218a-46: chos tshol ba la so sor spro ba dang ldan
T03D3805:218a-47: pas so // dga' ba'i sems zhes pa ni dga' ba des sems sbyangs pa'o //
T03D3805:218b-0: de las nyis 'gyur du dga' bar @218b 'gyur ba'i phyir rab tu dga' ba'i sems so //
T03D3805:218b-1: sbyin par bya ba zhes pa ni chos la mchod
T03D3805:218b-2: pa don nga gnyer bas bar chad du yang ma
T03D3805:218b-3: brtsis pa'o // rgyu rnams kyis ni gnod pa'o //
T03D3805:218b-4: yon tan gyi rigs ni mi rnams dang thun mong
T03D3805:218b-5: gi yon tan la khyad par ni mi las shin
T03D3805:218b-7: bzod pa ni rang gi bya ba 'dod pa'i phyir yang ngo //
T03D3805:218b-8: yul can ni de la ma zhen ba'o //
T03D3805:218b-9: spros pa ni spong ba can du'o //
T03D3805:218b-10: skad cig dang thang cig la nye bar len pa
T03D3805:218b-11: ni nyin pa po rnams kyi dad pa'i bye brag
T03D3805:218b-12: go // bla ma zhes pa ni bla ma'i rgyu mtshan no //
T03D3805:218b-13: rol mo ni rang bzhin gyi rol mo'i bye brag go //
T03D3805:218b-14: rab tu mang ba ni bye brag mang po'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:218b-15: rnyed par dka' ba ni don dam pa ste rgya chen po'i don to //
T03D3805:218b-16: chings ma bdun gyi mdud pa bdun la rang gi ming gi rgya rnams kyis rgyas btab pa'o //
T03D3805:218b-17: thogs pas ni snyim pas so //
T03D3805:218b-18: gsal zhes pa ni khyad par lhan cig mthong ba'i phyir te /
T03D3805:218b-19: byed pa ni lhan cig tu mtha' zhes pa'i don to //
T03D3805:218b-20: rtag par rab tu ngu ba nye bar mtshon pa'i le'u'o //
T03D3805:218b-21: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:218b-22: brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od
T03D3805:218b-23: ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung
T03D3805:218b-24: gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las le'u sum cu pa'o
T03D3805:218b-26: / // / de skad ces smras pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa ste ;
T03D3805:218b-27: stong pa nyid kyi rnam grangs rnams ni rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba tha dad de /
T03D3805:218b-28: nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha' dang de bzhin nyid chos mthun pa nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:218b-29: 'o na mtshan la sogs pas rnam par mdzes pa'i
T03D3805:218b-30: sku de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin nam zhe na
T03D3805:218b-31: / gsungs pa ma yin zhes te /
T03D3805:218b-32: de bzhin nyid la shin tu rnam par dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
T03D3805:218b-33: de ni de'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku'o //
T03D3805:218b-34: de bzhin gshegs pa dang dbyer med par gsungs nas /
T03D3805:218b-35: shin tu dbyer med par bstan par 'dod nas gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:218b-36: gang yang zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:218b-37: 'di rnams kyi de bzhin nyid la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:218b-38: dang chos thams cad de phung po dang khams la
T03D3805:218b-39: sogs pa rnams kyi gcig ces pa ni mdor bstan
T03D3805:218b-40: pa'o // yang gcig ces pa ni rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T03D3805:218b-41: 'dir nyi ma gung gi dus ni de'i tshe 'ong ba'o //
T03D3805:219a-0: mngon par chags pa zhes pa ni byed pa po stong pa ste zhes pa @219a * //
T03D3805:219a-1: ni don gyis rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi phyir ro //
T03D3805:219a-2: chos kyi sku zhes pa ni ngo bo nyid med
T03D3805:219a-3: pa'i sku ste kun rdzob tu ni gzugs sku las
T03D3805:219a-4: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i tha snyad med pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-5: glang po'i tshogs zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs ni 'dus pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-6: yongs su rdzogs pa ni yang dag pa'i don to //
T03D3805:219a-7: brdzun du smra ba dang chos mthun pa ni slu ba po nyid pas so //
T03D3805:219a-8: 'di gsungs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:219a-9: don yod pa ni sbyin par byed pa'i 'bras bu che ba'i phyir te /
T03D3805:219a-10: lus yongs su grub pa ni srid pa'i mchog 'dzin pa nyid do //
T03D3805:219a-11: gang du yang 'gro ba med pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus su ste ;
T03D3805:219a-13: 'go ba ni gang du yang yod pa ma yin pas so //
T03D3805:219a-14: sngon gyi spyod pa ni sngon gyi lam gyi gnas
T03D3805:219a-15: skabs kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams dang
T03D3805:219a-16: ye shes kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sbyor
T03D3805:219a-17: ba'o // rgyu ni nye ba len pa'i rgyu ste
T03D3805:219a-18: snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi tshogs kyi shugs
T03D3805:219a-20: rkyen ni lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu ste /
T03D3805:219a-21: de ni 'dir gdul bar bya ba'i sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba du ma ste /
T03D3805:219a-22: de gnyi ga'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi tshogs la ni dgu ste /
T03D3805:219a-23: de'i rgyas par bshad pa ni sngon gyi phrin las rnam par smin pas zhes pa ste /
T03D3805:219a-24: sngon gyi dge ba la rjes su gnas pa khyad
T03D3805:219a-25: par du gyur pa rab kyi mthar son pas yongs
T03D3805:219a-27: kha cig dag ni sgra ni nye bar len pa ni sgra'i rdul phra rab bo zhes so //
T03D3805:219a-28: rlung gi rdul phra rab ces pa ni gzhan dag gi'o //
T03D3805:219a-29: pi wang ni rgyud dgus dkris pa can no //
T03D3805:219a-30: nye ba'i sbra ni gtso bo ma yin pa'i rgyud la'o //
T03D3805:219a-31: rgyu med pa ma yin pa ni sgra'i'o //
T03D3805:219a-32: dkrogs pa ni kun du bskyod pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-33: sba bkong bar gyur ba ni grib ma yang med pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-34: slar yang the tshom mi 'jug go zhes pa ni
T03D3805:219a-35: the tshom spangs pas nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi
T03D3805:219a-36: mthong ba'i lam gyis rab tu spang bar bya ba'i
T03D3805:219a-37: nyon mongs pa spangs nas bdag nyid kyis mthong ba'i
T03D3805:219a-38: lam rtogs par gsal bar bya'o //
T03D3805:219a-39: mngon par bkab ces pa ni de'i mdun du lus thams cad sa la phab pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-41: gang bdag ni gang du bdag rjes su bslabs pa ni rjes su byed pa'o //
T03D3805:219a-42: lha'i ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
T03D3805:219b-0: sems gzhan du gyur pa ni sa'i chag chag gis kha phyir @219b phyogs pa'o //
T03D3805:219b-1: 'di snyam du ni so sor brtag pa'o //
T03D3805:219b-2: glags pa ni go skabs so //
T03D3805:219b-3: lhag par gnas pa ni mi byed pa'o //
T03D3805:219b-4: yongs su tshol ba ni rtsol ba'o //
T03D3805:219b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
T03D3805:219b-6: ji ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni de yang chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa de dang /
T03D3805:219b-7: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
T03D3805:219b-8: gang du chos rnams thams cad ni rang gi mtshan
T03D3805:219b-9: nyid rnams kyis dben pas 'dir de yang rang gi
T03D3805:219b-10: mtshan nyid rnams kyis dben pas so //
T03D3805:219b-11: gang chos rnams thams cad dben pa las mi g-yo
T03D3805:219b-12: bas te de'i yang dben pa las mi g-yo ba'o
T03D3805:219b-13: // chos rnams thams cad cung zad rlom sems med
T03D3805:219b-14: pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir la de'i
T03D3805:219b-16: dben pa dang ni mi g-yo ba de la gang gis kyang khengs par byed pa med de /
T03D3805:219b-18: rang bzhin gyis dben pa ni bstan pa ste des de yang bstan pa nyid de /
T03D3805:219b-19: de de bzhin nyid dang ro gcig pa'i chos rnams
T03D3805:219b-20: thams cad ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis med pa'i
T03D3805:219b-21: phyir te / de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
T03D3805:219b-22: mu ni sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag
T03D3805:219b-23: la chos rnams thams cad la de med pa ste
T03D3805:219b-24: / 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag med pa'i phyir te de'i phyir mu med pa nyid do //
T03D3805:219b-25: de bzhin nyid du de yang ngo //
T03D3805:219b-26: don dam par chos thams cad la ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:219b-27: med pas de'i phyir skye bar 'gyur ba med pa'i
T03D3805:219b-28: sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin te /
T03D3805:219b-29: de'i phyir skye ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:219b-30: de bzhin du de yang ngo //
T03D3805:219b-31: 'gag pa med pa ni de med pa'i phyir la de bzhin du de yang ngo //
T03D3805:219b-32: nam mkha' mu med pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum rnams su'o //
T03D3805:219b-33: de ltar des phyogs bcu dus gsum pa'i chos rnams
T03D3805:219b-34: stong pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro
T03D3805:219b-35: // phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3805:219b-36: rnams ni mu med pa'i rgya mtsho rnams kyis gang
T03D3805:219b-37: zhing de bzhin nyid dang gang yang chos rnams thams
T03D3805:219b-38: // cad kyi dang / gang yang shes rab kyi
T03D3805:219b-39: pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid de
T03D3805:219b-40: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i
T03D3805:219b-41: // cad kyi dang / phyir ro // ji ltar
T03D3805:219b-42: nam mkha' cung zad rnam par mi rtog ste ci
T03D3805:219b-44: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:219b-45: pa ste ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir dang rnam
T03D3805:219b-46: par rtog pa'i pha rol tu son pa'i phyur ro
T03D3805:219b-47: // nam mkha' bzhin du gzugs kyi phung po mu med pa nyid de /
T03D3805:220a-1: gzhan du gzugs med pa de la mu med pa'am snang ba med pa ste /
T03D3805:220a-2: de bzhin du de'i de bzhin nyid snang bar byed
T03D3805:220a-3: pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
T03D3805:220a-5: ji ltar rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes
T03D3805:220a-6: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa
T03D3805:220a-7: nyid du rnam par shes pa de ltar sems can
T03D3805:220a-8: mtha' yas pa rnams kyi tshor ba dang /
T03D3805:220a-18: rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa yang bshad par bya'o //
T03D3805:220a-19: rnam par shes pa'i phung po mu med pa nyid
T03D3805:220a-20: dang rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa dag
T03D3805:220a-21: gi khyad par gang zhe na /
T03D3805:220a-22: phung po dang khams kyi sgra dag gis sbyor ba byas pa'o //
T03D3805:220a-23: sems 'dzin pas chos te ting nge 'dzin la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin te /
T03D3805:220a-24: de la ni gang chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid de /
T03D3805:220a-25: de bzhin du de la chos rnams thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas so //
T03D3805:220a-26: chos thams cad kun tu tha mi dad pa dbye
T03D3805:220a-27: bas tha mi dad pa ni 'byed pa po rnams
T03D3805:220a-28: kyi rang gi mtshan nyid rnams med pa'i phyir te
T03D3805:220a-29: / de bzhin du de la yang tha dad pa med pa'o //
T03D3805:220a-30: chos thams cad cung zad kyang dmigs su med de /
T03D3805:220a-31: gzugs kyi phung po bems po'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:220a-32: lhag ma rnams kyang bdag nyid dang gzhan du 'dzin pa nyid du sbyor ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:220a-33: dmigs pa yang med pa ste /
T03D3805:220a-34: 'dzin pa po med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:220a-35: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dmigs pa med pa ste /
T03D3805:220a-36: dmigs par mi gyur ba'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:220a-37: de las ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir de rnams
T03D3805:220a-38: kyis de la yang nye bar dmigs pa med pa
T03D3805:220a-39: nyid de / kun rdzob tu ma brtags na nyams
T03D3805:220a-40: dga' ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni tha dad
T03D3805:220a-41: nyid de / du'o // rnams par mi 'jigs pa ni gzhan la tshig rnams kyi ston pas te /
T03D3805:220a-42: de ni de rnams kyis de'i phyir mi 'jigs pa ste /
T03D3805:220a-43: de rnams mnyam pa nyid pas so //
T03D3805:220a-44: de bzhin du gang zhig gi dmigs pa thams cad
T03D3805:220a-45: kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de'o
T03D3805:220a-46: // 'dod pa ni bya ba ste chos thams cad
T03D3805:220a-47: la ji ltar gang yang gang du yang skye bar
T03D3805:220a-48: // mi 'gyur la / kun rdzob tu 'di'i rkyen
T03D3805:220a-49: nyid tsam gyis 'di las 'di 'byung ba'i med na
T03D3805:220a-50: 'di mi 'byung ba ni re zhig pa'i rgyu dang
T03D3805:220a-52: don dam pa la ni 'di mi 'dod de /
T03D3805:220b-0: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa @220b pa yang ngo //
T03D3805:220b-1: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir dang bsam
T03D3805:220b-2: gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
T03D3805:220b-3: tu phyin pa yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T03D3805:220b-4: rig par bya zhes pa ni chos thams cad mnyam
T03D3805:220b-5: pa nyid la sogs pa'i tshig rnams dang 'brel te
T03D3805:220b-6: / mthar gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3805:220b-7: de nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:220b-8: gang zhig rim pa'i gang zhig rnam pa thams cad
T03D3805:220b-9: kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan
T03D3805:220b-10: pa des de ltar ting nge 'dzin sum cu skyes
T03D3805:220b-11: pa ste / de la chos thams cad mnyam pa
T03D3805:220b-12: nyid la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin
T03D3805:220b-14: ji ltar 'di rnams kyi rnam pa ni bye brag
T03D3805:220b-15: 'di rnams kyi dngos po shes pa'i phyir na ji
T03D3805:220b-16: skad du bshad pa'i gzhi shes pa'i zhes pa la
T03D3805:220b-17: sogs pa de ji ltar na dmigs pa ni de
T03D3805:220b-18: nyid kyi gzhi dang ldan pas so //
T03D3805:220b-19: yang na chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la sogs
T03D3805:220b-20: pa nyid la dmigs pa la dmigs pa'i phyir te
T03D3805:220b-21: ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces brjod do
T03D3805:220b-22: // dngos po la gnas nas rnam pa ji lta
T03D3805:220b-23: ba'i mtshan ma med pa la sogs pa brgya stong
T03D3805:220b-24: 'bum phrag gis sa dang po rtogs la /
T03D3805:220b-25: ting nge 'dzin brgya stong thob ces pa'i sa bcu'i
T03D3805:220b-26: tshig ni 'di rnams kyis nye bar mtshon pa ste
T03D3805:220b-27: / cung zhig nges par brgya thob pa nyid la
T03D3805:220b-28: ma nges pa ni brgyad las mang bar gzhan yang
T03D3805:220b-29: rmi lam gyi gnas skabs bzhin du dus re bzhin
T03D3805:220b-30: du ting nge 'dzin so sor nang ngo zhes pa
T03D3805:220b-32: chos 'phags kyis mtshon pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o /
T03D3805:220b-34: // / de thob ma thag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:220b-35: tshul ni mngon par rtogs pa brgyad do //
T03D3805:220b-36: ming ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'o //
T03D3805:220b-37: rnam grangs 'dis kyang zhes pa ni rtag par rab tu ngu ba'i byung tshul 'dis kyang ngo //
T03D3805:220b-38: de lta bas na zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:220b-39: rjes su bstan pa'i sgra'i bar gyis ni yongs su gtad pa dang po'o //
T03D3805:220b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis zhes pa
T03D3805:220b-41: ni des bar du gcod pa bzlog pa'i phyir dang
T03D3805:220b-42: / rjes su bstan pa ni yongs su gtad pa ste /
T03D3805:220b-43: ji ltar 'di nyan pa la sogs pa rgyun mi
T03D3805:220b-44: 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar khyod kyis zhes pa'i
T03D3805:220b-45: don to // 'di la gsungs pa ni 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:220b-46: de ci'i phyir zhes pa la sogs pa ni yongs su gtad pa gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:221a-1: 'di las ni kun du bstod pa'o //
T03D3805:221a-2: sku 'di las ni gleng bslang ba gcig la yongs su gtad pa gnyis pa'o //
T03D3805:221a-3: gang du gsungs pa'i lan gnyis lan gsum du yang
T03D3805:221a-4: zhes pa ni yongs su gtad do ni gtod pa
T03D3805:221a-5: byed pa'o // rjes su gtad do ni rjes su mthun pas gtad pa'o //
T03D3805:221a-6: skyes bu tha ma zhes pa ni ma gus pa'o //
T03D3805:221a-7: ci'i phyir 'di bdag gi dngos po bzhin du gus par bya zhes gsungs pa ni /
T03D3805:221a-8: ji srid du zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:221a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs zhes pa ni gang du
T03D3805:221a-10: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3805:221a-11: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag gi mu med
T03D3805:221a-12: pa'i yon tan rnams dang ngo bo nyid kyi yang
T03D3805:221a-13: rgyu yin pas na 'dir mchog tu gus par bya
T03D3805:221a-14: bar rigs zhes pa la dgongs pa de'i yang rgyu
T03D3805:221a-15: dang 'bras bu'i gnas skabs dag gi yon tan gyi
T03D3805:221a-16: che ba mdo sde mtha' yas la mang po bstan
T03D3805:221a-17: pa de'i zhad tsam brjod pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T03D3805:221a-18: ma la shin tu yang dag pa'i khyad par bskyed
T03D3805:221a-19: pa'i phyir te / de ltar yang 'phags pa dkon
T03D3805:221a-20: mchog brtsegs pa las tshogs kyi sa la dang po
T03D3805:221a-21: dang bdun pa'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
T03D3805:221a-22: ye shes kun du skyed par byed pa thams cad
T03D3805:221a-23: rnam par rtog pa med pas yang dag par bskyed
T03D3805:221a-24: cing mnyam pa'i sems kyis sems can rnams thams cad
T03D3805:221a-25: kyang de'i ye shes la rab tu sbyor bar byed
T03D3805:221a-26: pa'i phyir te / / des byang chub sems dpa' de la yang sngon du sangs rgyas mthong /
T03D3805:221a-27: lha stobs dang ldan par 'gyur bas spro ba skyed par byed kyi /
T03D3805:221a-28: rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa'i dgra bcom pa rnams la ni ma yin te /
T03D3805:221a-29: de'i sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyud mi gcad par gnas par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
T03D3805:221a-30: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las kyang /
T03D3805:221a-31: rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'i sems bskyed pa dang
T03D3805:221a-32: po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa'i phan yon
T03D3805:221a-33: gsungs pa ni sems bskyed pa dang bcas pas sems
T03D3805:221a-34: can thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur zhing bla
T03D3805:221a-35: mar gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing pha dang 'dra
T03D3805:221a-36: ba ste / bsod nams rab tu bskyed pa rnams
T03D3805:221a-37: kyang gegs med pa yongs su 'dzin cing gang gis
T03D3805:221a-38: bsrungs shing de la ma zhen pas gnyid log pa
T03D3805:221a-39: dang bag med pa na yang sdig sbrul dang gnod
T03D3805:221a-40: sbyin dang mi ma yin pa de na gnas pa
T03D3805:221b-0: rnams kyis tho @221b 'tshams par mi nus so //
T03D3805:221b-1: yongs su 'jug pa'i skye bo de la bsod nams kyis nang nyung bar 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:221b-2: skye bar gnod pa med par 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:221b-3: 'di'i dran pa brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro //
T03D3805:221b-5: gzhan gyi lag tu 'ongs kyang mi 'grub pa'i sems
T03D3805:221b-6: can rnams kyi yams dang nye bar 'tshe ba dang
T03D3805:221b-7: log 'dren ma rungs pa'i sngags kyi tshig dang rig
T03D3805:221b-8: pa'i tshig rnams de'i lag tu song bas 'grub par
T03D3805:221b-9: 'gyur na / grub pa rnams la lta ci smos la /
T03D3805:221b-10: gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gnas pa der
T03D3805:221b-11: 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba dang mu ge'i skyon
T03D3805:221b-12: dang mi ma yin pas byas pa'i nye bar 'tshe
T03D3805:221b-13: ba rnams mi 'byung zhing byung na yang nye bar
T03D3805:221b-15: gal te brgya lam na dmyal ba dang ngan 'gro'i
T03D3805:221b-16: sa rnams su skye ba na yang der yang de
T03D3805:221b-17: tsam gyis shin tu myur bar gyur pas grol bar
T03D3805:221b-18: 'gyur ro // dmyal ba rnams su sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chung bar gyur pa dang /
T03D3805:221b-19: shin tu myur bar yid 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur
T03D3805:221b-20: zhing sems can de rnams la snying rje chen po'i
T03D3805:221b-21: sems skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
T03D3805:221b-22: yum chen mor yang mos pas spyod pas byang chub
T03D3805:221b-23: sems dpa'i snying rje phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing
T03D3805:221b-24: gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten
T03D3805:221b-25: gyi khams ji snyed kyi dmyal ba dang /
T03D3805:221b-26: dud 'gro dang yi dags la sogs pa'i sems can
T03D3805:221b-27: rnams rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis kun du snang
T03D3805:221b-28: bar byas nas sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byas
T03D3805:221b-29: nas kyang sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i lha dang mi
T03D3805:221b-30: rnams su skye bar byed de /
T03D3805:221b-31: sangs rgyas la sogs pa yid la byed pa nyan
T03D3805:221b-32: du bcug nas de yid la byas pas de rnams
T03D3805:221b-33: ngan 'gro rnams las byung nas yang dag par rdzogs
T03D3805:221b-34: pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa dang rjes su
T03D3805:221b-35: mthun par sbyor ba yongs su bzung nas /
T03D3805:221b-36: pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa rnams
T03D3805:221b-37: kyang rgyun mi 'chad par lhag par 'phel bar 'gyur
T03D3805:221b-38: zhing rab tu dga' ba'i sa byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3805:221b-39: gnon par gyur nas byis pa'i skye bo thams cad
T03D3805:221b-40: dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das
T03D3805:221b-41: par 'gyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par
T03D3805:221b-43: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mi gcod kyi mthong ba'i lam la'o zhes gsungs so //
T03D3805:222a-0: skad cig ma gcig gis ting nge 'dzin @222a * //
T03D3805:222a-1: brgya thob cing snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
T03D3805:222a-2: sangs rgyas brgya mthong ba dang /
T03D3805:222a-3: de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par shes
T03D3805:222a-4: la 'jig rten gyi khams brgya g-yo ba dang kun
T03D3805:222a-5: du snang bar byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
T03D3805:222a-6: brgyar 'gro zhing sems can brgya smin par byed pa
T03D3805:222a-7: dang / bskal pa brgyar gnas shing sngon gyi mtha'
T03D3805:222a-8: dang phyi ma'i mtha' la rab tu 'jug cing chos
T03D3805:222a-9: zhal brgyas rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa
T03D3805:222a-10: dang / dang / lus brgyar ston par byed do //
T03D3805:222a-11: lus re re la byang chub sems dpa' brgya'i 'khor kun tu ston par byed ces gsungs te /
T03D3805:222a-12: sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag la 'jug
T03D3805:222a-13: par 'gyur ba ni sems can rnams sdig pa las
T03D3805:222a-14: bzlog pa'i bdag por byas nas las kyi 'gro ba
T03D3805:222a-16: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa ni rang gi blo
T03D3805:222a-17: yongs su smin pa'i don du chos kyi rnam grangs
T03D3805:222a-18: rnams kyi don sems par byed ces pa'o //
T03D3805:222a-19: thams cad du brgya bzung ba ni nges par 'gyur ba nyid kyis so //
T03D3805:222a-20: thabs la mkhas pas ni grangs med de /
T03D3805:222a-21: grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba ni tshogs kyis nas kyang ngo //
T03D3805:222a-22: 'di rnams kyi yang grangs nges pa dang ma nges

T03D3805:224b-26: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis yongs su smin pa dang
T03D3805:224b-27: / sems can yongs su smin pa'i sems can thams

T03D3805:224b-29: / ba'i phyir ro // byams pa chen po'i stobs
T03D3805:224b-30: kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su sbyor
T03D3805:224b-31: ba rjes su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro //

T03D3805:224b-33: chos nyid kyi stobs kyis ni sgyu ma lta bu

T03D3805:225a-1: // bcu'i bar gyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i

T03D3805:225a-20: dag par brjod pa kun tu gsungs pas sems bde
T03D3805:225a-21: ba skyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
T03D3805:225a-22: thams cad la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa
T03D3805:225a-23: dang / bsnyen bkur la rab tu zhugs pa dang /
T03D3805:225a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la shes par byed par 'gyur zhing /
T03D3805:225a-25: byang chub sems dpa' de'i yang lus thams cad kyi yan lag las 'od zer rnam par spros nas /
T03D3805:225a-26: bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa'i phyogs bcu'i nam
T03D3805:225a-27: mkha'i mtha' klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi
T03D3805:225a-28: dkyil 'khor rnams snang bar byas nas steng gi bar
T03D3805:225a-29: snang la 'od zer chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
T03D3805:225a-30: du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
T03D3805:225a-31: mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ba la rab tu 'jug
T03D3805:225a-32: par byed do // ji srid du phyogs bcu ma
T03D3805:225a-33: lus pa'i chos kyi khams kyi khongs su gtogs pa'i
T03D3805:225a-34: me tog la sogs pa dang /
T03D3805:225a-35: gdugs dang na bza' dang rin po che'i rgyan la
T03D3805:225a-36: sogs pa'i brtags pa rnams kyis 'jig rten thams cad
T03D3805:225a-37: kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i sna tshogs
T03D3805:225a-38: pa'i bkod pa'i rin po che la sogs pa'i char
T03D3805:225a-39: gyis / re re bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T03D3805:225b-0: 'khor @225b gyi dkyil 'khor la sprin bzhin du rab
T03D3805:225b-2: de'i rjes la de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhabs kyi 'og tu nub par gyur nas /
T03D3805:225b-3: der yang phyogs bcu'i mthas gtugs pa'i rab 'byam gyi
T03D3805:225b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams kye grangs med pa'i byang chub
T03D3805:225b-5: sems dpa' ji snyed pas sa dgu pa la rab
T03D3805:225b-6: tu gnas pa rnams 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'
T03D3805:225b-7: de la yang dag par mchod par byas nas lta
T03D3805:225b-8: bar byed cing ting nge 'dzin stong phrag bcu la
T03D3805:225b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi smin mtshams kyi
T03D3805:225b-11: mdzod spu nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mngon
T03D3805:225b-12: par shes pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od
T03D3805:225b-13: zer la grangs med pa'i 'od zer gyis yongs su
T03D3805:225b-14: bskor ba rnams kyis phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig
T03D3805:225b-15: rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams kun du snang bar
T03D3805:225b-16: byed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa
T03D3805:225b-17: kun tu ston cing grangs med pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3805:225b-18: dpa' rnams yang dag par bskul zhing 'ongs nas /
T03D3805:225b-19: byang chub sems dpa' de'i lus kyi mchog de la
T03D3805:225b-20: snun par 'gyur la de'i 'khor gyi 'od zer ni
T03D3805:225b-21: 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbu la
T03D3805:225b-23: de ni byang chub sems dpa' ye shes chen pos mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes brjod do /
T03D3805:225b-24: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam
T03D3805:225b-25: gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par thar
T03D3805:225b-26: pa'i sgo thob par gyur to //
T03D3805:225b-27: rang gi smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pas de'i rnam
T03D3805:225b-28: pa sna tshogs pa'i skus skad cig ma gcig la
T03D3805:225b-29: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rnams
T03D3805:225b-30: kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi
T03D3805:225b-31: 'jig rten gyi khams su spros pa'i dge ba'i bdud
T03D3805:225b-32: rtse'i rgyun rnams kyi char gyis bsam pa ji ltar
T03D3805:225b-33: bar sems can rnams kyi thog ma med pa'i dus
T03D3805:225b-34: can gyi mi shes pa las kun du byung ba'i
T03D3805:225b-35: nyon mongs pa'i rdul kun 'bar ba rnams thams cad
T03D3805:225b-36: zhi bar byed pas sa 'di la chos kyi sprin
T03D3805:225b-37: zhes brjod la ; de srid kyi 'jig rten gyi
T03D3805:225b-38: khams rnams dang dga' ldan du gnas pa nye bar
T03D3805:225b-39: bzung nas ji srid du yongs su mya ngan las
T03D3805:225b-40: 'das pa chen po'i bar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T03D3805:225b-41: thams cad kyi mdzad pa la lhag par gnas te
T03D3805:225b-42: zhes brjod la ; / grangs med pa'i 'jig rten
T03D3805:225b-43: gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi ji snyed pa
T03D3805:226a-1: lus du ma skad cig ma gcig la sprul pa'i
T03D3805:226a-2: lus re re la de snyed kyi phyag rnams dang
T03D3805:226a-3: / de snyed kyi dbu dang dbu re re zhing de snyed kyi ljags ston par byed la /
T03D3805:226a-4: phyag re res gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed
T03D3805:226a-5: kyi me tog rnams thogs shing de rnams kyis sangs
T03D3805:226a-6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gtor bar byed cing
T03D3805:226a-7: / de bzhin du bdug pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T03D3805:226a-8: ji snyed kyi na bza' dang gdugs dang rin po che la sogs pa rnams kyi bkod pas so //
T03D3805:226a-9: ljags de rnams kyis sangs rgyas de rnams kyi bstod
T03D3805:226a-10: pa gsungs shing sems kyi skad cig re re la
T03D3805:226a-11: phyogs bcur spros nas song bas mngon par byang chub
T03D3805:226a-12: pa'i bkod pa nas ji srid du yongs su mya
T03D3805:226a-13: ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar gyi bkod pa
T03D3805:226a-14: byin gyis brlabs nas ji snyed kyi zhal gyis phyogs
T03D3805:226a-15: re re mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi
T03D3805:226a-16: khams g-yo bar byed pa dang /
T03D3805:226a-17: ri rab chen po la sogs pa'i ri du ma
T03D3805:226a-18: skra nyag mas bcings nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal
T03D3805:226a-19: du med par 'phen par byed kyang sems can de
T03D3805:226a-20: rnams la skrag par byed pa med do //
T03D3805:226a-21: de ltar de la sogs pa'i grangs med pa'i ting
T03D3805:226a-22: nge 'dzin 'phel zhing mngon par shes pas rnam par
T03D3805:226a-23: rol par mngon par ston par byed do //
T03D3805:226a-24: de skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i
T03D3805:226a-25: lha'i rgyal po mnga' bdag tu yang de nyid du
T03D3805:226a-26: gyur nas sems can rnams pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T03D3805:226a-27: gdams ngag rnams la bkod par 'dod pa de ltar
T03D3805:226a-29: gang gi phyir skad cig ma gcig la phyogs bcur
T03D3805:226a-30: bgrang ba las 'das pa'i rdul phra rab ji snyed
T03D3805:226a-31: pa de snyed kyi ting nge 'dzin so sor thob
T03D3805:226a-32: cing de snyed kyi sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur zhing
T03D3805:226a-33: / de rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs shes par 'gyur ba dang /
T03D3805:226a-34: de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams g-yo bar 'gyur
T03D3805:226a-35: zhing kun tu snang bar byed pa dang de snyed
T03D3805:226a-36: kyi zhing du 'gro zhing de snyed kyi sems can
T03D3805:226a-37: rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /
T03D3805:226a-38: de snyed kyi bskal par gnas shing sngon gyi mtha'
T03D3805:226a-39: dang phyi ma'i mtha' yang 'jug par 'gyur zhing de
T03D3805:226a-40: snyed kyi chos kyi sgo rab tu rnam par 'byed
T03D3805:226a-41: par 'gyur zhing de snyed kyi sku rnams ston par
T03D3805:226a-42: mdzad cing sku re re la yang de snyed kyi
T03D3805:226a-43: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor du ma rnams dang /
T03D3805:226a-44: rang gi sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas bgrang ba
T03D3805:226b-0: las 'das pa'i @226b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das te
T03D3805:226b-1: re re zhing gzhal du med pa'i byang chub sems
T03D3805:226b-2: dpa'i 'khor rnams dang skad cig re re la gzhan
T03D3805:226b-3: dang gzhan du yang ston par byed la /
T03D3805:226b-4: gdul bar bya ba nyid brtags pa la kun tu
T03D3805:226b-5: spyod pas de las gzhan pa'i lha dang mi la
T03D3805:226b-6: sogs pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa'i 'gro ba lnga'i
T03D3805:226b-7: 'khor ba rnams la tha dad pa'i brgya byin dang
T03D3805:226b-8: tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa
T03D3805:226b-9: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs
T03D3805:226b-10: pas gdul bar bya ba'i sems can rnams 'dul ba
T03D3805:226b-11: nyid la lhun gyis grub pas brgya byin la sogs
T03D3805:226b-12: pa'i gzugs su kun tu gnas nas chos ston par
T03D3805:226b-13: byed do // de lta bu 'di'i yon tan mdor bsdus nas bstan pa ste /
T03D3805:226b-14: ji skad du kye rgyal ba'i sras rnams de lta
T03D3805:226b-15: bu nyid kyis de bzhin du re zhig chos kyi
T03D3805:226b-16: sprin gyis bskal pa grangs med par bstan par byas
T03D3805:226b-17: kyang phyogs gcig tsam bstan par 'gyur na /
T03D3805:226b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T03D3805:226b-19: de yang kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gal te phyogs
T03D3805:226b-20: bcu'i phyogs re re'i phyogs kyi mu med pa'i 'jig
T03D3805:226b-21: rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i
T03D3805:226b-22: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su de ltar sa thob
T03D3805:226b-23: pa'i byang chub sems dpas gang bar gyur cing de
T03D3805:226b-24: rnams kyis mu med pa'i bskal par mngon par bsgrubs
T03D3805:226b-25: pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas mngon par bsgrubs
T03D3805:226b-26: pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la gnas
T03D3805:226b-27: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi skad cig ma
T03D3805:226b-28: gcig la ji srid bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
T03D3805:226b-29: brgya stong gi char yang grangs su bgrang bar yang
T03D3805:226b-30: nas ji srid du dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod
T03D3805:226b-32: de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rnams ni
T03D3805:226b-33: kun du 'od la rnam pa thams cad rnams yongs
T03D3805:226b-34: su dag pa mthar phyin par gang de rnams thams
T03D3805:226b-35: cad du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi
T03D3805:226b-36: khyab pa'i ye shes kyi yul rnams dang de la
T03D3805:226b-37: cig shos kyi yon tan mtha' dag dang ldan pa'i
T03D3805:226b-38: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang tha mi
T03D3805:226b-39: dad pa gnas pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
T03D3805:226b-40: su gnas pa'i mgon med pa'i 'gro ba rnams la
T03D3805:226b-41: rnam pa thams cad kyis snod ji lta ba la
T03D3805:226b-42: rgyun mi 'chad pas nam mkha' ji srid du rab
T03D3805:226b-43: tu 'jug cing mgon du gyur te /
T03D3805:227a-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams nyid kyis @227a * //
T03D3805:227a-1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi shes
T03D3805:227a-2: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid kyi
T03D3805:227a-3: ba spu re re'i bu ga nas dpe byad dang
T03D3805:227a-4: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang stobs dang mi 'jigs
T03D3805:227a-5: pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la
T03D3805:227a-6: sogs pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams kyis yongs
T03D3805:227a-7: su bcad pa'i mthu rnams mngon par 'dzin pa ni
T03D3805:227a-8: rang gi ye shes kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab
T03D3805:227a-9: pas bskal pa grangs med par tshe byin gyis brlabs
T03D3805:227a-10: nas de ltar myur ba myur bar phrin las gzhal
T03D3805:227a-12: gal te mngon par brjod kyang de lta na yang yon tan yongs su rdzogs par mi nus na /
T03D3805:227a-13: sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang snga nas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ltar /
T03D3805:227a-14: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mthar thugs pa shes pa'am /
T03D3805:227a-15: mngon par brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos pa
T03D3805:227a-16: gang 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni bdag cag ma
T03D3805:227a-17: rig pa'i rab rib kyi mun par gyur pa ji
T03D3805:227a-18: lta ba rnams shin tu lkog tu 'gyur bas de
T03D3805:227a-19: bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mngon par brjod pa'i skabs
T03D3805:227a-21: de lta na yang 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs
T03D3805:227a-22: pa la brten nas the tshom bzlog pas bdag cag
T03D3805:227a-23: gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis shes
T03D3805:227a-24: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid
T03D3805:227a-25: kyi mthu'i yon tan phyogs gcig gi zhad tsam mngon
T03D3805:227a-26: par brjod kyang / byis pa rnams ni rang bzhin
T03D3805:227a-27: yon tan gyis dbul zhing mos pas bcom pas thos
T03D3805:227a-28: kyang de lta bu'i yon tan kun tu 'phel ba
T03D3805:227a-29: la blos ma mos la de'i chos la mkhas pa
T03D3805:227a-30: rnams kyis ni yang rkang dang dpyi la zhes pa
T03D3805:227a-31: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:227a-32: phyin pa dang de'i ngo bo rnams dang de'i rgyu'i
T03D3805:227a-33: ngo bo dang de gnyi ga'i mngon par brjod pa
T03D3805:227a-34: po la mngon par rab tu brten par 'gyur ro
T03D3805:227a-35: par brjod kyang / // de la phan pa ni
T03D3805:227a-36: des dad pa tsam dang yang mngon par rab tu
T03D3805:227a-37: ldan na ma nges pa'i rnam par smin pa rnams
T03D3805:227a-38: kyi sdig pa rnams kyi phung po myong bar mi
T03D3805:227a-39: 'gyur zhing lha rnams dang mi rnams kyi phun sum
T03D3805:227a-40: tshogs pa rjes su myong bar gyur nas de'i rjes
T03D3805:227a-41: la dngos po dang dngos po med pa la mngon
T03D3805:227a-42: par zhen pa'i rtsa ba can gyi phyir ma lus
T03D3805:227a-43: pa'i nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun
T03D3805:227a-44: nas nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rab tu 'byung ba'i de'i
T03D3805:227b-0: gnyen por gyur pa gcig pa nyid kyis @227b *
T03D3805:227b-1: par brjod kyang / // // legs pa'i grong khyer
T03D3805:227b-2: du rab tu 'jug cing gnas par byed pa ji
T03D3805:227b-3: skad du bshad pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3805:227b-4: phyin pa sgom par byed pa 'di nyid du don
T03D3805:227b-5: du gnyer ba rnams kyi ring du spang bar byas
T03D3805:227b-6: pa ni ma lus pa'i lam ngan pa la dka'
T03D3805:227b-7: ba'i rnam par rtog pa la dga' ba'o //
T03D3805:227b-8: de ltar lung dang rigs pa rnams kyi sgron mas
T03D3805:227b-9: gsal bar byas pa ni gang zhig bdag nyid chen
T03D3805:227b-10: po rnams kyis gsal bar byas pa'i phyir dang /
T03D3805:227b-11: ma lus pa'i skye bo rnams kyi ded dpon dpa' bo rnams gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa'i phyir /
T03D3805:227b-12: de nyid bdag nyid kyis nges par ston par 'dod
T03D3805:227b-13: pa rnams kyis blo dam pa mkhas pa las nges
T03D3805:227b-14: par byas pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma'i gnad kyi zla
T03D3805:227b-15: ba'i 'od la thos pa dang bsam pa dag la
T03D3805:227b-16: mchog tu gus pa'i gnas su byas nas gus pa
T03D3805:227b-17: dang bcas pa yun ring por ma bral zhing shes
T03D3805:227b-18: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas tshogs
T03D3805:227b-19: la sogs pa'i sa non nas rim gyis bla na
T03D3805:227b-20: med pa'i byang chub kyi pha rol tu son nas
T03D3805:227b-22: bcom ldan 'das ma'i rdzogs pa gsal bar bya ba'i phyir sdud par byed pa pos smras pa ni /
T03D3805:227b-23: de skad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T03D3805:227b-24: de skad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T03D3805:227b-25: pa'i mdo sde rin po che gsungs pa dang ldan
T03D3805:227b-26: pa ste / ston pa pos bla na med pa'i
T03D3805:227b-27: chos bstan pas dga' bar gyur nas nyan pa pos
T03D3805:227b-28: kyang gsungs pa la mngon par bstod pa'o //
T03D3805:227b-29: 'jig rten ni tshogs te byang chub sems dpa' la
T03D3805:227b-30: sogs pa dang lha la sogs pa dang bcas pa
T03D3805:227b-32: yongs su gtad pa'i mngon par brjod pa'i le'u'o //
T03D3805:227b-33: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T03D3805:227b-34: brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa gnad kyi zla ba'i 'od
T03D3805:227b-35: ces bya ba pandi ta chen po 'jigs med 'byung
T03D3805:227b-36: gnas sbas pas mdzad pa las yongs su gtad pa'i
T03D3805:227b-37: le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o /
T03D3805:227b-39: // / rin chen phung por skye bo phal chen rin chen rnyed par 'gyur min zhing //
T03D3805:227b-40: ma rtogs brgyus nas ji ltar yang ni rin chen blo yis mkha' la sgrogs //
T03D3805:227b-41: nang gnas yon tan rin chen rang bzhin 'di ni bdag gis kun 'byin pa'i //
T03D3805:227b-42: phrag dog med pa de yis rtag tu mkhas rnams brgyan par gyis //
T03D3805:227b-43: stong nyid thub pas rgyas btab phun sum tshogs pa yi //
T03D3805:228a-0: mtshon bya'i gnas kyi lam ldan mun pa @228a * //
T03D3805:228a-2: 'phags pa'i gsung gi nyi ma'i 'od zer dang //
T03D3805:228a-3: ldan kyang mi 'bral rnams kyis mthong ma yin //
T03D3805:228a-4: yum gyi rab 'dod che mchog gsal bar bsgrags pa las thob pa'i //
T03D3805:228a-5: bsod nams rnams kyis de lam 'bras bu 'gro bas bgrod 'gyur phyir //
T03D3805:228a-6: bdag gis dpag med yum gyi yon tan rab tu gsal byas pa'i //
T03D3805:228a-7: 'tsho ba'i rgyags byin sgrib med phun sum tshogs gyur
T03D3805:228a-8: cig / bde gshegs gsung dang bla ma bsnyen bkur
T03D3805:228a-10: 'grel pa byed pa 'jigs med kyis ni snying rjes byas pa 'di //
T03D3805:228a-11: phyogs rnams ma lus mi mthun phyogs las rgyal nas ji srid du //
T03D3805:228a-12: 'gro ba thub pa'i sku gsung thugs kyis spro ba'i
T03D3805:228a-13: bar du gsal gyur cig /'phags pa shes rab kyi
T03D3805:228a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa brgya stong pa'i 'grel ba
